story:
Short Summary

Have you ever see a great outfit idea on Instagram, Pinterest, Facebook, etc, and think why can't I buy this whole outfit, it's all so cute!!! Well, we feel the same way you do. We LOVE fashion, but hate the hours of shopping around for that flawless ensemble. So we decided to do something about it, thus Valerie Rune was born. Instead of tirelessly searching the internet for different pieces to create the perfect outfit, we are willing to do the work for you. Valerie Rune will provide ready-made outfit packages of all different styles for you to purchase on our retail website. Your package may include a top, a bottom, jewelry, outerwear, and a handbag (ALL IN ONE PACKAGE). Packages will range from as low as $25 to $100. Shopping has just been made EASY. But startup costs are necessary for this online store to begin, so please we need your help to make this dream into a reality!!! 

Christina Boyd was born and raised in the fashion capital of the world, New York. She enjoys fashion, reading, music and classic movies. She moved to California to obtain her Master's degree in Business and get a new outlook on fashion. 
-Sheereen Charles was born and raised in the fashion capital of the world, New York. She enjoys art, fashion, food and music. She moved to Florida to obtain her Associates in Business as well as as her Bachelor's in Fashion Management.

Sheereen Charles and Christina Boyd met in high school and their shared passion for fashion gave birth to Valerie Rune.

The Impact

We want to make a meaningful change in the fashion world. It is valuable to the contributor because you help make it possible to get your dream ensemble, supplemented with accessories, wholly packaged and ready for purchase, 

Risks & Challenges

Since we are a small company, our challenge would be growing too fast with limited manpower. We will overcome this by expanding our human resources, if the demand is exponential. Seeing that we possess degrees in Business Management and Fashion Management, we have the know-how to accomplish this.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that everyone can't provide financial support..That's OK! You can still get the word out, make some noise, share our page. You can still make this company happen!

story:
THE PERKS

CHLOE

Bikini with sliding triangle top and extra wide waistband bottom

Choose your options:  same color strings, contrast color strings, same color waistband, contrast color waistband

Choose your bottom:  traditional bikini (full coverage), Brazilian (minimal coverage), and thong (‘nuff said)


MIA

Bikini with halter top and sliding side-tie bottom

Choose your options:  same color chest tie, contrast color chest tie, same color waistband, contrast color waistband

Choose your bottom:  traditional bikini (full coverage), Brazilian (minimal coverage), and thong (‘nuff said)


LAYLA

Bikini with twisted bandeau top and sliding double waistband bottom

Choose your options:  same color waistband, contrast color waistband

Choose your bottom:  traditional bikini (full coverage), Brazilian (minimal coverage), and thong (‘nuff said)


EMMA

Monokini with scrunchy halter straps and ties behind back for security

Choose your bottom:  traditional bikini (full coverage), Brazilian (minimal coverage), and thong (‘nuff said)


AVA
Monokini with V-neck, tank top-style armholes, cutout sides, and ties in back for extra security

Choose your bottom:  traditional bikini (full coverage), Brazilian (minimal coverage), and thong (‘nuff said)


HANNAH

Swim Coverup with halter neckline and asymmetrical hem

It’s a convertible!  Wear it many different ways!  Or choose the Sarong-Style version for more traditional wear.


Our Story

We started Brazilia because we wanted to change the fashion world by creating a swimwear brand for smart, witty, creative women who aren’t afraid to speak their minds.  Too often women are criticized for everything they do from trying to be a good mother and housewife to trying to be a good boss.  We thought it was time to turn the tables around!  We wanted to create a brand that celebrates women and reflects our values:  excellent quality, elegant appeal, and enthusiasm to make the world a better place.


Why Brazilia?

First, we asked ourselves:  Can we create premium quality swimwear that’s comfortable, sustainable, uniquely-designed, AND sexy?

The answer is a resounding YES!
1. Premium Quality means using the softest nylon, spandex, and lace we can find.

2. Comfortable meaning your new Brazilia swimsuit will stay put, even when you go surfing or do yoga!

3. Sustainable means each Brazilia swimsuit was made with love by a single mother or female head-of-household.  Brazilia aims to empower women that currently provide financial support for their families, and to help restore their sense of dignity and purpose instead of that all-too-familiar feeling of helplessness. Of course, we do try to source the best eco-friendly materials too!

4. Uniquely-designed means we partner with awesome artists to create unique prints and add unexpected details to our products like continuously-customizable features and quotes on the inside of our non-reversible garments (we will make reversible ones in the near future!).

5. Sexy means exactly that, sexy!  We all know that we can get all of the above, but at the sacrifice of looking and feeling sexy.  Now, we don’t have to give that up!


Brazilia Does Good

Next, we asked ourselves:  How can we build a brand that does good?  To us, that means two things:  doing good for the women who buy our products and doing good for the entire world.

First, we decided that every woman deserves to smile.  So, we put quotes inside our swimsuits!  That’s right, quotes!  Think of it as our sexy little secret, OK?

Then, we decided we wanted to change women’s lives for the better.  Through our program, Swimwear For Hope, Brazilia trains and employs single mothers to sew.  All of our garments are made by women who are single mothers or female heads-of-households.  So, with every Brazilia purchase your make, you’re contributing to giving a single mother a job.


That’s great, but what else?

We believe in giving back to the community.  10% of profits from every swimsuit purchase will support a charitable cause listed at the bottom of this campaign.  We ask that you pick a cause that you’re passionate about, let us know what it is, and 10% of that sale goes to that cause.  Simple as that!


Our Swimwear

Our Signature Bikinis and Monokinis include your choice of 12 colors and 9 design options:

3 designs of bikini tops ~ halter, sliding triangle, or twisted bandeau

3 designs of waistbands ~ extra wide, sliding side ties, or sliding double

3 designs of bottoms ~ bikini, Brazilian, or thong

MIX ‘N MATCH OUR BIKINI TOPS AND BOTTOMS TO YOUR HEART’S DESIRE!

2 designs of monokinis ~ scrunchy halter or V-neck with cutout sides

Our monokinis also come with bottom choices (bikini, Brazilian, or thong).

Current available sizes:  S, M, L.  If we can raise enough funds, we want to expand to include XS and XL, which will be available at a later date.


Your Color Options:


Our Packaging

Your purchase comes in beautiful gift-wrapped packaging when one of your rewards includes a swimsuit.  We know how much you want to protect your new swimsuit, so we’ll include a free lingerie wash bag with every swimsuit purchase!


Why we’re raising money

We put in some of our own cash to start producing our first collection, but we need to raise just a little bit more to finish our collection.  We’d like to expand our range of sizing to include as many women as possible.  This is where you come in.


Other Ways To Help

We understand that some people aren’t able to make a contribution, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help.  Ask your family and friends to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, and check out our Social Media Bonus above!


Your Charitable Cause Choices:

Breast Cancer Research Foundation:  seek new prevention methods and treatments

V-Day:  end violence against women and girls

Save The Children:  health care for pregnant women and infant vaccinations

Women’s Funding Network:  general fund that distributes grants to smaller women’s nonprofits

The White House Project:  nonpartisan organization to put more women in leadership positions

Dress For Success:  provide interview suits and career development to low-income women

Challenged Athletes Foundation:  support athletes with physical challenges

National Partnership For Women and Families:  protect against sexual harassment at work

RAINN:  rape, abuse, and incest national network

Polaris Project:  end human trafficking in USA and abroad

AmeriCares:  humanitarian aid for disaster relief

WildAid:  end illegal wildlife trade so our children can see wildlife in their lifetimes


Why we’re raising money

We put in some of our own cash to start producing our first collection, but we need to raise just a little bit more to finish our collection.  We’d like to expand our range of sizing to include as many women as possible.  This is where you come in.


Please Help Spread The Word!



Social Media Bonus!

Please share our campaign using the IndieGogo Share Tools, or email to your friends.  We’d be extremely grateful, and we’ll show you just how much!  In efforts to boost this IndieGogo campaign, whenever you make any social media posts, use the social media links just below the video, and we’ll give you an (almost) instant shoutout on Twitter and Facebook!


Other Ways To Help

We understand that some people aren’t able to make a contribution, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help.  Ask your family and friends to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign and check out our Social Media Bonus above!


Our Guarantee

We hope it’s love-at-first-wear when you put on your new swimsuit!  If you’re unhappy with your purchase for any reason, including fit, we want to make it right.  Simply let us know what happened, and we’ll swap it for a new swimsuit.  Just pay for shipping and we’ll send another one out!  Please limit one swap per person.


Risks and Challenges

We’ve already made part of our collection, and your contribution will help us complete it.  We know that we’ll be able to manufacture and fulfill your reward with your help.  Should there be any production delays, or if an item(s) becomes sold-out due to high demand, we will provide a credit for a different item and/or fulfill your item at a later date.  If enough orders come in, we may need to expand production.  We dearly value the relationship we have with our customers, and will keep you updated on our progress every step of the way!


We have very high standards for our products, so we pride ourselves on delivering sparkling customer service and an overall fabulous experience!


Any questions?  Please drop us a line at sales @ BraziliaSwim.com.


Thanks for your support and for checking out Brazilia Swimwear!

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

How do I choose my size, color, and charity?

We’ll send you a link at the end of the campaign where you can specify which sizes, colors, and charities you want.  Your options are shown above.

What are the washing instructions?

Preferably hand wash and hang dry.  Or, machine wash cold with like colors and tumble dry low.  Brazilia swimwear performs best when washed and dried without the use of fabric softeners.

I forgot to add international shipping.  What do I do?

Don’t worry!  We’ll be in touch at the end of the campaign to sort it all out.

Can I change my shipping address if I move?

Yes, we’ll reach out to everyone 30 days prior to shipping your swimsuit to confirm your address and make any necessary changes.  Please message us if your email changes as we’ll be using that to contact you.

When will my PERK be delivered?

We will send out gift certificates immediately at the end of the campaign so that they are with you in time for the beginning of summer.  All of the swimsuits will be delivered by the end of June.

Why is delivery not the normal 3 weeks?

Delivery is longer than the normal proposed length as these are our first production orders.

If I want to buy something, what do I do?

Click on the PERK that you want and choose to pay for that perk or give a donation.  You can then pay with PayPal or a credit card.  Please be sure to give us your correct shipping address.  Once approved, you will get an automatic email from IndieGogo confirming your purchase.  We will update you on our progress throughout the campaign, and at the end of the campaign, we will send you a link where you can order your swimsuit online.

Why are you using IndieGogo and not just launching your website?

Good question!  We’ve spent the last 12 months working to develop our product, brand, technology, and supply chain.  We now need to raise capital to turn our ideas into a successful business, and crowdfunding gives us an amazing platform to achieve that quickly while sharing our passion with our family and friends.  Any money raised through this campaign can be used exactly where we need it - to expand our available sizes, and to get the website and supply chain to the level we need to deliver our brand promise.  We are all ready to go (0 to 60mph) full-speed ahead with all of these as soon as we raise the funds. IndieGogo is about allowing your friends and family to see, share, and engage in your idea, and then pledge support by buying PERKS.  There’s something for everyone, and every pledge of support gets something in return along with our eternal gratitude.

Is this your website?

No, this is our IndieGogo campaign page.  Our website is www.BraziliaSwim.com, and we will “go live” when our campaign finishes.  However, until then please spread the word about us using the IndieGogo Share Tools.  Thank you!

Is airfare and hotel included with the Official Fashion Catalog Shoot PERK?

No, sorry!

story:
"What makes a classic, a classic ?" 

Hello Guys !

We created The Proper Sneaker ™  because we couldn't find beautiful, minimal, inspiring, white sneakers, in natural leather of high quality under 400$. We saw the beauty of a simple solution and our answer was to create our own minimal white sneaker, a proper sneaker that we could treasure and sell at a fair price, no matter what, —one that isn't inflated by expensive showroom, storefronts, middlemen, or excessive marketing campaigns.

Thus, we want to be different building an honest relationship with you, going against the status quo, and offering high quality, minimal sneakers with the lowest possible markups.

The Proper Sneaker ™ is a brand built upon an awareness of a new kind of consumer—the kind of person who cares where his coffee and meat come from, as much as his clothes and sneakers. Uniformity, quality, efficiency and individuality are the words at the heart of each creative process. We believe that our consumer doesn’t necessarily wants to look like a walking billboard or doesn’t need any superfluous ornamentation or logos to assert his or her identity.

At The Proper Headquarters , Simplicity is the key.

Our inspirations come from Art, Architecture, and the rebellious minds in today’s corporate world. There is a difference between "Simple" and "Basic" and we make sure to separate both for our customers. The Proper Sneaker ™ is simple but not basic.

We choose the name "Proper" because of it's definition – "Genuine" in English (US), Correct in British –. We believe in minimalism, efficiency and simplicity. The Proper Way means minimal and clean lines, proper natural leather, properly constructed, properly stitched with no visible branding and above all, no luxury markup.  ✔

Now we need your help and support to spread the word to bring this project to life !

The Proper Team.

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

All the shoes ordered from this website will come with a discrete inscription inside :

"PROPER FOUNDING MEMBER 001"

Meaning you are the FIRST to contribute to the company.

 

 


 

                                                     

 

                                            

 

 

NEW PROPER SNEAKER – YELLOW MUSTARD

 

 

 

Q: How do I choose my size, and color?

Inside of the perks, you will be able to choose size range and color. Following the end of the project, you will receive an email to select your exact size, and color.

 

Q: Does The Proper Sneaker ™r come in men and women’s sizes?

Yes, The Proper Sneaker ™ is unisex. The size range for male is US 6-13, and for female is US 4-11.

 

Q: What’s the Exchange Policy?

You only have to pay for one way shipping to exchange items for a different size within 14 days. If you are based outside the US, you will need to pay duties and taxes on this. Please contact us at support@thepropersneaker.com prior to your shipping.

 

Q: What’s the Return Policy?

We will accept the product in its original condition for a refund of the purchase price within 14 days after the arriving of the product. The substitutes may change before shipping date.

 

Q: Will the The Proper Sneaker ™ be waterproof?

The Proper Sneaker ™ is water resistant but not waterproof. Normal wear like, sweat and rain are okay. If water is exposed, wipe it with a noninvasive cloth. But please care if you would for your nicest dress shoe.

 

Q: When will The Proper Sneaker ™ be shipped?

With your help, we are aiming to finalize manufacture and ready to ship in July 2017.

 

Q: Can I buy it in stores?

Currently, The Proper Sneaker ™ is only available on Indiegogo. So pre-order now!

 

Q: Do you ship worldwide?

Yes, we do. Shipping fee will be $30 outside of US and Canada.

We do ship to africa.

 

Q: Can I play sports wearing The Proper Sneaker ™?

Yes, you can play sports wearing The Proper Sneaker ™, It's a tennis shoe but we recommend to not to put excess stress on The Proper Sneaker ™. Casual use and good care will extend the longevity of The Proper Sneaker ™.

 

Q: What will happen if I change my address during the waiting period?

We will confirm the address again before shipping. If you are moving, please contact support@thepropersneaker.com for help
story_txt:
"What makes a classic, a classic ?" 
Hello Guys !
We created The Proper Sneaker ™  because we couldn't find beautiful, minimal, inspiring, white sneakers, in natural leather of high quality under 400$. We saw the beauty of a simple solution and our answer was to create our own minimal white sneaker, a proper sneaker that we could treasure and sell at a fair price, no matter what, —one that isn't inflated by expensive showroom, storefronts, middlemen, or excessive marketing campaigns.
Thus, we want to be different building an honest relationship with you, going against the status quo, and offering high quality, minimal sneakers with the lowest possible markups.
The Proper Sneaker ™ is a brand built upon an awareness of a new kind of consumer—the kind of person who cares where his coffee and meat come from, as much as his clothes and sneakers. Uniformity, quality, efficiency and individuality are the words at the heart of each creative process. We believe that our consumer doesn’t necessarily wants to look like a walking billboard or doesn’t need any superfluous ornamentation or logos to assert his or her identity.
At The Proper Headquarters , Simplicity is the key.
Our inspirations come from Art, Architecture, and the rebellious minds in today’s corporate world. There is a difference between "Simple" and "Basic" and we make sure to separate both for our customers. The Proper Sneaker ™ is simple but not basic.
We choose the name "Proper" because of it's definition – "Genuine" in English (US), Correct in British –. We believe in minimalism, efficiency and simplicity. The Proper Way means minimal and clean lines, proper natural leather, properly constructed, properly stitched with no visible branding and above all, no luxury markup.  ✔
Now we need your help and support to spread the word to bring this project to life !
The Proper Team.
 












   
 



 


 

 
All the shoes ordered from this website will come with a discrete inscription inside :
"PROPER FOUNDING MEMBER 001"
Meaning you are the FIRST to contribute to the company.



 

 

 
                                                     
 



                                            
 



 
NEW PROPER SNEAKER – YELLOW MUSTARD

 








 











 


Q: How do I choose my size, and color?
Inside of the perks, you will be able to choose size range and color. Following the end of the project, you will receive an email to select your exact size, and color.
 
Q: Does The Proper Sneaker ™r come in men and women’s sizes?
Yes, The Proper Sneaker ™ is unisex. The size range for male is US 6-13, and for female is US 4-11.
 
Q: What’s the Exchange Policy?
You only have to pay for one way shipping to exchange items for a different size within 14 days. If you are based outside the US, you will need to pay duties and taxes on this. Please contact us at support@thepropersneaker.com prior to your shipping.
 
Q: What’s the Return Policy?
We will accept the product in its original condition for a refund of the purchase price within 14 days after the arriving of the product. The substitutes may change before shipping date.
 
Q: Will the The Proper Sneaker ™ be waterproof?
The Proper Sneaker ™ is water resistant but not waterproof. Normal wear like, sweat and rain are okay. If water is exposed, wipe it with a noninvasive cloth. But please care if you would for your nicest dress shoe.
 
Q: When will The Proper Sneaker ™ be shipped?
With your help, we are aiming to finalize manufacture and ready to ship in July 2017.
 
Q: Can I buy it in stores?
Currently, The Proper Sneaker ™ is only available on Indiegogo. So pre-order now!
 
Q: Do you ship worldwide?
Yes, we do. Shipping fee will be $30 outside of US and Canada.
We do ship to africa.
 
Q: Can I play sports wearing The Proper Sneaker ™?
Yes, you can play sports wearing The Proper Sneaker ™, It's a tennis shoe but we recommend to not to put excess stress on The Proper Sneaker ™. Casual use and good care will extend the longevity of The Proper Sneaker ™.
 
Q: What will happen if I change my address during the waiting period?
We will confirm the address again before shipping. If you are moving, please contact support@thepropersneaker.com for help

story:
My inspiration for the Bloodstone Cross came when I was doing research for my brothers birthstone. The bloodstone, also known as the heliothorpe, is the March birthstone. I went back to find the origin of the Bloodstone, which goes back over two thousand years. Since the middle ages a Christian belief claims that the“Bloodstone” was formed at the base of the crucifixion of Jesus Christ, when the blood of his wounds fell onto the dark green earth and turned ordinary stone into Bloodstone. 

This, to me, was a profound discovery. Which lead me to combine the two of the most fundamental symbols of Christianity, the sacred blood of Jesus and the Cross it self.

In these times of unprecedented global natural disasters, the threat of war, mass murdering of innocent people, starvation and disease. I feel that it is essential and there is no better time that we get closer to God. We must shed our sins to do so. We do that by embracing the blood of Jesus. It is my purpose to have people be proud to embrace His blood every day by touching the Bloodstone Cross, wearing it, talking about it and being proud of this precious symbol of faith. 

Our Quality and Production

There are no two bloodstones alike.

The genuine bloodstones are sourced and mined in different parts of the world. A Gemologist selects each stone that exhibits the best quality/color and size. The stones get packed and labeled and shipped to our factory in Qingdao China where they are then cut to our exact specifications and then polished and then placed carefully in their settings. The last step before shipping to the US or around the globe is quality control inspection.  

Our Philosophy

​To Make Your Body and Spirit Happy. Start At The Core. Your Faith.

Proof of Business Viability

In a nutshell; We did a 3 week "proof of concept” test on Facebook, spending $20 a day using video ads. We targeted the obvious custom audiences and geo targeted 5 states (Georgia, Kentucky Tennessee, Mississippi, Missouri). The ad was served to 52,000 Facebook users and the video had over 20,000 views, 2.500 likes/loves and 293 people shared it with friends and family. Bloodstone Cross (on Facebook) had close to 300 positive and beautiful comments/conversations.  I received comments and emails with wonderful thoughts and prayers. Getting this kind of reaction with a total ad budget of $420 proved that the Bloodstone Cross is an item that people are passionate about, something they desire and would want to possess.

However, although I had a lot of click-throughs to the site many abandoned the shopping cart when they started shopping. It was the 8 weeks delivery that stoped them in their tracks. In an age of “next day shipping” having no inventory is a real problem. 

We Need Your Pledge

To make this project a reality and offer you the best of the best, we have a contract with a solid manufacturing partner but have come as far as we can on our own. Now, we would love your support so we can:

• Meet minimum order requirements by our manufacturer to take this from prototype to reality! 

• Scale up production  in order to get cost down. We want for that the Bloodstone Cross be  affordable so everyone can own this symbol of faith.

• Spread the word through social media marketing campaign

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Admittedly, I wasn’t prepared to spark so much interest and to touch such an emotional chord with so many. Now, all I have to do is to convert all that into sales. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Aren't you bored of all the minimalist and simplistically designed watches?

DACHW: The Dacian Edition

When we designed the watch and the brand we were inspired by two things

The Dacians for the logo

The Dacians were an Indo-European people, part of or related to the Thracians. Dacians were the ancient inhabitants of Dacia, located in the area in and around the Carpathian Mountains and west of the Black Sea. This area includes the present-day countries of Romania and Moldova, as well as parts of Ukraine, Eastern Serbia, Northern Bulgaria, Slovakia, Hungary and Southern Poland.

Vintage diving helmets for the watch

DACHW Technical Specifications

Case:

-Material:  316L Stainless Steel(Ion Plated)

-Glass: Convex Sapphire Crystal

-Diameter: 40mm

-Thickness: 12.6mm

Movement & Functions:

- Automatic: caliber LG0801B (same as Invicta Russian Diver)

- Hours and minutes

Strap 

- 316 L Stainless Steel

or

- Leather (Brown, Black)

Features

- 10ATM(100M) Water Resistance

- Luminous Hands

The watch is available in three colours: all black, all silver and silver case with golden bezel.

Production

We are scheduled for production on 1st of September 2017. The watches will be shipped right on time for Christmas.

Quality is our number one priority.

We want to build a stylish and sturdy timepiece, with a reliable workhorse, for the proper price. 

Thanks for your time and we hope to hear from you soon.

Kind regards,

Andrei Diaconu

story:
Short Summary

To be an awesome dad doesn't mean you have to do away with style right? My name is Miles, and I'm the founder of Rich Dad Society, a company created to keep dads looking cool! However, it's not just for dads. This brand has been great for coaches, teachers, mentors, and positive male role models alike! Sure, we use apparel as the vessel, but we're more that.  Rich Dad Society was created as a way to build a community; men who share stories, give advice, and generally just a group who enjoy shooting the S***!  

It's pretty clear that men don't have the same options when it comes to parenthood apparel. My goal is to change that! Fatherhood is a role that should be celebrated, and I'll gladly play its host. Providing apparel that looks awesome is a must. If it feels amazing, great. If you could combine those with a message of brotherhood, you'v e got yourself a real winner!! That's what  Rich Dad Society is; a company that make you feel like you're a part of something bigger than yourself.  The company tagline, "Continue To Inspire" speaks to that directly! Our current inventory includes T-shirts, Dri-balanced polo shirts, custom business and performance socks. We're hoping to add more items this fall; including our first subscription box!!

With your contribution, our company can introduce new items to our continuously growing community (that's a lot of C's), and allow us to keep our prices affordable! Lets be honest, diapers aren't cheap :)

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are hoping to raise $35,000.00. This money will help us complete quite a few things:

  • Marketing services that help spread the mission and vision of our company; Graphic Designer, Updated website, various marketing campaigns via social media platforms
  • Expanding our inventory for the next several collections (Fall, Winter, Spring, Summer)
  • Creating exclusive items for our subscription box 
  • Cover the cost for numerous trade shows & festivals for 2018 & 2019

We're currently creating EXCLUSIVE items for those who make a donation. These will not be available anywhere else as a special thank you for believing in what we're doing! We've teamed up with an amazing graphic designer who has created some awesome pieces for her clients; including our community service day apparel! We're lucky to have her on board for this campaign. 

Our perks range from "Great Dad I" to "Super Dad" and with each upgrade the perks just get better and better. Starting with the exclusive T-shirt, and ending with you actually CREATING one of the designs for our collection. We really want you know that you're helping launch something that will have a lasting impact on not just our local community, but whatever community you live in as well. This has the potential to go world wide!! Our perks include shirts, tumblrs, sock subscriptions, and more!

If we don't reach our goal, that's okay too! We'll donate 20% of what we earn to a local organization in the Kansas City, MO area! The rest will go towards adding additional inventory to our company.

 

The Impact

Supporting this campaign is more than just supporting an apparel brand. Rich Dad Society was created to build a sense of pride for an otherwise under-recognized group. Fathers often get overlooked in their role because of how awesome moms are! We wanted to create something that Fathers, and the women who represent them would want to be a part of. After becoming a father, that phrase, "It takes a village" had a whole new meaning!

"What if I'm not a dad?"

We get that question all the time. You don't have to be a dad to be a positive role model. This brand has been great for coaches, teachers, and mentors alike! We're building a community that kids can go to for help, and since our inception, the response has been absolutely wonderful! The message is our driving force; "Continue To Inspire" our clothes just happen to feel great!

Risks & Challenges

There's a ton of apparel brands out there, and we're not naive to that. In our first year of business, we found ourselves trying to compete, instead of focusing on our message. Once we dialed it back, and really embraced the "Dad Brand" our numbers started to show. We want our customers to feel like they deserve to wear Rich Dad apparel. We want those who buy our items to feel like, "I am a great dad" or "I know someone who is a great dad". We were able to recognize our error pretty early, and make the necessary changes. It's all about being able to adjust.

We'll continue to work hard at spreading the word of Fatherhood, and positive role models. We'll always live by our motto, "Continue To Inspire" because you know never know who that'll affect. 

Other Ways You Can Help

You love the idea, but you're being fiscally responsible? That's completely understandable! A simple share goes further than you could possible imagine!

Tell a friend or 10 about our campaign, and watch the magic happen! Indiegogo has made it pretty easy to share this with all of your social media friends, and we'll love you even more just for thinking we're worth sharing.

***If campaign goal is not met, perks will not be available. However, backers will still receive a gift on behalf of the company***

Providing apparel that looks awesome is a must. If it feels amazing, great. If you could combine those with a message of brotherhood, you'v e got yourself a real winner!! That's what  Rich Dad Society is; a company that make you feel like you're a part of something bigger than yourself.  The company tagline, "Continue To Inspire" speaks to that directly! Our current inventory includes T-shirts, Dri-balanced polo shirts, custom business and performance socks. We're hoping to add more items this fall; including our first subscription box!!
With your contribution, our company can introduce new items to our continuously growing community (that's a lot of C's), and allow us to keep our prices affordable! Lets be honest, diapers aren't cheap :)
 
What We Need & What You Get
We are hoping to raise $35,000.00. This money will help us complete quite a few things:

Marketing services that help spread the mission and vision of our company; Graphic Designer, Updated website, various marketing campaigns via social media platforms
Expanding our inventory for the next several collections (Fall, Winter, Spring, Summer)
Creating exclusive items for our subscription box 
Cover the cost for numerous trade shows & festivals for 2018 & 2019

We're currently creating EXCLUSIVE items for those who make a donation. These will not be available anywhere else as a special thank you for believing in what we're doing! We've teamed up with an amazing graphic designer who has created some awesome pieces for her clients; including our community service day apparel! We're lucky to have her on board for this campaign. 
Our perks range from "Great Dad I" to "Super Dad" and with each upgrade the perks just get better and better. Starting with the exclusive T-shirt, and ending with you actually CREATING one of the designs for our collection. We really want you know that you're helping launch something that will have a lasting impact on not just our local community, but whatever community you live in as well. This has the potential to go world wide!! Our perks include shirts, tumblrs, sock subscriptions, and more!
If we don't reach our goal, that's okay too! We'll donate 20% of what we earn to a local organization in the Kansas City, MO area! The rest will go towards adding additional inventory to our company.
 
The Impact
Supporting this campaign is more than just supporting an apparel brand. Rich Dad Society was created to build a sense of pride for an otherwise under-recognized group. Fathers often get overlooked in their role because of how awesome moms are! We wanted to create something that Fathers, and the women who represent them would want to be a part of. After becoming a father, that phrase, "It takes a village" had a whole new meaning!
"What if I'm not a dad?" 
We get that question all the time. You don't have to be a dad to be a positive role model. This brand has been great for coaches, teachers, and mentors alike! We're building a community that kids can go to for help, and since our inception, the response has been absolutely wonderful! The message is our driving force; "Continue To Inspire" our clothes just happen to feel great!
Risks & Challenges
There's a ton of apparel brands out there, and we're not naive to that. In our first year of business, we found ourselves trying to compete, instead of focusing on our message. Once we dialed it back, and really embraced the "Dad Brand" our numbers started to show. We want our customers to feel like they deserve to wear Rich Dad apparel. We want those who buy our items to feel like, "I am a great dad" or "I know someone who is a great dad". We were able to recognize our error pretty early, and make the necessary changes. It's all about being able to adjust.
We'll continue to work hard at spreading the word of Fatherhood, and positive role models. We'll always live by our motto, "Continue To Inspire" because you know never know who that'll affect. 
Other Ways You Can Help

You love the idea, but you're being fiscally responsible? That's completely understandable! A simple share goes further than you could possible imagine!
Tell a friend or 10 about our campaign, and watch the magic happen! Indiegogo has made it pretty easy to share this with all of your social media friends, and we'll love you even more just for thinking we're worth sharing.
***If campaign goal is not met, perks will not be available. However, backers will still receive a gift on behalf of the company***

story:
This is BOOKER, a high-fashion contemporary collection based in New York City. Conceived in 2012 by me, Jameelah Booker, BOOKER aims to be the high-fashion brand that expresses a woman’s personal power through timeless, sleek design and wearable function. Through design, BOOKER wants to inspire your unique edge…and set it free.


Why now? BOOKER was inspired by the passion that motorcycle culture ignites in my life. A marriage of what I love to do and what I love to wear. Now, BOOKER is proudly growing into a new phase. On the heels of growing industry buzz, I’m looking to expand.

BOOKER from a brand that offers only jackets and pants to a full ready to wear collection, unleashing the wild side in every woman. Clean lines, a timeless color palette, and a versatile modern fit that make women feel confident and free. 


The inspiration for my collection are real-life women I’ve met along my journey. I call them “The Wild Ones.” Transformed by their passions and raw ambitions, these girls have conquered and thrived in their own “jungle” of personal challenges and growth.







YOUR CONTRIBUTION TO BOOKER:

With your contribution, I can complete my Ready to Wear Collection, making my sketches a reality on the runways of New York Fashion Week this September. 

Every Dollar Will Go Towards:

-Fabric 

-Trim development

-Sample room fees 

-Tailoring

Any funds above and beyond our $25,000 goal will allow me to cover the PR and press related fees needed for a successful attendance of leading industry representation at Fashion Week.

Some Things You Should Know About BOOKER:

Locally Manufactured. I believe in the importance of locally sourced manufacturing in order to have complete control in the production and quality of each collection, and to oversee the precise details of each jacket made. Because of this, the price point may be higher, but the quality is that of the meticulously crafted vintage jackets of yesterday.

Quality leather jackets, hand crafted with the finest materials. I use the best available cow, deer, and lamb skins the market has to offer, and hand pick every skin to make sure my customer is getting the highest grade of leather. These are premium jackets that will get better with age.


Over 13 Years of Experience In the Fashion Industry:

I’ve dreamed of turning my passion for fashion into a career since I was a teenager, making my own clothes in South Central LA. A year after being accepted into the undergrad program at Otis Parsons College, I knew that I wanted to be right in the middle of where fashion lived, New York City. At the age of 19, with just a few dollars in my pocket, I headed East. Once in New York City, I moved up the fashion food chain quickly: starting first in retail while packing boxes for free at an established brand, then moving all the way up to the Creative Director of their international branch, working in Italy and China.

Since then, I’ve gained a uniquely well rounded knowledge of fashion design and development by working for some of today's leading fashion brands - from men's and women's to missy and juniors, specializing in denim development and outerwear. 

BOOKER Press:

BOOKER has gained interest from major Fashion publications such as Vogue, Harpers Bazar, Lucky, Elle, Nylon and Oprah, Marie Claire, Essence to name a few.

Vibe Vixen interview:

http://www.vibevixen.com/2013/09/vixen-tv-an-exclusive-look-at-jameelah-bookers-motorcycle-jacket-collection/

Vogue.com

http://www.vogue.com/slideshow/10710915/street-style-new-york-fashion-week-fall-2015/#3

Marie Claire Magazine:

http://www.marieclaire.com/fashion/g2455/marie-claire-editor-gift-guide/?slide=24

Essence Magazine:

http://photos.essence.com/galleries/shop-top-black-designers-holiday-season

BOOKER worn by Cindy Gallop and Editor and Chief of Lucky Magazine Eva Chen. 


Nylon fashion editor looking through the BOOKER racks.

BOOKER  jackets boxes gifted to Beyonce, Pink and Rhianna!

Fashion Bloggers and trend enthusiasts Angela Denae, Faustina and Liz Teich 

wear BOOKER to highlight the latest trends.

Dropping off BOOKER to Vogue for the first time!

Team BOOKER:

Designer:

Founder and designer, Jameelah Booker, has worked in Fashion as a designer 

and brand developer in New York City since 2001. Her industry experience, technical ability and personal connection to the best sample rooms, trim supplies and fabric specialists gives her the craftsmanship to create garments that are beautiful, practical, and promotes empowerment and inspired living.

The Booker Sample room: 

John & Joan, owners of JJ patterns, have more than 30 years of experience developing high end goods for leading NYC fashion designers 

such as Diane Von Furstenberg, Helmet Lang, The Row, Takoon and Rebecca Minkoff. JJ patterns has been with BOOKER from the beginning, working closely with a skillful team of pattern makers, cutters, and seamstresses to ensure the impeccable quality of each BOOKER jacket. 

Visual Director: 

Teddy Telles is an independent photographer and videographer, known for his technical precision and ability to translate ideas into striking imagery. Whether creating editorials, interviews, look books or portraits, Teddy's videos are alive with dynamic camera movement and still narratives. Having experience working on large scale campaigns throughout the U.S., as well as partnering with the design firm "Nothing Something," Teddy thrives on multi-faceted collaborations.

story:
PLEASE VISIT US AT http://www.alysiathomas.com

PERKS VIDEO illustrating all perks offered to the right. Thank you for your support!


'An artist’s eye, a fashion palette and a Californian bohemian twist.. Alysia Thomas’ scarves evoke a cinematic easy glamour and make me want to drive off into the sunset in a convertible..’.

- Laura Bailey  (Contributing editor, British Vogue) 


THE STORY

Alysia Thomas London, founded by photographer and film producer Alysia Thomas in 2014, is a slow fashion brand specializing in scarves, pocket squares and handkerchiefs that are finely printed digitally, in Britain and Italy. 

While luxury and quality is essential, the need to adopt environmentally-friendly practices is at the heart of the company. 

Working with family run factories, printers and mills Alysia Thomas London is dedicated to producing the finest quality printed fabrics in limited print runs. 

Alysia Thomas London creates sumptuous accessories that brighten any outfit and last a lifetime.


THE COLLECTIONS  

Based on a striking series of original photographs, Alysia Thomas London’s first collection of finely printed scarves, pocket squares, and handkerchiefs has been curated from travels across Europe, life in sun-kissed California, and a home base in London. 


SQUARES COLLECTION

With Alysia Thomas London, I wanted to add some fun and color to the men's accessories market. Most items available are the same old polka dots and stripes. Boring! I wanted to give men something fun to accessorize with. What makes our squares so unique is the ability to match multiple colors.  Each square has an endless color pallet, allowing men to match numerous tie and shirt combinations with one single square.


100% SILK SQUARES | MADE IN BRITAIN | 33 cm sq
LIMITED EDITION SILK POCKET SQUARE with the initial of your choice
(CHERRY BLOSSOMS PRINT)

(CALIFORNIA PRINT)

CALIFORNIA DREAMING, TANGERINE DREAMS, YELLOW CAB, VINS & LIQUEURS, PARIS AT NIGHT

'HAPPINESS', 'RIALTO', 'TANGERINE DREAMS', 'CALIFORNIA DREAMING'


100% EGYPTIAN COTTON SQUARES | MADE IN BRITAIN | 44 cm sq

'TWO CHAIRS', 'DUCKIES', 'CHERRY BLOSSOMS', 'BLUE MONDAY', 'PINKY'

'CHERRY BLOSSOMS'

'CHERRY BLOSSOMS', 'NOTTING HILL', 'ENGLISH FRUITERERS', 'BLUE MONDAY'


THE SCARF COLLECTIONS

The scarf collection is made up of only natural fibers using 100% when possible; silk, cashmere, wool & modal. Bright and uplifting, elegant, sumptuous and luxurious.  Perfect everyday wear for men and women.


100% SILK SCARVES | Made in Britain | 90 cm sq


'TANGERINE DREAMS'

'ONE DAY IN PARIS'


OVERSIZED WRAP SCARVES (20% cashmere) | MADE IN ITALY | 140 cm sq

This is the new series and the softest, most luxurious in the collection. The high percentage of cashmere makes these scarves absolutely sumptuous. They are oversized, very fine and super soft to the touch making them the perfect wrap scarf. Finished by hand with a rolled hem.


'CHERRY BLOSSOMS'

'TWO SURFERS'

'BEAUTIFUL RUINS'

'ONE DAY IN PARIS' please note the photo here includes a fringe hem when in fact this will come as a rolled hem like the three scarves above.


WHAT OTHERS HAVE TO SAY 

"I am a huge fan of Alysia’s pocket squares, they are a super cool, contemporary, take on an old school classic, and you just can’t beat that!” 

- Alex Mavros  (Patrick Mavros)


''I am a huge fan of Alysia Thomas designs, they are all so unique and the colours are fabulous!  I rarely wear a jacket without one of her pocket squares!"

- Tom Evans  (Boodles) 


"Alysia  has an unbelievable eye for colour and form. Her unique photographs celebrate places she has traveled to or is inspired by and she then turns them into beautifully luxurious scarves. The Eiffel Tower is one of my favorites!"

- Heather Howard  (COO, Anya Hindmarch) 


"I love wearing my California Dreaming scarf in all seasons because of Alysia's intriguing perspective on the city landscape. Her vision for her brand, is to me, just as original and exciting."

- Olivia Cole  (Literary editor of GQ)  


Alysia Thomas, with lustrous silk pocket squares offers sartorial gentleman versatility in colour, arranging their pocket square to create handsome contrasts with suiting. A thankful addition to my wardrobe.

- Henry Kimber (IWC)


"Alysia Thomas pocket squares are one of my favourites - fold them neatly for a more formal conservative look or stuff them in loosely to show off their funky, colourful designs like I do with my Japanese cherry blossom one." 

-Adam Hyman ( Code - London)

HAND FINISHING

All our scarves, pocket squares and handkerchiefs are finished by hand whether it's a flat pin hem or a rolled hem. This is with the exception of the fringe hem.


PACKAGING

All our packaging is made from fully recycled materials and meets all recycling standards (no shiny coating on the outside to prevent recycling at end of use). We take into consideration the whole life cycle of our packing, not just the making of it.

All our packaging is made by The Tiny Box Company founded by Rachel Watkyn. Rachel founded the company in 2014 because she could not source recycled packaging for her company. We are proud to use them exclusively.

"Individually we can't change the world. But together we can make a Tiny Difference". - Rachel Watkyn, founder of The Tiny Box Company.


TRADESHOW / TRANOI PARIS

I am hugely excited to have been invited to Tranoi Paris to take part in the Tranoi Homme show from the 23rd to the 25th of January, 2016. 

It attracts all the top buyers from around the world such as:

Harvey Nichols, Liberty, Selfridges, Harrods, Dover Street Market, Le Bon Marché, Merci, Storm, Lane Crawford, Fenwick, Kabuki, Mullbeck, Tom Greyhound (Paris)/ Hyundai Group, Brand Bazar...Bergdorf Goodman, Neiman Marcus, Net A Porter, Saks 5th Ave., Bloomingdale's, Holt Renfrew…to name a few.

Tranoi is invite only and has the ability to launch independent brands internationally. 


WHERE YOUR MONEY WILL GO

Your contribution will make Alysia Thomas London a reality. The perks highlight both the lines in production and upcoming collections. With your help there is plenty more to come!

* 30% Product development and launch of three new collections: African Elephant Collection, Initials Collection, and Paris Collection:

* 24% Brand launch at Tranoi Paris Jan 23rd, 2016, includes fees, travel and accommodation. Build inventory for current collections.

* 24% Technical infrastructure (update computer systems and digital  equipment)

* 20% An official HQ and photography studio 

* 2% Product development and launch of new Home Collection


THE AFRICAN ELEPHANT COLLECTION

If fully funded I will create a collection dear to my heart and inspired by a trip to Africa, when I was 11. This will be a collection of scarves featuring African Elephants with a percentage of proceeds from this collection going to various foundations that are working to save the African Elephants. 

Please support Alysia Thomas London and support African Elephants.


THE INITIALS COLLECTION
A collection based on the initials series that has been hugely popular on Instagram, to be made into scarves, squares and fine art prints.  


THE PARIS COLLECTION

A recent collection of images from Paris that will be made into pocket squares, handkerchiefs and scarves.


THE HOME COLLECTION
A collection of cushions finely printed on linen for the home. 

We hope you will support slow fashion designers as you do your local farmers at your weekend farmer's market. What we wear and put on our bodies is equally as important as what we eat and put in our bodies. 


THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING ALYSIA THOMAS LONDON !

Choose a perk to the right and support slow fashion ...

story:
Short Summary

Hows it going everyone. My name is Jared Harrison-Jackson. For a long time now, I have been a big fan of an indie game that's been recently growing in popularity called Skullgirls. I found myself designing hoodies that incorporated aspects of certain characters just because I thought it was fun. I didn't really think much of it until I had a good number of people praise it and express a great deal of interest in either modeling them if they were ever developed and an equal amount just saying they wanted to have it. That being in mind, I thought to seriously consider turning these designs into a reality. Thus here we are, at the start of this journey. As a contributor you would be helping turn this idea into a true option for fans of this game all over. A new way to express their fandom. 


This project is going to undoubtedly create its share of problems. The main one being that there aren't any decent silk screening services, online or otherwise, that can allow for the amount or manner of customization I would need to produce these designs in reality. After doing some research I've determined that in order to make this a reality and overcome this obstacle, I'll need to do this personally with my own silk screening mechanism, which requires me to purchase one. Per the research I've done a mechanism of high enough quality to create the quality and quantity I want to make a pristine product will cost nearly $500. I project I will cost nearly another $400 for the materials necessary to produce the initial first line such as the blank hoodies and silk screening materials. Even if the full funding goal isn't met by the deadline, whatever IS raised will be used to continue the pursuit of the final result. And all support will still be appreciated.
And of course your support will definitely be appreciated in more than just a thank you if possible. There are unique perks I plan on offering as a thank you. Exclusive opportunities and chances to obtain the finished works before anyone else being examples. 

The Impact

I feel this project has value a few different ways. The main one being that it gives a unique and as far as my research has told me currently non-existent way for this specific fandom to be represented. It also shows that you don't have to be a professional fashion designer or sponsored gamer to create something popular and interesting. Hopefully if the project is successful, in fact even if it isn't it'll inspire others to create. This is admittedly my first major project I am attempting to put into practice. However I have a distinct idea in mind and a plan to see it through.

Risks & Challenges

As previously stated the main hurdle to overcome is production. There arent any real silk-screening companies that allow for the level of customization to match my designs and the ideas that they are based on. With that in mind I'll need to do it myself with my own silk-screening press. If the proper funding isnt acquired then I will overcome that hurdle by using what funding I can manage and getting a cheaper press or implementing a less expensive method of silk-screening. This will cause for a longer production time to create the same quality product but at least the final product will still be assured. 
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people simply cant provide funding. But the word "contribute" doesnt always mean money. There are certainly other ways to help. You can always:
  • Provide me with advice to make the project easier and go more smoothly
  • Share this project where-ever you can using the share tools
  • Just give some words of support. They are always appreciated.

Lets all work together to make this project a reality. The journey begins with us.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hows it going everyone. My name is Jared Harrison-Jackson. For a long time now, I have been a big fan of an indie game that's been recently growing in popularity called Skullgirls. I found myself designing hoodies that incorporated aspects of certain characters just because I thought it was fun. I didn't really think much of it until I had a good number of people praise it and express a great deal of interest in either modeling them if they were ever developed and an equal amount just saying they wanted to have it. That being in mind, I thought to seriously consider turning these designs into a reality. Thus here we are, at the start of this journey. As a contributor you would be helping turn this idea into a true option for fans of this game all over. A new way to express their fandom.    
This project is going to undoubtedly create its share of problems. The main one being that there aren't any decent silk screening services, online or otherwise, that can allow for the amount or manner of customization I would need to produce these designs in reality. After doing some research I've determined that in order to make this a reality and overcome this obstacle, I'll need to do this personally with my own silk screening mechanism, which requires me to purchase one. story:
OH HI! I Wasn't Expecting You, I Was Just Enjoying The 2014 Edition Of The Simpsons Annual, What's That? Who The Hell Are You?

My name is Kim Kheradmandi, but no one except myself on the internet calls me Kimbo Gruff. 

I'm a British/Persian visual artist, designer and the more attractive male counterpart of Kim Kardashian. I'm currently based in Berlin, I moved here last year after spending 1460 days in the lovely city of Amsterdam. 

I work in many different mediums including drawing, painting, collage and photography, you can check my work here.

I'm here to plead, I mean pledge, I mean to ask you to pledge, whatever you can afford (if you like the project) to help me get my new clothing label, GRUFF, off the ground


The Gruff Logo


When Did GRUFF Start And Why Kimbo Gruff?

Kimbo Gruff is my artist alias for reasons I won't go in to, it's not a traumatic story, it's just a bit dull. GRUFF started as I've had the idea of creating a small T-shirt label for a while and I thought my current artist alias lent itself nicely to the branding of the label. I've been working on the current format of my t-shirt aspirations for a few months now and feel I have a solid product to launch in to the world.

I've always enjoyed simple, visually striking t-shirts over busy bright shirts with pop culture references or cringey phrases, particulary shirts that say BABE in glitter or such like, although I am a babe, obviously. 

I would love to create my own line of shirts with simple, bold designs and a high print and garment quality. I have already realised a very small run of one design (pictured below on my body) and would like to continue to get the rest of my ideas out there and develop the label further,eventually producing sweatshirts, hoodies etc.





Where IS GRUFF now?

I'm in a very good position to get this project off the ground as soon as I receive the funding boost I need! I have a tried and tested printer ready to supply the goods and of course the designs are all there, six designs in total which you can see here:

Mechanical Boy


Gruff Standard

Rekt

Gruff Limb

Gruff Diagram

Gruff Logo


Why I Need Your Help?

Cos I'm currently living in a barrel, not really, don't be silly! I just decided to sit in a barrel for a perfectly normal reason, I definitely didn't forget to put on any jeans that day.

Basically, I'm reaching out for your help as I would like to get all my designs out there and give people some options on which GRUFF shirt they would like to sport. In the future I would also like to expand the label in to producing things like sweatshirts and hoodies etc.

Where Your Generosity Will Go

  • To produce the actual shirts first and foremost, including a super sweet logo printed on the outer back collar of the shirt itself
  • All six designs will be produced and ready to buy
  • We will be printing on high quality organic fabrics 
  • I'll be organising some photo shoots to create some wonderful content for the online presence of GRUFF
  • General promotion & marketing
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, I will still invest all of the money raised in to helping this project along as best I can.

What You Get

I won't go in to all the details about the rewards here of course but needless to say I've got some nice things lined up for all you beautiful peoples, including shirts, digital art prints and original artwork!



The Printers 

As I said, I have a tried and tested print company already lined up to print my t-shirts, they're a small screen printing company based in the Kreuzberg district of Berlin. The small run of shirts I already got from these guys was perfect.  


The Print Technique

The print technique we will be using is water-based silk screen printing, here's why:

  • It is better for the environment as there are fewer chemical nasties involved
  • It gives a much nicer feel to the shirt as the ink goes directly in to the fabric; rather than having the feeling that some one stuck some plastic on your shirt, as so often happens
  • The longevity of the design is also very good with this type of printing


The Shirts

The model of shirts I will be using are a super soft 100% organic cotton t-shirt from Stanley Stella. Check here for more info about the companies sustainability policies.


Risks & Challenges

The risks and obstacles for this project are very minimal as I have already had a sample of the product and am confident with the guys I've got to deliver the goods. 

As long as the project is fully, or partly, funded I will be able to go ahead, place the orders and have all or some of the shirts ready to go.

Of course with any project there could be hiccups, however I will do my absolute best to get all of the shirts produced and shipped out to all you lovely people!


The Webstore

The webstore is also set-up and ready to go, you can check it here


Like What You See?

Thanks! (I'm assuming you said yes to that question) that's great! I would genuinely appreciate your support to get this project off the ground, you would be helping an independent clothing label continue to create designs and new products with a focus on design and craftsmanship!

Even if you can't afford to help with the funding, it would be great if you could share this project with your fashionable friends and spread the word; that would make me a very happy Kimbo :) 

Cheers,

Kim x


Thinking about shirt designs on the U-Bahn, as per

story:
What is a Boss Kap?

Boss Kaps are durable and reusable lids that make vegetable fermenting easy! Preparing quick batches of pickles, kimchi, sauerkraut, relishes and sauces ensures you have access to probiotic rich, highly flavorful vegetables and condiments. 

Here at Primal Kitchen, delicious food that is good for you is important! We are a family run business, and a brother and sister team. Our love of food and culinary creativity in the kitchen stems from being raised in a large food-loving family! 

We are super excited about this new product! The Boss Kaps combine the simplicity of our Boss Valves with the ruggedness of a stainless steel lid and the convenience of standard wide-mouth mason jar into one sleek design that will be available at a great price. Our goal is to make probiotic-rich fermented foods easy and accessible for the average family. Wouldn't it be incredible if your fridge was full of raw condiments jam-packed with enzymes, highly available vitamins and good bacteria? You should be able to enjoy all of the wonderful advantages of fermented foods right at your fingertips!


We Need Your Help!

Our Indiegogo goal amount will cover the initial costs of production tooling and initial component runs. 

What's in it for you:

  • Check our reward levels to get in on a Boss 3 pack or other valuable offers


The Impact

Our society as a whole is losing touch with real food. We hope to bring back some appreciation for nourishing food in a way that makes sense to the modern world and it's busy inhabitants. 

We want to...

  • Reach the crowd who isn't quite sure what "fermentation" means
  • See more of a connection between people and their food
  • Combine health, flavor, and fun in one entire experience


Risks

The only real risk is that we fail to meet our funding goal. In this case, we can still proceed in the following way:
  • If we are unable to reach our goal we will continue as planned with a longer time frame. 
If we are unable to meet our funding goal even after extending the funding timeline, we will fulfill the orders we do receive as follows:
  • You will receive our Kraut Kaps 3pack instead of Boss Kaps. The Kraut Kaps are proven fermenting kits which use BPA free food grade plastic lids and airlocks. 
  • The Kraut Kaps don't come with the weights. 




Other Ways to Help

  • Please tell your friends and family about our campaign! 
  • Don't forget to use your Indiegogo share tools!
  • Thank you so much! Your help makes a huge difference!!!

story:
Welcome of Qbox, the first Spy themed subscription box experience delivered directly to your Safe House monthly.

Why Qbox?

Let me explain, Qbox was founded on a principle that everyone can enjoy the elaborate gadgetry, innovative toolsets and state of the art accessories of a master spy.  At Qbox we just don't send killer boxes but rather introduce you to the world of espionage through a monthly mission theme. 

The Qbox founders are not strangers to the world of spies, having worked in the intelligence services for over twenty years our team has direct access to the best available products, gadgets and tools and are working to build a monthly experience  starting with killer boxes delivered directly to your safe house monthly. 

What is Qbox? 

Qbox consists of hand-selected items that include; innovative and fun gadgets, clandestine tools, reading and training materials to support mission set and last but not least the most epic clothing (t-shirts, ties, and accessories). These products are not samples, rather, they are hand-picked by former intelligence professionals that have you and your mission in mind.  

Make no mistake - there was a lot of work to be done here!

Introducing this concept was challenging yet very rewarding, after all, master spies are not created overnight.  Here is what we have done to bring this concept to life. 

  • Developed partnerships with some of the most innovative companies in the world, some of which are crowdfunded companies just like us; giving you access to interesting new gadgets and gear.  
  • Development and design concepts from ground up...which we are proud of how it turned out in the long run. 
  • The funds from the this crowd fund will go into expanding our brand and increasing our product reach as we aim to include clothing, tools and gadgets in every box shipped to your safe house.  

Here is our blueprint to success and fun.  Monthly Mission Protocol:


Monthly Adult Themes - Each item hand-selected by Intelligence professionals.

EPIC One of a Kind T-shirts in every Qbox.

In partnership with Clandestine Apparel Corp., best quality shirts with the most innovative designs monthly.

Qbox is Simple, fun and affordable.

We think you'll really be into it. Now, we need your support to lead the revolution to make Qbox a reality.  It is our hope you will become a member, join in our missions, and be apart of history.  If you do, you will be Unique, and Legendary for Life. 

We're Ready!

We chose Indiegogo.com, to meet people who like the idea of doing things made differently.  Fun ideas make sense, and make life more enjoyable along with providing more purpose, intent and drive.  

In our collective 20 years of experience, we're optimistic to hit the ground running and get our initial Qbox orders ready for you.  So far, we received very positive response from potential Qbox members through our social media marketing campaigns and are ready to bring more "qboxers" on board.  We're proud to give this to you first, before anyone else.  Like all things, no one knows about your movement until it's moving.  So subscribers we genuinely need and appreciate your help.  

By Backing our Indiegogo campaign today, you will be amongst the others in the world that strive to be unique and legendary. Make no mistake we're in this for the long haul and look forward to expanding this unique experience to all.  The Qbox team will continue to blaze the trail, fueled with fun, creative, innovative and most importantly your support to build this amazing community.  So grab your friends, and grab your gear and join the mission.  

From us to yours, Always Thanks.

Risks and Challenges:

We've been in the industry for over 3 years, and eat, sleep and dream about spy stuff daily.  We've got some great experience under our belts with over 20 years of actual field experience and feel confident that our product partnerships will make you happy and enrich your life monthly.  

Forecasting Risks

If all goes well during our funding campaign, we'll finish up with a giant heap of preorders and have many new "qboxer's" join the experience.  Of course we are trying to predict our future demand and plan accordingly, but it's far from an exact science.  While we have prepared for a large influx of members, it could be slightly off our initial calculations.  

Acts of God

We are based in Texas, which is known for some calamity, however what ever happens, we'll get through it as a team and ensure you get top quality and epic gear delivered to your safe house monthly with no hitch. Promise.

story:
24PI7

The next generation Automatic Mechanical SMART watch

Introducing the next generation of mechanical watches: the 24PI7 SMART watch. At your convenience, it is an easy-to-read classic mechanical watch, while combining the technologically advanced features of a smart watch. One of the features includes a modern Bluetooth watch.  A clear LCD display to keep you connected to the internet. This unique combination is offered at a special price for Indiegogo supporters. 

24PI7 is the only Hybrid Mechanical smart watch in the market with the classic traditional look. It has a 11mm thickness that gives you a feeling of wearing a luxury jewelry watch. 24PI7 is not just a watch, it's a social status.

Mechanical features

  • Smooth high grade stainless steel scratch resistance body gives Elegant classic look, which can be worn for any occasions.
  • High end Automatic Mechanical movement with 28800 vibrations per hour, 24 Jewels and  42 hours of power reserve
  • Scratch proof Gorilla® Glass.
  •  5 ATM water resistance that lets you bath, or even swim with it.

 

Smart features

PMOLED display with vivid lifelike colors that show any screen in a sharp way. Currently, we are working to further improve it to a 1.44" inch TFT display with 128 x 128 resolution.

Has Bluetooth communication that receives instant notifications (vibration) from Android and iOS devices

  • Answer or reject incoming calls
  • Make and receive Skype calls
  • Access to Twitter, facebook,whatsapp,Twitter communications
  • Anti lost feature, you can NEVER lose your phone
  • Day-by-day weather reports
  • Flight status
  • Lock or unlock the screen
  • Answer of reject calls
  • Set Alarm and reminders
  • NFC to unlock doors, exchange contact details etc.,

--> Listen and control music from your mobile device or from inbuilt storage

--> Sleep monitor

--> Flight alerts

Track outdoor activities like cycling, golf, running, swimming, etc.,

 

An in-built GPS navigator that gives you accurate locations, without even using the internet

 

24-36 hours of battery life in heavy usage. 24PI7 comes with an unique USB charger

 

Tech Specifics:

  • Stainless steel 316L
  • Gorilla® Glass 3
  • 42 mm Diameter watch
  • 22/20 mm Stainless steel strap. The black leather strap is optional.
  • Mechanical movement with 28800 vibrations per hour, 24 Jewels and  42 hours of power reserve.
  • PMOLED display with 96 x 64 resolution,. Currently, we are working to further improve it to a TFT display with 128 x128 pixel resolution.
  • 360 mAh battery
  • Vibrator
  • Water resistance - 5 ATM
  • 3 Axis accelerometer
  • Android Kit kat
  • Bluetooth 2.1+ EDR and 4.0 BLE iOS devices.
  • Internal storage - 4GB
  • 800 MHz Single core processor with 512 MB RAM
  • NFC

Compatibility

Compatible with iOS and Android devices. It runs on the Bluetooth system 2.1+ EDR and 4.0.

Available colors

  • Stainless steel
  • 24K gold plated
Production Timeline
  • Sep'15  - Oct'15  :  Crowd funding campaign
  • Nov'14 - Jan' 16. :  Prototype manufacturing and Software programming
  • Jan'15  - Feb'16  :   Pilot production and Testing
  • Feb'15 - Mar'16  :   Final production and Shipping

FAQ

Q. Does the charger energize the mechanical movement?

A. No, charger is used to charge the battery. The battery is what powers the smart functions

Q. How do I energize the Mechanical movement?

A. It's automatic; it will energize itself when used every day.  It can also be energized using the watch crown. The watch crown can also be used to set the time.

Q. Will 24PI7 work with Blackberry or Windows Phones?  

A. No, currently it only supports most iOS and Andorid devices. However,  we are planning to develop our own OS to support Blackberry and windows phones.

Q. What are the languages it supports?

A. Currently, it supports English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, German, French, Italian, Spanish and Arabic.  We will work on more languages in the future.

Q. Specifics about warranty?

A. You will have 1 year for the full replacement warranty. Shipping will be paid for by the buyer. In the future, we will try to establish service centers in all over the world.

Q. Is open source SDK available for developers?

A. Yes, we will release the open source SDK.

Q. Is there any referral programs to support 24PI7?

A. Yes, please see the referral program description below.

Q. Do you have a working prototype?

A. No, all pictures shown here are conceptual designs. we will make real working prototype after successful funding.

 

.... We will add more Q&A as more supporters contact us.


Referral Program

Help us spread the word - We need your support

  • Get 1 free watch for every 10 watches referred
  • Get  10$ off  by posting about our campaign on your Google plus, facebook and twitter.
  • Get 30$ off by posting about our campaign on your Facebook page that has a minimum of 200 friends/followers  or 1000 followers in Twitter or 200 google plus circle
  • Bloggers special - get 50$ off by posting article about our campaign in your blog or other websites (Tech related , should be followed by at least 500 persons / 1000 visitors per day to the particular article page). 

Please  use your own referral  link below our video.
story_txt:
24PI7
The next generation Automatic Mechanical SMART watch

Introducing the next generation of mechanical watches: the 24PI7 SMART watch. At your convenience, it is an easy-to-read classic mechanical watch, while combining the technologically advanced features of a smart watch. One of the features includes a modern Bluetooth watch.  A clear LCD display to keep you connected to the internet. This unique combination is offered at a special price for Indiegogo supporters. 

24PI7 is the only Hybrid Mechanical smart watch in the market with the classic traditional look. It has a 11mm thickness that gives you a feeling of wearing a luxury jewelry watch. 24PI7 is not just a watch, it's a social status.
Mechanical features


Smooth high grade stainless steel scratch resistance body gives Elegant classic look, which can be worn for any occasions.
High end Automatic Mechanical movement with 28800 vibrations per hour, 24 Jewels and  42 hours of power reserve
Scratch proof Gorilla® Glass.
 5 ATM water resistance that lets you bath, or even swim with it.

 
Smart features
PMOLED display with vivid lifelike colors that show any screen in a sharp way. Currently, we are working to further improve it to a 1.44" inch TFT display with 128 x 128 resolution.
Has Bluetooth communication that receives instant notifications (vibration) from Android and iOS devices

Answer or reject incoming calls
Make and receive Skype calls
Access to Twitter, facebook,whatsapp,Twitter communications
Anti lost feature, you can NEVER lose your phone
Day-by-day weather reports
Flight status
Lock or unlock the screen
Answer of reject calls
Set Alarm and reminders
NFC to unlock doors, exchange contact details etc.,

--> Listen and control music from your mobile device or from inbuilt storage
--> Sleep monitor
--> Flight alerts
Track outdoor activities like cycling, golf, running, swimming, etc.,

 
An in-built GPS navigator that gives you accurate locations, without even using the internet

 
24-36 hours of battery life in heavy usage. 24PI7 comes with an unique USB charger


 
Tech Specifics:

Stainless steel 316L
Gorilla® Glass 3
42 mm Diameter watch
22/20 mm Stainless steel strap. The black leather strap is optional.
Mechanical movement with 28800 vibrations per hour, 24 Jewels and  42 hours of power reserve.
PMOLED display with 96 x 64 resolution,. Currently, we are working to further improve it to a TFT display with 128 x128 pixel resolution.
360 mAh battery
Vibrator
Water resistance - 5 ATM
3 Axis accelerometer
Android Kit kat
Bluetooth 2.1+ EDR and 4.0 BLE iOS devices.
Internal storage - 4GB
800 MHz Single core processor with 512 MB RAM
