story:
So It Begins…

Beauty, energy and spiritual vibrations are all around us,
so why not wear them?


The Journey

As a psychic and crystal healer, one difficulty was obtaining stones and
carrying them on our person for their properties and attributes.
-Jewelry is widely used, but finding the combinations needed is often difficult
-People often spent way beyond their budget on mismatched pieces.

Native American studies and training utilized a great solution
for PART of the problem, the Medicine Bag.
-Several stones of choice can fit into the bag and be worn around the neck.
-The pouch was paintable, and could be customized with symbols.

However…
-Leather, like silk and plastic, seals stone energy from releasing
frequencies into the aura.
-The style did not go well with much other than very casual dress.

It was a long journey that brought forth
the exquisite stones and metals for this line…
conceived from my paintings, dreams, meditations & journeys.
The collection was created with fluidity and movement
Full of light, life and energy.
To see my visions come to life I decided only Jewelry would convey my story.
My first collection, “The Sacred Feminine”,
was birthed from my Grandmother’s best friend’s broken Rosary and
my beautiful friend who inspired my collection, Terri Riha.
It was a long journey that brought forth
the powerful stones and metals for this line.

Golden Hawk

A Shamanic Counselor, teacher and practitioner, as well as,
a multi-media artist, designer and writer for over 30 years.
Phoenix Fyr Collections is launching with the
Limited Editions of ‘The Divine Mother’ and ‘Phoenix Wing Enhancers’.
This collection springs from a combination of many skills and a
lifetime journey into the sacred.
This is the realization of a dream that began in childhood, making jewelry at my grandmother's kitchen table, almost 50 years ago.

Angelia F. English

How Phoenix Fyr got started

In 2012, I was reunited with Terri Riha; and in 2013 I flew to Arizona to meet with her again in person. She is a marketing specialist, but I had gone down to teach some classes she had set up for me with some groups down there, but she also wanted to review my portfolio. I did not include my jewelry designs in this
because my pieces were one of a kind, and I rarely even took pictures of what was essentially someone else's sacred piece.

As usual, I was wearing a personal piece, my Egyptian Menat, which I created as a solution to a streamlined, elegant Medicine Bag. She fell in love with it, and I told her it was a one of a kind, one of my pieces. Terri insisted I start creating jewelry again, tossed a piece of cloth on her kitchen counter, and started taking pictures and making phone calls. She was right, everything was almost perfect. I had the paintings for the symbolism in my portfolio, and the Menat. I knew what was needed for the Amulet, with dozens of different stone combinations.

Terri Riha sent my Egyptian Menat to a major brand name marketing company representative, telling me that she was going to put my jewelry out “on the market”.

2 weeks later I received a call.

Terri said her contact is very interested my design, that the company wants to see my jewelry ‘sets’. This particular company was actually actively looking for a designer of more 'spiritual' jewelry, created by one who understood and could produce all the stone, cultural, and spiritual information.  I laughed,and said, “I don’t have any SETS of jewelry right now”. She replied, “Well, pull out your portfolio and put something together in Power Point. You have 2 weeks.”

I am a shaman, and an artist, so I went through my paintings, and pulled out 5 of my favorite paintings to start creating the first 2 sets.

Within that 2 week period, I did the renderings and completed a PowerPoint presentation, with my information on the attributes of the imagery and stones as well as with the proposed packaging. The representative was impressed, and I was given a fulfillment list for September.

The Divine Mother Collection and
Phoenix Wing Enhancer Collection were born.


By the end of May 2013, I had been in personal contact with the Buyers Rep, and they had started making offers to me. I was also given a new fulfillment list for the next meeting, in October,in person. While doing the marketing and research reports as well as working on my copyrights, I called my family connections that began clear back with my Grandmother, to make the first sets of jewelry, and now…

A single ‘Master Set’ of the jewelry was used in all the photos. Each piece pictured is from that set: Menat Chain, White Onyx Pendulum,
Faceted Clear Quartz Pieces. The difference in color, has to do with the way light travels through and is reflected and diffused
by the stones. Sometimes the pieces seem almost colorless, but in motion they are alive with Color and Light!

What Makes these Collections so Unique?

-Designs are so different they have been awarded Copyrights
-New perspective of the ancient that speaks to our souls
-Imagery aligns with the fire and strength of the Sacred Feminine
-‘Medicine Bag’ streamlined, elegant and personalized
-Amulet allows the smallest stones and beads to be used
-Energetically balanced through Icons as well as minerals
-Pieces are interchangeable as life transitions occur
-Separate velvet/suede pouches for individual pieces
-Unique 8 pocket pouch that also holds two cuffs
-Pouches transport and protect pieces, and any other jewelry
-Convenient scrolls put properties and attributes at your fingertips
-The line is created as an art collectible.

Minerals chosen for their values,
attributes, and beauty.

Real Semi-Precious and Precious Stones,

SYNERGY

The combined or connected energy of these stones is wonderful and very powerful for bringing in a great deal of light and bio-physical energy. It brings a great boost to the aura and one's personal vibration, as well as grounding it into the Chakras, high to low, and the physical body. Your personal energy increases, with even more available, as it draws guidance to you and brings the psychic abilities you already have to your attention. In addition to this, it initiates a different type of protection: one that turns negative and unwanted foreign energies sent forward moving into a higher vibration, rather than deflecting negativity off you towards others. It also helps Empaths recognize what is not their own! A great booster for those highly spiritual, and gently effective for those new to the path. 
GoldenHawk

What are the benefits of wearing these minerals?

Metals held sacred through the Ages…

-SILVER-

“Reflection, Psychic Influence & Inner Awareness” Identified with the Eternal Mother Hat-Hor, said to bestow deep inner reflection, a natural connection to

Divine Timing, and life cycles. Like a tidal sea of energy it attracts, absorbs, deflects, & dissolves. Being non-magnetic it stimulates release of that which no longer
serves, often bringing awareness of deeply held blocks in all bodies, physical as well as energetic. Protective & healing to the psyche. When used in settings or
stones, worn as jewelry, it amplifies the stones attributes, releases the energy into one’s aura & syncs one with Divine timing.

-COPPER-

A ‘fountain of youth’, the metal of Auset (Isis), the Queen of Heaven, said to bestow her Divine Attributes on the wearer. Through the ages, claims have
been made in the use of copper to stop and even reverse signs of aging. Nefertiti, Cleopatra & the Queen of Sheba were said to use copper based skin cream to retain
& improve youth & beauty. A conductor and bridge for energy between individuals, bodies, space & other minerals. Enhances the properties of all stones & crystals. Draws out toxins, physical & spiritual. For 1000s of years it has been used to treat arthritis, parasites, gray hair, burns, bruising, pain & swelling in muscles & joints,
viral and bacterial infections. Symptoms gradually decrease as elasticity, flexibility & synaptic response improve. Now known to be an essential micro-nutrient, needed for blood, protein metabolism, cell formation, production of RNA, enzyme activity, hair and skin color, and nerve health.
Used as an active ingredient in expensive skin treatments.

-RHODIUM-

Associated with the Egyptian Goddess Nieth, ‘The Weaver’, ‘Womb of Light ‘Used in ancient civilizations for magical and alchemical properties long before its re-discovery in the 1800’s. Wearing jewelry with Rhodium brings a complex & catalytic connection with the ‘Web of Light’, focused on Ascension & Restoration. Invokes power to change in a balanced, cohesive & Harmonized way by effecting the individual on all levels: body, mind & spirit. Connects with higher vibrations of personal and mass consciousness. Involved in: brain & gland function, cognition, IQ, emotional development, memory, thymus, adrenal, hypothalamus, pineal balance, sleep regulation, restoration regeneration of tissue & DNA, used to improve: deteriorating cell tissue, mental attitude, hormonal, emotional, menstrual Balance. To alleviate: headaches, twitching, irritability & panic attacks. Rhodon means Rose, directly associated with the Virgin Mary, Mary the Mother of God.

The DIVINE MOTHER

{on the left : Suspended in a drop of light, representing ‘The Tear of Hathor’, released rom the Eye of  RA , upon  Her return from which came the Gods and Man}

{on the right : Bursting free from the Duat, on a spray of inspirational stars, bringing color and light into a new dawn.}

Her names are your names. She is daughter, sister, mother, wife and partner, as well as she who walks alone. Many fold and as multi-faceted as the stars in the Heavens. Virgin or whore, pauper or Queen, she is the balance, the missing piece that brings wholeness into what has been a broken, chaotic, war torn and disposable world. Symbol of life, abundance, healing, loving protection, peace and personal-empowerment: the feminine face of God.

At the age of about 4, I began a life long journey into what is now called the ‘Sacred Feminine’. I began with what was available, the Children’s Bible. Starting with stories of Mary, then Eve, I finally found Sarah, Rebecca, Deborah, Leah, and Egypt. In Egypt, I found The Goddess. Through history, legend, music, mythology, poetry, ceremony, dance and art from many ancient cultures around the world, I experienced the sacred female.

Almost 45 years after beginning my journey, and with all of our new technology and communications, the Divine Feminine has made herself known again.

Through the ancient arts of design, painting, metal-smithing and stone cutting, I am making her icons, legends, lore and symbolism readily available, constructed with high quality metals and real semi-precious and precious stones made as my offering for the goddess: You. 
Angelia

Dedicated to the Sacred, Living, Divine Flame of Inspiration in all of us ...

the Divine Mother Collection

the Divine Mother Menat Set

1 set, 8 different ways to wear it

-Back ‘shield’ piece’ on the original Menat adds Stabilization and Balance to the piece (it just hangs better!)
-A beautiful way to add more healing and spiritual properties
-Comfortably wear heavier pieces even with neck injuries
-Protection for the Aura over what is energetically called the ‘Demons Gate’
-The Chapet piece worn in the back with short hair adds elegance
-The Chapet can be removed and used as a pendulum
-Purchase in a set, or collect individually
-You can add pieces you already own


the Phoenix Wing Enhancer Collection


As a child reading a history book, I can't remember the name of, I came across an old spelling of the word, ‘fire’. Whether it was Celtic, Welsh, Viking, I can’t remember, but
the meaning haunted me: fire from liquid or gas, “swamp fire”, spelled FYR. Then, reading the legends of the Phoenix, how it sprung forth from the heart of an Eternal God,
like the soul released into the heavens! Later, after reading the stories of The Goddess Hathor, and her tears, being the fluid seed for gods and men, I was inspired.
It lived in my subconscious, weaving through almost everything I did. And now, expressed in metal and stone, my representation of this process is combined
with ancient icons, based on earliest legends, and imagery.
I give you my dream, my vision.
Angelia

TRANSFORMATION INTO THE BENU BIRD (the Phoenix)

Up out of primeval matter. I came into being like the god Khepera. I germinated like the plants. I am concealed  like the tortoise [in his shell]. I am the seed of every god. I am Yesterday of the Four [Quarters of the Earth, and] the Seven Uraei, who came into being in the Eastern land. [I am] the Great One (Horus) who illumineth the Hememet spirits with the light of his body. [I am] that god in respect of Set. [I am] Thoth who [stood] between them (Horus and Set) as the judge on behalf of the Governor of Sekhem and the Souls of Anu. [He was like] a stream between them. I have come. I rise up on my throne. I am endowed with Khu. I am mighty. I am endowed with godhood among the gods. I am Khensu, [the lord] of every kind of strength. He shall see the  Disk [of the Sun], he shall be in good case upon earth before Ra and His word shall be truth in the sight of Osiris and no evil thing, what so ever, shall have dominion over him for ever  and  ever. 
The Book of Coming Forth by Day  Translated E.A. Wallis Budge

The PHOENIX  Self Created’ , ‘Lord of Jubilees ‘, ‘The Ascending One’

“I am the Bennu Bird, the Heart-Soul of RA, the Guide of the Gods through the underworld” (Egyptian book f the Dead). To ‘Become the Phoenix’ is to ‘Rise Brilliantly’ to ‘Shine’.
Legend is that the Phoenix burst forth from the heart of Osiris during His Resurrection. RA is re-born through the seeding of Light into Auset (Isis) creating the Horus line of
God-Kings, attaining Immortality through awakening, burning to ashes the old and painful, as it rises into new life. Its cry is the most beautiful song, giving the Sun pause as
its voice rises to the Heavens. Said to always return to Egypt to rest upon The Ben Ben Stone in The Temple of the Phoenix, considered one of the most sacred places on
Earth until The Stone was stolen, the temple defiled. A universal symbol of free will, healing & ascension spanning thousands of years, bridging time & cultures.

The WINGED DISK


Ancient, often carved in stone to last for eternity, associated with royalty, governance, power. Representing the ‘true light’ of ascension which humanity is to attain through revelation,

awareness and responsibility. A symbol worn by Light Bearers, in the name of RA (the light) and Horus, a sign of the new Golden Age of Sovereignty.




A Contract in Good Faith is Broken,
The Dream is Nearly Shattered! 

After weeks of near silence with messages of ‘I am moving’, on launch day for our Website, Social Media and Crowd funding, the owner of the company
we hired and paid $7,500.00 to build our sites and Crowd funding contacted us and said he was not delivering. We had almost nothing, and what
little he had done was wrong and under phoenixfyr.net, not our .com. Our professionally produced film wasn’t edited or converted…we were in trouble!


 Women with Mad Skills, Terri, Jane and Marie are Professionals in PR and marketing, and they have moved forward with all the Social Networking and doing what they do so well. Only 2 had technology or web skills at all. Annelise, a Jr High school class in website building, and Jo who had some HTML. My mother is editing! We went to work November 1st. On November 4th, we had completely re-built the website, with the same files we had sent to the Website and Marketing Company. This is Day 3 of creating the first Crowd Funding Campaign or Project. Our Video was never edited, compressed or converted, so, we did one. This has been a huge set back. The *Media Launch, which you are reading a segment of now, is in process. It is next on the Fulfillment list. At this point, we have $45,000.00 invested into the Phoenix Fyr Collections,

What we need this Crowd Funding to accomplish....

-MEDIA LAUNCH

-Web Site-Social Media-Crowd Funding

-PROOF of CONCEPT

-Response to Media Launch and Web Presence is reported

-PROOF of QUALITY in QUANTITY

-a minimum of 5000 pieces must be of consistent Quality

This is where Crowd Funding comes in, and why
it is so important.

We need an additional $15,000 dollars
and your response

To complete this Fulfillment List, The Phoenix Fyr team is asking for your involvement and backing to finish this project. 900 pouches have been received and inspected 1500 pieces of jewelry are expected to be delivered and inspected by the end of November, with 2600  pieces remaining which this campaign will accomplish.  Your participation is what is necessary. Please Pledge, Fund, Contribute, and...   Check us out on FaceBook as Phoenix Fyr, Visit our Website phoenixfyr.com, Pin us, Tweet and tell your friends!

$15,000.00 will purchase, and ship
the remaining 2600 pieces for inspection.

After more than 2 years of perfecting, testing and meetings fulfillments...

High quality custom size and cut stones
Specialty A+ faceted beads
Custom fittings and findings
Hand cut waxes
Hand made molds
Investors
The metals
Copyrights
Market research reports
Prototypes for testing   

The first step was the most difficult without Sherri, my original metalsmith. I had never done metalwork pieces without her. The designer pieces were her metalsmith work and my designs. I called her brother, Tom, at Handley’s Rock and Jewelry and it became very simple. Tom said he would be more than happy to custom cut my stones for the jewelry and that he would make a few phone calls.  Within hours of initial contact, he had called their current metalsmith and arranged for me to meet with her. He also contacted a wax maker for me.



At Handley’s Rock and Jewelry store in Vancouver, I spoke with Arlene Handley, known for her wall of personally hand-picked strands of stone beads and the information that goes with them. She immediately began taking down beads, and pulling specialty jewelers fittings/findings out for me. She shared expert advice, and said that she’d help me throughout the process.

Then, I had waxes fabricated. I was very unhappy with the machined waxes, and wanted something better, but I had no idea who could hand cut waxes like Sherry did. I decided, during our appointment, to ask Beth from Overcast Studio about my situation. When I told her the machine pieces from my renderings were NOT going to work out for me, she said she could HAND CARVE the waxes, make hand pressed molds, and do the first jewelry with reclaimed silverware. She laughed and asked what the family silver looked like. The costs went up at that point, but the Originals had to be hand cut. Designer pieces from start to finish.

Jo Diamond came in as an investor at this point, making the next steps possible. Hand carved waxes and hand-made molds are incredibly expensive, but it. I was pleased that she agreed. She wanted the jewelry as much as Terri did. I signed her on, and we waited for the completion, as the price of silver went up.

The waxes and molds were coming close to completion, and I had chosen silver for the metal for the first set for a multitude of reasons. Beth's comment about the silverware drifted through my mind again, and a light bulb went off: Paul Hamilton and Norbert Anderson, who I’d been working with for gems and minerals as well as estate jewelry for my one of a kind Menats, for decades. I contacted Paul and made an appointment. I told them my situation: I had no family silver, and a limited budget for this. Norbert generously donated me a sum of cash and Paul Hamilton started handing me mis-matched silverware by the fistfuls. Their support was very important; They have been in the jewelry business since the ‘80’s.  Norbert said ‘copyright, Copyright, COPYRIGHT’. I told him I was on it!

On August 10th I had submitted 36 copyrights (with 117 derivatives). The process was intense, and even with the background I had in jewelry making, this was a new and different world, I was learning more as I went, while the silverware from Paul was steadily becoming the first complete prototypes for Quality Control and my testers. Tom was hard at work on more stones.

There was a great deal of market research involved, and I was finalizing my 248 page document around the middle of September. The gem suppliers I had been dealing with for over 20 years from India and Bali were no longer at U.S. gem shows and the orders I had made were arriving with the wrong stones, incorrect measurements and findings. A jewelry designer friend of mine suggested a new stone supplier elsewhere, and made the connections happen. The stones were fabulous! I went to work with this new company for the test pieces. Between Handley’s Rock & Jewelry, Overcast Studios, and this new company, I had 12 sets of jewelry prototypes ready go through 18 months of rigorous testing. I traveled in October for a personal meeting with the marketing company representative. I turned over 3 sets of prototypes for Quality Control, and learned there was interest from 3 additional Countries. I also received a new fulfilment list. It was very in depth, but I had around a year, because the jewelry had to be tested by people who would wear it, and the production designs had to be tested also. I knew there would be changes coming.

A team of Testers and Investors come together...

Estheticians, Doctors, Contractors, Marketing Specialists, Physicists, Pilots,

Astrologers, Publicists, Musicians, Healers, Chefs, Bartenders, Weavers.

Mothers, Sisters, Daughters, Friends. The Wind that feeds the Fyr.

We immediately start on the new Fulfillment list
LLC
.com
Social media sites
High Quality Reproduction Company
Stone Supplier
Logos
Trademark
Packaging (Finished Scrolls & Pouches)
Pictures for Website
Social Media Specialist

This deal was not JUST for the jewelry itself, but for a complete package deal. I would have a website containing not just the jewelry but also the information from the Scrolls of Lore and Legend with the attributes of the metals and stones, as well as that of the Icons which is part of the packaging.

-Over $10,000.00 was invested into the Website: A highly
recommended web builder was hired, purchased the .com domain,
and created the logos and trademarks.

-The perfect stones and minerals were already chosen,
the reproduction company was in place, and the designs were updated.
It was time to start producing the pieces, build the website
and commence with networking.

-After completing the 18 months of testing, $25,000.00 has been
invested in the first reproductions of Jewelry, Art, scrolls and packaging.
900 pouches & scrolls and 1500 pieces of jewelry are here.

For packaging, I connected with a trusted company; one that would meet
my specific design needs.
They acquired suede velvet in microfiber to make some of the pouches,
in order to help protect from tarnishing.
They assisted in the setting and sizing of my logos. I went to a local print shop
that worked well with me, & this too is completed.

I contacted my friend, Bill Bungard, (photographer to rock stars!) and he did a couple photo shoots with me for the
social media, website and jewelry pictures that were needed. Bill did extraordinary work with me and everything looked great.

Marketing and Social Media has $5,000.00 invested
Office Expenses and Travel has received $5,000.00 also…
We have invested over $45,000.00.

Golden Hawk


A
Shamanic Counselor, teacher and practitioner, as well as,a multi-media artist,
designer and writer for over 30 years.
Phoenix Fyr Collections is launching with the Limited Editions of ‘The
Divine Mother’ and ‘Phoenix Wing
Enhancers’.
This collection springs from a combination of many skills and alifetime
journey into the sacred.
This is the realization of a dream that began in childhood, making jewelry at
my grandmother's kitchen table, almost 50 years ago.


Angelia F.
English


How Phoenix Fyr got
started


In 2012, I was reunited with Terri Riha; and in 2013 I flew to Arizona to meet
with her again in person. She is a marketing specialist, but I had gone down to teach some classes she had set up for me with some
groups down there, but she also wanted to review my portfolio. I did not
include my jewelry designs in thisbecause my pieces were one of a kind, and I rarely
even took pictures of what was essentially someone else's sacred piece. As usual, I was wearing a personal
piece, my Egyptian Menat, which I created as a solution to a streamlined,
elegant Medicine Bag. She fell in love with it, and I told her it was a one of a kind, one of my
pieces. Terri insisted I start creating jewelry again, tossed a piece of cloth on
her kitchen counter, and started taking pictures and making phone calls. She was
right, everything was almost perfect. I had the paintings for the symbolism in my portfolio, and the Menat. I knew what was needed for the Amulet, with
dozens of different stone combinations. 

Terri Riha sent my Egyptian Menat to a
major brand name marketing company representative, telling me that she was going to put my jewelry out “on the market”.


2 weeks later I received a call.

Terri said her contact is very interested my design, that the company wants to
see my jewelry ‘sets’. This particular company was actually actively looking for a designer of more 'spiritual' jewelry, created by one who
understood and could produce all the stone, cultural, and spiritual
information.  I laughed,and said, “I don’t have any SETS of jewelry right now”. She replied, “Well,
pull out your portfolio and put something together in Power Point. You have 2
weeks.”
I am a shaman, and an artist, so I went through my paintings, and pulled out 5
of my favorite paintings to start creating the first 2 sets.

Within that 2 week period, I did the
renderings and completed a PowerPoint presentation, with my information on the
attributes of the imagery and stones as well as with the proposed packaging. The representative was impressed, and I
was given a fulfillment list for September.



The Divine Mother
Collection and Phoenix Wing Enhancer Collection were born.








By
the end of May 2013, I had been in personal contact with the Buyers Rep, and
they had started making offers to me. I was also given a new fulfillment list
for the next meeting, in October,in person.
While doing the marketing and research reports as well as working on my
copyrights, I called my family connections that began clear back with my
Grandmother, to make the first sets of jewelry, and now…


A
single ‘Master Set’ of the jewelry was used in all the photos. Each piece
pictured is from that set: Menat Chain, White Onyx Pendulum, 
Faceted Clear Quartz Pieces. The difference in color, has to do with the way
light travels through and is reflected and diffused 
by the stones. Sometimes the pieces seem almost colorless, but in motion they
are alive with Color and Light!


What Makes these Collections so Unique?


-Designs are so different
they have been awarded Copyrights-New perspective of the ancient
that speaks to our souls-Imagery aligns with the fire and strength of the Sacred Feminine-‘Medicine Bag’ streamlined, elegant and personalized-Amulet allows the
smallest stones and beads to be used-Energetically balanced through Icons as well as minerals-Pieces are interchangeable as life transitions occur-Separate velvet/suede
pouches for individual pieces-Unique 8 pocket pouch that also holds two cuffs-Pouches transport and protect pieces, and any other jewelry-Convenient scrolls put properties and attributes at your fingertips-The line is created as an art collectible.


Minerals chosen for their
values, attributes, and beauty.

Real Semi-Precious and Precious Stones, 











SYNERGY




The combined or connected
energy of these stones is wonderful and very powerful for bringing in a great
deal of light and bio-physical energy. It brings a great boost to the aura and one's personal vibration,
as well as grounding it into the Chakras, high to low, and the physical body.
Your personal energy increases, with even more available, as it draws guidance to you and brings
the psychic abilities you already have to your attention. In addition to this,
it initiates a different type of protection: one that turns negative and unwanted foreign energies
sent forward moving into a higher vibration, rather than deflecting negativity
off you towards others. It also helps Empaths recognize what is not their own! A great booster for those highly spiritual, and gently
effective for those new to the path.  GoldenHawk



What are the benefits of
wearing these minerals?



Metals held sacred through the Ages…


-SILVER- “Reflection,
Psychic Influence & Inner Awareness” Identified with the Eternal Mother
Hat-Hor, said to bestow deep inner reflection, a natural connection toDivine Timing, and life cycles. Like a tidal sea of energy it attracts,
absorbs, deflects, & dissolves. Being non-magnetic it stimulates release of
that which no longer
serves, often bringing awareness of deeply held blocks in all bodies, physical
as well as energetic. Protective & healing to the psyche. When used in
settings or
stones, worn as jewelry, it amplifies the stones attributes, releases the
energy into one’s aura & syncs one with Divine timing.


-COPPER- 
A
‘fountain of youth’, the metal of Auset (Isis), the Queen of Heaven, said to
bestow her Divine Attributes on the wearer. Through the ages, claims have 
been made in the use of copper to stop and even reverse signs of aging.
Nefertiti, Cleopatra & the Queen of Sheba were said to use copper based
skin cream to retain 
& improve youth & beauty. A conductor and bridge for energy between
individuals, bodies, space & other minerals. Enhances the properties of all
stones & crystals. Draws
out toxins, physical & spiritual. For 1000s of years it has been used to treat
arthritis, parasites, gray hair, burns, bruising, pain & swelling in
muscles & joints, 
viral and bacterial infections. Symptoms gradually decrease as elasticity,
flexibility & synaptic response improve. Now known to be an essential
micro-nutrient, needed for blood, protein metabolism, cell formation, production of RNA, enzyme activity,
hair and skin color, and nerve health. Used as an active ingredient in expensive
skin treatments.


-RHODIUM- 
Associated
with the Egyptian Goddess Nieth, ‘The Weaver’, ‘Womb of Light ‘Used in ancient
civilizations for magical and alchemical properties long before its re-discovery in the 1800’s. Wearing
jewelry with Rhodium brings a complex & catalytic connection with the ‘Web
of Light’, focused on Ascension & Restoration. Invokes power to change in a balanced, cohesive
& Harmonized way by effecting the individual on all levels: body, mind
& spirit. Connects with higher vibrations of personal and mass consciousness. Involved in: brain
& gland function, cognition, IQ, emotional development, memory, thymus,
adrenal, hypothalamus, pineal balance, sleep regulation, restoration regeneration of tissue & DNA, used to improve: deteriorating
cell tissue, mental attitude, hormonal, emotional, menstrual Balance. To
alleviate: headaches, twitching, irritability & panic attacks. Rhodon means Rose, directly
associated with the Virgin Mary, Mary the Mother of God.



The
DIVINE MOTHER







{on the left : Suspended in a drop of light, representing ‘The
Tear of Hathor’, released rom the Eye of 
RA , upon  Her return from which
came the Gods and Man}{on the right : Bursting free from the Duat, on a spray of
inspirational stars,
bringing color and light into a new dawn.}
Her names are your names. She is daughter,
sister, mother, wife and partner, as well as she who walks alone. Many fold and
as multi-faceted as the stars in the Heavens. Virgin or whore, pauper or Queen, she is the balance, the missing piece that
brings wholeness into what has been a broken, chaotic, war torn and disposable
world. Symbol of life, abundance, healing, loving protection, peace and
personal-empowerment: the feminine face of God.
At the age of about 4, I
began a life long journey into what is now called the ‘Sacred Feminine’. I
began with what was available, the Children’s Bible. Starting with stories of Mary, then Eve, I finally found Sarah, Rebecca, Deborah, Leah, and
Egypt. In Egypt, I found The Goddess.
Through history, legend,
music, mythology, poetry, ceremony, dance and art from many ancient cultures
around the world, I experienced the sacred female. 

Almost 45 years after beginning my journey, and with all of our new technology
and communications, the Divine Feminine has made herself known again. 

Through the ancient arts of design, painting, metal-smithing and stone cutting,
I am making her icons, legends, lore and symbolism readily available, constructed
with high quality metals and real semi-precious and precious stones made as my offering for the
goddess: You.  Angelia

Dedicated to the Sacred, Living, Divine Flame of
Inspiration in all of us ...






the Divine Mother
Collection


the
Divine Mother Menat Set










1
set, 8 different ways to wear it


-Back
‘shield’ piece’ on the original Menat adds Stabilization
and Balance to the piece (it just hangs better!)
-A beautiful way to add more healing and spiritual properties
-Comfortably wear heavier pieces even with neck injuries
-Protection for the Aura over what is energetically called the ‘Demons Gate’
-The Chapet piece worn in the back with short hair adds elegance 
-The Chapet can be removed and used as a pendulum
-Purchase in a set, or collect individually
-You can add pieces you already own



















the Phoenix Wing Enhancer Collection










As
a child reading a history book, I can't remember the name of, I came across an
old spelling of the word, ‘fire’. Whether it was Celtic, Welsh, Viking, I can’t
remember, but 
the meaning haunted me: fire from liquid or gas, “swamp fire”, spelled FYR. Then,
reading the legends of the Phoenix, how it sprung forth from the heart of an
Eternal God,
like the soul released into the heavens!
Later, after reading the stories of The Goddess Hathor, and her tears, being
the fluid seed for gods and men, I was inspired.
It lived in my subconscious, weaving
through almost everything I did. And now, expressed in metal and stone, my
representation of this process is combined
with ancient icons, based on earliest
legends, and imagery. I give you my dream, my vision. Angelia

TRANSFORMATION INTO THE
BENU BIRD (the Phoenix)


Up
out of primeval matter. I came into being like the god Khepera. I germinated
like the plants. I am concealed  like the
tortoise [in his shell]. I am the seed of every god. I am Yesterday of the Four
[Quarters of the Earth, and] the Seven Uraei, who came into being in the
Eastern land. [I am] the Great One (Horus) who illumineth the Hememet spirits
with the light of his body. [I am] that god in respect of Set. [I am] Thoth who
[stood] between them (Horus and Set) as the judge on behalf of the Governor of
Sekhem and the Souls of Anu. [He was like] a stream between them. I have come.
I rise up on my throne. I am endowed with Khu. I am mighty. I am endowed with
godhood among the gods. I am Khensu, [the lord] of every kind of strength. He
shall see the  Disk [of the Sun], he
shall be in good case upon earth before Ra and His word shall be truth in the
sight of Osiris and no evil thing, what so ever, shall have dominion over him
for ever  and  ever. 
The Book of Coming Forth by Day 
Translated E.A. Wallis Budge


The
PHOENIX  Self
Created’ , ‘Lord of Jubilees ‘, ‘The Ascending One’



“I
am the Bennu Bird, the Heart-Soul of RA, the Guide of the Gods through the
underworld” (Egyptian book f the Dead). To ‘Become the Phoenix’ is to ‘Rise
Brilliantly’ to ‘Shine’.
Legend is that the Phoenix burst forth
from the heart of Osiris during His Resurrection. RA is re-born through the
seeding of Light into Auset (Isis) creating the Horus line of
God-Kings, attaining Immortality through
awakening, burning to ashes the old and painful, as it rises into new life. Its
cry is the most beautiful song, giving the Sun pause as
its voice rises to the Heavens. Said to
always return to Egypt to rest upon The Ben Ben Stone in The Temple of the
Phoenix, considered one of the most sacred places on 
Earth until The Stone was stolen, the temple defiled. A universal symbol of
free will, healing & ascension spanning thousands of years, bridging time
& cultures.


The
WINGED DISK






Ancient,
often carved in stone to last for eternity, associated with royalty,
governance, power. Representing the ‘true light’ of ascension which humanity is
to attain through revelation, 


awareness
and responsibility. A symbol worn by Light Bearers, in the name of RA (the
light) and Horus, a sign of the new Golden Age of Sovereignty.


































A Contract in Good Faith is Broken, The Dream is
Nearly Shattered!  


After weeks of near silence with messages of ‘I
am moving’, on launch day for our Website, Social Media and Crowd funding, the
owner of the company 
we hired and paid $7,500.00 to build our sites and Crowd funding contacted us
and said he was not delivering. We had almost nothing, and what 
little he had done was wrong and under
phoenixfyr.net, not our .com. Our professionally produced film wasn’t edited or
converted…we were in trouble!













 Women with Mad Skills, Terri, Jane and Marie
are Professionals in PR and marketing, and they have moved forward with all the
Social Networking and doing what they do so well. Only 2
had technology or web skills at all. Annelise, a Jr High school class in
website building, and Jo who had some HTML. My mother is editing! We went to
work November 1st. On November 4th, we had completely re-built the
website, with the same files we had sent to the Website and Marketing Company.
This is Day 3 of creating the first Crowd Funding Campaign or Project. Our
Video was never edited, compressed or converted, so, we did one. This has
been a huge set back. The *Media Launch, which you are reading a segment of
now, is in process. It is next on the Fulfillment list. At this point, we
have $45,000.00 invested into the Phoenix Fyr Collections,


What we need this Crowd
Funding to accomplish....


-MEDIA LAUNCH


-Web Site-Social
Media-Crowd Funding


-PROOF of CONCEPT 


-Response to Media Launch and Web Presence is
reported


-PROOF of QUALITY in
QUANTITY
-a minimum of 5000 pieces must be of consistent Quality






This is where Crowd
Funding comes in, and why it is so important. 

We need an additional $15,000 dollars and your response 

To complete this
Fulfillment List, The Phoenix Fyr team is asking for your involvement and
backing to finish this project. 900 pouches have been received and inspected 1500 pieces
of jewelry are expected to be delivered and inspected by the end of November, with
2600  pieces remaining which this campaign will accomplish.  Your participation is what is necessary.
Please Pledge, Fund, Contribute, and...   Check us out on FaceBook
as Phoenix Fyr, Visit our Website phoenixfyr.com, Pin us, Tweet and tell your
friends! 
$15,000.00 will purchase, and ship the remaining 2600 pieces
for inspection.After more than 2 years of perfecting, testing and meetings
fulfillments...


High quality custom
size and cut stones
Specialty A+ faceted beads
Custom fittings and findings
Hand cut waxes
Hand made molds
Investors
The metals
Copyrights
Market research reports
Prototypes for testing    The first step was the
most difficult without Sherri, my original metalsmith. I had never done metalwork
pieces without her. The designer pieces were her metalsmith work and my
designs. I called her brother, Tom, at Handley’s Rock and Jewelry and it became
very simple. Tom said he would be more than happy to custom cut my stones for
the jewelry and that he would make a few phone calls.  Within hours of initial contact, he had
called their current metalsmith and arranged for me to meet with her. He also
contacted a wax maker for me. 




 

At Handley’s
Rock and Jewelry store in Vancouver, I spoke with Arlene Handley, known for her
wall of personally hand-picked strands of stone beads and the information that
goes with them. She immediately began taking down beads, and pulling specialty
jewelers fittings/findings out for me. She shared expert advice, and said that
she’d help me throughout the process.


Then, I had
waxes fabricated. I was very unhappy with the machined waxes, and wanted
something better, but I had no idea who could hand cut waxes like Sherry did. I
decided, during our appointment, to ask Beth from Overcast Studio about my
situation. When I told her the machine pieces from my renderings were NOT going
to work out for me, she said she could HAND CARVE the waxes, make hand pressed
molds, and do the first jewelry with reclaimed silverware. She laughed and asked
what the family silver looked like. The costs went up at that point, but the Originals
had to be hand cut. Designer pieces from start to finish.




Jo Diamond
came in as an investor at this point, making the next steps possible. Hand
carved waxes and hand-made molds are incredibly expensive, but it. I was
pleased that she agreed. She wanted the jewelry as much as Terri did. I signed
her on, and we waited for the completion, as the price of silver went up.


The waxes
and molds were coming close to completion, and I had chosen silver for the
metal for the first set for a multitude of reasons. Beth's comment about the
silverware drifted through my mind again, and a light bulb went off: Paul
Hamilton and Norbert Anderson, who I’d been working with for gems and minerals as
well as estate jewelry for my one of a kind Menats, for decades. I contacted
Paul and made an appointment. I told them my situation: I had no family silver,
and a limited budget for this. Norbert generously donated me a sum of cash and
Paul Hamilton started handing me mis-matched silverware by the fistfuls. Their
support was very important; They have been in the jewelry business since the
‘80’s.  Norbert said ‘copyright, Copyright,
COPYRIGHT’. I told him I was on it!






On August 10th I had submitted 36
copyrights (with 117 derivatives). The process was intense, and even with the
background I had in jewelry making, this was a new and different world, I was
learning more as I went, while the silverware from Paul was steadily becoming
the first complete prototypes for Quality Control and my testers. Tom was hard
at work on more stones. 


There was a great deal of market
research involved, and I was finalizing my 248 page document around the middle
of September. The gem suppliers I had been dealing with for over 20 years from India
and Bali were no longer at U.S. gem shows and the orders I had made were
arriving with the wrong stones, incorrect measurements and findings. A jewelry
designer friend of mine suggested a new stone supplier elsewhere, and made the connections
happen. The stones were fabulous! I went to work with this new company for the
test pieces. Between Handley’s Rock & Jewelry, Overcast Studios, and this
new company, I had 12 sets of jewelry prototypes ready go through 18 months of
rigorous testing. I traveled in October for a personal meeting with the
marketing company representative. I turned over 3 sets of prototypes for
Quality Control, and learned there was interest from 3 additional Countries. I
also received a new fulfilment list. It was very in depth, but I had around a
year, because the jewelry had to be tested by people who would wear it, and the
production designs had to be tested also. I knew there would be changes coming.




A
team of Testers and Investors come together...


Estheticians, Doctors, Contractors,
Marketing Specialists, Physicists, Pilots, 


Astrologers, Publicists, Musicians,
Healers, Chefs, Bartenders, Weavers.


Mothers, Sisters, Daughters, Friends. The Wind
that feeds the Fyr.










We immediately start on
the new Fulfillment list
LLC
.com
Social media sites
High Quality Reproduction Company 
Stone Supplier
Logos
Trademark
Packaging (Finished Scrolls & Pouches)
Pictures for Website 
Social Media Specialist
This deal was not JUST for the jewelry itself, but for a complete package deal.
I would have a website containing not just the jewelry but also the information from the Scrolls of
Lore and Legend with the attributes of the metals and stones, as well as
that of the Icons which is part of the packaging.
-Over $10,000.00 was invested into the Website: A highly recommended web builder was hired, purchased the .com domain, and created the logos and
trademarks. 
-The perfect stones and
minerals were already chosen,
the reproduction company was in place,
and the designs were updated. 
It was time to start producing the pieces, build the website and commence with
networking.
-After completing the 18 months of testing, $25,000.00 has been 
invested in the first reproductions of Jewelry, Art, scrolls and packaging.
900 pouches & scrolls and 1500 pieces of jewelry are here.



For packaging, I connected with a trusted
company; one that would meet my specific design needs. 
They acquired suede velvet in microfiber to make some of the pouches, in order
to help protect from tarnishing. 
They assisted in the setting and sizing of my logos. I went to a local print
shop that worked well with me, & this too is completed.











I contacted my friend, Bill Bungard, (photographer
to rock stars!) and he did a couple photo shoots with me for the 
social media, website and jewelry pictures that were needed. Bill did
extraordinary work with me and everything looked great.



Marketing and Social
Media has $5,000.00 invested
Office Expenses and Travel has received $5,000.00 also…
We have invested over $45,000.00.

story:
About this project


Motivation

Imagine risking your life on a glass of clean water. For an astounding amount of people around the world, this is daily reality. The numbers are staggering. Over nine-thousand deaths occur around the world every day due to water water bourn illnesses, and nearly nine-hundred-million people world wide lack access to clean water. However, our world doesn't have to remain this way.

Together, we can close the gap between those with access to clean water, and those without.


Eight Hundred

Its not only a rad Tee shirt design of ours; on average, over eight hundred litres of clean water is created every year by each piece in our line. Every quarter of a year, funds from Living Water Apparel are invested into global water projects. Our primary partner, Turn on the Tap, is a non-profit program that functions around the world, constructing wells and bio sand filters, as well as providing water sanitation training for the recipients. This process isn't a quick or simple fix, and the solutions are not cheap. However, the reliable life expectancy of one bio sand filter alone runs in the vicinity of 15 to 20 years.  The funds from just one hoodie or tee shirt can produce up to 1,200 litres of water clean water per year.

Swag

All Living Water Apparel is sourced and produced responsibly. We print here in Canada on Bella Canvas apparel, and we stand by our production process with unwavering commitment to quality. Many hours have been spent on design refinements, and the evidence is in the fit, feel, and look of our Apparel. As with anything made with love, you'll just get it. We believe design is like soup. Those without attention to detail may not notice the difference between one pot and the other. But, like a pinch of salt can save the batch, so good design can bring life to any project.  In the process of achieving this "saltiness", we have had the pleasure of working together with a lot of people we love, and we really couldn't be more proud of the results.

Don't forget, kids, tags are out.  Freshen up and love your wardrobe even more with our itch-free, screen printed labels


Progression

We will be spending the remainder of 2015 processing pledges and preparing for fulfillment in mid February.  Once the campaign has concluded, we will send out an order details survey to hear about your choices in size and colour. Shipping shall begin in mid February, and your swag should arrive within two to three weeks.


Team


Jonathan Colp,

Founder and visionary. Highly driven entrepreneur with a passion for water and the great outdoors. Jonathan resides one hour East of the Rockies in Lethbridge, Canada.

Kye Bowman,

Business parter and supervisor of logistics. Musician and armchair business enthusiast, with a love for good coffee. Kye resides one hour East of the Rockies in Lethbridge, Canada.

Spencer Paddock,

Branding and design.  Religious longborder, and mild adrenaline junky. Spencer resides one hour East of the Rockies in Lethbridge, Canada.

Timothy Harder,

Media, and Filmography.  Partaker of various and sundry hipster activities, and lover of art.  Timothy resides in Bragg Creek, Canada 


Further Info

Lets connect: 

Facebook + Insta:    living water apparel

Email:                           livingwaterapparel.co@gmail.com


Bella Canvas has a solid reputation in quality of production. Designed and produced in L.A. California, using ring-spun cotton, their solar powered production line is 100% sweatshop free, and employees receive free yoga classes, in addition to other company perks. Bella Canvas is gold certified by the Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production agency (WRAP)

Timothy Harder is a filmmaker and co owner of Harder Brothers Productions based in Bragg Creek Alberta. The company has been in operation since 2013, and during the past three years the creativity they bring into any environment has allowed them to be involved in a wide variety of projects ranging from tourism and government media, to corporate promotional films, industrial documentation and even events like weddings and concerts.

www.harderbrothersproductions.ca


Risks and challenges

Risks are limited as long as we are able to get full support on the pledged budget. Having said that, and regardless of the great control we have over our supply chain, sometimes problems arise, as any manufacturing process at high volumes, processes can be delayed. Rest assured, we have done everything in our power to avoid such delays. Our partners have the ability to respond quickly to these unexpected situations.

story:
Your $mart Closet’s mission is to provide an Eco-friendly fashion solution that protects our planet.



Did you know that the U.S. Fashion market is a $230 billion dollar industry?  Or, that the U.S. spends 5 times more on clothes NOW than it did in 1980?



Here’s the problem

  • 13.1 million tons of textiles are discarded annually
  • 70 pounds of textiles per person go into our landfills
  • Only 15% of textiles are reclaimed or recycled



Your $mart Closet has the solution:

  • Provides access to quality NEW and like new fashions that can be exchanged for an affordable price of ONLY $29.95
  • Embraces the shared economy by also accepting donations for recycling to reduce the negative impact of textile waste in our landfills
  • Builds a community of like-minded women who are changing the fashion world by being fashionable with a purpose



Your $mart Closet Exchange Works in 3 simple steps:

Step 1: Begin Your Search on www.yoursmartcloset.com

Step 2: Request any item for ONLY $29.95 and receive in 5-7 business days

Step 3: Use the easy pre-paid label and reusable envelope to send your exchange item to us for FREE.  We do the rest!

Thank you for being an Eco-fashionista!


Your $mart Closet also welcomes your clothing donations and we’ll provide the envelope and shipping label for FREE!  We will sort through your donated clothing items and ensure that every item has a home or is recycled.



Be part of the solution. Your contribution:

  • Will help improve our website, help build an infrastructure to manage scalability, and help us market this Eco-fashion movement
  • Will help build an inventory of quality and stylish clothing
  • Will help fund Dress For Success Austin—10% of your contribution will be gifted to them so they can continue the great work they do every day

The impact:

  • By donating unwanted clothing for recycling, we help reduce landfill waste
  • By providing fashions for exchange, we make quality items available to women at an affordable price
  • By building an inventory of quality clothing, we can support non-profits like Dress for Success and other organizations that strive to empower women

Other Ways You Can Help:

While the challenges have been many, our commitment has never wavered.  We’ve dedicated countless hours building the exchange model while maintaining full-time jobs, taking care of families, and contributing to our communities.  We know this is the right thing to do and we ask your help to promote our mission.

  • Donate.
  • Share via Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter - all your social media tools!
  • Ask your friends, family, and co-workers to get the word out about Your Smart Closet’s campaign and to donate.
  • If you know someone who loves clothes, but feels guilty with all the clothes she has, show her this!  She'll want to help. 
  • Talk about us. We are here to change the way women think about their clothes and inspire them to be more environmentally and globally aware. Join the Movement.

Thank you!

  


Be Fashionable with a Purpose

story:
The shirt that launched a shirtstorm

In 2014 I made a shirt for my husband’s best friend, Dr Matt Taylor, as a birthday gift – then he wore it on TV. He is part of the European Space Agency team that landed the Philae probe on a Comet (the Rosetta Landing) and the shirt caused something of a media storm!



Apart from a certain amount of hate mail (some people really don’t appreciate pin-up art) that both Matt and I received – there was huge support for us too. In a matter of days I had orders for 300 shirts.


A business was born

There’s a limit to what one woman with a sewing machine can do in her spare time – so I took a leap of faith and with lots of support from my husband, Matt and my friends, I quit my day job and became a professional seamstress.


The journey has been amazing and I’ve learned a lot – some of it the hard way!

I researched mass production and found a UK manufacturer that would meet my (very high) quality standards. I talked to the original fabric producers in the USA and persuaded them to relaunch the material design of the original shirt (it had been discontinued at the time).

I found myself in the press, on digital TV stations and radio interviews across the globe – and my Twitter and Facebook following generated a huge amount of business. (Search for #shirtstorm to find out more).

I had some family investment to help me get started and I used it to buy materials and pay for manufacturing. The last year has been exciting and challenging – but I’ve managed to pay the bills and I've got a lot more orders for shirts, skirts and other items.




Now what?

I’m constantly resourcing good quality 100% cotton in designs that appeal to my market – and I’ve found that many people want bespoke items, and that keeps me busy. I’ve made a wedding dress in cartoon fabric, tailored shorts in fabulous pin up material, tote bags, circular and pencil skirts and even appliqued the fantastic material onto knickers!

I even – finally – made time to make myself a dress too!


I have a few celebrity clients and had a stand at the London Film and Comic Convention which was hugely successful and got a lot of attention (I even had one of the SFX guys from a VERY high profile film ask me for my autograph!).

These are just a few of the shirts that I’ve made to order over the past year:


I’ve even made Matt some new shirts so he has something that is unique – as a thank you for all the support and encouragement he’s given me and just because he’s one of my best friends and a great guy!


This is THE FUNDING PLAN!

Even working full time there’s a limit to what I can make – and I need support to give me the time to resource material, design new items and keep up with my bespoke commissions.

The funding I need will:

* Give me administrative support to keep up with my social media and marketing

* Enable me to have a wider range of garments manufactured

* Allow me to purchase larger quantities of material (at better rates to bring the cost per item down) in a wider range of designs

* Develop a kids’ range of comic material shorts and tops – which I’ve frequently been asked about – but haven’t had the time or resources to develop.

* Develop the Vivian James hoodie – a project I’m already exploring.


I’ve been in discussion with a very well-known comic artist about producing our own completely exclusive fabric – that nobody else will have – and that’s going to require investment.


Risks & Challenges

The risk with garment manufacture is always getting the order levels right. I’ve already experienced what happens when you order too much material (storage challenges and tying up cash in stock). With a year’s experience I’ve got a much better idea now of sensible ordering levels.

I’ve had a roller coaster first year and I’ve got good brand awareness in my target market, but it’s time to expand the market place. That’s going to need more of my time. Balancing running the company with doing the bespoke commissions is going to offer some time management challenges – which is why I need financial help to get expert marketing support.

Many people have asked why I don’t resource material and/or manufacturing services from the Far East – but I feel really strongly that I want to retain a UK produced range. Then I know I am dealing with ethical companies and I can monitor quality control better. I’m aware that this impacts on the prices I can charge and am constantly tracking the marketplace to ensure that my range stays competitive.


Why should you invest?

I have some amazing customers, including celebrities, and I want to be able to offer so much more than I currently do.

I want to be able to make people feel awesome with super interesting and head-turning clothing. People who have bought Elly PriZeMaN clothing tell me they are proud to wear it so I know it already has impact – I just want to make that even bigger and better!


I have done a lot more market research on prices and how other companies create clothing lines so I now know HOW to move it forward I just need investment to make that happen.

My thank you for investing begins with a heartfelt THANK YOU, through a ‘Star Appearance’ on my Facebook Page, some fantastic discounts and gifts, up to your very own Elly Prizeman original shirt.

This needs to happen! I get so many compliments on my work, but it needs to expand, be more affordable and offer more choice! With my high profile clients growing in number I can't keep up! I have big goals – and I want this to be much more than a hobby business. Please donate as much as you can, even £2 will make a difference, and share, share, SHARE! Find me on Facebook Follow me on Twitter I’ll keep you posted on progress!

story:
The hungarian language description is  found at the bottom of the page

/A magyar nyelvű leírás az oldal alján található. A támogatás lépéseihez pedig itt találhattok segítséget magyarul:  https://punctuallypunch.wordpress.com/2015/12/29/igy-tudsz-tamogatni-engem/


HISTORY

Hi, my name is Flora Hartyandi, I am an experimental artist from Hungary. I work in the cultural field and in addition I make my unique creations. Primarily bags, but I make clothes, accessories, pictures, household objects, party decorations, too. I love recycling, unusual materials and new techniques.

In the last 15 years, I had my own fashion show, I made some costumes and sceneris, My grafics were published, I held some workshops and I sold my creations on several festivals.

I already have gained some success: the most recent was a Canadian wearable fashion competition, where my costume, ‘Pets and Wild’ also starred in fashion show in the middle of November, this year.

Cultural work has become hard in Hungary. Nowdays my payment is enough for rent, but not enough for anything else. My work will be finished in begining of next year. After that I could start my art buisness, finally. I wanted it since I was a child. The buisness name is will be Punctually Punch.

I created my blog - punctuallypunch.wordpress.com - a few month ago and posted some old and current artworks. Nowadays I am working on the buissness details, the identity, some plans and some bag collections.


What We Need & What You Get

If I want a professional operating buissness I will need some tools.

Now I’m using an old, hobby sewing machine and my own hands, which is a good meditative program but very slow, so it doesn’t pay off. 


A second hand, middle-aged industrial sewing machine which would be perfect for me.This machine is the most important thing in the first place.

Above that I would buy some other little things. too. All of these could accelerate and make my workflow more diverse: a sewing mannequin; leather-wright tools; home screen printing tools; tailor tools;  etc. 

If you would and can help me with my first steps, in exchange for your donation, I can give you a unique creation. All of them are completed, and now they are waiting for their owners.

Please check out the photos with the details and choose one of them.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you love my works but you can’t donate, don’t worry! Please post this page everywhere (facebook, twitter etc.) and share it with everybody. This activity would be a big help for me, too!

If you would want to help me another way, please write me an email: punctuallypunch@gmail.com

****************************************************************************


THANKS COASTERS / KÖSZI ALÁTÉT

Hand painted, drawn coasters with various patterns, Punctually Punch logos and handwritten Thank-you text.

Kézzel festett, rajzolt poháralátét, különböző mintákkal, Punctually Punch logóval és kézzel írt Köszönő szöveggel.


TEXTILE BRACELET and NECKLACE / TEXTIL KARKÖTŐ ÉS NYAKLÁNC

Unique braided accessories made of residual cotton, felt materials and string of pearls for children and women.

Különböző gyermek és női fonott kiegészítők, maradék anyagokból, filcből és gyöngysorokból.


IPAD CASE / IPAD TOK

Ipad mini and Ipad air cases made of floral furnishing fabrics

Virág mintás bútorszövetből, Ipad mini és Ipad air tokok.


UNIQUE ENVELOPE CLUTCH with CABINET KNOBS / EGYEDI BORÍTÉK TÁSKÁK SZEKRÉNY GOMBOKKAL

Felt and leatherette envelope cluth with unusual locking

Filcből és műbőrből borítéktáskák, szokatlan zárással


EMBROIDERED IPAD CASE / HÍMZETT IPAD TÁSKA

Furnishing fabrics ipad mini case with hand embroidery, inside pocket, velcro and felt padd.

Bútorszövet ipad mini tok, kézzel hímzett mintával, belső zsebbel, tépőzárral és filc béléssel.


SHOPPER’S BAG OUT OF T-SHIRT / BEVÁSÁRLÓ TÁSKA TRIKÓBÓL

Leather and crochet T-shirt recycled to shopping bag with inside pocket.

Bőr és horgolt trikó újrahasználásából, bevásárló táska belső zsebbel.


SHOPPING BAG WITH FLOWERS / BEVÁSÁRLÓ TÁSKA VIRÁGGAL

Hand woven shopping bag with plastic bag flowers .

Kézzel szőtt bevásárló táska, műanyag zacskóból készített virággal


REVERSIBLE BACKPACK / KIFORDÍTHATÓ HÁTIZSÁK

Reversible backpack with a lot of pockets out of felt, flax and leatherette.

Filc, len és műbőr anyagokból készített, kifordítható hátizsák, rengeteg zsebbel.


FLORAL HANDBAG / VIRÁGOS KÉZITÁSKA

Hand woven handbag with braided bag handle out of TV cabel.

Kézzel szőtt kézitáska, tv kábelből fonott füllel


FLORAL BACKPACK / VIRÁGOS HÁTIZSÁK

Hand woven and emboridered backpack with mosquito net accessories

Kézzel szőtt és hímzett hátizsák, szúnyogháló kiegészítőkkel


****************************************************************************

ELŐZMÉNYEK

Hartyándi Flóra vagyok, egy kísérletező alkotóművész Magyarországról. Jelenleg főállásban kulturális területen dolgozom, ami a forráshiányok és az átszervezések miatt évről évre egyre nehezebb. Egyedi kreációimat munka mellett készítem. Főképp táskákat, de ruhákat, kiegészítőket, képeket, használati tárgyakat és party dekorációkat is csinálok. A szokatlan anyagok és a hagyományok újraértelmezése jellemzi leginkább műveimet.

Az elmúlt 15 évben volt saját divat bemutatóm, készítettem jelmezeket - díszleteket különböző produkciókhoz, kiadványokban jelentek meg grafikáim, tartottam műhely foglalkozásokat és több alkalommal árultam fesztiválok keretében az alkotásaimat.


Tipikus-, kínai boltban kapható, kisállatos festmény-nyomatból készített ruhám, amely a ’Pets and Wild’ elnevezést viseli, most novemberben került kifutóra Kanadában, egy szokatlan, de hordható viseleteket bemutató divat-show keretében.


Ezen a sikeren felbuzdulva és a jelenlegi fizetésemet megvizsgálva – amely az albérletre elég, de másra már nem – arra jutottam, hogy itt az ideje megpróbálni a saját lábamra állni és gyermekkori vágyamat megvalósítani.

Aktuális munkám a jövő év elején véget ér, ekkor szeretném elindítani saját művészeti vállalkozásomat, Punctually Punch néven.

Ezen terv megszületése óta, készítettem egy blogot - punctuallypunch.wordpress.com – és egy facebook oldalt – facebook.com/punctuallypunch- amelyeken először a régebbi, majd a mostani munkáimat teszem közzé. Aktuálisan a leendő vállalkozásom részletein, az üzleti terven, az arculaton és különböző kollekciókon dolgozom.


AMIRE SZÜKSÉGEM VAN

Amennyiben profi üzletet szeretnék üzemeltetni, néhány eszközre szükségem lesz.

Jelenleg egy régi, hobby varrógépet használok, illetve gyakran a két kezemet, amely kellemes meditatív munka, de lassúsága miatt nem valami kifizetődő. 


Szeretnék venni egy használt, középkorú ipari varrógépet, ami tökéletes lenne nekem.

Ez a gép a legfontosabb az első időkben.

Ezen túl szeretnék pár egyéb apróságot is. Mindezek gyorsítják és sokszínűbbé teszik a munka folyamataimat: próba baba, bőr műves-, házi szita nyomáshoz való-, valamint szabó kellékek stb.

AMIT KAPSZ

Amennyiben szeretnél és tudod is segíteni első lépéseimet, az adományodért cserében egyedi kreációt adok neked. Minden darab már elkészült és várja az új gazdáját.

Kérlek nézd meg a fotókat, leírásokat és válassz közülük!


EGYÉB MÓDJA A SEGÍTSÉGNEK

Ha tetszik, amit csinálok, de nem tudsz anyagilag támogatni, ne aggódj! Kérlek posztold ezt az oldalt mindenfelé (facebook, twitter stb.) és mond el mindenkinek. Ez is nagy segítség nekem!

Amennyiben pedig más úton szeretnél segíteni, akárhogy, kérlek írj nekem emailt: punctuallypunch@gmail.com

KÖSZÖNÖM

UNIQUE ENVELOPE CLUTCH with CABINET KNOBS / EGYEDI BORÍTÉK
TÁSKÁK SZEKRÉNY GOMBOKKAL
Felt and leatherette envelope cluth with unusual locking
Filcből és műbőrből borítéktáskák, szokatlan zárással





EMBROIDERED IPAD CASE / HÍMZETT IPAD TÁSKA

Furnishing fabrics ipad mini case with hand embroidery, inside
pocket, velcro and felt padd.
Bútorszövet ipad mini tok, kézzel hímzett mintával, belső
zsebbel, tépőzárral és filc béléssel.



SHOPPER’S BAG OUT OF T-SHIRT / BEVÁSÁRLÓ TÁSKA TRIKÓBÓL
Leather and crochet T-shirt recycled to shopping bag with
inside pocket.
Bőr és horgolt trikó újrahasználásából, bevásárló táska belső
zsebbel.



SHOPPING BAG WITH FLOWERS / BEVÁSÁRLÓ TÁSKA VIRÁGGAL
Hand woven shopping bag with plastic bag flowers .
Kézzel szőtt bevásárló táska, műanyag zacskóból készített
virággal



REVERSIBLE BACKPACK / KIFORDÍTHATÓ HÁTIZSÁK
Reversible backpack with a lot of pockets out of felt, flax and
leatherette.
Filc, len és műbőr anyagokból készített, kifordítható hátizsák,
rengeteg zsebbel.



FLORAL HANDBAG / VIRÁGOS KÉZITÁSKA
Hand woven handbag with braided bag handle out of TV cabel.
Kézzel szőtt kézitáska, tv kábelből fonott füllel



FLORAL BACKPACK / VIRÁGOS HÁTIZSÁK
Hand woven and emboridered backpack with mosquito net
accessories
Kézzel szőtt és hímzett hátizsák, szúnyogháló kiegészítőkkel



****************************************************************************ELŐZMÉNYEK
Hartyándi Flóra vagyok, egy kísérletező alkotóművész
Magyarországról. Jelenleg főállásban kulturális területen dolgozom, ami a
forráshiányok és az átszervezések miatt évről évre egyre nehezebb. Egyedi
kreációimat munka mellett készítem. Főképp táskákat, de ruhákat, kiegészítőket,
képeket, használati tárgyakat és party dekorációkat is csinálok. A szokatlan
anyagok és a hagyományok újraértelmezése jellemzi leginkább műveimet.

Az elmúlt 15 évben volt saját divat bemutatóm, készítettem jelmezeket - díszleteket különböző produkciókhoz, kiadványokban jelentek meg grafikáim, tartottam műhely foglalkozásokat és több alkalommal árultam fesztiválok keretében az alkotásaimat.



Tipikus-, kínai boltban kapható, kisállatos festmény-nyomatból
készített ruhám, amely a ’Pets and Wild’ elnevezést viseli, most novemberben
került kifutóra Kanadában, egy szokatlan, de hordható viseleteket bemutató
divat-show keretében. 



Ezen a sikeren felbuzdulva és a jelenlegi fizetésemet
megvizsgálva – amely az albérletre elég, de másra már nem – arra jutottam, hogy
itt az ideje megpróbálni a saját lábamra állni és gyermekkori vágyamat
megvalósítani.
Aktuális munkám a jövő év elején véget ér, ekkor szeretném
elindítani saját művészeti vállalkozásomat, Punctually Punch néven. 
Ezen terv megszületése óta, készítettem egy blogot -
punctuallypunch.wordpress.com – és egy facebook oldalt –
facebook.com/punctuallypunch- amelyeken először a régebbi, majd a mostani
munkáimat teszem közzé. Aktuálisan a leendő vállalkozásom részletein, az üzleti
terven, az arculaton és különböző kollekciókon dolgozom.



AMIRE SZÜKSÉGEM VAN
Amennyiben profi üzletet szeretnék üzemeltetni, néhány eszközre
szükségem lesz.
Jelenleg egy régi, hobby varrógépet használok, illetve gyakran
a két kezemet, amely kellemes meditatív munka, de lassúsága miatt nem valami
kifizetődő. 


Szeretnék venni egy használt, középkorú ipari varrógépet, ami
tökéletes lenne nekem.
Ez a gép a legfontosabb az első időkben.
Ezen túl szeretnék pár egyéb apróságot is. Mindezek gyorsítják
és sokszínűbbé teszik a munka folyamataimat: próba baba, bőr műves-, házi szita
nyomáshoz való-, valamint szabó kellékek stb. 
AMIT KAPSZ
Amennyiben szeretnél és tudod is segíteni első lépéseimet, az
adományodért cserében egyedi kreációt adok neked. Minden darab már elkészült és
várja az új gazdáját.
Kérlek nézd meg a fotókat, leírásokat és válassz közülük!



EGYÉB MÓDJA A SEGÍTSÉGNEK
Ha tetszik, amit csinálok, de nem tudsz anyagilag támogatni, ne
aggódj! Kérlek posztold ezt az oldalt mindenfelé (facebook, twitter stb.) és
mond el mindenkinek. Ez is nagy segítség nekem!
Amennyiben pedig más úton szeretnél segíteni, akárhogy, kérlek
írj nekem emailt: punctuallypunch@gmail.com
KÖSZÖNÖM

story:
Click Here for English version!


Magyar dizájnerek tervezik, magyar nagymamák horgolják!
Donner Andrea és Mike Tünde. Mi vagyunk a Freshka Design megálmodói.
Segítsetek nekünk és a velünk együttműködő közel 100 nagymamának! Mutassuk meg együtt Európának! Tegyük együtt nemzetközileg ismertté a Freshka Design horgolt játékait! 

 a Freshka Design jelenleg közel 100 nagymamával, munkanélküli vagy megváltozott munkaképességű nővel dolgozik együtt. Ha kijutunk Nürnbergbe, ez a szám a duplájára, triplájára nőhet.

 játékaink mind magas minőségű, kézzel készült, magyar dizájn termékek. Ha kijutunk Nürnbergbe, jó hírét visszük Magyarországnak.

 a horgolás hazánkban nagy tradíciókra tekint vissza. Ha kijutunk Nürnbergbe új lehetőségek nyílhatnak meg előttünk, hogy még jobban hasznosítsuk azt a rengeteg tehetséget és tudást, ami körülöttünk van.

 a Freshka Design játékai itthon már bizonyítottak és több ezer családban megtalálhatóak Magyarországon. Ha kijutunk Nürnbergbe meghódíthatjuk egész Európát!

 játékaink CE minősítéssel is rendelkeznek, ami azt jelenti, hogy újszülött kortól biztonsággal adhatóak gyerekeknek és megfelelnek az EU-s szabványoknak.

elképesztően cukik a játékaink!

Saját tervezésű figuráink mindegyikét nagymamák szorgos kezei készítik országszerte. Kiválasztásukban fontos szempont volt, hogy magas minőségű, precíz munkát végezzenek. Zebulon, a zebra, Oszkár az oroszlán és a többiek kiegészítő keresetet biztosítanak olyanoknak, akiknek nagy szükségük van erre.

Szeretnénk, ha munkatársaink számát többszázra növelhetnénk, ehhez azonban el kell érnünk egy sokkal nagyobb piacot! Itt az idő, hogy ezek a figurák ne csak Magyarországon, de Európa-szerte ismertek és megvásárolhatóak legyenek.  Ezzel fenntarthatóvá válik a Freshka Design működése, csapatának bővítése és lehetőség nyílik újabb termékek gyártására, fejlesztésére.

Már vannak viszonteladóink Bécsben, Salzburgban, Svédországban, Németországban. Egy-egy bolt... de Nürnbergben egyszerre érhetjük el a nemzetközi játék- és design kereskedelem képviselőit!

A Nürnbergi Nemzetközi Játékkiállítás a legnagyobb játékmustra minden évben. Nagy dolog, ha itt bemutatkozhat egy cég, nekünk nagyon régi álmunk ez. Hisszük, hogy ott várnak minket a nagy lehetőségek. Hisszük, hogy a Freshka Design termékei meg fogják állni helyüket ezen a vásáron.

Segíts nekünk, hogy megvalósíthassuk álmunkat és kijussunk a Nürnbergi Nemzetközi Játékkiállításra!

A költségek legnagyobb részét a stand bérlése teszi ki: 3000$. Ezen kívül egy 4 napos vásárnál a szállás is nagy költség, még akkor is ha olcsó megoldást keresünk és időben lefoglaljuk, és természetesen ennyi cuccal az utazás is bonyolult. Szükség lesz továbbá szóróanyagokra, a stand dekorációjára és egy elég nagy raktárkészletre, aminek segítségével bemutathatjuk magunkat az érdeklődőknek. Ezekhez kérjük a támogatásotokat!

A Freshka Design 2012-ben jelentette meg első horgolt figuráit, ekkor született meg a Zebulon és barátai horgolt kollekció. Mára már több mint harmincféle figura gazdagítja a kínálatunkat. Horgolt figuráink a felhasznált alapanyagoknak és az alkalmazott technikának köszönhetően bababarátok, biztonságosak és egyediek. Élénk színek, puha pamut borítás teszik a figurákat kicsik és nagyok kedvencévé.

Horgolt figuráinkat magunk tervezzük, és elsősorban hátrányos helyzetű, munkanélküli, vagy megváltozott munkaképességű, magyar nők készítik. Más termékeink gyártásakor is keressük az együttműködést olyan szervezetekkel, egyesületekkel, ahol valamilyen módon a társadalmi felzárkóztatásban is segíteni tudunk. Így dolgoztunk együtt már az Igazgyöngy Alapítvánnyal, a Frushka babáinkat pedig a dombóvári Reménység Napközi Otthon lakói készítik.

Először szerettük volna kipróbálni magunkat itthon. Kiismerni a vállalkozói lét nehézségeit és lehetőségeit, kitapasztalni kapacitásunkat, korlátainkat és korlátlanságunkat! Ez az elmúlt 3 évben megtörtént és most készen állunk, hogy nemzetközi szinten is bemutatkozzunk!

Segíts nekünk, hogy megvalósíthassuk álmunkat és kijussunk a Nürnbergi Nemzetközi Játékkiállításra!

English

Hungary’s cutest toys are crocheted by grannies

Help Freshka participate the International Toy Fair in Nürnberg! 

  

Andrea DONNER and Tünde MIKE. We are the ones who created Freshka Design. Help us and some 100 grandmothers who work for us! Let’s make Freshka Design known all across Europe!

at the moment we work with some 100 grandmothers, unemployed, underprivileged and disabled women. If we make it to Nurnberg, we can easily double or even triple this number.

… our toys are premium quality, handcrafted designer products. If we make it to Nurnberg, we can improve Hungary’s reputation.

… crochet has rich traditions in Hungary. If we make it to Nurnberg, we’ll have greater opportunities to utilize the talent and experience we surrounded ourselves with.

the toys of Freshka Design are well-known and loved by thousands of Hungarian families. If we make it to Nurnberg, we can charm the entire continent.

our toy animals are CE certified, meaning that they comply with all EU standards, and are safe to be given to newborn babies.

our toys are strikingly cute!

Our design toys are crocheted by the hands of grandmothers all across the country. We handpick them based on the exquisite quality of their work. Zachary the zebra, Oscar the lion mean an extra income for those, who need it most.

We would like to increase the number of women we work with, but in order to do that, we have to reach out to a much larger market. It’s time for Freshka toys to become known and loved Europe-wide. This will also make Freshka Design’s growth sustainable, and will open up opportunities for us to design new products.

We have distributors in Vienna, Salzburg, Sweden and Germany already, but these are few and far between. In Nurnberg we could reach out to the entire European toy and design industry all at once.

The Nurnberg International Toy Fair is the largest professional event, and it would be a long time dream come true for us to be there. We sincerely believe that this is our great chance and that we will be up for it.

Help us make our dream come true, and make it to the Nurnberg Toy Fair!

The biggest chunk of our expenses – some 3000 USD – is the participation fee of the expo. For a four-day expo, accomodation is also a substantial cost, even if we go really cheap. And, of course, traveling with all these toys will be a biggie, too. All that aside, we’ll need decoration, marketing materials and sufficient stock to make the most of the event. This is where we need your help!

Freshka Design introduced its first crochet toy collection, Zachary and Friends, in 2012. As of today we have a variety of over 30 toy animals. All of these figures are unique, and due to the materials and production technologies used, they are completely safe as well. Their colors, the soft, cuddly cover make these toy animals the favorite of kids and adults alike.

We design these toys ourselves, and they are handcrafted by unemployed, underprivileged or disabled Hungarian women. We also seek out opportunities to cooperate with NGOs that enable us make a difference. We had projects with the Real Pearl Foundation of Berettyóújfalu, and our Frushka dolls are made by the inhabitants of Reménység (Hope) Community Center of Dombóvár.

We first wanted to give it a shot at home. To explore the difficulties and potentials of being an entrepreneur. To experience our capacities, our limits, or the lack thereof. This has been our journey for the past three years.

We are now ready to make an international debut.

story: Download Press Kit here
