story:
The Disc Collection is made of Recycled Sterling Silver. Not only is it a classic, chic style, but your purchase promotes environmental protection.

 

 

 

Let us introduce ourselves. We are Gerson and Lori. Two jewelers that have come together with the desire to provide high quality, handmade and custom jewelry that positively affects everyone involved from mine to client to recipient.

From the age of 6, Gerson has been learning and perfecting his craft as a goldsmith. Being raised in a jewelry manufacturing environment has allowed him to learn all aspects of the trade. In 2015 Gerson decided it was time to branch out on his own and opened GCD Jewelry Repair and Custom Jewelry.

Lori earned her Diamond Grading Certification from The Gemological Institute of America (GIA) and for the last 5 years has been an estate jewelry buyer. She's had the opportunity to visit artisans in Zimbabwe, Mozambique, India and Jordan where she began to learn about ethically sourced goods.

We are currently operating out of a small jewelry repair shop in downtown LA. Our place is modest with one jewelers bench, a desk and a turntable display case.

We would like to create a space where Gerson can expand his class offerings as well as a place where clients can come in, shop for jewelry, have a one on one design consultation for custom design pieces while watching the jewelry being made.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With your contributions we will be able to do the following:

1. Create a beautiful, welcoming environment where clients can shop for various types of ethically sourced jewelry from diamond engagement rings and one of a kind vintage pieces, to custom designed items.

2. Expand our Ethically Sourced jewelry line to incorporate interchangeable discs featuring engraved initials and ethically sourced stones.

3.Purchase equipment that will allow us to expand our production capabilities and allow Gerson to expand his class offerings.

What We Need

We are seeking to raise $20,000 for the following:

Expand Jewelry Line to Include Interchangeable Discs

Silver - $2000

Molds - $500

Screw Driver Plate - $150

Shop Equipment

Lazer Soldering Machine - $5000

Photo Booth - $1200

Rolling Mill - $800

Engraving Block - $575

Plating Materials - $350

Shop Renovation

Flooring - $1000

Safe - $600

Jewelry Wall Display - $500

Jewelry Floor Display Case - $500

Jewelry Displays - $500

Window Decals for Store Front - $300

Stools for Guests - $200

Supplies

18K and Silver Solder - $200

18K and Silver Wire - $200

18K and Silver Sheet Metal - $200

Remaining Amount is Our Cost for the Campaign

Harmony Silver - $2500

Packaging - $725

Processing Fees - $2000

If we are not able to reach the entire $20,000, we can still move forward. We will still expand the Lori Rochelle jewelry line, and make as many shop design changes as we can. The areas we may have to wait will be in certain pieces of equipment.

The Impact

The amazing part about this campaign is that EVERYBODY BENEFITS:

1. You will receive beautifully made jewelry made of Ethically Sourced Recycled Sterling Silver for either yourself our to give as a gift!

2. We will be able to build our Shop of Dreams and expand our Ethically Sourced Jewelry Line!

We know that jewelry is meaningful, whether purchased for yourself or as a gift for someone else. Our dream is to provide a place where people can shop beautifully curated ethically sourced jewelry or design their own custom piece of jewelry.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please, Please, Please help us get the word out about our campaign!

1. There are several share tools available at the top, right side of the page next to the "BACK IT" button.

Facebook

Twitter

Email Importer - Allows you to share in email format with your entire address book.

Embed Code - Allows you to share on your website or blog.

Share Link - Allows you to copy the link and share with friends.

2. Follow us on social media to stay up to date with the campaign and most importantly, life after the campaign so you can see how your donation was put to use! 

Facebook; www.facebook.com/LoriRochelleJewelry & www.facebook.com/GCDJewelryRepair

Instagram: @Lori_Rochelle & @gercevduart

Twitter: @Lori_Rochelle & @gercevduar

Website: www.LoriRochelle.com & www.GCDCustomDesign.com
story_txt: The Disc Collection is made of Recycled Sterling Silver. Not only is it a classic, chic style, but your purchase promotes environmental protection.   Let us introduce ourselves. We are Gerson and Lori. Two jewelers that have come together with the desire to provide high quality, handmade and custom jewelry that positively affects everyone involved from mine to client to recipient.From the age of 6, Gerson has been learning and perfecting his craft as a goldsmith. Being raised in a jewelry manufacturing environment has allowed him to learn all aspects of the trade. In 2015 Gerson decided it was time to branch out on his own and opened GCD Jewelry Repair and Custom Jewelry.Lori earned her Diamond Grading Certification from The Gemological Institute of America (GIA) and for the last 5 years has been an estate jewelry buyer. She's had the opportunity to visit artisans in Zimbabwe, Mozambique, India and Jordan where she began to learn about ethically sourced goods.We are currently operating out of a small jewelry repair shop in downtown LA. Our place is modest with one jewelers bench, a desk and a turntable display case.We would like to create a space where Gerson can expand his class offerings as well as a place where clients can come in, shop for jewelry, have a one on one design consultation for custom design pieces while watching the jewelry being made.         With your contributions we will be able to do the following:1. Create a beautiful, welcoming environment where clients can shop for various types of ethically sourced jewelry from diamond engagement rings and one of a kind vintage pieces, to custom designed items.2. Expand our Ethically Sourced jewelry line to incorporate interchangeable discs featuring engraved initials and ethically sourced stones.3.Purchase equipment that will allow us to expand our production capabilities and allow Gerson to expand his class offerings.What We NeedWe are seeking to raise $20,000 for the following:Expand Jewelry Line to Include Interchangeable DiscsSilver - $2000Molds - $500Screw Driver Plate - $150Shop EquipmentLazer Soldering Machine - $5000Photo Booth - $1200Rolling Mill - $800Engraving Block - $575Plating Materials - $350Shop RenovationFlooring - $1000Safe - $600Jewelry Wall Display - $500Jewelry Floor Display Case - $500Jewelry Displays - $500Window Decals for Store Front - $300Stools for Guests - $200Supplies18K and Silver Solder - $20018K and Silver Wire - $20018K and Silver Sheet Metal - $200Remaining Amount is Our Cost for the CampaignHarmony Silver - $2500Packaging - $725Processing Fees - $2000If we are not able to reach the entire $20,000, we can still move forward. story:
Axess is a brand of handmade Front Pocket Wallets that combines excellent craftsmanship with beautiful leather from the renowned leather district of Tuscany in Italy in minimalist designs meant to fit seamlessly in your front pocket so that you don't have to sit on your bulky wallet. 

For those looking for a wallet to hold their essential belongings, Axess is an elegant solution designed to leave a lasting impression. 

  • All designs fit comfortably in your front pocket without protruding.
  • All models come with an RFID-blocking pocket to protect your sensitive cards from wireless skimming or ID-theft.
  • All wallet are carefully handmade by seasoned craftsmen using only the finest leather.

Vegetable tanned leather

The vegetable tanned leather used in Axess Front Wallets models is hand tanned in Tuscany, Italy following strict standards and use traditional tanning methods in their production of some of the world’s finest vegetable tanned leather.

The leather is made by hand with the passion of a few master tanners located in Tuscany using techniques and traditions hailing from the Renaissance, which means that there are no harmful chemicals used in the tanning process.

Vegetable tanned leather ages and develops a patina over time, making each wallet uniquely yours. Vegetable tanning is more time consuming than other types of leather tanning (such as chrome based tanning), but the result is a much richer patina developed with no use of harmful chemicals that holds up better than other leather and lasts longer.

Axess is designed to fit seamlessly in your front pocket so that you don't have to sit on your bulky wallet.

Saffiano leather    

Saffiano leather, which is a type of textured genuine leather common in modern day luxury accessories originally developed by Prada in 1913. The Saffiano gives the wallet a cross hatch finish which not only looks exclusive but also makes the wallet scratch resistant and durable. In addition, the treated wax finish also gives this Saffiano wallet water resistant properties.

Passionately handmade

Each wallet is passionately made by hand, using methods of hand cutting with special cutting tools – all credit card slots and edges are also cut by hand to ensure perfection. The lining consists of carefully selected eco-friendly cotton fabrics, and each wallet is separately stitched with durable Polyester/Cotton Core spun Thread, using precision machines to ensure a tight and strong stitching. Each piece is also individually embossed and inspected in person by the manufacturer to ensure that each wallet is delivered in a pristine state.

Partial RFID-blocking wallets

All of Axess wallets have an RFID blocking pocket where special material will protect your sensitive cards (similar to physically wrapping your credit cards in tin foil). This is to prevent your sensitive credit card information from being subjected to “electronic pickpocketing” or other methods of wirelessly accessing your credit card info or personal information. The RFID-blocking material used by Axess is a multi-layered RFID-protection foil that has successfully gone through third-party testing and verification.

All wallets come with an RFID-blocking pocket.

The idea behind having a partially RFID-blocking wallet is that you should still be able to scan your subway card and access cards if you use them in the wallets' other pockets. The wallets will also come with a physical marker in the pockets that are RFID-blocking.  

"Being able to have your credit cards protected whilst still having the convenience of using a transport or work pass card inside the wallet will appeal to many".

Slimwalletjunkie

COLOR CHOICES:

The color choices are for models 03/05/06: 

CARAMEL, BLACK, BLUE, GREEN

For models 04,07: 

CARAMEL, BLACK, BLUE, PINK. 

You will specify this once the Kickstarter Campaign is over when surveys will be sent out.

The back contains a pocket for an ID window.Model 07 'Ideal' - Black ColorModel 05 'Superior' - Caramel ColorCOLOR CHOICES:The color choices are for models 03/05/06: CARAMEL, BLACK, BLUE, GREENFor models 04,07: CARAMEL, BLACK, BLUE, PINK. You will specify this once the Kickstarter Campaign is over when surveys will be sent out.



















During the last campaign I had some issues with missing parcels, so for increased accuracy I have this year partnered with a domestic US Fulfilment center in addition to the one I'm currently using in the UK, for speedier deliveries and less lost parcels.




 Music credits: The music in the video comes from Bensound.


Risks and challenges
Lost parcels are always an issue when it comes to selling physical goods, which I experienced during my last Kickstarter campaign, where I sent wallets to individual backers up to three times, and yet wallets kept getting lost. That is the main challenge to this project in the stage I am in, but I have tried to get around that by this time using a domestic US Fulfilment center for US orders, and a British Fulfilment center for European orders, and limiting where I ship to Europe, US/Canada and Australia. As frustrating it is to back a project and not receive anything, it is equally frustrating to create something and keep sending wallets that never arrives.

story:
Featured In    

>>> Click here for Press Release


                               

                                            


     

      What is Zero Wearables?

ZW is a premium brand moving wearable technology beyond its current domain of health and wellness. The company has created a new category called Wearable Media™, which is at the intersection of fashion, social networks and digital media.

The ZW HLN (hat) you see below is the first of its kind! You can instantly change the image on your hats Flexible E-paper display in seconds with the ZW app on your smartphone.

       HELP US BRING THIS PROJECT TO REALITY!

After more than a 100 years of no innovation in the Baseball hat industry,  we have re-imagined the baseball hat to fit the needs of the 21st Century  because a lot has changed  since its inception in 1901!

              

ZW is changing the wearables market in 3 key areas: Product, Media and Platform. You've never seen anything like this before! Trust me there's more to come...


Using the ZW App with your ZW HLN (hat) will allow you to "Express Yourself!"



The Intellectual Property for the ZW-HLN Hat is Patent Pending with the United States Patent and Trademark Office.


The ZW HLN  will be available in two colors for this Indiegogo campaign and multiple styles with more to come at a later date.


Why We Need You

We’ve turned to Indiegogo to open our idea to you and the awesome community of tech-savvy hat and sneaker-heads around the world. As you know often times a cool has must accompany those hard to get kicks! We want to learn from you, and with your support, we will get this product to market that much faster. We have  advisers with expertise in manufacturing products, and we have identified a handful of manufacturers that are experienced consumer electronics and fashion industries that can make this product a reality. All together, we can make this happen.     

  

We understand that everyone works hard for the money they earn and the chart above explains exactly where the money you provide us during this campaign will be used. Essentially all of it will be used to make the product you've so generously contributed to make a reality. Thanks again for your support!


The timeline above is not meant to be a  guarantee however,we do expect to meet and most likely exceed our July 2017 goal of shipping product to our Indiegogo supporters.




Risks and Challenges


We have been working for more than a year on Zero Wearables  first product the ZW H1 and getting  it ready for production. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have great partners/advisors to help us execute. However, we know that before any mass production begins, we may encounter some problems. We have plans to mitigate these risks  and have enlisted experts in the manufacturing arena to help us.

Manufacturing

We need to create tooling to manufacture different parts of the product. This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk, we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.

Software

The  website, software and app are functional but we still have a lot of work to do building all of the features needed in the ZW app. Software development sometimes gets tricky and takes longer than expected but we have a lot of experience in this area as one of the founders developed top secret software for U.S. federal government. We have identified partners that could be used If necessary to solve any unforeseen problems that could occur and cause delays.

story:
Our brand for contemporary watches was launched by me, Paulus van Leeuwen, in 1992 in the Netherlands. 

With a history in design for the ceramic industry, I emphasize the three dimensional nature of design. It is my habit to approach the design of our watches more as sculptured objects, often leading to surprising and subtle detail, even on the back of the watches. I simply refuse to look at watches as only graphical objects: "dials and straps".

Our logo, as usual: only on the back.


The integration of high quality execution & reduced design in combination with proven reliable swiss movements have always been at the heart of Quantuz watches.

Materials like Stainless Steel, Sapphire Crystal, Aluminium and Titanium are allowed to flourish with these aesthetic choices, giving rise to a nice unison  of material in resonance with the different textures in one design.

We aim for quality watches, both physically and aesthetically. Doing so, they last for decades and we found quantuz-lovers in many corners of the world.  We still offer service to those loyal and grateful owners of a Quantuz watch as far back as 1992. 

If you want to have an impression of our history: Please visit this page of the Quantuz website and scroll down.


The latest design that we released in a first production run and present to you here is our line "Shades of Grey" (not 50!). In short we say: "Shades Of", it could be any color after all!

We started this colorful line with a limited number of 24 color combinations. Some of them are joyful, some of them are very distinguished and some even funny. These color combinations were compiled in collaboration with our color-stylist Cécile van Eeden who happens to be my partner in business and in life as well. She is also a great jewellery designer and goldsmith. We work closely on all our mutual projects.

  • No brand on the dial. It keeps the design clean, as we like it.
  • Tiny second hand, it shows the watch is alive and kicking.
  • Carefully designed lugs for perfect fit on the wrist. Lugs have the same color as the ring with dots under the glass.
  • Two different colored hands. A Quantuz habit too, but very functional in fact.

Business or smart casual.

Leisure


Creator

Design your own watch.

Now we are ready to expand the 'Shades Of' series for the next production run and that is where you come in. We can expand the color range of this watch to more than 2700 color combinations of your choice with the help of our 'Shades Of' Creator.

Do yourself the favor of trying the creator, it's really exciting, even more so with a friend!   

With your help:

  • We can further develop our online marketing, in order to reach more enthusiasts all over the globe.                                                                                                                          
  • We can expand our online community and involve this community in future projects.                         

      You already help us by sharing this campaign !                

  • We can fine-tune or expand the executions of our designs with the feedback from our backers.       

      We are open to any suggestion but cannot promise to fulfill them all.                                                                                                                                      

  • We can give a boost to our future projects.                                       

     We are working on a automatic watch for men and a extra flat quartz watch             in two sizes, fully Swiss Made.....Stay tuned on our newsletters, Facebook and soon also Instagram! 


The amount of € 15.000,-- that we aim for will help us to realize a vast portion of what we want to achieve.  

If we raise more we can speed up our plans.
If we raise less (we chose for a flexible goal) we will be able to fulfill a smaller part of what we want to achieve but it will certainly make it possible to improve our online presence and expand our community.  
Also we will have assembled and seen many versions of the watch as compiled by you, that we did not make before. This must be a great pleasure and we are looking forward to it!
Whatever the result of our campaign, we will be able to make all our backers happy with the perk of their choice, including their very individual color combination. We are lined up for it.
The choice from several thousands of individual color combinations will be facilitated by our creator that you find below. We think it explains itself. Use the resulting order code for our survey after the campaign. 

If you prefer to choose one of our 24 standard styles, simply communicate to us the right order code. Just follow the link below. 

24 Standard Models


Product Specifications

Powered by a large and strong Swiss Made Ronda 783 movement. 

Durable clear sight on dial and hands through a scratch proof Sapphire Crystal. 

The 37mm watchcase is 3ATM water resistant and made of anodised aluminium. This allows for the many elegant colour combinations with the bezel, a 316L surgical grade stainless steel ring that covers the majority of the outside of the watch and also available in PVD: Gunmetal, Grey, Brown and Navy-blue. (matches great with jeans)

A calf-leather, stitched 18mm parallel strap, available in 15 shades, completes the festivity.

And a nice bamboo giftbox!



Support Us

For your welcome and appreciated support we offer you the following rewards:

Perk 1: 


Perk 2:  Limited 25 


Perk 3: Limited 25


Perk 4: Limited 100


Perk 5: Limited 100


Perk 6: Limited 200


Perk 7: Limited 25


Perk 8: Limited 25


In Depth

Product development 'Shades of'

Unlike many other campaigns for watches we do not show you technical drawings provided by the case manufacturer, often nicely romanticized with pencils and Vernier-calipers. Neither will we bother you with pencil sketches that hardly have a relationship to the actual design.

Our design process follows other tracks, the result of 35 year experience in product and watch design, including the use of 3D design software, 3D printing, in house prototyping and product development in very close communication with our manufacturing partners in Hong-Kong and Switzerland.

We like to share a few images though, which shed some light on the process that we went through during the development. This is the real thing!

A vast number of sculptural, proportional and dimensional studies, cross-sections, prototypes, refinements, and a pile of communication later, we finalized this joyful and stylish line of watches for both men and women and for wearing on any occasion you can imagine!

Risks & Challenges

We enjoy decades of experience in production and sales of watches for the international market. As said, we are lined up for this campaign. This means that we have stock of all the parts in house. Therefore we can assemble and send out your reward in a reasonably short time. We will operate on a "first in - first out" basis. Of course we have no control on the popularity of certain colored parts. This implies that we have to order these parts again if we tend to run out of stock. In that case, we will inform you about the new estimated delivery time. In case you prefer not to wait and have an alternative choice, we can send your reward faster. In case we are very successful, the same situation could be the result. Whatever happens we keep in touch.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you like what we do, you can support us as well by sharing this campaign with your network. The Indiegogo share tools are easy to use for that purpose.

We thank everyone who helps us to make this campaign a success!

The QUANTUZ team.

FAQ:

Guarantee? We give a 2 year guarantee on faulty workmanship, not on normal wear and tear.  Shipment for guarantee to us needs to be payed by you, the return shipment will be payed by us. 
Where can I purchase spare straps?  You can contact us per Email for all your requests including orders for straps. We will adapt our webshop for that purpose too.

Do yourself the favor of trying the creator, it's really exciting, even more so with a friend!   
With your help:




We can further develop our online marketing, in order to
reach more enthusiasts all over the globe.                                                                                                                          


We can expand our online community and involve this community in future projects.                         


      You already help us by sharing this campaign !                


We can fine-tune or expand the executions of our designs with the feedback from our backers.       

      We are open to any suggestion but cannot promise to fulfill them all.                                                                                                                                      


We can give a boost to our future projects.                                       

     We are working on a automatic watch for men and a extra flat quartz watch             in two sizes, fully Swiss Made.....Stay tuned on our newsletters, Facebook and soon also Instagram! 

The amount of € 15.000,-- that we aim for will help us to realize a vast portion of what we want to achieve.  
If we raise more we can speed up our plans.If we raise less (we chose for a flexible goal) we will be able to fulfill a smaller part of what we want to achieve but it will certainly make it possible to improve our online presence and expand our community.  Also we will have assembled and seen many versions of the watch as compiled by you, that we did not make before. This must be a great pleasure and we are looking forward to it!Whatever the result of our campaign, we will be able to make all our backers happy with the perk of their choice, including their very individual color combination. We are lined up for it.The choice from several thousands of individual color combinations will be facilitated by our creator that you find below. We think it explains itself. Use the resulting order code for our survey after the campaign. 

If you prefer to choose one of our 24 standard styles, simply communicate to us the right order code. Just follow the link below. 24 Standard Models






Product Specifications
Powered by a large and strong Swiss Made Ronda 783 movement. 
Durable clear sight on dial and hands through a scratch proof Sapphire Crystal. 
The 37mm watchcase is 3ATM water resistant and made of anodised aluminium. This allows for the many elegant colour combinations with the bezel, a 316L surgical grade stainless steel ring that covers the majority of the outside of the watch and also available in PVD: Gunmetal, Grey, Brown and Navy-blue. (matches great with jeans)
A calf-leather, stitched 18mm parallel strap, available in 15 shades, completes the festivity.
And a nice bamboo giftbox!



  Support Us 

For your welcome and appreciated support we offer you the following rewards:





Perk 1: 
Perk 2:  Limited 25 


Perk 3: Limited 25


Perk 4: Limited 100

Perk 5: Limited 100

Perk 6: Limited 200

Perk 7: Limited 25


Perk 8: Limited 25



In Depth
Product development 'Shades of'


Unlike many other campaigns for watches we do not show you technical
drawings provided by the case manufacturer, often nicely romanticized with pencils
and Vernier-calipers. Neither will we bother you with pencil sketches that
hardly have a relationship to the actual design.
Our design process follows other tracks, the result of 35 year experience
in product and watch design, including the use of 3D design software, 3D
printing, in house prototyping and product development in very close communication with our manufacturing partners in
Hong-Kong and Switzerland.
We like to share a few images though, which shed some light on the process that we went through during the development. This is the real thing!
A
vast number of sculptural, proportional and dimensional studies, cross-sections,
prototypes, refinements, and a pile of communication later, we finalized this joyful
and stylish line of watches for both men and women and for wearing on any occasion you can imagine!












    Risks & Challenges We enjoy decades of experience in production and sales of watches for the international market. As said, we are lined up for this campaign. This means that we have stock of all the parts in house. Therefore we can assemble and send out your reward in a reasonably short time. We will operate on a "first in - first out" basis. Of course we have no control on the popularity of certain colored parts. This implies that we have to order these parts again if we tend to run out of stock. In that case, we will inform you about the new estimated delivery time. In case you prefer not to wait and have an alternative choice, we can send your reward faster. In case we are very successful, the same situation could be the result. Whatever happens we keep in touch.   
Other Ways You Can Help If you like what we do, you can support us as well by sharing this campaign with your network. The Indiegogo share tools are easy to use for that purpose.
We thank everyone who helps us to make this campaign a success!
The QUANTUZ team.

FAQ:

Guarantee? We give a 2 year guarantee on faulty workmanship, not on normal wear and tear.  Shipment for guarantee to us needs to be payed by you, the return shipment will be payed by us. 
Where can I purchase spare straps?  You can contact us per Email for all your requests including orders for straps. We will adapt our webshop for that purpose too.

story:
WHY WE DO.

CROSSROADS has been a passion of mine since the inception of the idea and creation of the logo in 2009. The desire to start this clothing brand came from a need to fund and support inner city outreach we are a part of and desire to expand.

My name is Jamie Francis, I am an architect and a preacher, among other things. My love and passion for urban and hip hop culture, its music, and clothes, has led me to utilize my fields of study and apply them to this clothing brand.

The CROSSROADS Brand can have an impact on the hip hop/urban youth and young adults that many times the culture, music, and clothing impacts in the wrong way. I am a product of hip hop/urban culture and I know the direction my life was going until I was confronted by Christ who has given me deeper meaning and true purpose.

With your help, I will be able to fully stock the merchandise I have printed already and also print more of the different meaningful and powerful apparel that I have designed over the years.

 

WHY CAMPAIGN?

The purpose of this Funding Campaign can be broken down in 3 parts:

1. Gain funds to fully stock online store. 

2. Create awareness of the CROSSROADS Brand and its mission. 

3. See if others outside of my inner circle see the value in the brand’s mission enough to support it and desire to utilize it to change lives.

Our goal is to reach $5,500 by July 31st. Every penny we receive will go towards getting more merchandise, some shipping costs, and Indiegogo related fees.

You, as the supporter, will play a remarkable role in helping us with our mission, to share the love of Christ, and challenge the mindset of our society and push beyond its cultural limits by utilizing creativity, graphics, questions, and profound statements to seek deeper meaning & purpose. With your support, CROSSROADS will be able to help fund our community service goals as well.

 

WHAT WE DO.

We believe the artwork we produce will jolt and shock individuals at their core by both using explicit or subtle imagery and phrases. Each shirt and clothing item will have meaning; in fact, the design concepts are derived to effectively relate and affect the heart and mind of both those that are affiliated with and are a part of a church but also those that have never stepped a foot inside of a church building. The clothing will challenge those who claim Christ to be more compassionate and bold so that he or she will continue to communicate God’s heart.

 

REWARDS.

And such investments & sacrifice are not without reward.

First of all, it’s known in Heaven.

Secondly, we have Perk Packages as well:

 

LEVEL 1 - REGULAR TEES

 

LEVEL 2 - FASHION TEES

 

ACCESSORIES

 

$10 – Thank You For Support! – LIFT HIM UP!

$25 – 1 Regular Tee (LEVEL 1) + Dog Tag/Keychain with Chain

$50 – 3 Regular Tees (LEVEL 2) + Wrist Band -OR- 2 Fashion Tees (LEVEL 2) + Wrist Band

$75 – 3 Fashion Tees (LEVEL 2) + Wrist Band

$100 – 5 Regular Tees (LEVEL 1) + Dog Tag/Keychain with Chain + Wrist Band

$150 – 5 Fashion Tees (LEVEL 2) + Dog Tag/Keychain with Chain + Wrist Band

$250 – 8 Fashion Tees (LEVEL 2) + HAT INCLUDED + Dog Tag/Keychain with Chain + Wrist Band

With LEVEL 2 Perks, you may select both Fashion Tees & Regular Tees as well.

 

Please visit WEBSITE: http://crossroads-clothing.com/ to view more design options.

 

WE NEED YOU.

Please order for yourself and family. In fact, please order merchandise to give as gifts to extended family, friends, neighbors, co-workers, church family, etc.

Even if you cannot support financially, you can help this cause by spreading the word and letting your friends and family know about the brand and its mission.

 

OUR GOAL, STRETCHED.

More shirt selections & merchandise will be added if funding exceeds the $5500.

A new shirt will be unlocked and added if stretch goal of $6500 met.

Another new shirt design will be unlocked if stretch goal of $7500 is met.

One more new shirt design will be unlocked if stretch goal of $8500 is met.

Kids shirt sizes will be unlocked if stretch goal of $10,000 is met.

 

Please visit my website http://crossroads-clothing.com/ and subscribe for our email list. Please email me the name of the merchandise, color, & sizes you desire as well.

If stretch goals are met and you desire to update your selected apparel items with the newly unlocked shirt designs, you can resubmit your email after the funding campaign is over.

 

OUR CHALLENGE YET OUR SUCCESS.

Free Shipping for all merchandise orders shipped inside the USA during this funding initiative. All orders outside the United States will have a shipping fee of $10 Canada & $20 Rest of World. Excluding any unforeseen circumstances, i.e. production delays, customs, acts of God, etc. our goal is to ship products to you as quickly as possible.  We are currently scheduled to ship merchandise by late September 2017, but will make every effort to ship products earlier if possible.

 

YOU MAKE IT HAPPEN.

If You Desire To Contribute More, Please Do!

Feel Free To Donate Any Amount - Donations Will Be Accepted At Any Time. JUST PRESS THE "BACK IT" BUTTON @ TOP OF PAGE TO DONATE ANY AMOUNT YOU DESIRE.

Feel free contact me through our WEBSITE: http://crossroads-clothing.com/contact-us/ if you desire to do so.

The more received will help to supply more Shirt Designs & Sizes to be printed Now for You to receive.

 

APPRECIATE YOU!

Thanks, truly, to everyone that has already contributed. Thanks to everyone that has given a donation. Also, thanks to everyone that has made a pledged package amount. I will be sending your products while this campaign initiative is active thanks again for all of your help. You all made this possible.

 

Please visit Website & sign up for our Newsletter:

WEBSITE: http://crossroads-clothing.com/

 

Please Like, Follow, & Share Social Media Pages:

FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/Crossroads-Clothing-LLC-686177808196360/?fref=ts

INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/crossroadsclothing_cr/

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/JamFrancCR

PINTEREST: https://pinterest.com/crossroads_CR/

 

More To Come!!!

God Bless.

story:
The Amazing MX-LOCare™ GPS Watch allows you to keep watch of your loved ones. We understand that safety is critical, whether we are at home or out in the community, alone or with loved ones.

Caring for a person with Alzheimer’s disease is a challenge. We hope that this watch will help you cope with some of these challenges and provide a solution to increase the security and freedom of the person with Alzheimer’s in your home.

Everything you need to monitor their safety is available in this small wearable device that they keep on their wrist. The device provides two-way communication using high sensitivity GPS and cellular tower location as well as latest WiFi technology when GPS is not available. It’s also a Quad-band GSM Phone for voice and data communication. 

MX-LOCare™  is a wrist wearable safety device with advanced GPS and cellular technology for both outdoor and indoor location.

The MX-LOCare™ (BR-2) GPS Watch is the most advanced and cost effective wearable, waterproof mobile personal emergency response solution (mPERs) available today.

It can easily connect to any smartphone and our easy to use scan App download feature automatically allows up to 16 caregivers to integrate and monitor the wearer.

It is extremely secure! The watch is also very comfortable and features a hypoallergenic band. It has an Optional Locking Mechanism with integrated detach alert, which means it can be locked onto wearer and features an Integrated Light Beam detach alert to notify if device has been taken off or separated from the wearer,

We have taken the complexity out of the setup and administration of MX-LOCare™ GPS Watch so it as easy as charge and play and know that you get 100% support along the way! Our team of highly skilled professionals are available to assist you.

Contribute today and you can help to keep someone with Alzheimer's safe!

story:
With Amy's Curve Sizing , we have expanded the sizing system by an additional 15 sizes to fit those of us that have been gifted with more in the backside than what manufacturers consider a woman has.

Traditional sizing allows for XS, S, M, L, XL etc. We have expanded on this to add the Curve that increases the sizes available by more than 300%.

If you suffer from eternal wedgies due to having your plumper backside being pushed into "normal butt" panties, be relieved, our patent pending sizing system ensures that is a thing of the past.    

 

Measuring for Amy's Undies Video:

 

Curve Sizing Chart Video:

 

 

My husband and I have created several successful service related companies here in St Louis. So I am no stranger to starting a company, but I am new to crowdfunding. 

I know with the help of others, we can do so much more than I could do alone, so crowdfunding just makes sense and Indiegogo is a great way to launch a company and get a lot of exposure.

The more I talked to girls with this problem the more we knew we had to take advantage of every opportunity to spread the word. 

We already have demands for so much more than underwear because the sizing system is broken. Therefore, it is broken for proper fitting bathing suits, jeans etc.

We know this campaign is just the start and we couldn't be more excited.

We will start off with all 15 sizes in the styles of Bikini, Boyshorts & Cheeky in the color black. This is our $15,000 primary target.

When funds exceed this goal, we will unlock new colors and then the Plus Size line. See our Stretch Goals below.

Make sure to click the right spot to support the campaign.

 

After my kids were both in school, I had a bit more time to think about myself. 

One thing I decided to do was get new underwear and I wanted something other than the type I had been wearing.... since I was 12 - the plain bikini underwear that my mom always bought. They never really fit too well but they got the job done.

Now, I wanted to buy something cute and above all, I wanted comfortable underwear. Well, $500 dollars and many pairs of underwear later and everything thrown in the trash, you could say I was a bit frustrated. Nothing fit, like, not even close.

Could it actually be that there was not an underwear option out there for women with more butt, except to result in wearing a thong??

Yep, that was the case and I decided to do something about it. So I created Amy's Undies.

Amy's Undies are comfortable underwear to fit those whom are more rounded in the backside. 

It's for bigger butts

--Amy

A big thanks to everyone whom has helped me during the process of bringing this line to life:

MakersRow.com for educating me on the process and making it easy to find all the resources i needed.

The Pattern Makers for getting my ideas started.

Mike Castillo and his team at American Stitch Design for being patient and educating me through the manufacturing process.

And of course my husband who has pushed and supported me through the whole thing.

 

As you can see we are offering substantially more options in underwear sizes than what is normal. This is unavoidable in order to get underwear that fits. With more size options, come more stock - like 300% - 500% more.

When all the stretch goals are achieved we will have 288 possible different size, color and style combinations and that is just the start.

The more money we raise, the more supplies we will be able to buy and the more we buy the better price we get. With that will be able to create more stock and will be able to keep investing into more styles and color choices.

The sizing has never been changed before and now we know why - it is a lot of work. 

Not only did we have to design....and redesign and prototype and design... again, we also had to figure out how to maintain the proper amount of inventory. It was more complicated by far than we had initially anticipated, so much so that we added an Inventory Algorithm to our patent pending sizing system.

This is my passion and I have never worked so hard on anything in my 34 years on this planet. So thank you for reading all the way down here and thank you for your help.

Sincerely,

Amy Jones

REFUNDS

We reserve the right to issue or deny any requested refunds. If we issue a refund, we will deduct 10% from it because that amount has already been taken from your pledge as fees for the payment processor and Indiegogo.

EXCHANGES

We want you to be satisfied with your perk. If the product you receive does not fit, you may exchange the unworn items for a different size. We cannot exchange underwear once the package is opened so we recommend trying one pair before opening the remaining ones. For exchanges, you’ll have to send the product back to us at your own expense and then pay for shipping the new product back to you.

INTERNATIONAL BACKERS

We normally ship internationally to select countries using FedEx and USPS.

All international shipments are subject to duties, taxes and clearing fees which you are responsible for paying. All perks will be declared 'gifts', however, most countries will assess duties/taxes and in certain countries, the carrier will pre-pay the duties and taxes and bill you later. If you refuse delivery, your package will be abandoned. Once abandoned, we can’t ship another package to you or issue a refund.

story:
SPRING is now live on our own website! Visit us at:

www.springscrunchies.com

SPRING scrunchies for goodness' sake.  Built with purpose and poise. Engineered to keep up with the demands of every woman's busy schedule. Meet your hair's new best friend.

I’m a systems engineer with a fascination for learning and an obsession with improving the status quo. Engineering has always made sense to me – there are reasons why some things happen and some things don’t, and I get to be the architect of that reality. When my fiancé’s grandfather was suddenly diagnosed with pancreatic cancer and passed away, I was forced to face an uncontrollable situation where logic or reason didn't apply. I didn’t like it and I decided I should do something about it. The journey of creating SPRING was born out of my battle with the unexpected and the unexplainable. When I combined the product, original scrunchies I hand made with my grandmother, with the SPRING mission, I knew I was on the right track. I hope you will enjoy the SPRING scrunchie as much as I do – I wear mine every day for goodness’ sake. 

At SPRING, the objective is simple – scrunchies for goodness’ sake. Each scrunchie has an associated color-matched cause to which a portion of the proceeds is donated. As homage to breast cancer awareness month (October) and pancreatic cancer awareness month (November), a limited edition pink and purple scrunchie, respectively, is being sold with a portion of the proceeds being donated to the Duke Cancer Institute for breast cancer and pancreatic cancer research. I didn’t like feeling helpless in the face of pancreatic cancer, so I’m deciding to do something about it. In addition- although not exclusively diagnosed in females, breast cancer is a disease dominated by the female experience and I’d like for a product built for the modern woman to be directed towards educating her and saving her. 

This past September, SPRING donated 100 scrunchies to swag bags for attendees to the "What's Best for Breasts" event at the Duke Hospital. The event was geared towards educating the community on breast cancer, detection, and general women's health. We loved to be involved with such a great event and look forward to continuing a partnership with the Duke Cancer Institute.

This is our journey of where we began, our current SPRING scrunchie, and why the SPRING scrunchie is different.

 

   As a former Division One field hockey player and mechanical engineering student, I needed a hair product that could keep up. I rocked the tight, high ponytail on the field, and the loose bun in the engineering classroom. 

My solution to my complex schedule was the scrunchie – but not just any scrunchie, a scrunchie engineered to last longer and hold up my thick hair (and I mean really thick). And the only place I found what I was looking for was in my grandmother’s kitchen in Minnesota. Like any amazing Minnesotan grandma, my grandma Marlis taught me how to sew. The first items we made together were scrunchies and I still wear those originals in my hair today. SPRING scrunchies don’t lose their spring, and once I was inspired by the volunteering mission behind my product – I decided it was time to bring the SPRING scrunchie to the market.

   As women, we are strong. We are introspective, brave, and intelligent, and know our strengths. Not only do we know them, we do not apologize for them. We are stylish in our own way and by our own choosing. We are dancers, bankers, chefs, mothers, teachers, engineers, and painters.

We are diverse, and so are our needs. 

But we are all busy, or shall we say, dynamic. We all wear many different ‘hats’ in the course of one day, and have to mentally transition from hat to hat with ease. Shouldn’t we, women, with our dynamic nature, have equally dynamic style? 

We thought so. Enter - the SPRING scrunchie: a hair solution that’s as dynamic as every woman.

See the perks panel to check out the product pairings! One pack, two pack, or three pack - they all come with a limited edition SPRING patch! 

SPRING scrunchies are the better engineered alternative to the scrunchies on the market today. We have made a product that lasts – no more losing elasticity after only a few wears, the SPRING scrunchie has been engineered to last for years. Not only does the SPRING scrunchie keep its spring, the SPRING scrunchie holds your hair in place. Running a marathon for a cause and want to keep your hair up with a product that cares? – try the SPRING scrunchie. Sick of redoing that low bun that gets messy no matter what you do? – try the SPRING scrunchie. Thick, thin, curly, straight – this product will be your hair’s new best friend. Do yourself a favor and purchase one today for goodness’ sake.  

We've broken our goal strategy into our Primary Funding Goal and Additional Goals that we would love to achieve with your support! 

Each SPRING scrunchie is hand-made by me. I need the capital to pay a manufacturer to produce the SPRING scrunchie, so that the company can grow past my individual quota. It was important to me for these scrunchies to be Made in the USA and made with the same high quality standards that I currently hold for the final product. Here is a break-out of where the goal funding will be spent:

Our goal of $10,461 is based upon meeting the demand of a batch order size of 810 scrunchies. Because we every scrunchie is matched with $1, benefitting the Duke Cancer Institute’s breast cancer and pancreatic cancer research areas, the more people who purchase packages with scrunchies – the better! 

Here are some stretch goals that would enable some exciting add-ons to the SPRING Indiegogo journey: 

The vision for the online store will be to have three product lines: the athlete, the professional, and the weekend warrior. 

My aspirations do not end with the scrunchie – I intend to grow the SPRING brand to add more exciting products to the SPRING line.

An ode to my mechanical engineering background, the name SPRING lends itself to a mechanical spring, a device that translates potential energy into kinetic energy (or vice versa :) ). SPRING scrunchies can act as a spring board for organizations seeking to make real changes in their immediate community. In addition, Spring, the season, is a time for rebirth and growth, and I like the idea of planting seeds of change with the SPRING scrunchie.

story: .

We may make leather ties, but it's what we stand for that I'm the most proud of.  Life is quick to kick you down and constantly remind you to be part of the group.  You're supposed to blend in.  Nobody wants you to speak out or be different.  Why?  Some of the most influential people ever, did just that.  Before you're accepted, you're an outcast and you're discouraged.  I'm here to tell you not to accept things as they are.  Challenge the norm.  From redesigning something that hasn't changed in years, to challenging the leather industry in India to treat the environment with more respect.  Success comes from original ideas.  We stand behind the movers and shakers.  Those are our kind of peeps. 

 

My Story...

That guy right there, that's me, Jason Caplan.  About a year ago I created a company on the premise that life shouldn't be lived in a box.  The idea that what you see everyday, isn't what you're limited to.   I love to create things that stretch the boundaries of what we know.  Why should we accept something for what it is, and not try to change it?  I always searched for new ways to express myself.  That's when I came up with my idea to redesign the common tie.

  

Ties Haven't Really Changed Much In The Last 100 Years.... 

You know the drill..  Picking out a tie is about as exciting as a visit to the dentist.  You've put all of your energy into your suit, shirt and shoes. Your tie becomes an afterthought.  Another pattern, another color.  Pretty soon they all look alike.  I wanted something that stood out, something original, something that said who I was without speaking.  

 

That's When Moo Moo Ties Was Born!  

You can't blend in when you're born to stand out, so I set out to prove just that.  I searched for the very best quality leather I could find, combined it with a patent pending design and an ultra comfortable leather and velcro neck strap.  I have redesigned the tie to give you it totally new look.  Welcome to the fashion revolution! 

 

The Patent Pending Design That Started the Whole Thing

The reason leather has never really been considered for making ties is because it's thick.  It has such a beautiful character, and with age looks better and better.  I always thought there is no reason why there are no quality leather ties in the world today.  Many people have tried, but they often lack quality, or structure.  They feature an awkward clip, or string, or just don't look good. 

 

I came up with the design you see above where I wrapped the leather to form a knot, and secured it with a "chicago screw".  The "chicago screw" is used often in leather crafting.  This design forms a perfect knot, that resembles the likeliness of a neck tie perfectly.  I achieved exactly what I was looking to do.  I officially filed a utility patent in September of 2017.  

 

Features: What Makes a Moo Moo Tie Unique?                

 

 

 

The Collection:

We have 22 different color variations to choose from across a collection of bow ties and neck ties.  There's a tie for every and any occasion.  When you choose to back my project (big thank you by the way!), you can send us a message choosing the exact color and style you'd like.  

 

 

 

 

Project Timeline: 

I have come a long way since the beginning of the year, and invested over $40,000 so far for my patent application and trademark, molds for each piece of leather used to make the tie, the branding video you see above, and marketing materials such as professional photographs and designs.  

I'm looking for your help to help me reach the next step.  Right now I'm working on finalizing the website as well as purchasing inventory to launch in February.  Other expenses include packaging as well as integrating a distribution center.   WIth your pledges and successful funding on Indiegogo I can ship your ties in February and launch shortly after.  

 

 

Rewards:

 

For a limited time, you can select your reward and receive up to 50% off retail price.   Your reward will be delivered by February of 2018, and I will gladly return or exchange your tie within 30 days of receiving it with free shipping.  You'll be able to let me know exactly which tie you'd like by using the corresponding number on the table below in a short message when you make your pledge.   Thank you for your pledge.  I appreciate your support, and can't wait for you to try on your Moo Moo Tie!

 

  

 

 

 

Recent Press

           

 

 

 

Share this project with your friends and family.  Join us on Social Media using the links below.

story:
Short Summary

London based Ramm Design was launched in 2018 by Charley Ram and veteran shoe designer Kevin Martel (coincidentally an Aries...the other Ram) as a design studio focusing on direct to consumer footwear. Martel has designed footwear and accessories for some of the most iconic names in luxury including Ralph Lauren, Giorgio Armani, Bentley and Aston Martin.

The Ramm footwear philosophy emerged from the knowledge that guys who grew up wearing trainers will not tolerate uncomfortable shoes. After all - What are ‘dress’ shoes today?

Fed up with the tedious nature of the seasonal fashion system, Ramm Design has set out to launch products when they are ready and work directly with their customers to evolve the brand.

Our mission is to create classic footwear for a modern world incorporating comfort and components more akin to your favourite trainer than a traditional English shoe. A heavy leather sole is a 5000 year old idea...maybe even prehistoric. It survives out of a respect for tradition – not comfort.

We ask ourselves: Does comfortable have to mean ugly or uncool? Why is comfort such a nasty word in fashion?

Quality footwear also need not be overpriced. We are selling direct to our consumers online, via trunk shows and pop-up experiences. We call it PHYGITAL retail (Physical + Digital). Eliminating the traditional wholesale sales model keeps our costing in check and our quality product attainable to all.

We now want to expand our product offering and open our Phygital retail space in central London: this will take additional funding.

We launched Ramm footwear in January with our first classic design, the Ramm 001 Derby. We would now like to now develop the second drop, the Ramm 002 Loafer. This continuous development will take new funding and based on the amazing response to 001 – we can’t wait!

By contributing to the development of the Ramm footwear concept, we will be able to drop new styles every few months and create exciting new Limited Editions and colours to expand the business. Our first design has won many fans and this is just the beginning of what we can achieve. Footwear design takes serious investment and to innovate takes another level.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are setting a flexible funding goal of £15,000 to fund the first production of the Ramm 002 Loafer. This will fund the development of new moccasin lasts, sole moulds and engineering of this cool new slip-on. We have also created a new lightweight expanded rubber sole design featuring a London Underground grip pattern – a daily part of our lives here at Ramm. This is the new lightweight summer shoe we want for our commute!

As an early adopter of Ramm footwear, you will have the pleasure of owning one of our cool Ramm 001 derby lace-ups or being the first to experience the Ramm 002 Loafer as soon as the first production leaves our Italian factory. We are also offering a Customised pair of the Ramm 001 Derby made just for you: choosing from over 100 colours of suede or calfskin, grosgrain trims and various sole colours – a truly bespoke shoe made just for you!

We are opting for a flexible funding goal so that all funds raised can go towards new development. We will use any and all funds to pay for the new sole design which requires a custom aluminium mould that can range from £1000 to £3000 per size. The more we can raise after the initial components are developed, the more shoes we can make in production for selling.

 

The Impact

“I am making shoes for today and selling direct to my customers. Guys that grew up in trainers are not going to tolerate dress shoes made with 19th century processes and certainly don’t want to shop that way either.” – Kevin Martel, Designer/Founder

Kevin Martel is a founder and Creative Director of Ramm Design, a London based design studio specialising in footwear and accessories design. Martel has designed footwear and accessories for some of the most iconic names in fashion including Ralph Lauren and Giorgio Armani.

Today, Martel and Ramm Design collaborate with a variety of leading footwear, automotive and lifestyle companies to create innovative footwear and accessories utilising the latest technologies and material research.

We are building a new kind of footwear and accessories company based on style and comfort. We are developing products to showcase our love of classic footwear and our belief that comfort is non-negotiable: and it has to be beautiful.

Mission: To make classic dress shoes with style, and trainer-like comfort.

Mission: To convert the classic English Dress shoe customer to a rubber sole Ramm.

A classic derby is the first Ramm footwear design because we know this tried and tested pattern will adapt to every season, wardrobe, occasion and work environment.

Risks & Challenges

Making footwear is an expensive adventure. There is a reason that most emerging designers are unable to make their own footwear until well into the maturity of their brand. Unlike handbags or other accessories, footwear is a sized business and requires many hand-processes and size-sensitive components: each size requiring a specific investment in equipment. These costs can be daunting in the early stages of development, but the product can become highly profitable when amortised over time. Each design needs to be carefully considered. Mistakes such as a bad fit or inferior quality material can be costly to repair and lead to loss of confidence in the consumer. After all…nobody likes uncomfortable shoes!

Founder and Designer Kevin Martel has over 25 years of experience designing for marquee menswear brands such as Ralph Lauren and Giorgio Armani. The most recent project, Harrys of London ran successful shops in London, Dubai and Japan and sold to the world’s finest multi-brand department stores. His knowledge of footwear, sourcing and Italian manufacturing is world class and his nerve unflappable.

We want to build this business carefully and only launch new styles when they are fully realised and ready for market. This will take time and investment to get each design perfect.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone needs a new pair of shoes right now – we all have many priorities, but there are other ways to support our project!

Please share our story with your friends, family and colleagues! Help us get the word out that Ramm footwear is doing something different. Social media is a great tool for us to tell our story and you can help too by sharing our links on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and YouTube. Use the Indiegogo share tools provided here! Let’s make some cool shoes!

story:
A Self-Cleaning everyday sock, utilizing Pure Silver in the latest Micron Tech, Rev is engineered to outperform. Silver has been utilized by NASA, US Special Forces, and Olympic athletes to create germ free textiles.


 


 
 
 

Silver binds to essential cell components like DNA to neutralize their harmful effect. The process of minimizing the bacteria helps with eliminating odor, prevents skin irritations and more. 

 
 
 
 

Rev comes in two styles and three size options. You will be able to select your preferred style and size in the survey after the campaign has completed. 

 
 
  • Rev’s ultra soft cotton quickly wicks away moisture so that you stay warm and dry.
  • The custom MaxBreath™ weaves provides an ultra light feel.
  • Strategically placed pure silver fibers actively eliminates germs and odor.
  • The air weave cushion reduces friction to help prevent blisters.
  • Silicone anti-slip grip helps to minimize movement.
  • Advanced form fitting matrix eliminates sagging for a custom tailored feel. 
 

Rev Socks uses Long-Staple cotton. The longer fibers adds strength, durability and quality while maintaining maximum breathability compared to ordinary cotton.  

 
 
 

Silver binds to essential cell components like DNA to neutralize their harmful effect. The process of eliminating bacteria helps with odor, prevents allergies such as skin irritations, pimples, asthma, runny nose, sneezing and more. It has taken years of development for silver fabrics to arrive at this level of effectiveness and quality. We use micron technology, a step above nano tech, to coat the entire fiver with pure silver. 

 

 The benefits of silver have been used by NASA, U.S. Special Forces and Olympic Athletes. Proven effective against microbes such as bacteria and fungus means that silver naturally destroys odor-causing pathogens.  

 

To add any of our Rev™ 2019 Collection products,  please click on your “Manage your pledge” button (on top side when you open the project page), then click “Change your pledge” and simply add to the total pledge. For multiple quantities please multiply the product's cost. 

You will be able to select your preferred size or color in the survey after the campaign ends. For more info about these products please visit revactivewear.com

*Additional International Shipping will apply during the survey for all add-ons. 

 
 
 

After years of research and development and after countless prototypes, we've perfected our design. We're all ready for production and we hope that you'll join us make this idea a reality. 

 
 

"Our goal is to better the health and wellness of people through science and technology. We hope that you'll join us revolutionize the future of Activewear."

-Boban Veljanov

We've partnered with Silicon Valley California tech company PLX Devices Inc. who have perfected the silver nano technology. PLX Devices Inc. as raised over $3.3 Million on Kickstarter and fulfilled rewards to 28,000+ backers since 2013. Innovations in the latest and cutting edge technologies is their passion and we're proud to have them as a strategic partner for Rev Socks. 

 
 

We've also partnered with San Francisco, California company Ivana Designs who have helped us perfect the design, and comfort of Rev Socks. Ivana Designs has raised over $754k on Kickstarter and fulfilled rewards to 4400+ backers since 2017. Ergonomic design and textile manufacturing is their passion and we're proud to have them a strategic partner for Rev Socks. 

 
 

Questions? Please feel free to message us with any questions. We're here to help.

 

*Due to continuous product improvements, the images on the website may differ slightly from the actual product that you receive. Early prototype shown. 

**All domestic and international rewards will be shipped with full tracking information.

***"Rev Socks" is a trademark of Ivana Designs LLC

****Pure Silver Fibers is an intellectual property of PLX Devices Inc. with patents pending.

story:
Who is Novique?
Novique is a footwear and apparel brand founded in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania that was built on the pillars of originality, integrity and perseverance. The name derives from a combination of my son and daughter's first names, Domonique and Nova.

My name is Malcolm Mays, I'm a father, lifetime musician and aspiring entrepreneur. My mission to build a legacy that I can pass to my children keeps my flame of passion lit like a torch in the night. I want to pass them knowledge, ownership, wealth and understanding instead of debt, hardships and lack of awareness. Through necessity, curiosity and perseverance, I developed and nurtured skills such as writing, branding, marketing, graphic design and website development; Novique is a cultivation of all my gifts and skills.

 

Why am I raising money?
In September, I launched my pre-orders for the Novique Origin via a Facebook video with my prototypes in hand. By this point I had already developed the name and logo, built the website and sourced my product. I was able to show the public what the shoe looked like and the post went somewhat viral. I pledged (and still do) to give back $5 per pair sold, to local community organizations in my hometown of Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. The two organizations that I chose to donate to was the Boys and Girls Club of Harrisburg and Capital Rebirth Inc. The orders started to pour in and I immediately went into action; I was now able to fund my entire order of 700 pairs, as we peaked at a little under $13K in pre-sales.

Anticipating my order's arrival, I entered a lease agreement for a storage/processing location where I have been paying rent since October/November. The shoes were estimated to be produced in about 4 weeks, but due to employee shortage brought upon by COVID-19 protocols, that production time almost tripled.

Upon completion, my supplier notified me that the shipping cost had increased dramatically to over $12K, for the express service which delivers in a little over a week. The cheaper option of shipping it by sea has been fluctuating between $5K and $7K, which takes about 4 weeks for delivery. At this point, all funds have been depleted. The funds from the pre-order sales have been split between the production of goods and maintaining rent at my processing location, awaiting my shipment.

Currently, my order of 700 pairs of shoes (127 pre-ordered) is sitting with my supplier awaiting shipment, collecting dust. I made the mistake of cutting the pre-orders off at a certain date; I was trying to make it limited and only allowed people to pre-order up until October/November. I wouldn't be in this position if I would have left them open because there was a lot of momentum generated and I believe I would have had the funds necessary to cover this shipping expense. I've had to refund several customers who obviously are disgruntled due to the amount of time they've been waiting for their product(s). At this point, my business' reputation (and mine as well) is at stake and I would hate for this to be seen as a lack of integrity or a malicious move to collect funds and never fulfill orders. 

I've been in countless meetings and several phone calls, trying to secure funding, trying to find investors or any solution that will allow me to move forward and pay this outstanding shipping cost.

How will I use the money?
If my minimum goal of $7K is reached, I will immediately contact my supplier to see if I am able to select the standard shipping (by sea). If I am able to raise upwards of $14K, I will select the express shipping so that I can get my pre-orders delivered ASAP and also revive the brand. Each time I have inquired about the shipping, it fluctuates around the same numbers, which is why I have the amount rounded up. If I am able to secure at least $18,500 I will cover the express shipping, pay 2-3 months of rent at my processing location, setup utilities (electric, water, gas, internet) and purchase working equipment (shipping desks, worktop tables and computer equipment). At this tier, I would also be able to establish my distribution chain. 

Distribution will initially be handled by me, with receiving, processing and shipping being handled in-house. Estimating there are 5-6 pairs sold a day, I could handle the processing myself. I am fully prepared to hire and educate staff if necessary, in the event that I cannot fulfill the orders myself. After the initial 700 pairs are sold, distribution will then be delegated to ShipBob, a fulfillment company with four warehouses in the United States located in Chicago, Los Angeles, Dallas and Bethlehem, PA. ShipBob’s system seamlessly integrates with the online platform that Novique is hosted on, Shopify, and will fulfill orders remotely from their warehouses, after the orders are received on Novique’s platform.

How do I know I can receive my inventory and stay in business?
Initially, Novique raised $12,315.80 in pre-order sales for the first product, the Novique Origin. From there, I launched a quick test advertising campaign on Facebook and Instagram that produced 15 purchases at $6.60 cost per purchase on a $150 item (1 pair of sneakers, pre-sold at $95) with a reach of 3,545 people, costing Novique $99.02 to run the campaign. That equates to spending $99.02 to make $1,425. In order to reach Novique’s first year sales of $315K, 5.75 pairs would need to be sold daily or the equivalent of $863/daily. We reached 3,545 people and earned 15 purchases, so that gives us a number as far as the daily reach, that we would need in order to garnish at least 5.75 pairs sold a day. 

Novique knows the exact formula to reach its goals. From these results, a more perfect formula will be crafted for each different type of media that it is presented, allowing us to increase sales while establishing customer retention.

In order to reach Novique’s projected goals over the next three years, it will take intense focus, superior organization skills and amazing adaptability as markets often change. I'm adept at handling these responsibilities. I've put in the initial efforts to: develop the product idea and sales model, design a logo, secure a supplier for product development, build Novique’s website from the detailed script to product images, integrate necessary applications with Shopify’s system, register necessary business filings and develop social media campaigns.

www.noviquewear.com

story:
"Poor people fed up!" - Bounty Killer, Jamaican Reggae Artist. 

The people have been fed up! The sentiment sits well with the stories within Issue #2. Stories from Black pioneers like Dapper Dan have significance in the trajectory of his past as a first-generation child of the Great Migration from the 'Deep' South to North-East of the United States of America. Furthermore, we seem to neglect the influence that Caribbean culture has had on popular culture; the reign of European nations like England, France, and Spain still loom, ironically - in the 'West Indian' islands. A blend of cultures leading to a new - the people of the Caribbean share the interest of the rest of the developed world, but suffer the brunt of a secondary existence.

The Caribbean islands are subject to natural disaster as much as human consumption-waste that litters the land and the surrounding sea. Often left to fend for themselves in those situations, they are subject to the finances of external sources in search and support of preserving a particular part of a considerable paradise, and all that comes with it.

The idea to seek paradise is benign but raises a conundrum. Who lives in Paradise? Our Issue #1 highlights how surfer Stephanie Gilmore had noticed the human-consumed plastic waste products in the South-East Asian region of the world where she would often surf for years into her adulthood. Issue #2, we dive into Caribbean natives Rushemy Botter of Curaçao, and Lisi Herrebrugh of the Dominican Republic. Both leading the design for BOTTER, a Parisian-based fashion line, and their efforts to find sustainable solutions. Using plastic they found and recycled for the first collection has now served as a foundation for the brand and a couple an effort to save the coral reefs.

It is evident that Black-African culture has evolved beyond its infamous shorelines and is regenerating - the story of Black life. We watched an entire year of protest for the lives and livelihoods of Black people, not just in America, but for every nation. We are weathering a biological storm known as COVID-19. We have come to terms with the fact that human impact on the planet is unavoidable. It's a vital point of interest for survival. Finding solutions for our overall safety, we are rejecting norms for the time. Creating new normals in place of outdated habits.

- Cassell Ferere, Editor-in-Chief

 

Expect 2-6 weeks to receive depending on your location. International shipping may affect shipping costs.

story:
Who We Are

Michoud & Irish is a Boutique Watch Brand offering custom crafted, luxury timepieces in small batch production for people that simply dig watches.

​You never quite know where life will take you.  The road is full of twists and turns… ups and downs.  Life has its way… But no matter where life takes us, we all had to start somewhere.  For us, it was New Orleans.  Becoming friends in our freshman year of High School, we’ve been buds for over three decades.  Will grew up off of Michoud Boulevard in New Orleans East and I’m from the Irish Channel in Uptown New Orleans. We’ve both traveled to many different parts of the world and now live in different parts of the country, but New Orleans is a lady that you always carry with you. She speaks to our spirit... our core… far from perfect… but real, passionate, and resilient.  This is the fabric that makes Michoud & Irish. 

 ~Sean Williams  & Will Bolling

We would take very different journeys and chase a number of individual pursuits.  Will would head off to college and a career in the U.S. Air Force retiring as a Lt. Colonel.  The path for me would be college football, the corporate world, then life as a cigar maker rising to head up one of the most iconic cigar brands in the world.  Throughout these journeys we and our friends would always connect around family, shared passions, and business interests. These connections would become even more prescient in 2013 as Will shared the news that he’d just been diagnosed with leukemia and would be retiring from the military not quite knowing what the future might hold.  This kind of realization  encourages you to pursue your passions with a clearer sense of purpose.  In one special way that this passion and purpose would manifest itself for us was with Michoud & Irish and the philosophies that drive the brand.  One of our basic philosophies is the belief that every man of reasonable means should have a few basic accessories… and central in this lineup of accessories is a fine timepiece.  We also believe that a fine timepiece should be accessible.  This belief lead to our creation of the Michoud & Irish Watch Company in 2016 releasing our first watch in the fall of that year. 

We have enjoyed success with our small batch releases such as the Motus and the Blue Series and after a few years of working with and developing relationships with skilled artisans in different factories around the world we are excited to be able to offer our upcoming release to watch enthusiasts throughout the world. The Michoud & Irish LE COMMANDANT is a beautiful representation of our well-made and uniquely stylish timepieces made available at an incredibly attainable price point. 

LE COMMANDANT Specifications:

Case Diameter: 43mm

Case: 316L Stainless Steel

Bracelet: 304L Stainless Steel Folding Clasp (22mm width)

Dial: Nautilus with Luminova Markings

Bezel: Uni-Directional

Crown: Screw Down (Offset)

Power Reserve: 40 Hours

Water Resistance: 20ATM (656ft)

Movement: Miyota 8215 Automatic (21 Jewels)

Power: 40hr Reserve

Crystal: Sapphire Crystal

Complications: Date

2-year International Warranty

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Our funding goal is $40,000 to assist with production costs.
  • In becoming a supporter of this project you will receive one of these beautiful timepieces at $325 off of the retail price!
  • Any funds raised short of $40,000 will go towards production costs.

The Impact

Le Commandant's case is constructed with 316L Stainless Steel for time tested durability and tarnish resistance along with an extremely scratch resistant Sapphire Crystal. Additionally, Le Commandant is mechanically powered by perpetual movement so there is no need for a battery.  It's the little things that add up!

Risks & Challenges

As the great pugilist and philosopher Mike Tyson once said, “Everybody has a plan til' they get punched in the mouth”. Thankfully at this point in our entrepreneurial pursuits we are able to say that we have been punched in the mouth before!  For that reason alone we are sure to give the process a little bit more runway. We realize that there is always the possibility of a delay, but having production experience with our factory partner beforehand helps in mitigating that possibility as much as possible. Our commitment is to keep our backers informed every step of the way with messages and pictures and most certainly give a heads up if we anticipate any delays in fulfillment. We want this journey to be as real and exciting for our backers as it is for us. We really hope that you decide to be a part of the Michoud & Irish foundational family!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone has the need for one of our beautiful watches or maybe even the ability to participate at this time but we could still use your support. We would greatly appreciate you passing this along to anyone that you think may be interested.  Put the Indiegogo share tools to work:-)
