story:
TPHR Apparel is a new clothing line started by Topher Oriel, a music photographer and graphic/web designer based out of Orange Country, CA.

This project began around midterms season when I noticed peoples' eyes were constantly glued to their books, afraid that if they don’t memorize every detail that they will fail at everything. Personally, I kind of saw that as depressing. So I thought about how I could help fix this. I wanted to figure out some way to share a tiny bit of encouragement just to get people through the day.

And thus, TPHR Apparel was born!

The opening release of shirts will include designs derived from thoughts that helped me get through troubled times in a simplistic, minimal fashion. But down the line, each collection will feature different themes deriving from pop culture, literature, etc. so be on the lookout.

The main concept behind every shirt is simple: leave behind a positive, thoughtful message.

Shirts will be printed on Gildan Ultra Cotton crewnecks in S-XL.
Sizing chart is also included below.

#1: "Life is All About Balance."

"Life is all about balance. If something bad happens, something greater will come right around the corner." White and pink lettering and accents printed on a black tee.

#2: "Mistakes Are Proof That You Are Trying."

"Mistakes are proof that you are trying." White and light blue lettering and designs printed on a dark gray heather tee.

#3: "This Is Your Reminder."

"This is your reminder that life will all work out in the end. Take it from me. I used to be a thought and now I made it on a shirt." White lettering printed on a deep red tee.

#4: "Wake Up and Smell the Daisies."

"Wake up and smell the daisies." White lettering and design printed on a black tee.



Like mentioned before, TPHR Apparel's strives to leave behind a positive message through our products. To share that positive message with the community, we will give back a portion of each collection's earnings to a charity or non-profit that we believe deserves help.

As an up-and-coming establishment, we are open for collaborations big or small. So if you are running a non-profit that is interested in working with us, please feel free to contact us at http://topheroriel.com/contact

As a young establishment, it's sometimes difficult for us to get our foot in some doors, but we believe that Indiegogo is an awesome way to raise awareness of the line and get more people interested worldwide. The requested $3,000 for this campaign will not only help jumpstart the apparel by producing the shirts and help build a foundation, but it will also support future endeavors of working with other designers to make more diverse and unique collections in the future. 

We are excited how TPHR Apparel can springboard from crowdfunding and reach new heights.

There are two main things that the money raised will go into:
  1. Getting the shirts printed and ready: Both getting the shirts and getting them printed is going to be the main category  the money will go to. Because of this category taking up over 75% of the overall funds, it is a high priority just to get the apparel out there.
  2. Online store production and making an online presence: Because of my background of being a photographer, designer, and pretty much living in the internet for most of my time,  I've figured out how to work my way around productions on a low budget as a one-man team. But to promote this brand new line, TPHR Apparel is going to have to put a bit more emphasis on making sure the store, multimedia promotions (video and photo ads, social media, etc.), and presence gets more resources than what gets usually put in.


Once the campaign starts, there will be multiple events to promote TPHR Apparel during and after the campaign.

  • Tuesday, June 2nd, 2015: Start of the campaign.
  • Friday, June 12th, 2015: 6-hour promotional livestream for the campaign on Twitch.
  • Friday, July 31st, 2015: 12-hour livestream on Twitch to promote the last day of the campaign.
  • Saturday, August 1st, 2015: End of Campaign.
  • Wednesday, September 30th, 2015: Perks will be shipped.
  • Saturday, October 3rd, 2015: Grand opening of TPHR Apparel at the Topher Oriel art gallery/concert in Fullerton, CA.


The Indiegogo exclusive card

UPDATE (June 6th - 8th): Any backer that contributes between this Saturday and Monday will receive a bonus sticker/button package with their perk. After Monday, this perk will be available separately and in a shirt package!

  • $4,000+: Beanies. TPHR Apparel will make a limited run of the logo made on beanies.
  • $5,000+: Hoodies. TPHR Apparel will do a limited run on all 2 designs printed on hoodies.
  • $6,000+: 24-hour livestream. If we can double the amount raised by the end of the campaign, I will dedicate a day to hang out to thank you on Twitch.

CROWDSHARING is CROWDFUNDING. 

Choose a perk & show your support! We tried to make the perks for this campaign as much fun for everyone. The more backing goes into the campaign, the more exposure this can get by sharing. This is the best option for if you are not in the best shape for finances right now (please make sure to support your well-being before anything else). Every voice counts.

Please share this project on other social media platforms throughout the campaign and let people know about this! Tag @topheroriel when you share this since I will be looking out on various platforms. Some people who share the TPHR Apparel Indiegogo could have a special surprise when their perk gets shipped to them (aka, get some more free goodies).

"Your support means the world to me in this new adventure. Your name will be forever embedded in my heart and we'll give you a thank you shout-out on a dedicated section on the TPHR Apparel website in recognition for the campaign." -Topher Oriel

Shawn Wasabi for the background music in the campaign video.
http://twitter.com/shawnwasabi
http://youtube.com/shawnwasabi
http://facebook.com/shawnwasabi
Eric Guzman for hooking me up with test products and letting me shoot for his band.
http://twitter.com/ewicguzman
http://lookalive.storenvy.com/
http://facebook.com/thelongrunmusic

story:
Cora Anne Intimates

Inspired by the women in my family before me; Cora Anne covers the generations of women in my family who've been brave, strong, and have inspired me. 

(NEW YORK is the state that I ultimately want to register the business in as well as open a store front. This is why New York is in the title). 

The Collections

The Cora - Inspired by my grandmother; Cora Ruth, this collection will be off whites, Lilacs, with Southern charm touches. Grandma always told me that I should be an artist and do something with computers, well I am living that dream today. She taught me how to have faith and ultimately believe in myself. The example that she set was completing her nursing degree. Having eight kids and a few set backs didn't stop her - she showed perseverance and never gave up. 

The Anne - Inspired by my mother; Anne Victoria, this collection will be 1980's inspired, fashion forward, bold & edgy yet feminine. First my mother then a friend, now she's everything. Funny, beautiful and outgoing this woman has taught me to not "care" what people think and just go out there and DO IT, with class that is. 

The Josephine - Inspired by my aunt, Valerie Josephine; this collection will be 1970's, MOD - fashion forward pieces. Legit hustler. Aunt Valerie is a prime example of work hard, play harder. Overcoming racial tensions in the South growing up, making a name for herself and proving that if you want something bad enough, yo'll get it. 

The Virginia - Inspired by my father's mother, Annie Virginia, this collection will be 1950's vintage inspired with teal colors. Annie past away from Cervical Cancer when I was only 8 years old, I don't have a large memory span but I do remember her GRACE, pure grace. Proceeds from any of the pieces purchased from this collection will go towards a Cervical Cancer Non-Profit Charity. 

The Brunette - Inspired by my grandmother's sister, Aunt Brunette, this collection is fun, sunny, bright and full of energy; everything she was. This collection will also be what "PINK" is to "Victoria's Secret".

The Rosa - Inspired by my grandmother's Aunt Rosa, this collection will be soft, minimal with design details of ROSE LACE. 

These five lines are the basic to the CORA ANNE INTIMATES. Limited editions such as Mable, Hettie, Amanda, etc.. may be in the works. 

The Phylis - inspired by Aunt Phylis (married Cora Ruth's son, Chuck). This collection will be our signature plus line for larger and curvier women. Looking for a collaboration with her daughter, Nikki in hope to bring this line into play.  

The Pieces 

Each collection will be limited-production with average bra sizes (A - DDD) available. Larger sizes can be made to order. 

Inviting, Anne (Vicki Smith) and Valerie Jackson to oversee creative direction/inspiration boards to show designer (looking to hire one) what each collection should represent. 

Each line will have a Spring/Summer collection & Fall/Winter collection. From chemise, baby dolls, robes, teddies, panties, etc... luxury threads, silks and lace all incorporate into the design. 

Risks & Challenges

  • Hiring a well qualified designer to actually make the pieces. I have a few in place who already have collections of their own. 
  • Securing efficient manufacturing cost.
Start up will be ONLINE web store only. With no store front, adverting online, participating in shows, being featured in print is crucial. I am already producing several lingerie shows here on the East Coast that will allow me to introduce and to place special orders of the collection. 
www.laceclt.com - My Lingerie Show
www.carolinabridalfair.com - Carolina Bridal Fair; client in which I produce the lingerie & fashion shows. I'll also have a booth to sell and promote the collection. 
Not all collections can be debuted at first. The main collection is; The Cora. The others will come due to marketing, growth, etc...
story_txt:
Cora Anne Intimates Inspired by the women in my family before me; Cora Anne covers the generations of women in my family who've been brave, strong, and have inspired me. 
(NEW YORK is the state that I ultimately want to register the business in as well as open a store front. This is why New York is in the title).    The Collections The Cora - Inspired by my grandmother; Cora Ruth, this collection will be off whites, Lilacs, with Southern charm touches. Grandma always told me that I should be an artist and do something with computers, well I am living that dream today. She taught me how to have faith and ultimately believe in myself. The example that she set was completing her nursing degree. Having eight kids and a few set backs didn't stop her - she showed perseverance and never gave up.

story:
THE STORY

Tosha and I are co-founders of Liv2BGirl, a social mobile platform where girls are inspired and rewarded to Spread the Love and Stop the Hate!

Many businesses are inspired by a passion and Liv2BGirl is no different. In 2011, when Facebook was the place to be for tweens and teens, we saw the issues immediately. Social pressures are part of your world even when you leave school.

As co-founders, neighbors and friends, Tosha and I wanted something different for our girls. We embarked on a journey to create a positive place where girls felt comfortable being individuals. Here are the highlights:

  • Self-funded a social website, liv2bgirl.com.
  • Created merchandise to raise brand awareness.
  • Watched our community grow to 500+ beta users who showed their desire for a place that was supportive and uplifting.   
  • User base grew from local to international. 
  • Girls spent an average of 30 plus minutes on the site daily.
  • Girls monitored and controlled any negativity that crept into the community.
  • Website beta test cut short due to a hacking incident. Took the site down for the security of the community.
  • Re-evaluated our market strategy and switched our focus to mobile based on the direction of the marketplace.
  • Created a prototype for a mobile platform using the valuable information we obtained during the website beta.

TODAY

Launching this app and spreading the word (user acquisition) is our company's goal. The more girls we reach, the more we can make a change! But we need your help.

SOCIALLY RESPONSIBLE

Mobile apps that exist for the teen girl demographic aren't offering a supportive environment, one that encourages girls to champion one another.  Liv2BGirl is an app with a social influence beyond the technology.

SOCIALLY COMPLETE

Liv2BGirl combines many communication functions teen girls already rely on in one place - messaging a group, following news about an event, posting/commenting on pictures, and more.

SOCIALLY UPLIFTING

Liv2BGirl has Hangouts (groups) where girls can find their interests and share them with other girls. The interest areas include options for discussing anything from fashion to sports to social issues. There will be mentors over many Hangouts who lift the girls up on a daily basis. The app also has a "Featured Girl" who inspires them to pursue their passions.

SOCIALLY AWARE

Liv2BGirl gives a percentage of their profits to organizations with similar missions.

OUR FUTURE

In the investment community, funding risky ventures is very difficult. A successful Indiegogo campaign would move us forward in so many ways!

We are asking for $50,000 to:

  • Create a beta mobile app on IOS with a limited number of users initially.
  • Build our partnership network, including identifying organizations we can support financially when we reach revenue!
  • Prove to the investment community this is a worthwhile and needed change to the existing social media environment.

Our big reach is $100,000. Here is what we could do:
  • Build the app with unlimited amount of users on IOS and Android.
  • Continue building the brand at a national level using PR and existing social media channels.
  • Sell branded merchandise and give a percentage of proceeds to organizations with similar missions.

Your support means everything to the future of Liv2BGirl!

If you have a daughter, granddaughter, niece or friend in need of a community created to lift her up, support her and encourage her, then take a moment to give to our campaign. Together we can make a difference in the lives of girls everywhere.

story:
Looking good makes us feel good! An innovative activewear concept that will change your life!

Have you ever thought of wearing your sports items not only at the gym and still look a million dollars? Today you can! We have designed a collection of activewear that combines the sportive look with a touch of elegance, which will allow you to combine it in many different ways, according to your needs.

Original and unique Italian urban sportswear, produced with high quality Italian sports fabrics you will be able to wear both at the gym and in the city. Designed by Ayelet Shein Kudevitzki who lived  15 years in Milan, the capital of fashion, and studied at the Milan prestigious school of fashion Marangoni.


SIZE CHART

Sizes were thought for the body of the average woman. Most of us don't have the body of a top model, but we can still dress to kill!!


Measurements are in cm.

XL will soon be available.


OUR SITE 

www.albawomen.com: women empowerment through sports on the Internet. This is what we are working on:

-Shopping online: you will able to purchase our items on our website

 - The physical activity that is right for you. You don't know which physical activity best suits you? Find out which sport is your sport and go for it!

 - Personal stories: sometimes it is thank to other people stories that we become inspired and find the resources to go for what we want.

- Online lectures given by professionals in the field (nutritionists, psychologists, coaches, sports experts, etc.)

- Build your personal fitness program online


How will we help other women?

10% of the business net profits will go to organizations that help less fortunate women regain control over their lives (organizations that fight violence against women, shelters for abused women, self-defense studios for women, organizations that deal with reintegration into society, etc.). It will be thank to your contribution that we will be able to make this come true. 

Discover the fascinating world of women empowerment, fashion and sports, while, at the same time, helping other women regain their lives. 

 About me

I am Rachel 42 years old, Italian, a wife, a mother a martial artist and a martial arts instructor. I grew up in Milan, the capital of fashion, where my parents had a clothing business.

I started practising martial arts 22 years ago, I have a B.A, in translation, (I speak five languages), lived in six different countries, have an MBA, and worked in high-tech for more than ten years. Today I dedicate my time to making my project become a reality and helping women fulfil themselves, acquire self-confidence, physical and mental strength through sports and by feeling good with themselves and their body. I do karate and krav maga and teach women and children karate and self defense.

story:
With a focus on craftsmanship, quality and beauty Ellen Conde is a jewelry line that brings a universe of splendour into any given situation that life may present.

Our jewelry is a narration and reminder of what beauty really is, going beyond superficial ideals of contemporary society.

Inspired by the birth of our daughter, Ellen Conde was established in 2013.

Ellen Conde’s vision is to create timeless, classy yet modern pieces which transmit beauty and are a heritage to be passed on to someone special.


           


            





                      




 

-Katy Perry for FORBES 


 




                       

         


                                  

            



                             


      

     

                         


  

             FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!!                     

  

     

                     

              FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!!                                 

                                         

                              

                     

           

               FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!!    



                                 

                       

          

               FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!! 


                           

                       


               FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!



                           

                      


   

               FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!!


                                  

                             

                       

          


               FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!! 



                           

                       

 

               FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!! 


    



           


   

          



         




                


At the moment, our studio in Milan handles the design phase  and the final hand assembly.That means that there are many steps in between that are located far away – which adds to logistics expenses.

               


                

     







We take great pride in making top quality jewelry by using only the best materials, techniques and most authentic methods.

   


The pieces are crafted under a rigorous, detail-oriented process, which requires great finesse to achieve a balance of forms. 

    

Only certified and superior materials are used: Swarovski Crystals, symbol of glamour and elegance, and precious soft pearls, symbol of timeless femininity, combined with precious and semi-precious metals. (24k gold, 18k. rose gold, ruthenium and palladium.)

  


All materials are nickel/lead free and hypoallergenic making them suitable for sensitive skin.

  



             

     

                  

      


          


      


-Less is more. Stick to one statement piece per outfit. This will allow your piece to stand out like it’s supposed to. 

  

 

-Choose your earrings wisely. Statement earrings are eye-catching and they should suit your face shape and hair. Choose the right earrings according to length, color, and shape and make sure they suit your features, hairstyle and outfit.

   

  

-Keeping it simple. When wearing a big piece, tone down your outfit with simple clothes, neutral and block color pieces and don’t mix it up with busy patterns and sparkly clothing.        

  


-Match the necklace to the neckline. Strapless, off-shoulder, scoop or v-necklines are easy to match a statement piece. Collars and halter necks are difficult but work well if they are in neutral and block colors so that they emphasize your piece.    

 


-Statement pieces ARE the outfit. Statement pieces are designed to make a statement so let them speak for the rest of your outfit. Choose your overall style then choose your statement piece which boasts that style.

 


        


         

 

                              

                               

                                

                                 

                                 

                                                




                          


The biggest potential challenge of an online crowd-funding campaign offering exclusive deals is the possibility of receiving an extremely numerous amount of orders. Luckily, we’ve been producing for a while now and our production line and manufacturers have already been selected and have proven to be of the most accomplished artisans in Italy.

With an online campaign we understand that you cannot physically feel the pieces. Our jewelry is set apart from others for its quality and tactile sensation. Since we use Swarovski materials, we are represented by a brand with over 120 years of quality and experience, we are confident that you will feel its superiority and love your piece. 

We’ve done our research and we realise that many backers are often let down by campaigners due to a lack of communication. Our TEAM is well prepared to receive any request at any time of day! 

 



   






                     


We are a team of international designers with very different backgrounds and personalities.  What brings us together is a shared desire to create respectful and quality items through a conceptual design approach to bring a new kind of appreciation to beauty.

                               

 The Big Boss, Eva always has the final say in what happens, when it happens and how! Better not mess with her. She is the inspiration and lucky charm for everyone in the team.


                                

Entrepreneur, Creative Director, Mom and Perfectionist by nature, Elena is the founder and designer behind our brand. With an engineering and product design background it's safe to say she's well prepared! With an eye for detail Elena puts the cherry on top…of the cake…literally, she bakes amazing sweet treats for the team.        


                           

Ellen's right arm and husband… He's the Project Manager, designer and back officer... Just to mention a few of his tasks. Gilberto is the night owl, who is even up at 3 in the morning with new ideas. He has the insomnia world record with an average of 3 hours of sleep …. per week. Besides being involved in every aspect of the brand he always finds the right time for his daughter.


                               

Designer, thinker and concept developer, Cara is the "yang" of the situation, you're never gonna see her stressed or mad! She's a great Design Thinking specialist offering communication expertise and idea development to the brand with a solid educational background.


                

Luca, half Italian and half Swiss, is our digital genius. Although skilled in video and digital image making he is also the best photographer in town. Dedicated to all areas of his work he relies on his trusted "portable" 27" iMac.




                     


1. When do I get my Perk?  Physical Perks ordered during the campaign will go into production in July and will be shipped in August/September.

Digital Coupon Perks and Distributors Perk have a longer ordering period. For example, The “More for Less” Perk allows you to place orders throughout the whole upcoming year.

Orders placed during the months of July&August will be produced in September and shipped in October. Orders placed during the months of September&October will be produced in November and shipped in December.Etc.

Our production and shipping are well organized and in this way, we are sure to satisfy our valued backers. Obviously those who back the project earlier in the campaign will get the perk fastest.   

2. Where do you ship to?  We use DHL services for delivery and we will ship to anywhere that they deliver. ELLEN CONDE offers its backers international standard shipping to all products purchased. Orders are shipped from Milan, Italy. Please, ensure that the shipping address you indicated is correct. In case of error ELLEN CONDE will not be responsible and cannot reroute your products after the shipment.

Please note that all deliveries must be signed for, so it is advisable to ensure somebody will be available to do so at your chosen delivery address.

ELLEN CONDE will send you by e-mail a shipment confirmation and the tracking number of the shipment as soon as your order has been shipped.

3. Do I need to pay for the shipment? Shipping in Italy is free, European countries $20, 00 and Rest of the world $35, 00. Actual rate.

4. How do I know my purchase went through? You’ll receive and email confirmation from our staff.

5. How do I select my perk color? We will include available color options for your perk on your confirmation email. You may confirm or adjust your color choice by replying to that email.

6. How do I purchase additional accessories? Through spontaneous flash sales at discounted Indiegogo prices.

7. When will there be flash sales? If you are an early supporter, you’ll be notified in advance by mail. Otherwise you’ll need to keep an eye on our social media.

8. Do the pieces come with packaging/box? Off course, Yes!  Each Ellen Conde piece comes in exclusively designed packaging. It is presented in a soft touch black box with black velvet detailing and is branded with our rose gold signature. The packaging makes it perfectly presentable as a gift and there is no extra charge for the packaging.

9. How much do Ellen Conde items usually cost? We are offering exclusive and discounted prices on our Indiegogo Campaign. After the campaign ends prices will return to their original amount. (except for the More for Less coupon)

10. I ordered more than one perk. Do I need to pay extra shipment? No. All your goods will be dispatched in one single shipment/ carton. 

11. Can I return my perk? Unfortunately not. All our sales on Indiegogo are final. However, we are happy to help you if you are unhappy or unsatisfy.

12. Is there any consideration I need to know for DIGITAL & EXPERIENCE Perks? Yes, Please note the following information:

13. How "THE SHARING KIT" works?  Pretty easy, share our specially designed posts on Facebook and you get 10% discount on any item in our digital lookbook. Prices in our lookbook are retail and may be viewed on our website.

Valid for 1 year. $ 1 + 1 SHARE = 10% OFF

14. How " THE GIFTLIST BLESSINGS" works? 

1. Select your gift from the campaign page

2. Communicate it to your family and friends by sharing the campaign page link.

3. Get them to contribute by purchasing the Giftlist Blessing. The blessings cost $20 and you can contribute as many times as you like.

4. On the payment page of our campaign you can choose your contributors appearance that will be displayed on our page. Choose “other” and write the gift holders name there. Get all your friends and family to do the same.

5. After purchasing the desired amount of Giftlist Blessing you will receive a confirmation email where you will be asked to confirm the gift holders name and email address so that we arrange shipment directly to them.

15. Does "THE MORE FOR LESS COUPON" 50% off REALLY SAVE ME MONEY?  YES. This coupon works best if you plan to buy more than one of our jewelry items. For example, if you’d like to buy a set of Earrings, Bracelet and Necklace. You could also plan your gifts for a year and order a number of items for those special people in your life. With our More for Less Coupon you get all our pieces in our La crème de la crème lookbook at HALF PRICE FOR A WHOLE YEAR and there are no limits to the amount of purchases! Prices in our lookbook are retail and may be viewed on our website.

16. Why WORKSHOPS? Collaboration is an important element in our design process. We’d love to share our ideas and know-how on manufacturing jewelry and how we achieve superlative quality through handmade techniques.

17. What I need to know for the WORKSHOP + Dinner? It will be scheduled at a mutually agreed upon date. The workshop price  includes : 

-Workshop

-Lunch  & dinner.

Not included in the price:

- Travel.

 PLEASE NOTE:  YOUR PIECE will be shipped to you after it has been plated and the crystals and pearls are assembled.

18. What I need to know for the FANCY WORKSHOP? It will be scheduled at a mutually agreed upon date. The workshop price  includes : 

-Transfer from airport to lodging/ lodging to airport.

-Transfer to all destinations included in the package.

-Workshop/ create your pieces.

-Excursions in Milan.

-Secret shopping. (and for secret we mean really hidden places. No tourist places for sure..)

-Accomodation (apartment in the center of Milan)

-Dinner at Como lake

Not included in the price:

- Travel,  food  & beverages.

  PLEASE NOTE: 

-YOUR PIECE will be shipped to you after it has been plated and the crystals and pearls are assembled.

-If you plan to fly in from outside the EU, you will be responsible for abiding by European immigration law. We will not be responsible for assisting with legal advice on how to obtain a Shenghen visa.

19. INVESTMENT PERK and the fine print. Before purchasing the Investment Perk please contact us so we can negotiate a specific deal for you. A 100% refund is available during the campaign but please note that a full refund is not available after the campaign ends because of Indiegogo's 5% fees and bank charges are inevitable. 

20. Is the jewelry suitable for sensitive skin? Yes, all products are hand-crafted with precious materials and high-quality finishing, following high standards of production. ELLEN CONDE ensures that all products are hypo-allergenic, nickel and lead free.

21. How to care for my piece? All products need gentle handling over time. Please, gently wipe product with soft cloth and store in jewelry boxes in an appropriate setting. Use protective pouch to avoid scratches. Please note that all-day use, cosmetics, dust, sand, showering and swimming can damage products.

22. Will the jewelry suit me? It certainly will. We are confident about this because we have designed each item considering every kind of woman.

23. Haven't found an answer to your question among these FAQs? No problem, you are always welcome to get in touch with us  at ellenconde@ellenconde.it for an answer!
story_txt:
With a focus on craftsmanship, quality and beauty Ellen Conde is a jewelry line that brings a universe of splendour into any given situation that life may present.


Our jewelry is a narration and reminder of what beauty really is, going beyond superficial ideals of contemporary society.

Inspired by the birth of our daughter, Ellen Conde was established in 2013.
Ellen Conde’s vision is to create timeless, classy yet modern pieces which transmit beauty and are a heritage to be passed on to someone special.            
            






                      



 

-Katy Perry for FORBES 

 



                       
         





                                  

            




                             

      


     

                         

  
             FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!!                     
  

      
                      



              FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!!                                 


                                         

                              

                     
           
               FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!!    



                                 


                       

                         FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!! 





                           


                       




               FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!


                           




                      



   

               FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!!

                                  


                             

                       

          



               FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!! 


                            


                       


 





               FIND BIGGER IMAGES HERE!!!                             

         

                


At the moment, our studio in Milan handles the design phase  and the final hand assembly.That means that there are many steps in between that are located far away – which adds to logistics expenses.


               





                



     













We take great pride in making top quality jewelry by using only the best materials, techniques and most authentic methods.

   


The pieces are crafted under a rigorous, detail-oriented process, which requires great finesse to achieve a balance of forms. 


  
 


Only certified and superior materials are used: Swarovski Crystals, symbol of glamour and elegance, and precious soft pearls, symbol of timeless femininity, combined with precious and semi-precious metals. (24k gold, 18k. rose gold, ruthenium and palladium.)


  



All materials are nickel/lead free and hypoallergenic making them suitable for sensitive skin.


  




             


     
                  




      


          


      

-Less is more. Stick to one statement piece per outfit. This will allow your piece to stand out like it’s supposed to. 
  
 
-Choose your earrings wisely. Statement earrings are eye-catching and they should suit your face shape and hair. Choose the right earrings according to length, color, and shape and make sure they suit your features, hairstyle and outfit.
   
  


-Keeping it simple. When wearing a big piece, tone down your outfit with simple clothes, neutral and block color pieces and don’t mix it up with busy patterns and sparkly clothing.        


  

-Match the necklace to the neckline. Strapless, off-shoulder, scoop or v-necklines are easy to match a statement piece. Collars and halter necks are difficult but work well if they are in neutral and block colors so that they emphasize your piece.    

  
-Statement pieces ARE the outfit. Statement pieces are designed to make a statement so let them speak for the rest of your outfit. Choose your overall style then choose your statement piece which boasts that style.

  

        


          

 
                              

                               
                                
                                 
                                 
                                                




                          



The biggest potential challenge of an online crowd-funding campaign offering exclusive deals is the possibility of receiving an extremely numerous amount of orders. Luckily, we’ve been producing for a while now and our production line and manufacturers have already been selected and have proven to be of the most accomplished artisans in Italy.

With an online campaign we understand that you cannot physically feel the pieces. Our jewelry is set apart from others for its quality and tactile sensation. Since we use Swarovski materials, we are represented by a brand with over 120 years of quality and experience, we are confident that you will feel its superiority and love your piece. 
We’ve done our research and we realise that many backers are often let down by campaigners due to a lack of communication. Our TEAM is well prepared to receive any request at any time of day! 
 






   








                     




We are a team of international designers with very different backgrounds and personalities.  What brings us together is a shared desire to create respectful and quality items through a conceptual design approach to bring a new kind of appreciation to beauty.



                               

 The Big Boss, Eva always has the final say in what happens, when it happens and how! Better not mess with her. She is the inspiration and lucky charm for everyone in the team.

                                

Entrepreneur, Creative Director, Mom and Perfectionist by nature, Elena is the founder and designer behind our brand. With an engineering and product design background it's safe to say she's well prepared! With an eye for detail Elena puts the cherry on top…of the cake…literally, she bakes amazing sweet treats for the team.        


                           

Ellen's right arm and husband… He's the Project Manager, designer and back officer... Just to mention a few of his tasks. Gilberto is the night owl, who is even up at 3 in the morning with new ideas. He has the insomnia world record with an average of 3 hours of sleep …. per week. Besides being involved in every aspect of the brand he always finds the right time for his daughter.

                               
Designer, thinker and concept developer, Cara is the "yang" of the situation, you're never gonna see her stressed or mad! She's a great Design Thinking specialist offering communication expertise and idea development to the brand with a solid educational background.


                
Luca, half Italian and half Swiss, is our digital genius. Although skilled in video and digital image making he is also the best photographer in town. Dedicated to all areas of his work he relies on his trusted "portable" 27" iMac.




                      



1. When do I get my Perk?  Physical Perks ordered during the campaign will go into production in July and will be shipped in August/September.
Digital Coupon Perks and Distributors Perk have a longer ordering period. For example, The “More for Less” Perk allows you to place orders throughout the whole upcoming year.
Orders placed during the months of July&August will be produced in September and shipped in October. Orders placed during the months of September&October will be produced in November and shipped in December.Etc.Our production and shipping are well organized and in this way, we are sure to satisfy our valued backers. Obviously those who back the project earlier in the campaign will get the perk fastest.   



2. Where do you ship to?  We use DHL services for delivery and we will ship to anywhere that they deliver. ELLEN CONDE offers its backers international standard shipping to all products purchased. Orders are shipped from Milan, Italy. Please, ensure that the shipping address you indicated is correct. In case of error ELLEN CONDE will not be responsible and cannot reroute your products after the shipment.


Please note that all deliveries must be signed for, so it is advisable to ensure somebody will be available to do so at your chosen delivery address.
ELLEN CONDE will send you by e-mail a shipment confirmation and the tracking number of the shipment as soon as your order has been shipped.
3. Do I need to pay for the shipment? Shipping in Italy is free, European countries $20, 00 and Rest of the world $35, 00. Actual rate.
4. How do I know my purchase went through? You’ll receive and email confirmation from our staff.
5. How do I select my perk color? We will include available color options for your perk on your confirmation email. You may confirm or adjust your color choice by replying to that email.

6. How do I purchase additional accessories? Through spontaneous flash sales at discounted Indiegogo prices.
7. When will there be flash sales? If you are an early supporter, you’ll be notified in advance by mail. Otherwise you’ll need to keep an eye on our social media.
8. Do the pieces come with packaging/box? Off course, Yes!  Each Ellen Conde piece comes in exclusively designed packaging. It is presented in a soft touch black box with black velvet detailing and is branded with our rose gold signature. The packaging makes it perfectly presentable as a gift and there is no extra charge for the packaging.
9. How much do Ellen Conde items usually cost? We are offering exclusive and discounted prices on our Indiegogo Campaign. After the campaign ends prices will return to their original amount. (except for the More for Less coupon)
10. I ordered more than one perk. Do I need to pay extra shipment? No. All your goods will be dispatched in one single shipment/ carton. 
11. Can I return my perk? Unfortunately not. All our sales on Indiegogo are final. However, we are happy to help you if you are unhappy or unsatisfy.

12. Is there any consideration I need to know for DIGITAL & EXPERIENCE Perks? Yes, Please note the following information:
13. How "THE SHARING KIT" works?  Pretty easy, share our specially designed posts on Facebook and you get 10% discount on any item in our digital lookbook. Prices in our lookbook are retail and may be viewed on our website.
Valid for 1 year. $ 1 + 1 SHARE = 10% OFF
14. How " THE GIFTLIST BLESSINGS" works? 
1. Select your gift from the campaign page
2. Communicate it to your family and friends by sharing the campaign page link.
3. Get them to contribute by purchasing the Giftlist Blessing. The blessings cost $20 and you can contribute as many times as you like.
4. On the payment page of our campaign you can choose your contributors appearance that will be displayed on our page. Choose “other” and write the gift holders name there. Get all your friends and family to do the same.
5. After purchasing the desired amount of Giftlist Blessing you will receive a confirmation email where you will be asked to confirm the gift holders name and email address so that we arrange shipment directly to them.
15. Does "THE MORE FOR LESS COUPON" 50% off REALLY SAVE ME MONEY?  YES. This coupon works best if you plan to buy more than one of our jewelry items. For example, if you’d like to buy a set of Earrings, Bracelet and Necklace. You could also plan your gifts for a year and order a number of items for those special people in your life. With our More for Less Coupon you get all our pieces in our La crème de la crème lookbook at HALF PRICE FOR A WHOLE YEAR and there are no limits to the amount of purchases! Prices in our lookbook are retail and may be viewed on our website.
16. Why WORKSHOPS? Collaboration is an important element in our design process. We’d love to share our ideas and know-how on manufacturing jewelry and how we achieve superlative quality through handmade techniques.
17. What I need to know for the WORKSHOP + Dinner? It will be scheduled at a mutually agreed upon date. The workshop price  includes : 
-Workshop
-Lunch  & dinner.
Not included in the price:

- Travel.

 PLEASE NOTE:  YOUR PIECE will be shipped to you after it has been plated and the crystals and pearls are assembled.

18. What I need to know for the FANCY WORKSHOP? It will be scheduled at a mutually agreed upon date. The workshop price  includes : 
-Transfer from airport to lodging/ lodging to airport.
-Transfer to all destinations included in the package.
-Workshop/ create your pieces.
-Excursions in Milan.
-Secret shopping. (and for secret we mean really hidden places. No tourist places for sure..)
-Accomodation (apartment in the center of Milan)
-Dinner at Como lake
Not included in the price:
- Travel,  food  & beverages.
  PLEASE NOTE: 
-YOUR PIECE will be shipped to you after it has been plated and the crystals and pearls are assembled.
-If you plan to fly in from outside the EU, you will be responsible for abiding by European immigration law. We will not be responsible for assisting with legal advice on how to obtain a Shenghen visa.

19. INVESTMENT PERK and the fine print. Before purchasing the Investment Perk please contact us so we can negotiate a specific deal for you. A 100% refund is available during the campaign but please note that a full refund is not available after the campaign ends because of Indiegogo's 5% fees and bank charges are inevitable. 

20. Is the jewelry suitable for sensitive skin? Yes, all products are hand-crafted with precious materials and high-quality finishing, following high standards of production. ELLEN CONDE ensures that all products are hypo-allergenic, nickel and lead free.


21. How to care for my piece? All products need gentle handling over time. Please, gently wipe product with soft cloth and store in jewelry boxes in an appropriate setting. Use protective pouch to avoid scratches. Please note that all-day use, cosmetics, dust, sand, showering and swimming can damage products.

22. Will the jewelry suit me? It certainly will. We are confident about this because we have designed each item considering every kind of woman.
23. Haven't found an answer to your question among these FAQs? No problem, you are always welcome to get in touch with us  at ellenconde@ellenconde.it for an answer!

story:
Note: 

ETEAQ ended its Indiegogo campaign; our products can be purchased at www.eteaq.com. 

Thank you.


ETEAQ, launched early 2015, and ETEAQ’s Tracker technology has been featured in Bloomberg and The Wall Street Journal:



All ETEAQ products:

  • have an unique number representing a newly planted tree. The tree can be located with TreeTracker, a web application using Google satellite maps. You know exactly what you are giving back. 
  • are made from only recycled materials in order to minimise the impact on the environment. Materials such as reclaimed Javanese teak wood, prized for durability and beauty. 

  

ETEAQ's iPhone Cases features:

  • A solid thin piece of beautiful reclaimed teak wood is mounted in a frame of recycled plastics coming with a nice soft finishing.
  • Each case comes with a unique number laser engraved in the teak wood that connects you to your adopted tree.
  • Beautiful handmade giftbox made from recycled materials.
  • Compatible with iPhone SE, 5S/5, 6S/6 and 6S/6 Plus and comes in 2 colours, black or white.
  • You can order ETEAQ's iPhone Cases here.

Creates Limited Collector's Edition iPhone Case Design for ETEAQ

Weiner's works have been shown worldwide - from New York's MOMA and London's Tate Modern to installations at Art Basel Hong Kong and more. For nearly half a century, Weiner has had an impact on graphic design, modern art and fashion. 

He is best known for his typographic texts and can be considered one of the founding father's experimenting with text as form.

True to form, Weiner created a design to help the Trees4Trees tree planting mission and bring attention to ETEAQ's tree tracking technology. 

Limited Collector's Edition Lawrence Weiner 'FROM BEFORE AND AFTER'. 

Detailed shot showing the laser engraving and the reclaimed teak wood .

Handmade giftbox

  • Set in teak wood that will last for generations, Weiner's design comes laser engraved on sustainable teakpanels reclaimed from old Javanese houses.
  • Limited Collector's Edition of 888 numbered copies, with certifications of authenticity; built to fit iPhone 6S/6.
  • The number 853426 in above photo represents 5 newly planted trees you would adopt in case you decide to claim this perk.
  • You can order the limited edition of Lawrence Weiner case here.

The Universal Phone Dock features:

  • Never fumble around to balance your phone again, the Universal Phone Dock,  made from solid reclaimed teak wood, is the ideal solution for keeping your phone in view when you are focused on other tasks.
  • The recycled Aluminium plaque shows the number representing your adopted tree.
  • The Dock has an opening on the bottom for discreet charging when phone is docked and has 4 natural rubber feet preventing the Dock from sliding.
  • Beautiful handmade giftbox made from recycled materials.
  • You can order the Universal Phone Dock here.


The Universal Tablet Stand features:

  • The Universal Tablet Stand is a perfect match for any tablet with screen sizes up to 10 inch, such as the mini iPad and the latest 9.7 inch iPad Pro. Moreover, it supports the bigger 12.9 inch iPad Pro. 
  • The Stand is made from solid reclaimed teak wood and has 4 natural rubber feet preventing the dock from sliding.
  • Locate the tree you adopted with the purchase of this Universal Tablet Stand, the tree number is engraved on a piece of recycled Aluminium coming from old machine parts.
  • The Stand was designed with the latest iPad Pro's in mind providing a convenient resting place for the Apple Pencil.
  • Beautiful handmade giftbox made from recycled materials.
  • You can order the Universal Tablet Stand here.


Creates Limited Collector's Edition Design iPad Stand for ETEAQ 

Shanghai based artist Ni Youyu, born 1984 in Ganzhou, is representative of a younger generation of Chinese artists who are rediscovering China's cultural heritage, and its ink painting tradition, which he seeks to reinterpret and situate within contemporary and global art discourse.

Ni won the prestigious "Best Young Artist" CCAA Chinese Contemporary Art Award in 2014. 

Limited Collectors Edition Ni Youyu 'VIEW OF HISTORY'

Detailed shot showing the laser engraving and the reclaimed teak wood .

  • Set in teak wood that will last for generations, Ni Youyu's design comes laser engraved on sustainable teakpanels reclaimed from old Javanese houses.
  • Limited Collector's Edition of 888 numbered copies, with certifications of authenticity signed by Ni Youyu; compatible with iPads or tablets.
  • The number 805362 in above photo represents 5 newly planted trees you would adopt in case you decide to claim this perk.
  • Claim your Ni Youyu tablet stand today.
  • You can order the limited edition Ni Youyu Tablet Stand here.



  • In addition to the many environmental products mentioned above you can contribute more directly to reforestation by choosing ETEAQ's TreeCards which come in 10 and 25 trees, basically a small forest! 
  • You will receive an certificate signed by ETEAQ and our tree planting partner Trees4Trees with all the details how to locate your forest.
  • You can order the TreeCards here.


The screen shot below shows an example of the TreeTracker technology, your tree's location and name of your tree's caretaker.

 

ETEAQ’s designs are characterized by the use of reclaimed Indonesian teak wood coming from old Javanese houses and prized for its strength and beauty, creating a fantastic one-of-a-kind story for each piece. This beautifully aged teak wood, many which are 30 years old, contain less moisture than new woods, which means that they have better durability and water resistance. 

For tree planting, ETEAQ partners with Trees4Trees, a non-profit foundation dedicated to reforestation efforts throughout Indonesia. Trees4Trees works with over 14,000 farmers. 

Watch the video below to find out how Trees4Trees helps sustainable reforestation in Indonesia:


  • Q: Where does the reclaimed wood come from? 
  • A: It is a custom in Java, Indonesia, for families to move into a new house with every third generation. The teak wood from the old house is sold, and with the proceeds, the farmers are able to finance their new homes and take care of other expenses.
  • Q: If I buy a product and adopt a tree, will I own the tree? 
  • A: With your donation you help finance the operation of Trees4Trees, who will grow high-quality tree seedlings in their tree nurseries. They then donate the trees to the farmers who work with them. In the end, the farmer takes care of the tree, and owns it.
  • Q: What happens if the tree dies? 
  • A: We have agreed with Trees4Trees that if your adopted tree dies within two years, for any reason, you will have a new tree allocated to your unique number. However, the survival rate of the trees is very high, thanks to the quality seedlings Trees4Trees grows, and to the farmers, who all get adequate training.
  • Q: Where are the trees planted and what type of tree is planted? 
  • A: The trees are mostly planted in Java, Indonesia, and are mostly teak trees. Java is located on the equator ,and the trees don't lose their leaves. As such, the trees absorb carbon dioxide and produce oxygen the whole year!
  • Q: Where are the products being produced? 
  • A: All products are produced by incredible craftsmen in a trusted, well-run factory in Yogyakarta, Indonesia. While the wood comes from Indonesia, the recycled plastic frames for the iPhone cases come from a trusted source in China - a Hong Kong-based company with Western management and a factory in China. 


Note: iPhone and iPad are registered trademarks by Apple Inc., registered in the US and other countries.

Q: Where are the products being produced? 
A: All products are produced by incredible 
craftsmen in a trusted, well-run factory in Yogyakarta, Indonesia. While
 the wood comes from Indonesia, the recycled plastic frames for 
the iPhone cases come from a trusted source in China - a Hong Kong-based
 company with Western management and a factory in China. 


Note: iPhone and iPad are registered trademarks by Apple Inc., registered in the US and other countries.

story:
Our Story a.k.a. Who we really are


We are a new brand of underwear called MASZARYK and with our products, we literally want to connect countries that are currently in tense relationships. 

Instead of taking down our enemies, we should take down our partners‘ underwear. Much more pleasure in that, don't you think.

And this is why you can find in one underwear pack, one pair of underwear in Ukraine theme for you and another one in Russian theme for your partner in our releasing collection.

Underwear is very intimate, it gets to our very skin. By taking off underwear represetning a country flag, we free ourselves and become naked. We become those people we were when we were born, without a nationality that was given to us afterwards.

The purchase of Maszaryk underwear is a choice for people in this very description. We want to break the stereotypes. (Not only by design in underwear industry but we also want to show that you and we care about the presence of tension or war between two countries. Information on the exact amounts of underwear sold will be freely available to everyone, therefore even politicans will be able to see that people can love each other even with national boundaries.

Our brand Maszaryk comes from Masaryk – the first Czech-Slovak president who joined up two nations without the use of any guns. This very fact in the history of these two nations is extremely important and we believe that it should also become known world-wide. We would like to breathe life into this historical element and bring hope and belief to people, to let them realise nations shouldn’t need to fight. They can love each other. Maszaryk underwear expresses this idea via the product design, where these fighting countries are symbolically brought together. The foundation of the brand as well as the whole production process are based in Czechoslovakia. Materials used for our products are sourced from high-quality local producers and are processed by various small entrepreneurs, all within Czech and Slovak Republics. Therefore, this brand recreates now extinct label – Made in Czechoslovakia.  



What's unique about Maszaryk


The world is full of people that didn’t have any say in whether they want their country to be in a politically unstable state or in a state of war. Maszaryk would give them the chance to SPEAK UP and express their opinions. 


And above all considering our materials, we set out to reach a few important targets:

– Maszaryk shouldn’t annoy your skin, the canvas we use is a very comfortable   blend of cotton and elastic fibre

– Maszaryk should be soft and strong at the same time, the threads we use are very strong and long-lasting

– Maszaryk is comfortable and functional

– No toxic substances present

– The design is innovative and surprising, comes from individual national cultural patterns

– Maszaryk cannot let down the good old high-quality label ‘Made in Czechoslovakia’

    


What We Need & What You Get

In order to get this line fully off the ground, we need a total of 8,000 €.  This money will go towards manufacturing costs, packaging, marketing, business administration etc. Of course, with your help, we hope to exceed much more than that in order to fulfill our goal.  
Perks you will get are described bellow:

Perk 5€

This is the one we offer you the biggest thank for being so great and generous.

Perk 35€

You can choose from this or 2 following perks in the price of 35€ and select - 1 pair of underwear (1 for him in Russian design, 1 for her in Ukrainian design) in the size of your preference. 

   


Perk 35€

1 pair of underwear (1 for him in Ukrainian design, 1 for her in Russian design) 

                    


Perk 35€

1 pair of underwear (2 for her/him in Ukrainian and in Russian design) 

   


  



Early bird perk 60€

This perk offers you 2 pairs of underwear (2 for him -1 in Russian design and 1 in Ukrainian design, 2 for her - 1 in Russian design and 1 in Ukrainian design) in the size of your preference in great pre-sell price of 60€.

                                   


                                   


70€ perk

For 70€ you will get 2 pairs of underwear - 1 in Russian design and 1 in Ukrainian design. 2 designs for her, 2 designs for him.


200€ perk

Be part of our future working-on pair (select a pair of countries which are going to appear on next prepared collection) according to our brand philosophy.

There are of course plenty of combinations that can be made in the future based on the current situation in the world – for example Chile and Argentine, South and North Korea, Slovakia and Hungary and plenty more.  So be forethoughted and help us make a biggest impact with your choice.


300€ and 500€ fund's perk

We trust in our product and believe that Maszaryk will become a successful brand. If you share our beliefs, that we can enter a stock market in few years, we have prepared for you our funds today. You will get interchangeable refund and contract, which will be exchanged for Maszaryk’s funds in value of 500€ for 300€ perk and 800€ for 500€ perk.


Perk for 1000€ 

This great perk and unique peace of underwear will be created for two of you and presidents of Russian federation and Ukraine (you can choose one option), who will get a piece of their "friendly neighbor". 


Size chart


The Impact we try to reach - 1 step a time

With your help we want to establish Maszaryk non-governmental organization in future, where certain percentage of money are going to be used from your purchased set of our underwear. This will in turn be used to connect and eliminate prejudice between the countries featured in the purchased set. 

We are trying to make a big impact in the fashion industry by supporting domestic manufacturing and therefore, all garments and other parts are made in the Czechoslovakia.  Supporting domestic manufacturing helps create jobs and keeps money local.  


We want to be able to wear underwear which we are proud of and has its purpose. 

Pure ideas generate high-quality products, and this is our target.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to contribute by any other way as well, we would be more than grateful, so:

Talk about us

Sing about us

Show us to your friends

Share us with your friends on

fb

twitter

pinterest

...


THANKS
