story:
Click here for German


We are a young fashion brand, producing stylish and fairly produced T-shirts for ladies and gents. By combining art and fashion in a sustainable setting, with a strong desire for spotlighting human rights, we created the TNI T-shirt for a good cause.

We are aiming for 25.000 EUR in order to produce TNI T-shirts on a bigger scale and to reach a bigger audience.

By supporting us on Indiegogo you allow us to visualise more rights and to come up with more styles.

Take a stand for human rights by wearing your TNI T-shirt. 


Ladies loose fit TNI T-shirt

The ladies loose fit TNI T-shirt is perfect for all who like to wear casual and comfortable clothing. 

Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL.


Ladies fitted TNI T-shirt

The ladies fitted TNI T-shirt is a tight fitting stylish T-shirt. 

Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL. 

Gents TNI T-Shirt

The TNI T-shirt for gents is an eye-catcher and comfy to wear. 

Available sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL. 



All TNI T-shirts have a handmade seam on the back. 

           


Very strict standards govern the production process of your TNI T-shirt to protect our environment and the people.

 

Your TNI T-shirt is made of 100 % organic grown and fair trade certified cotton.

The SA8000 certificate makes sure that the human rights of the workers producing your TNI T-shirt are respected. 


The "Made in Book" is our way of being as transparent as possible. In the made in book the entire production process from start to finish is outlined. Moreover, the above-mentioned certificates are described in greater detail. To give you a taste we show you a short section of our made in book. 


100 % bio-degradable, stamped and individualized. 

Our packaging material is made out of sugar-cane molasses – a waste product of sugar production. It is 100 % bio-degradable - the packaging can be thrown onto the compost or in your bio-waste container. 



We are proudly announcing our official partnership with Amnesty International Austria!
10 % of our turnover will directly be donated to this organisation! 


A couple of facts why we think that human rights are essential for a peaceful and dignified life for every one.


All over the world people just like we are being tortured right now. Imagine being beaten, electrocuted, having your face cut, having your fingernails pulled out.

A new global poll, commissioned by Amnesty International, has revealed that 44 % of people around the world fear being tortured in their own country.

                  


Freedom of expression can be understood as a mulit-faceted right that includes not only the right to express, or disseminate, information and ideas but also to seek, receive and impart them. For us freedom of expression is one of the fundamental pillar for human rights protection, because it allows us to articulate other human rights. 

                   


The right to privacy constitutes an essential defence against the state. Privacy creates a space separate from political life and gives us personal autonomy. We think that the current mass surveillance is a needless violation of the rights of citizens around the world.                         

                             

                         

TNI is a combination of art and fashion. We designed hand crafted frames which make every room look nicer. 


        

At the end of the campaign you will receive an e-mail in which you will be asked for your preferred graphic for your TNI frame.  


Approximately two years ago Hubert came up with the idea of printing human rights on a T-shirt. However, we didn’t want to just print human rights on a T-shirt. We wanted to contribute something special to our society. So just printing the articles of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights of the United Nations on a T-shirt is nothing extraordinary, right!?
We have been on the lookout for designers for quite a while. Finally, we found DECASA – two sisters located in the Austrian city Graz. At the first meeting we immediately realized that something special was happening. They were enthusiastic about the idea of bringing human rights back to the heart of our society. Soon after the first meeting we got the first drafts of the paintings. After completing some modifications we drove up to Copenhagen to meet our producer. We have chosen Neutral®, because it is one of the leading firms in the sector of sustainable clothing. Their certificates are the guarantee that human rights of the workers are respected and that the T-shirt is produced with as little negative impact on our earth as possible.

Summer 2014                        flash of inspiration                               

 Autumn 2014                     we found our designers                   

 Spring 2015                         we found our producer                 

 Winter 2015                               we ordered our                           First Production

Spring 2016                          official partnership with                 

Summer 2016                                  start on                                        

August 2016                                                                             DELIVERY


Obviously a risk for the fulfilment of our goal is that too many people take human rights for granted. 

However, with a well-thought-out approach we are sure that we can bring the idea of human rights closer to everyone. 

People like you are the reason we started this campaign because we know that a lot of others think the same way we do. Human rights are a benefit for all of us. Join us and minimise the risk of failing. 

In the case we will not reach our funding goal we will continue fighting for a world in which human rights are a reality for all of us.


We need the help of every single person to set the idea of human rights for ALL the people in motion. Spread the word and share the campaign with your friends and beloved ones on Facebook and Twitter. The more noise we can make the more human rights will come to the attention of a wider audience. Together with your help we can make the word a better place. 


EXCHANGE POLICY
If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the T-shirts should fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your TNI T-shirt for any reason, we’ll happily do that but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our T-shirts at discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns. Please make sure the items are unworn and unwashed. 

FAQ
How do I specify the SIZE, STYLE and GRAPHIC of my TNI T-shirt? We will ask for your preferred size, style and graphic at the end of the campaign via e-mail.
How do I specify my shipping address? We will ask for your shipping address immediately when you order your TNI T-shirt on Indiegogo. 
When will new colours/versions be available? We have a ton of great ideas for visualising more rights, new colours and different styles and can't wait to make them available. A lot depends on how many we sell, so please tell all your friends to hit us up on Indiegogo!
When will I receive my TNI T-shirt? As soon as the campaign is over we will start delivering your TNI T-shirt to you. Shipment will start in August 2016. 

Deutsch

Das Video mit deutschen Untertiteln gibts hier:


TNI ist die Abkürzung für Tua Nosce Iura, kommt aus dem Lateinischen und bedeutet übersetzt: „Kenne deine Rechte!“

Wir sind eine junge Modemarke, die nachhaltige und fair produzierte T-Shirts für Frauen und Männer kreiert. Dabei verbinden wir Mode und Kunst mit Nachhaltigkeit. In Kooperation mit zwei Designerinnen aus Graz haben wir Menschenrechte visualisiert, um wieder mehr Aufmerksamkeit für das Thema zu schaffen.

Wir benötigen 25.000 EUR, um TNI T-Shirts in größerem Umfang zu produzieren und mit unserer Idee mehr Menschen erreichen zu können.

Durch deine Unterstützung auf Indiegogo ermöglichst du uns, mehr Rechte zu visualisieren und weitere Styles auf den Markt zu bringen.

Setze ein Zeichen, indem du die Idee von Menschenrechten mit deinem TNI T-Shirt in die Welt hinausträgst!

Ladies loose fit TNI T-Shirt

Das ladies loose fit TNI T-Shirt ist genau das richtige für diejenigen unter euch, die gerne lässige und bequeme Mode tragen. 

Verfügbare Größen: XS, S, M, L, XL.


Ladies fitted TNI T-Shirt

Das ladies fitted TNI T-Shirt ist ein enganliegendes und stylisches T-shirt.

Verfügbare Größen: XS, S, M, L, XL.


Gents TNI T-Shirt


Das TNI T-Shirt für Männer ist ein absoluter Blickfang und angenehm zu tragen.

Verfügbare Größen: S, M, L, XL, XXL.


Alle TNI T-shirts haben eine von Hand eingestickte Naht auf der Rückseite. 


Die Herstellung deines TNI T-Shirts unterliegt strengsten Anforderungen in Bezug auf Umwelt- und Sozialverträglichkeit. 

             

Dein TNI-Shirt besteht zu 100 % aus biologisch angebauter und FAIRTRADE-zertifizierter Baumwolle.

Das SA8000 Zertifikat garantiert, dass die Menschenrechte der Arbeiter, die dein TNI T-shirt herstellen, geachtet werden.

Das „Made in Book“ ist unser Weg so transparent als möglich zu sein. Darin zeigen wir alle Produktionsschritte auf. Von der Baumwollerzeugung bis zum Schneidern. Vom Design bis zum Bedrucken. Darüber hinaus werden die einzelnen Zertifikate im Detail beschrieben. Einen kleinen Vorgeschmack gibt’s hier:


100 % biologisch-abbaubar, gestempelt und individualisiert. 

Unser Verpackungsmaterial besteht aus Zuckerrohrmelasse, ein Abfallprodukt der Zuckerproduktion. 

Wirf die Verpackung ganz einfach in die Bio-Tonne oder auf den Kompost und hilf uns, die Umwelt zu schonen!



Wir sind stolz, unsere offizielle Partnerschaft mit Amnesty International Österreich präsentieren zu dürfen.

10 % des auf Indiegogo erzielten Betrages fließen direkt an diese Organisation!


Einige Fakten, warum wir davon überzeugt sind, dass die Einhaltung der Menschenrechte unerlässlich für ein friedvolles und würdiges Leben für uns alle ist. 

Stell dir vor, geschlagen, ausgepeitscht oder verstümmelt zu werden oder gar, dass dir die Fingernägel gezogen werden! Auf der ganzen Welt sind Menschen wie du und ich diesem Moment Opfer von solchen grausamen Foltermethoden.    

Eine neue, von Amnesty International in Auftrag gegebene Studie hat gezeigt, dass 44 % der Menschen rund um den Globus in der Angst leben, gefoltert zu werden.

                 


Meinungsfreiheit ist ein umfassendes Recht. Neben dem Recht auf freie Meinungsäußerung beinhaltet es auch, sich ohne Rücksicht auf Grenzen Informationen zu beschaffen, zu empfangen und zu verbreiten und zwar über Medien jeder Art, egal ob in Schrift, Wort oder Bild. Für uns stellt dieses Recht eines der fundamentalsten in der Allgemeinen Erklärung der Menschenrechte dar, denn es erlaubt uns, weitere Menschenrechte zu artikulieren. 

                        


Das Recht auf Privat- und Familienleben wird als Abwehrrecht gegenüber dem Staat verstanden. Jedem soll die Möglichkeit gegeben werden, unbeobachtet und frei von Überwachung zu leben. Durch dieses Recht erlangen wir persönliche Autonomie. Vor allem im Zusammenhang mit den Abhörskandalen aus jüngster Zeit und der Massenüberwachung, der wir tagtäglich ausgesetzt sind, denken wir, dass es wichtig ist, dieses Menschenrecht wieder mehr in den Fokus der Gesellschaft zu rücken.

                         


TNI ist eine Kombination aus Kunst und Mode. Unsere handgemachten TNI-Rahmen sind Kunstwerke und ein Highlight in jedem Raum. Die Grafik wird mit 30 Fäden von Hand hineingespannt. Die Allgemeine Erklärung der Menschenrechte von 1948 umfasst 30 Artikel - jeder Faden repräsentiert ein Menschenrecht. 

                   

Am Ende der Kampagne kontaktieren wir dich per Mail und du kannst uns bekanntgeben, mit welcher Grafik dein TNI Rahmen bespannt werden soll.


Vor ungefähr zwei Jahren hatte Hubert die Idee, Artikel aus der Allgemeinen Erklärung der Menschenrechte auf T-Shirts zu drucken. Wir waren der Meinung, dass dies alleine noch nichts Besonderes sei und machten uns weiter Gedanken. Wir wollten ein einzigartiges Produkt mit Mehrwert für unsere Gesellschaft schaffen. In Graz sind wir auf die zwei Künstlerinnen Carola und Sabrina Deutsch gestoßen. Die beiden Schwestern waren sofort von unserem Projekt begeistert und wollten unsere Idee visualisieren. Wir machten uns also ans Werk und kreierten gemeinsam die ersten Entwürfe. Nach einigen Anpassungen standen schon nach kurzer Zeit die Grafiken für unsere TNI T-Shirts fest und Hubert und ich machten uns auf den Weg zu unserem Produzenten nach Kopenhagen. Wir haben uns für das Unternehmen Neutral® entschieden, weil es eine der Top-Adressen für verantwortungsbewusste und nachhaltige Textilproduktion ist. Die Zertifikate von Neutral® garantieren, dass unsere T-Shirts mit der geringstmöglichen Belastung für unsere Erde produziert wurden.


Sommer 2014                              Geistesblitz                                         

Herbst 2014              wir fanden unsere Designerinnen              

Frühling 2015           wir fanden unseren Produzenten               
Winter 2015                            wir bestellten unsere                        Erste Produktion 

Frühling 2016                   offizielle Partnerschaft mit                                

Sommer 2016                                 start auf                                       

August 2016                              start der                                  AUSLIEFERUNG


Möglicherweise sehen viele in unserer Gesellschaft Menschenrechte als etwas Selbstverständliches an und sind sich der Gefahr nicht bewusst, dass wir im Begriff sind, diese fundamentalen Rechte über Bord zu werfen. Genau diese Gefahr wollen wir den Menschen vor Augen führen und wieder ein Bewusstsein für dieses wichtige Thema schaffen.

Wir sind aber davon überzeugt, dass wir mit unserem Konzept die Idee von Menschenrechten jedem näherbringen können.

Menschen wie du haben uns dazu bewogen, diese Kampagne zu starten. Wir sind davon überzeugt, dass viele unsere Idee, dass das Bewusstsein für Menschenrechte geschärft werden sollte, ebenso wichtig finden wie wir. Sei also dabei und hilf uns, wieder Aufmerksamkeit für dieses Thema zu schaffen!

Für den Fall, dass wir den oben genannten Betrag nicht erreichen sollten, werden wir uns natürlich weiterhin für Menschenrechte einsetzen und deren Wichtigkeit für unsere Gesellschaft aufzeigen.

Wir benötigen die Hilfe jedes einzelnen, um das Bewusstsein für Menschenrechte zu schärfen und eine Bewegung zu starten, die ein klares Zeichen setzt: Ja zu Menschenrechten! Teile diese Kampagne auf Facebook und Twitter, damit wir gemeinsam eine größere Aufmerksamkeit schaffen können. Je lauter wir sind, desto eher erreichen wir jene, die sich mit diesem Thema noch nicht auseinandergesetzt haben um ihnen zu zeigen, wie wichtig und wertvoll Menschenrechte sind. Mit deiner Hilfe können wir Menschenrechte wieder mehr in den Fokus der Gesellschaft rücken!


Umtausch

Wenn du der Größentabelle, welche du per E-Mail nach der Kampagne zugesandt bekommst, folgst, kann wenig schief gehen. Falls du dein TNI T-Shirt dennoch – aus welchen Gründen auch immer – umtauschen möchtest, dann machen wir das natürlich gerne. Da wir allerdings gerade erst dabei sind unsere Firma aufzubauen, können wir die Transportkosten leider nicht übernehmen. Bitte achte außerdem darauf, dass die T-Shirts ungetragen und ungewaschen sein müssen, wenn du sie zurückschickst.

Häufig gestellte Fragen:

Wo kann ich die Größe, Grafik und das Modell meines TNI T-Shirts auswählen? Du bekommst am Ende der Kampagne eine E-Mail, in der wir dich nach deiner gewünschten Größe, Grafik und dem gewünschten T-Shirt-Modell fragen. 

Wie gebe ich meine Lieferadresse an? Wir fragen dich gleich beim Bestellen des Perks (T-Shirt, Rahmen) nach deiner Lieferadresse.

Wann werden weitere Farben und Modelle erhältlich sein? Wir arbeiten unter Hochdruck daran, weitere Modelle auf den Markt zu bringen und mehr Rechte zu visualisieren. Vieles hängt allerdings vom Ausgang dieser Kampagne ab – also bitte teile diese Kampagne mit deinen Freunden, damit sie uns auf Indiegogo finden!

Wann wird mein TNI T-Shirt geliefert? Sobald die Indiegogo-Kampagne zu Ende ist, starten wir mit der Auslieferung der TNI T-Shirts. Das wird im August sein!
story_txt:
Click here for German


We are a young fashion brand, producing stylish and fairly produced T-shirts for ladies and gents. By combining art and fashion in a sustainable setting, with a strong desire for spotlighting human rights, we created the TNI T-shirt for a good cause.
We are aiming for 25.000 EUR in order to produce TNI T-shirts on a bigger scale and to reach a bigger audience.
By supporting us on Indiegogo you allow us to visualise more rights and to come up with more styles.
Take a stand for human rights by wearing your TNI T-shirt. 



Ladies loose fit TNI T-shirt



The ladies loose fit TNI T-shirt is perfect for all who like to wear casual and comfortable clothing. 

Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL.



Ladies fitted TNI T-shirt


The ladies fitted TNI T-shirt is a tight fitting stylish T-shirt. 
Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL. 


Gents TNI T-Shirt





The TNI T-shirt for gents is an eye-catcher and comfy to wear. 
Available sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL. 









All TNI T-shirts have a handmade seam on the back. 

           




Very strict standards govern the production process of your TNI T-shirt to protect our environment and the people.

 
Your TNI T-shirt is made of 100 % organic
grown and fair trade certified cotton.
The SA8000 certificate
makes sure that the human rights of the workers producing your TNI T-shirt are
respected. 






The "Made in Book" is our way of being as transparent as possible. In the made in book the entire production process from start to finish is outlined. Moreover, the above-mentioned certificates are described in greater detail. To give you a taste we show you a short section of our made in book. 











100
% bio-degradable, stamped and individualized. 
Our packaging material is made out of sugar-cane molasses – a waste product of
sugar production. It is 100 % bio-degradable - the packaging can be thrown onto the
compost or in your bio-waste container. 










We are proudly announcing our official partnership with Amnesty International Austria!
10 % of our turnover will directly be donated to this organisation! 







A couple of facts why we think that human
rights are essential for a peaceful and dignified life for every one. 






All over the world people just like we are being tortured right now. Imagine being beaten, electrocuted, having your
face cut, having your fingernails pulled out.
A new global poll, commissioned by Amnesty
International, has revealed that 44 % of people around the world fear being
tortured in their own country.
                  






Freedom of expression can be understood as a
mulit-faceted right that includes not only the right to express, or
disseminate, information and ideas but also to seek, receive and impart them. For us freedom of expression is one of the fundamental pillar for human rights protection, because it allows us to articulate other human rights. 
                   






The right to privacy constitutes an essential defence against the state. Privacy creates a space separate from political life and gives us personal autonomy. We think that the current mass
surveillance is a needless violation of the rights of citizens around the
world.                         

                             

                         


TNI is a combination of art and fashion. We designed hand crafted frames which make every room look nicer. 

        
At the end of the campaign you will receive an e-mail in which you will be asked for your preferred graphic for your TNI frame.  


Approximately two years ago Hubert came up with the idea of printing human rights on a T-shirt. However, we didn’t want to just print human rights on a T-shirt. We wanted to contribute something special to our society. So just printing the articles of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights of the United Nations on a T-shirt is nothing extraordinary, right!?
We have been on the lookout for designers for quite a while. Finally, we found DECASA – two sisters located in the Austrian city Graz. At the first meeting we immediately realized that something special was happening. They were enthusiastic about the idea of bringing human rights back to the heart of our society. Soon after the first meeting we got the first drafts of the paintings. After completing some modifications we drove up to Copenhagen to meet our producer. We have chosen Neutral®, because it is one of the leading firms in the sector of sustainable clothing. Their certificates are the guarantee that human rights of the workers are respected and that the T-shirt is produced with as little negative impact on our earth as possible.




Summer 2014                        flash of inspiration                               

 Autumn 2014                     we found our designers                   



 Spring 2015                         we found our producer                 



 Winter 2015                               we ordered our                           First Production



Spring 2016                          official partnership with                 


Summer 2016                                  start on                                        


August 2016                                                                             DELIVERY




Obviously a risk for the fulfilment of our goal is that too many people take human rights for granted. 
However, with a well-thought-out approach we are sure that we can bring the idea of human rights closer to everyone. 
People like you are the reason we started this campaign because we know that a lot of others think the same way we do. Human rights are a benefit for all of us. Join us and minimise the risk of failing. 
In the case we will not reach our funding goal we will continue fighting for a world in which human rights are a reality for all of us.







We need the help of every single person to set the idea of human rights for ALL the people in motion. Spread the word and share the campaign with your friends and beloved ones on Facebook and Twitter. The more noise we can make the more human rights will come to the attention of a wider audience. Together with your help we can make the word a better place. 


EXCHANGE POLICY
If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the T-shirts should fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your TNI T-shirt for any reason, we’ll happily do that but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our T-shirts at discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns. Please make sure the items are unworn and unwashed. 

FAQ

How do I specify the SIZE, STYLE and GRAPHIC of my TNI T-shirt? We will ask for your preferred size, style and graphic at the end of the campaign via e-mail.

How do I specify my shipping address? We will ask for your shipping address immediately when you order your TNI T-shirt on Indiegogo. 

When will new colours/versions be available? We have a ton of great ideas for visualising more rights, new colours and different styles and can't wait to make them available. A lot depends on how many we sell, so please tell all your friends to hit us up on Indiegogo!

When will I receive my TNI T-shirt? As soon as the campaign is over we will start delivering your TNI T-shirt to you. Shipment will start in August 2016. 


Deutsch
Das Video mit deutschen Untertiteln gibts hier:




TNI ist die
Abkürzung für Tua Nosce Iura, kommt aus dem Lateinischen
und bedeutet übersetzt: „Kenne deine Rechte!“

Wir
sind eine junge Modemarke, die nachhaltige und fair produzierte T-Shirts für
Frauen und Männer kreiert. Dabei verbinden wir Mode und Kunst mit
Nachhaltigkeit. In Kooperation mit zwei Designerinnen aus Graz haben wir
Menschenrechte visualisiert, um wieder mehr Aufmerksamkeit für das Thema zu
schaffen.

Wir
benötigen 25.000 EUR, um TNI T-Shirts in größerem Umfang zu produzieren und mit
unserer Idee mehr Menschen erreichen zu können. 

Durch
deine Unterstützung auf Indiegogo ermöglichst du uns, mehr Rechte zu
visualisieren und weitere Styles auf den Markt zu bringen.

Setze
ein Zeichen, indem du die Idee von Menschenrechten mit deinem TNI T-Shirt in
die Welt hinausträgst!



Ladies loose fit TNI T-Shirt


Das
ladies loose fit TNI T-Shirt ist genau das richtige für diejenigen unter euch,
die gerne lässige und bequeme Mode tragen. 
Verfügbare Größen: XS, S, M, L, XL.


Ladies fitted TNI T-Shirt



Das
ladies fitted TNI T-Shirt ist ein enganliegendes und stylisches T-shirt.


Verfügbare Größen: XS, S, M, L, XL.





Gents TNI T-Shirt


Das
TNI T-Shirt für Männer ist ein absoluter Blickfang und angenehm zu tragen.


Verfügbare Größen: S, M, L, XL, XXL.









Alle
TNI T-shirts haben eine von Hand eingestickte Naht auf der Rückseite. 





Die
Herstellung deines TNI T-Shirts unterliegt strengsten Anforderungen in Bezug
auf Umwelt- und Sozialverträglichkeit. 
             


Dein TNI-Shirt
besteht zu 100 % aus biologisch angebauter und FAIRTRADE-zertifizierter
Baumwolle.
Das SA8000 Zertifikat
garantiert, dass die Menschenrechte der Arbeiter, die dein TNI T-shirt
herstellen, geachtet werden.





Das
„Made in Book“ ist unser Weg so transparent als möglich zu sein. Darin zeigen
wir alle Produktionsschritte auf. Von der Baumwollerzeugung bis zum Schneidern.
Vom Design bis zum Bedrucken. Darüber hinaus werden die einzelnen Zertifikate
im Detail beschrieben. Einen kleinen Vorgeschmack gibt’s hier:








100
% biologisch-abbaubar, gestempelt und individualisiert. 



Unser
Verpackungsmaterial besteht aus Zuckerrohrmelasse, ein Abfallprodukt der
Zuckerproduktion.  


Wirf die
Verpackung ganz einfach in die Bio-Tonne oder auf den Kompost und hilf uns, die
Umwelt zu schonen!








Wir
sind stolz, unsere offizielle Partnerschaft mit Amnesty International
Österreich präsentieren zu dürfen. 

10 % des auf Indiegogo
erzielten Betrages fließen direkt an diese Organisation!





Einige
Fakten, warum wir davon überzeugt sind, dass die Einhaltung der Menschenrechte unerlässlich
für ein friedvolles und würdiges Leben für uns alle ist. 


Stell
dir vor, geschlagen, ausgepeitscht oder verstümmelt zu werden oder gar, dass
dir die Fingernägel gezogen werden! Auf der ganzen Welt sind Menschen wie du
und ich diesem Moment Opfer von solchen grausamen Foltermethoden.    


Eine
neue, von Amnesty International in Auftrag gegebene Studie hat gezeigt, dass 44
% der Menschen rund um den Globus in der Angst leben, gefoltert zu werden.
                 






Meinungsfreiheit
ist ein umfassendes Recht. Neben dem Recht auf freie Meinungsäußerung
beinhaltet es auch, sich ohne Rücksicht auf Grenzen Informationen zu
beschaffen, zu empfangen und zu verbreiten und zwar über Medien jeder Art, egal
ob in Schrift, Wort oder Bild. Für uns stellt dieses Recht eines der
fundamentalsten in der Allgemeinen Erklärung der Menschenrechte dar, denn es erlaubt
uns, weitere Menschenrechte zu artikulieren. 
                        






Das
Recht auf Privat- und Familienleben wird als Abwehrrecht gegenüber dem Staat
verstanden. Jedem soll die Möglichkeit gegeben werden, unbeobachtet und frei
von Überwachung zu leben. Durch dieses Recht erlangen wir persönliche
Autonomie. Vor allem im Zusammenhang mit den Abhörskandalen aus jüngster Zeit
und der Massenüberwachung, der wir tagtäglich ausgesetzt sind, denken wir, dass
es wichtig ist, dieses Menschenrecht wieder mehr in den Fokus der Gesellschaft
zu rücken.
                         




TNI
ist eine Kombination aus Kunst und Mode. Unsere handgemachten TNI-Rahmen sind Kunstwerke
und ein Highlight in jedem Raum. Die Grafik wird mit 30 Fäden von Hand
hineingespannt. Die Allgemeine Erklärung der Menschenrechte von 1948 umfasst 30
Artikel - jeder Faden repräsentiert ein Menschenrecht. 
                   


Am Ende der
Kampagne kontaktieren wir dich per Mail und du kannst uns bekanntgeben, mit welcher Grafik dein TNI Rahmen bespannt werden soll.




Vor
ungefähr zwei Jahren hatte Hubert die Idee, Artikel aus der Allgemeinen
Erklärung der Menschenrechte auf T-Shirts zu drucken. Wir waren der Meinung,
dass dies alleine noch nichts Besonderes sei und machten uns weiter Gedanken. Wir
wollten ein einzigartiges Produkt mit Mehrwert für unsere Gesellschaft schaffen.
In Graz sind wir auf die zwei Künstlerinnen Carola und Sabrina Deutsch gestoßen.
Die beiden Schwestern waren sofort von unserem Projekt begeistert und wollten unsere
Idee visualisieren. Wir machten uns also ans Werk und kreierten gemeinsam die
ersten Entwürfe. Nach einigen Anpassungen standen schon nach kurzer Zeit die
Grafiken für unsere TNI T-Shirts fest und Hubert und ich machten uns auf den
Weg zu unserem Produzenten nach Kopenhagen. Wir haben uns für das Unternehmen Neutral® entschieden, weil es eine der Top-Adressen für verantwortungsbewusste und
nachhaltige Textilproduktion ist. Die Zertifikate von Neutral® garantieren,
dass unsere T-Shirts mit der geringstmöglichen Belastung für unsere Erde
produziert wurden.

Sommer 2014                              Geistesblitz                                         
Herbst 2014              wir fanden unsere Designerinnen              

Frühling 2015           wir fanden unseren Produzenten               



Winter 2015                            wir bestellten unsere                        Erste Produktion 



Frühling 2016                   offizielle Partnerschaft mit                                
Sommer 2016                                 start auf                                       
August 2016                              start der                                  AUSLIEFERUNG







Möglicherweise
sehen viele in unserer Gesellschaft Menschenrechte als etwas
Selbstverständliches an und sind sich der Gefahr nicht bewusst, dass wir im
Begriff sind, diese fundamentalen Rechte über Bord zu werfen. Genau diese
Gefahr wollen wir den Menschen vor Augen führen und wieder ein Bewusstsein für dieses wichtige
Thema schaffen. 

Wir
sind aber davon überzeugt, dass wir mit unserem Konzept die Idee von
Menschenrechten jedem näherbringen können. 

Menschen
wie du haben uns dazu bewogen, diese Kampagne zu starten. Wir sind davon
überzeugt, dass viele unsere Idee, dass das Bewusstsein für Menschenrechte geschärft
werden sollte, ebenso wichtig finden wie wir. Sei also dabei und hilf uns,
wieder Aufmerksamkeit für dieses Thema zu schaffen!

Für
den Fall, dass wir den oben genannten Betrag nicht erreichen sollten, werden
wir uns natürlich weiterhin für Menschenrechte einsetzen und deren Wichtigkeit
für unsere Gesellschaft aufzeigen.




Wir benötigen die Hilfe jedes einzelnen, um das
Bewusstsein für Menschenrechte zu schärfen und eine Bewegung zu starten, die
ein klares Zeichen setzt: Ja zu Menschenrechten! Teile diese Kampagne auf
Facebook und Twitter, damit wir gemeinsam eine größere Aufmerksamkeit schaffen
können. Je lauter wir sind, desto eher erreichen wir jene, die sich mit diesem
Thema noch nicht auseinandergesetzt haben um ihnen zu zeigen, wie wichtig und wertvoll
Menschenrechte sind. Mit deiner Hilfe können wir Menschenrechte wieder mehr in
den Fokus der Gesellschaft rücken!



Umtausch


Wenn
du der Größentabelle, welche du per E-Mail nach der Kampagne zugesandt bekommst,
folgst, kann wenig schief gehen. Falls du dein TNI T-Shirt dennoch – aus
welchen Gründen auch immer – umtauschen möchtest, dann machen wir das natürlich
gerne. Da wir allerdings gerade erst dabei sind unsere Firma aufzubauen, können
wir die Transportkosten leider nicht übernehmen. Bitte achte außerdem darauf,
dass die T-Shirts ungetragen und ungewaschen sein müssen, wenn du sie
zurückschickst.



Häufig gestellte Fragen:


Wo kann ich die Größe, Grafik und das Modell meines
TNI T-Shirts auswählen? Du bekommst am Ende der Kampagne eine E-Mail, in der
wir dich nach deiner gewünschten Größe, Grafik und dem gewünschten T-Shirt-Modell
fragen. 

Wie
gebe ich meine Lieferadresse an? Wir fragen dich gleich beim Bestellen des
Perks (T-Shirt, Rahmen) nach deiner Lieferadresse. 

Wann
werden weitere Farben und Modelle erhältlich sein? Wir arbeiten unter Hochdruck
daran, weitere Modelle auf den Markt zu bringen und mehr Rechte zu
visualisieren. Vieles hängt allerdings vom Ausgang dieser Kampagne ab – also
bitte teile diese Kampagne mit deinen Freunden, damit sie uns auf Indiegogo
finden!

Wann
wird mein TNI T-Shirt geliefert? Sobald die Indiegogo-Kampagne zu Ende ist,
starten wir mit der Auslieferung der TNI T-Shirts. Das wird im August sein!

story:
Executive summary
We have all heard about how much of a threat climate change is. It's overwhelming to deal with and it's easier to sweep under the rug and just hope for the best. Unfortunately, that approach won't work with this phantom menace.

Here's the low-down: Scientists tell us we need to stay below a 2 degree Celsius warming in order to avoid unimaginable consequences. To stay below a 2 degree Celsius warming level, we need to cut per-person emissions levels from 8 tons of CO2 equivalents to 2 tons between 2020 and 2050. That's a cut of 75%!

Let's be real: solar and wind energy, electric cars, and energy efficiency measures won't get us there. If we don't take action ourselves, governments will put in place product bans, massive industry regulations, and introduce a variety of taxes to protect us from harm.

What can we do? We can offset our emissions by planting trees and taking other measures to reduce emissions in the atmosphere. No, we won't ask you to go out and plant trees. We'll take care of it for you. For $10, you can buy 1 carbon credit. That carbon credit offsets 1 ton of CO2, which offsets roughly one month of the average person's carbon footprint. In practice, this means we'll plant 40 trees. Powerful stuff, right? We love it, too and we want to roll out our model across the world in an app to automate all of it.

Our app

We are building an app that will give you the ability to live a carbon-neutral life with minimal effort.

Powered by a data-driven model, the evolutionR mobile app will allow users to measure, monitor and offset their carbon footprint via a monthly subscription. To be successful, we are engineering an application that updates users about their carbon footprint while allowing them to choose the most efficient way to go carbon-neutral. Once users decide to go carbon-neutral, their contributions on the evolutionR platform will be matched by a corporation willing to purchase an equal amount of carbon credits. Individuals and corporations are currently spending over $500M per year on carbon credits alone. We believe that evolutionR has the potential to expand this number while promoting the use of solar, wind and bio-fuel as alternatives to fossil fuels.


How it works

The evolutionR platform will help users measure and monitor their carbon footprints by using mobile accelerometer data to determine how often we drive a car, ride a bus, ride a bike or even catch a flight. Each one of these actions has a different degree of impact on our environment. We want to help users understand these differences so that they can begin to make a difference themselves.

Through interactive designs and data visualizations, the evolutionR app will allow users to explore the relationship between how they move about the world and how this impacts the environment. evolutionR will help quantify climate change by showing carbon emissions at both the individual and collective levels. Our design promotes action by encouraging users to set carbon reduction goals to decrease their carbon footprint.  The mobile app will also show data on how the evolutionR community is performing as a whole.

By creating a unique user experience that promotes both environmental awareness and action, we believe evolutionR has the potential to unite individuals and corporations in building a carbon neutral world.


Carbon Credits and Projects

The world's most successful companies are investing in clean energy. Last year, Google alone invested in 2.5 gigawatts of clean wind energy, the equivalent of removing 1 million cars off the road. Additionally, the carbon credit market provides an alternative solution for companies to reduce their environmental impact. The South Pole Group is a leader in sourcing carbon emissions reductions projects and our partnership with this industry leader will literally put these projects in the palms of anyone’s hands. Users will be able to watch updates from projects all over the globe through the evolutionR app, providing transparency into how their contributions are combatting climate change.


Why Indiegogo?

evolutionR began with the thought that people would be more motivated to reduce their carbon footprint if they just knew more about it. We want to incentivize as many people as possible to learn more about their individual impact on the environment and that's why we are here today. We want to build a product that builds a community and we believe Indiegogo is the place to start. We've set our goals astronomically high because they need to be. Climate change is a grave economic threat to our future and the sense of urgency is inconsistent with the challenges we face. We believe we have assembled a team that can execute on these ambitions with efficiency. The initial funding from this campaign will enable us to release our beta app by the end of 2016.

Thank you for supporting evolutionR


Learn more

Check us out on our website at www.evolutionR.org, on Facebook at www.facebook.com/evolutionR.org

Check out South Pole Group at http://www.thesouthpolegroup.com

story:
FAQ

About our product

Is the W2S watch waterproof?

Excellent waterproof performance, waterproof level, 50 meters

How long can W2S's battery standby？How to solve when it out of battery?

Normal daily use battery can standby for 3 years.  Then please replaced by our free battery.

Does all size of wrist can wear W2S?

Yes, the strap can be adjusted in length, to adapt the size of the wrist.

How many colors does it have?

Two, golden rose and silver.

What material is the watch strap?

The watch strap is made of Italian leather.

About After-sales

All products offer one year free warranty. Shipping cost requires users to pay.

What system of mobile phone support installation applications?

Support Android and IOS system.

Does it easy to set pairing W2S and phone?

Very simple, can step by step according to the manual settings.

Does the W2S compatible with NFC?

Temporarily does not support this feature.

About the transportation

When can I receive my W2S watch?

The first order will be finished in June, 2016. You can receive it within 20 days.

Can I just send back to repair if the watch have a defective or broken?

W2S provide one year free warranty service.

How can I pay my order?

Indigogo accept PayPal and credit card(Master Card and American Express etc.) on line.


About other problem

Pls contact us by E-mail: service@myelephone.com

Shipping cost requires users to pay.What system of mobile phone support installation applications?Support Android and IOS system.Does it easy to set pairing W2S and phone?Very simple, can step by step according to the manual settings.Does the W2S compatible with NFC?Temporarily does not support this feature.About the transportationWhen can I receive my W2S watch?The first order will be finished in June, 2016. You can receive it within 20 days.Can I just send back to repair if the watch have a defective or broken?W2S provide one year free warranty service.How can I pay my order?Indigogo accept PayPal and credit card(Master Card and American Express etc.) on line. story:
I'm Sean Daugherty, and I believe deeply in individuality and the ability to express oneself in new and creative ways that make you, you! Growing up I struggled with the idea of always fitting in, but never really liked standing out; I wanted to be my own person yet still feel like I belonged somewhere. Sole Mates is based on the exact same principles, that with the subtlety of socks you will be able to have a creative outlet to express who you are and show off your individuality. In a society with so much conformity it sucks to just blend in, so why not stand out? You'll look great and feel even better! With the Sole Mates family at your side you'll never feel like you don't belong.

To properly fund my start up costs I am asking to raise 1,500 dollars, which will go towards purchasing enough socks for men's and women's socks for people to purchase and some extra socks for giveaways and promotional uses. It will cost me around 1,000 dollars to manufacture a solid amount of socks (roughly 600 pairs, depending on the manufacturer) and the remaining 500 I would use to purchase my trademark. Trademarks are really important and I want to ensure security for my company so that I can continue to make fantastic socks for all of you. Regardless if I reach my goal, whatever money is raised will go directly to purchasing the socks so that I can bring quality socks to your feet!

There are a lot of sock companies out there, but none of them are like mine. With Sole Mates you won't just be purchasing a pair of socks, you'll be joining a family of people who love socks and who love to express themselves in a multitude of different ways. Remember: you can stand out, while still fitting in. With Sole Mates I want to bring unity and creativity back to the people and provide a simple outlet for expression, we wear socks everyday- why not make it fun! 

People that know me know that I am a go-getter, when I want to accomplish something nothing will stand in my way or get me down. I am more than determined to bring quality socks to anyone and everyone that wants to find a fun and unique way to express themselves. I've been in love with socks since I was 16 years old, and even had my own small sock business in High School. Now that I am older and more knowledgable about business I'll be able to bring a lot more to the table and execute a fully functioning business for consumers. I love socks, and I want to share that love with the world. I have a vision and I won't be stopped until everyone has been given the chance to find their Sole Mate(s) socks.

Like I said before, I'm a go-getter- but that doesn't mean that there are gonna be challenges along the way. I am aware that manufacturers can pose a problem with production time and quality of my product, but I have built some business relationships over the past few years that can assist me with overcoming any of these obstacles. Being so young and I'll be able to conquer the social media aspect of the business and will be able to have multiple sources of media that you, the reader, will be able to find information about Sole Mates on. The relationships I have built in the business world will help me tremendously along my journey to creating Sole Mates, any obstacle I may face I will be able to tackle with resources I know of and the people I can rely on.

My greatest resource however will always be you, the reader. You are my eyes and ears in the consumer world, and my biggest support as well. I know not everyone will be able to donate, but sharing my vision and spreading my campaign will help me just as much as donating. Use the tools provided by indiegogo to share my story on your social media outlets or by word of mouth! I honestly appreciate any help I can get, I know I can't do it alone, help me make my dream a reality!

story:
Simple, light, easy to use. Fashionable, ecofriendly, hand made in Italy.
Shield à Porter® is the real first anti-RFiD range of items having this long sequence of unusual features.

How was SàP® born? When Francesca and I started reading in the news about contactless creditcards scanning and by running a market survey, we realized it is quite difficult to find nice and value-for-money wallets we had the idea of creating an RFiD protected range of accessories to help any end user safeguard his/her own personal data and money.   

After long studies and talking with several factories in Italy and in China, we finally selected Almini Milano a great family run factory with the key characteristics we were looking for:

- "hand" working on each single item

- italian taste and style

- using recycled leather

With Amos and Dante Almini, we studied a lot of available materials in the special market of ecofriendly recycled leather and, after many tests, we found a 100% granulate recycled leather, compacted into large, natural sand and dark grey coloured sheets.

(left) Recycled Leather Granulate - Recycled Leather Compacted Sheets (right)

So, always with Almini Bros. precious help, we coupled two recycled layers inserting a very thin aluminium foil between them. We tested many different thicknesses searching for the best ratio between the anti-RFiD effect and the general softness of the material to work out. This is the final result we obtained:

 

The Shield à Porter® accessories range now awaits your contribution to be produced!

With this Indiegogo Campaign and with your precious help, we will be able to start the mass production respecting the minimum order quantity (250 pcs only!). This is our factory's request to keep the production costs at a very good level thus resulting in a very seductive purchasing price!

Only through the contributors' help we will be able to offer a fashionable and useful range of accessories at a very competitive price, we are sure that Shield à Porter® will be chosen by a lot of people needing to protect their own data and money.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SàP® THINNY Card Holder (open inside view) in Sand colour

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SàP® PRO Card Holder (open inside view) in Dark Gray colour

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SàP® ClutchBag (front view) in Sand colour

And be aware that no one single cows or calfs were or will be killed to produce Shield à Porter®!

 

By collecting only 2,000$ we will be able to produce the new Shield à Porter® range at a factory cost (but totally affecting our profits). No problem of course, but it's a pity not to be able to launch any advertising campaign to present this fashionable products range to the rest of the world :(
By collecting around 4,000$, the production costs will decrease a little bit and we will make some profit out of it to start a Facebook or Google Ads Campaign.
By achieving our goal at 5,000$ or more, we will be able to improve our current static website by inserting an e-commerce plug in, powering a little bit our advertising campaign.
Above all, our target is to keep our prices as low as possible thus giving the opportunity to a lot of people to protect their own personal data and money at very accessible prices. And we also would like to enlarge our range with new items and with new releases.

Where else could you find such smart and nice but above all fashionable and eco-friendly RFiD shielded accessories?  Nowhere but here, and you know.

By sustaining this incredible campaign, you will receive your selected Shield à Porter® accessory at home (for all perks, we already included worldwide shipping costs!), in your preferred colour (selecting it between Sand or Dark Gray!) and at an incredible price (!!!).

Last but not least, you will be the first one ever in the world to get your own Shield à Porter®!

If we should not achieve our 5.000$ target through the campaign, we will try to start the production even at higher costs to ship to any subscriber his/her selected Shield à Porter® item but at the same cost as our subscribers funded.

We believe our solution as we developed and implemented in the Shield à Porter® range is the best option people can choose from and we will do anything we can do to launch it to the market.

By sustaining the campaign we will allow a lot of people feel safer in this technological and a bit "out of control" world. In addition to that fashion and style will be with you, that's  the way do things. 

As you can see in our pictures and videos, prototypes and final samples are already in our hands. All the production issues we met in making samples were finally solved. So, be confident: we don't see any additional real problems when we start our mass production of your own Shield à Porter®.

If you like our project, if you want to push our work around the world, if you love Shield à Porter® accessories range, please share this Indiegogo Campaign in your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram pages to inform all your friends about it. Also this type of contribution can boost our campaign to acheive the goal soon. Thanks a lot!

To have more informations about the possible scanning of your data, you can read:
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3171431...

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/technology/2016/02/1...

https://www.theguardian.com/money/2015/jul/23/c...

http://www.thisismoney.co.uk/money/saving/artic...

http://www.forbes.com/sites/andygreenberg/2012/...

https://www.wired.com/2014/11/chip-n-pin-foreig...

story:
REFLECTRECOVERY.COM

RECOVERY: A RETURN TO A NORMAL STATE OF HEALTH, MIND OR STRENTH.  THE ACTION OR PROCESS OF REGAINING POSSESSION OF SOMETHING LOST OR STOLEN. 

ReflectRecovery.com is a brand apparel business designed to empower those of us in recovery.  Each day, we are reminded of one or both of the definitions above.  Whether we are recovering from addiction, cancer, abuse, disease, or grief, the mindset is still the same - to take personal ownership everyday of what and who we are.  We are not a victim of circumstance; we are individuals with the power to change, overcome, survive and thrive. 

Every day we see different messages on someone’s shirt.  But, when we look in the mirror how do we see and respond to that message?  This is the concept behind our apparel line.  We are an online marketplace for EMPOWERMENT APPAREL.   The messages are in reverse so that when we look at ourselves in the mirror we are reminded of what we are; “Blessed”, “Worth It”, “Beautiful”, to “Be Kind”, to have "Faith over Fear", a “Survivor”.

We are also an online community of recovering individuals assisting others in recovery. We organize fundraisers and sponsor individuals who are starting out on their journeys, or those who may have hit a rough patch while trudging their road to Happy Destiny.    

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise funds for inventory and equipment.  We are also looking to start our sponsorship program out and to immediately start helping others.   We are starting out by launching our flagship shirt, "Survivor" for only $25.  All of our apparel comes from the top line manufacturers and for this event will be available in medium, large, X-large and XX-large.  Even if we do not reach our goal, we will still be sending out all of the shirts to those that have purchased them and donating the additional funds to one of the scholarship funds for individuals already in the queue.    

The Impact

As stated above, this is a business and an organization.  Not only is everyone who works on the team is in some stage of recovery, we are working toward empowering everyone who looks at themselves in the mirror everyday.  We are in recovery, for recovery by recovery.  Eventually, we would also like to set up a 3rd party marketplace where those in recovery will be able to sell their unique items and have a portion of those proceeds going toward additional scholarship funds. 

When we go to bed at night, or wake up in the morning, we are the only ones that truly know how we feel, what we are thinking, what we are acting on.  The question that our apparel can answer is, "Do you reflect your recovery?"

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone has the ability to donate/purchase.  We do ask if you believe in what we are trying to do, please share this by using the Indiegogo share tools or other share functions through social media.  Of course please contact us with any further questions.  Thanks for your consideration!

story:
Symbiosis Soft Enamel Pins

  • Hi! I'm a nonbinary artist in Reno, Nevada who loves the local landscape and wildlife. These themes are prominently featured in my work.
  • This campaign will allow me to bring one of my favorite drawings to life as a soft enamel pin. It will be a wearable work of art that desert lovers can take with them everywhere to feel connected to this beautiful environment.
  • This campaign will also help me expand the range of merchandise I offer. I am an independent artist whose major source of income is my Etsy shop. Helping me fund this pin will help me expand my business and add a new item to my shop.

Artist's Statement

  • This drawing is called "Symbiosis" to play off the fact that coyotes and crows do not have symbiotic relationships in nature and in fact are both scavengers who compete over the same food sources. However, this piece re-imagines that relationship as a collaborative one, instead of a competitive dynamic, in which they can help one another survive.
  • The pairing of a coyote and crow is meant to symbolize the fact that while they may survive on their own in the harsh environment of the high desert, it would be easier for them both if they worked together. This piece is meant to be a reminder that while we are strong on our own, we are stronger when we work together as a community.
  • On a personal level, it also represents my partner and I, who represent ourselves as a crow and a coyote respectively in our zine series, and our bond and connection to each other as equals and collaborators.

Details

  • The pins will be 30mm high, made of soft enamel and come with a single post and rubber back.
  • 3 inch tall vinyl stickers of the design are also available.
  • This campaign aims to raise $170, which will cover the production cost for 100 pins.
  • This campaign is using flexible funding, so even if the goal is not met, the stickers and pins will still be produced and sent to supporters!

Risks & Challenges

  • I have worked with all of the manufacturers involved previously and have around 8 years of experience with online sales and both domestic and international shipping.
  • However, shipping deadlines are meant to account for possible production delays and I will keep supporters informed of any issues that arise.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this campaign with your friends or purchase a pin as a gift!
  • Purchase from my Etsy shop: etsy.com/shop/zeppystarduststudios
  • Donate to my Ko-Fi: ko-fi.com/zeppystarduststudios
  • Follow me on Instagram to see more of my work and get updates on this project: @raydaylamifrost

Feel free to email me with any questions, concerns or other inquiries: zeppystarduststudios@gmail.com

story:
We are a group of Metaphysics experts that love unique designs, we want to get away from the usual 12 zodiac or horoscope signs and create something deeper to reveal yourself. Your support will help us to start our Journey.

Our first project is based on Chinese Metaphysic, Bazi 八字

Design theme: Day Master

BaZi is an ancient form of Chinese astrology that reveals a person's nature, inner working and overall destiny based on your date of birth. In BaZi, each and every one of us is represented by one of the five classical Chinese elements; Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal and Water in Yin and Yang variant. The 10 elements in total, known as your personal Day Master, holds a treasure trove of information on who you truly are

Each of our Day Master T-shirts are beautifully designed to reflect the different facets of the elements and in turn, your truest self. One would say it is just a T-shirt however the amount of research, discussion and creativity we go through for each theme will bring wearer pride and joy. It's definitely a conversation-starter as well as letting others see who you truly are.

While our t-shirt designs are ready (take a peek below), we are going to need 7,500 SGD to kickstart this project. With your support, we'll be able to mass produce and launch this product by early December. 

How well do you know yourself?
Each of us appear differently to our friends, family and acquaintances. There are different sides to our personality and it's not often that our true nature can shine through. Sometimes, we're not even sure ourselves on who we really are deep inside. Fortunately, the answer to this question might literally be written in the stars.

To know or understand more, connect with us.

Each funding (20 SGD & above) will come with your personal Day Master explained, if you do not know your Day Master we will be contacting you to establish (date of birth required).

For Silver & Gold Pack - we will provide a month & three months forecast based on your Day Master respectively.  A forecast provides you the outlook of what can happen and how you can action on it.

 

* Shipping charges for other countries range from 8 to 15 SGD.
story_txt: We are a group of Metaphysics experts that love unique designs, we want to get away from the usual 12 zodiac or horoscope signs and create something deeper to reveal yourself. Your support will help us to start our Journey.Our first project is based on Chinese Metaphysic, Bazi 八字Design theme: Day MasterBaZi is an ancient form of Chinese astrology that reveals a person's nature, inner working and overall destiny based on your date of birth. In BaZi, each and every one of us is represented by one of the five classical Chinese elements; Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal and Water in Yin and Yang variant. The 10 elements in total, known as your personal Day Master, holds a treasure trove of information on who you truly areEach of our Day Master T-shirts are beautifully designed to reflect the different facets of the elements and in turn, your truest self. One would say it is just a T-shirt however the amount of research, discussion and creativity we go through for each theme will bring wearer pride and joy. It's definitely a conversation-starter as well as letting others see who you truly are.While our t-shirt designs are ready (take a peek below), we are going to need 7,500 SGD to kickstart this project. With your support, we'll be able to mass produce and launch this product by early December. How well do you know yourself?Each of us appear differently to our friends, family and acquaintances. There are different sides to our personality and it's not often that our true nature can shine through. Sometimes, we're not even sure ourselves on who we really are deep inside. Fortunately, the answer to this question might literally be written in the stars.To know or understand more, connect with us.Each funding (20 SGD & above) will come with your personal Day Master explained, if you do not know your Day Master we will be contacting you to establish (date of birth required).For Silver & Gold Pack - we will provide a month & three months forecast based on your Day Master respectively.  A forecast provides you the outlook of what can happen and how you can action on it. * Shipping charges for other countries range from 8 to 15 SGD.

story:
Hi,

I'm Matteo Marziali, I'm an Italian shoes designer, I was born in a family of long time Artisan traditions. My family taught me how to express my skills.

When I was young, my artistic attitudes, brought me to enrich my passions abroad. So I left Italy and went first to London and then to Barcelona. My working experiences in the main capitals of fashion made me a designer.

My artisan attitudes and my constant care for  innovation and quality distinguishes my Sneakers. The result is a trendy product 100% Made in Italy who cares for feet wellness.

My project on Indiegogo aims to realize for you a premium product entirely hand-dyed in LIMITED EDITION.

That's why each pair of my hand-dyed shoes will have a serial number and  my signature.

Each Style is both for man and woman.

 Shoes realized for this project are hand-dyed pair by pair. To obtain the best dyeing we have picked out a new material.

To grant the best result we are proposing our best tested styles.

Together with the shoes perks is enclosed a maintenance kit as follows:

The jar contains 10 cl (3.38 oz) of water based dye in the same color as the shoes you have backed plus a polish cloth in woolen fabric.

The woolen cloth is apt to polish vegetable tanned leathers as the one we use in manufacturing PlayHat hand-dyed sneakers.

 
We have put a rough action on a hand-dyed sneakers with sand paper to show you how a maintenance kit works.
  1. Clean the worn part of hand-dyed shoes with cloth  impregnated with ethyl alcohol
  2. Wait a couple of minute
  3. Dunk the sponge in the dye taking a slight quantity of color 
  4. Apply the dye on worn area of shoes in smooth and circular motions
  5. Wait half a hour to let the dye dry well
  6. Take a paper handkerchief and remove the exceeded dye
  7. Take the woolen cloth to polish shoes

Each hide has his own natural pattern that gives each product his own character if not drowned out during tanning.

This is the reason why we are using goat skin to manufacture hand-dyed Playhat shoes.

Goat skin has such a grain as to grant dyes both depth and shades you see in the pictures. 

Playhat sneakers are all leather lined, the insock is fully made of natural antibacterial latex, it is provided with an antishock under the heel that allows the back to releive from body weight.

We always use a lasting sole made of natural leather.

The endurance of Playhat shoes are due also to a particular sewing that links the sole to the upper.

Each pairs of Playhat sneaker is hand-dyed with natural paints.

The out soles are dyed pairs by pairs as the upper.

We trust on reliable domestic suppliers who grant us with premium quality raw materials that match, even much further, our high quality standards.

 

PlayHat brand has gained notable Italian awards during three edition of Florence Pitti Immagine.

 

  • Strings are in cotton hand-dyed
  • Eye lets are nychel free
  • Tip is made of Termo Adhesive Fabric
  • Counter is made of Salpa (regenerated natural cow)
  • Lasting sole is made of natural leather
  • Fussbett is made of natural antibacterial latex it is self - shaping: after two hours wearing, it takes the shape of your feet.
  • Anti-shock is made of shock-absorbed material
  • Seam stitchings are sewed with a waxed-cotton thread
  • Linen is made of breathable natural leathers
  • Uppers are made of natural leathers
  • High density foam rubber
  • Reinforcements of fiberglass
  • Dyes we use only eco-friendly colors

When you are back home you’ll forget to wear your slippers

You can wear playhat sneakers even without socks

After € 15.000 stretch goal we add 3 new colors:

electric blue - vintage pink - ivy green

After € 25.000 stretch goal we add 3 new colors:

red aperol - eggplant violet - mustard

To be sure what your real size is we suggest to follow the instructions below:

  1. Place a sheet of paper on the floor right next to the wall
  2. Place your foot on the sheet of paper with the heel adherent to the wall
  3. Draw a line with a pencil/pen on the top of your toe
  4. Measure the distance between the line you have drawn and the rim of the sheet
  5. Sign down the result of the measurement on the survey we will send when the campaign ends (both cm and inch will do)

story:
FIND YOUR LANGUAGE

​ENGLISH / ESPAÑOL / FRANÇAIS

 DEUTSCHE / PORTUGUÊS 

 

WELCOME TO ZerOne!

Where sustainability and creativity meet in a beautifully unique way!

ZerOne is a high-end, affordable, cosmetic line focused on bringing you beautiful, sustainable (and kind) products to elevate your expression! 

A Little About Us:

Our story began in London. In 2012 our team set out to design a line of makeup products that would enrapture our customers. By 2015, when social media was still in its infancy, MUA had more than 250,000 Facebook followers and was one of the fastest-growing cosmetics brands in the world.  But having a successful line wasn’t the complete picture. 

Fast forward to 2020 and ZerOne, an amalgamation of all the things we learned in the past, mixed with a passion for living a sustainable lifestyle. We are working hard to bring you products you can be proud of. Ones that support both you, and the planet.
 


 

OUR VISION:

We are passionate about the belief that we can create a world where everyone wins. We believe that it's possible to make high-quality cosmetics that are safe for our customers, safe for the environment (plastic-free and made with sustainable materials), and affordable to everyone in the world.

We believe that the ability to play and learn and express ourselves is a right that should be accessible to everyone. And it shouldn't come at the expense of anyone else. We're creating an online environment, where you can come and learn about makeup, share your artistry and knowledge, and join a community of like-minded friends!

We want to see creativity flow. So, alongside our online community, we will be creating weekly video tutorials from our makeup artists (like Karla Powell who created the images seen above)

 

 

OUR COMMITMENT:

Here at ZerOne, we care about you and the planet. 

We believe we have a responsibility to protect our planet and its inhabitants. So, you’d better believe we have no problem committing to using cruelty-free, natural, and sustainable products, as well as committing to giving back to organizations that are on the front lines fighting to protect people, the planet, and all creatures that call this place home.

You can rest assured that our priority will always be to create prestige quality products, in certified factories, that give you the ability to express and explore yourself in a way that is safe for both you and the environment.

We want to feel good about what we put on our bodies, and we want that for you too.
 

 

ABOUT OUR POP UP SHOPS:

Because we are committed to protecting our environment, our mobile popup shops are built using zero-emission battery vehicles.

We have designed mobile popup shop retail trucks where you can come to safely and comfortably test new products, purchase, or receive training from our very own makeup artists. Your safety is important to us, so every sample you test will be brand new, and anything you test you can take with you!

 


 

As a contributor, you will be helping to create a unique opportunity within the cosmetic world.

We are the first of our kind offering totally safe product testing in zero-emission mobile pop up's, alongside cruelty-free, plastic-free, vegan products sold online only. With a website translated into 8 languages and customer service delivered by our staff in 11 countries, ZerOne will be the first truly international brand.

There are three essential elements of successful online businesses. First, great products. Second, a great website. Third, outstanding social media marketing. Our campaign budget is $110,000 broken down into three groups of expenditure:
 


 

$42,000 – Website: Populating site with product photos, eCommerce and Cyber Security software licenses;

$41,000 – Makeup inventory (including Indiegogo backer incentive offer products);

$27,000 – Pre-Launch marketing: Social media ads and influencer sample kits

In the event that we do not reach our funding goal, we will launch the business with a reduced set of products.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We value the time you took to join us here.  If you aren’t able to make a contribution, we would really appreciate you sharing our story with your friends via social media, email or via Indiegogo sharing tools. Thank you!

story:
Kelly Reed’s Boutique is a women’s boutique catering to the sophisticated lady. We carry sizes 4-24 giving our clients the opportunity to shop with their friends. We want to uplift women and set an example for young girls. We want to encourage them to be confident and know they are beautiful. Our clientele can find casual, professional, night out, and special order evening wear. We carry local designers to provide exclusive jewelry, clothing, & handbags. We collaborate with designers, make-up artists, hair stylists, and wardrobe stylists to provide custom packages to meet our clients needs. 

Kelly Reed’s Boutique is completely self funded and has been able to grow our business over the past two years. We have been featured in several fashions shows, including:

  • The Brag Network (weight loss reveal) - Tampa, FL
  • Curve Nation Expo - Orlando FL 
  • Cocktails & Couture - The Ritz - Tampa, FL
  • Victorious Fashion Show (Survivors of Domestic Violence) - Tampa, FL 
  • You Deserve to be Loved Girls Summit - Tampa, FL
  • Dignitary Card Launch Party - Seminole Hard Rock Casino - Tampa, FL 
  • Eye on Fashion Stylist Competition - Tampa, FL

               

"YOU DESERVE TO BE LOVED GIRLS SUMMIT 2016"

               

THE BRAG NETWORK 2015

Kelly Reed's Boutique has been featured in Magazines: 

  • Bay Magazine April 2016 (Cover)
  • Estrela Magazine February 2016

                                                    

BAY MAGAZINE APRIL 2016

 

              

ESTRELA MAGAZINE 2016

 

Kelly Reed's Boutique clothing has also been featured in a film: 

  • Standing Firm - Righteous Productions

We are coming to Indiegogo to help prepare and market for the fall and winter seasons. Our fall calendar is filled with fashion shows and trunk shows and we need to be prepared leading up to the holiday season. 

By contributing to our campaign, you'll help Kelly Reed's Boutique continue to uplift women and encourage them to love their body. We encounter so many women and young girls who feel unattractive or are discouraged about shopping. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need $15,000 to purchase fall inventory and help with our marketing budget. 

  • Fall Clothing Inventory - $6000
  • Fall Designer Handbag Inventory -$2000
  • Jewelry & Accessories - $2000
  • Marketing Budget & Indiegogo fees - $5000

Being apart of this campaign gives you amazing perks: 

  • Thank you card
  • Gift Cards
  • Styling Sessions
  • Make Overs
  • Designer Perks

The Impact

Kelly Reed's Boutique is a woman owned business whose whole concept is to have a boutique for women of all body styles to shop in a comfortable and chic environment. We want to encourage and uplift women and young girls. By helping us to continue with our vision you are helping to empower women to love themselves.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We are so passionate about helping to encourage woman and young girls. Outside of contributing to the campaign,  here are other ways you can help. 

  • Book a Shopping Party
  • Use Kelly Reed's Boutique as an event space
  • Share this campaign with a friend and on social media
  • Follow us on social media

Facebook: www.facebook.com/kellyreedsb

Instagram: www.instagram.com/kellyreedsb

Twitter: www.twitter.com/kellyreedsb

Thank you!

story:
STUFFED POCKETS AND LOW BATTERY?

“The LF Power Wallet provides an intelligent, functional and stylish solution for a truly omnipresent problem. An accessory that avoids worries to every owner of smartphones without the need to fill their pockets with classic powerbank, cables and bulky wallets.”

THE POWER WALLET

“Exit comfortable and carefree” the idea behind LF Power Wallet was designed to obtain in the smallest possible space everything you need to go out during the day or night without worries.
When you want to leave home without stuffed pockets, but at the same time without anxiety for fear of seeing the exhaust phone when you most need it, the only choice falls on a thin and stylish object containing cards, banknotes, powerbank, charging cable and adapter with RFID blocking sistem.... thus LFpowerwallet was born... with high quality leather, handmade by crafts- men, in which fashion meets function.

IDEA

As often happens the idea came from a daily problem. The phone discharges quickly, so in order to avoid that, we leave the house with stuffed pockets carrying with us many objects; wallet, power bank, charging cable... So we decided to bring together all in a minimalist and functional object.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS & ATTENTION TO DETAILS

As luxury traders specialists for over 40 years, we have selected the finest leathers which will pass the test of time. The workmanship is carried out by an italian top craftsmen in leather business, who work also for many famous international brands.

We chose a true "saffiano" leather; the "saffiano" is a particular texture of veal leather invented by Prada. The saffiano is a synonym for beauty and luxury and there are many other fashion brands that use this leather.

 

TECH SPECS

○ 10,1 x 7,2 x 0,8 cm
○ Power bank: 2500 mAh
○ Up to 24h smartphone battery
○ Charging led
○ Space for 3/4 card with slide
○ 1 hidden pocket for your banknotes and coins
○ Built in cable microUSB + apple adapter
○ RFID Block
○ Charging cable included

 

CHOOSE YOUR CUSTOM SEAMS

 

UNLOCK TOTAL BLACK  EDITION

Help us reach 14000€  and we could produce LF Power Wallet TOTAL BLACK edition.

 

CONCEPT

In July 2015 the architect Luca Ferretti began to pursue the idea of creating an object of simple but technological design that can be useful in everyday life.
The choice fell on solving some of the necessities of everyday life by merging in a small object a card holder/notes and a powerbank.
The first step was to patent the idea in August 2015, after which began the research of the smallest and performing powerbank. In parallel we worked on prototyping the leather wallet model. Once ready the powerbank, the focus has shifted on design and object’s size.
The first prototypes were born in December 2015, which was followed by modifications and testing, up to July 2016 with the final models.

 

PERKS

TIMELINE

 

TEAM

Our team was born from shared ideas between father and son. We were then supported by other 2 members (a leather craftsman, a PR) to be able to optimally merge the functionality and fashion, making our days easier with style.

 

HELP US SPREAD THE WORLD

 

SHIPPING COST BREAKDOWN

 

Shipping December 2016, before Christmas! Shipping cost stays flat when you pledge for more then one product. Costs are based on 1 and 2 pieces.

Italy - 4.00€

European Union - 11.00€

Canada,  United States -  13.00€

Australia - 19.00€

N.B. if you can not find your nation between destinations please contact us and we will add it without problems with the best price.

*Backers outside European Union will be responsible for customs and duties.

 

RISKS

Our largest challenge has already been solved by outsourcing the electronic components. They are CE, FCC and ROHS passed and are ready to produce as many or as little as required.

We want also to make it clear that we are not going to compromise with the quality of our products. Since every one of them is hand-crafted it takes more time to produce a piece.

 

EXCHANGE & RETURN POLICY

There will be no exchanges or returns unless there is a manufacturing defect. We stand by our product and we will send you a replacement unit in that case.

 

FAQ

With that kind of smartphone works?
It works with every smartphone

When will my order be shipped?
Orders will be shipped in December 2016, before Christmas.

Do you ship worldwide?
We can only ship via trucker in Europe, but in the next few days we will add shipments for the rest of the world by air. Duties or VAT that may be applied to your order will be your responsibility.

Who will be responsible for any additional taxes, VAT or duties?
Any additional taxes, duties or VAT that may be applied to your order will be your responsibility. Please check your country's import duties before purchasing as it varies internationally.

You may contribute to the campaign?
We would be very grateful if you could share our campaign with your friends. You can also support us with the 1€ or 5€ perks.

Have a question?
If the info above doesn't help, you can ask the to project creator directly: info@lfpowerwallet.com

 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT
