IDEA
As often happens the idea came from a daily problem. The phone discharges quickly, so in order to avoid that, we leave the house with stuffed pockets carrying with us many objects; wallet, power bank, charging cable... So we decided to bring together all in a minimalist and functional object.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS & ATTENTION TO DETAILS
As luxury traders specialists for over 40 years, we have selected the finest leathers which will pass the test of time. The workmanship is carried out by an italian top craftsmen in leather business, who work also for many famous international brands.
We chose a true "saffiano" leather; the "saffiano" is a particular texture of veal leather invented by Prada. The saffiano is a synonym for beauty and luxury and there are many other fashion brands that use this leather.

 
TECH SPECS

○ 10,1 x 7,2 x 0,8 cm○ Power bank: 2500 mAh○ Up to 24h smartphone battery○ Charging led○ Space for 3/4 card with slide○ 1 hidden pocket for your banknotes and coins○ Built in cable microUSB + apple adapter○ RFID Block○ Charging cable included
 
CHOOSE YOUR CUSTOM SEAMS

 
UNLOCK TOTAL BLACK  EDITION
Help us reach 14000€  and we could produce LF Power Wallet TOTAL BLACK edition.

 
CONCEPT
In July 2015 the architect Luca Ferretti began to pursue the idea of creating an object of simple but technological design that can be useful in everyday life.The choice fell on solving some of the necessities of everyday life by merging in a small object a card holder/notes and a powerbank.The first step was to patent the idea in August 2015, after which began the research of the smallest and performing powerbank. In parallel we worked on prototyping the leather wallet model. Once ready the powerbank, the focus has shifted on design and object’s size.The first prototypes were born in December 2015, which was followed by modifications and testing, up to July 2016 with the final models.


 
PERKS

TIMELINE

 
TEAM
Our team was born from shared ideas between father and son. We were then supported by other 2 members (a leather craftsman, a PR) to be able to optimally merge the functionality and fashion, making our days easier with style.

 

HELP US SPREAD THE WORLD




 
SHIPPING COST BREAKDOWN
 
Shipping December 2016, before Christmas! Shipping cost stays flat when you pledge for more then one product. Costs are based on 1 and 2 pieces.
Italy - 4.00€
European Union - 11.00€
Canada,  United States -  13.00€
Australia - 19.00€
N.B. if you can not find your nation between destinations please contact us and we will add it without problems with the best price.
*Backers outside European Union will be responsible for customs and duties.
 
RISKS
Our largest challenge has already been solved by outsourcing the electronic components. They are CE, FCC and ROHS passed and are ready to produce as many or as little as required.
We want also to make it clear that we are not going to compromise with the quality of our products. Since every one of them is hand-crafted it takes more time to produce a piece.
 
EXCHANGE & RETURN POLICY
There will be no exchanges or returns unless there is a manufacturing defect. We stand by our product and we will send you a replacement unit in that case.
 
FAQ
With that kind of smartphone works?It works with every smartphone
When will my order be shipped?Orders will be shipped in December 2016, before Christmas.
Do you ship worldwide?We can only ship via trucker in Europe, but in the next few days we will add shipments for the rest of the world by air. Duties or VAT that may be applied to your order will be your responsibility.
Who will be responsible for any additional taxes, VAT or duties?Any additional taxes, duties or VAT that may be applied to your order will be your responsibility. Please check your country's import duties before purchasing as it varies internationally.
You may contribute to the campaign?We would be very grateful if you could share our campaign with your friends. You can also support us with the 1€ or 5€ perks.
Have a question?If the info above doesn't help, you can ask the to project creator directly: info@lfpowerwallet.com 
 
THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT

story:
We are still shipping. 

A couple of people asked us if we still ship the product even if we do not reach the goal - we will still ship to all supporters even though we might not reach the goal in the given time-frame. Thanks for all the support so far.

 

 


We are SVSTEM. We speak to:

Functional utility over contrived exclusivity,
Premium quality at a democratic price point.

 


 

 

Featuring a modern aesthetic inspired by vintage timepieces, SVSTEM's 2016 Collection seamlessly blends traditional watch elements with new materials to create an elegant composition of old and new.

 

Super Early Bird

- USD 99 (save $80)

Early Bird

- USD 119 (save $60)

Supporter

- USD 139 (save $40)

Retail - USD 179
* All prices include shipping fees.

 

A Modern Classic

Having one successful campaign in 2015 under our belt, we're back with a new collection of watches, featuring a brand new design with an improved quality at the same affordable price.

For our second watch, we focused on using unique materials and details: a three dimensional dial that provides a unique concave depth on the watch face, a silicone band that reveals a custom pattern on the underside, as well as a domed glass enclosure elevated by a symmetrically shaped back case-design.

 

Domed Glass

Custom Silicone Band

Screw-on Back Case

Three Dimensional Dial


2 Colorways: Black / Steel

Released in 2 colorways, Black and Steel, each colorway accentuates a different aspect of the watch's thoughtfully crafted design.
 

Black (starting from $99)

The black colorway features a matte black PVD finish that exudes an elusive, tactical premium feel.
 

Steel (starting from $99)

The steel colorway features a raw metal finish that emphasizes the purity of its material and its machined production process.
 

 

 

From Concept to Production

We designed this watch with the intent to put our brand name second to deliver a statement that fits your lifestyle. We believe in delivering a great watch for a justified price point.
 

 

Quality Parts at an Affordable Price Point

Our watch components are selected to achieve the highest quality for the price point that we are offering: a domed glass enclosure, custom silicone band, and a finely finished stainless steel body combined with one of the most reliable Japanese movement makers.

Movement:
Case Material:
Case Diameter:
Strap Material:
Strap Width:
Optics:
Water Resistance:

Japanese Miyota Movement 14L5
Stainless Steel 316L
40mm
Silicone, with Stainless Steel Buckles
20mm
Mineral Glass
3 ATM / 30 meters

 

Project Timeline

We have been in talks with our manufacturers for around 6 months now, making the necessary rounds of quality checks and sample approvals. All the watch components are fully designed and ready for their full production run.

Mass production run
Delivery of product to warehouse
Creating shipping labels and packages
Shipping to customers

Nov 2016
Mid Dec 2016
Late Dec 2016
Late Dec - Jan 2017

 


Production & Shipping Schedule

With our watches ready for its mass production run, we are confident you will receive your watches within the stated timeframe. These 3 factors inform our confidence:

We’ve already been through several iterations of production samples and quality checks.
Months before launching this campaign, we have already been through several rounds of quality checks and sample approvals. We have been working very closely with our manufacturer and are very satisfied with the quality we've received so far.

Our production run is small, and it's ready to go.
Due to the jump start we have in production samples, the full production run is already ready to go as soon as the manufacturer receives the funds.

Having just 2 colorways will significantly speed up the shipping process.
With just 2 colorways for our team of 2 to handle, the sorting of packages for delivery would be much faster and more streamlined than our previous campaign.

In the unlikely event of delays with production we will let our backers now ASAP and be as transparent as we can with the process.
 

 

F.A.Q

How do I select my watch color?
Your color selection can be made within the perk itself. Each perk features a different colorway labeled in its title. Simply select your preferred colorway and follow the on-screen steps to complete your pre-order.

Do you ship internationally?
Yes we do. Our watches ship worldwide and shipping is free of charge as well. Please note that shipping to certain countries (particularly in Europe) would incur additional customs charges. We do not cover those additional customs charges.

How much does shipping cost?
Shipping is free worldwide. Please note that shipping to certain countries (particularly in Europe) would incur additional customs charges. We do not cover these additional customs charges.

Have you successfully shipped stuff before?
Yes, we have. We successfully shipped our watches to backers from all over the world in our previous campaign.

Can I pre-order more than one watch?
Yes, you can pre-order as many watches you want to.

What is the movement and how long does the battery last?
We use a Japanese Miyota 1L45 movement, and the battery lasts for an average of 3 years.

What is the warranty on my watch?
All of our watches come with a limited warranty for one year.

 

Press Kit

Visit our website

Photos are taken by Vicky Moon (http://www.vickymoonphoto.com/) and Raffael Dickreuter (http://www.raffael3d.com/)

Thank you for your support!

story:
The Aria scarf features an embedded nanofiber filter sandwiched between protective cotton/wool blends. Mechanical filtration acts as a net capturing nano-particles whilst the electrostatically charged part catches even smaller particles by attracting them – the smaller the particulate, the stronger the attraction to the charge.

 

 

The Aria scarf is a fashionable, futuristic face covering that allows the wearer to breathe pure air without giving up on your look. It sits on the face and around the head comfortably, without leaving face marks or unpleasant pressures. It’s easy to adjust and get an optimal fit. 

In no way compromises on style and in fact, is designed to be a highly desirable item. It also is far more pleasant than a mask and allows the wearer to match their style in a more effective way. 

 

 

 

 

One of the biggest advantages of the Aria scarf is its versatility. It has been designed to have a universal for allowing it to be easily adaptable to any face, from kids to grown-ups. We all know how hard it is to make kids do something, especially when it comes to wearing protective gear. Having an Aria scarf handy is an easy and fun solution to this!

 

 

The scarf measures 180 cms x 40 cms and weighs 270g. Featuring a mouldable nosepiece to prevent the scarf from falling down, two discrete earloops for extra flexibility of movement, no filters to change, Aria is fully washable at low temperatures.

Air temperature is largely influenced by the heat coming from the earth's surface rather than the direct Sun's radiation. Therefore in wintertime, the air close to the surface is colder and denser, and it moves slower than warm air. This density means that cold air traps the pollution but also doesn't whisk it away. 

 

 

 

Winter air pollution, worsened by heating systems, remains in place for much longer and therefore is breathed in at a higher rate than during the summer. 

 

 

A scarf is an item most people often carry with them in wintertime, giving a filtering capacity to it, makes it more likely to be used for protection rather than an extra cumbersome item to carry around with you.

 

 

 

 

Before starting his own projects Alex worked for the most important manufacturer of respiratory protection products in Italy. For four years on his desk, all kinds of protective masks appeared. Whether they were proper industrial PPE or new concepts for fancy Urban Masks that were co-developed together with his company, he really got the chance to see the good and the bad of this particular industry. In his opinion what really lacks in most of these products is a real user-centered approach. Protection is useless if the product you're supposed to wear is uncomfortable or doesn't fit nicely on your face.  With this experience in breathing protection and an out of the box creative thinking together with his project partner Mukti, he started Aria.

story:
Pet owners everywhere agree on one thing...their pet is part of the family! They are more than “owners," they are Pet Parents and proud of it. 

              

 

Blue Jay Wireless has made a major move in the industry by introducing Trackums! The World’s First Smartphone For Pets! 

Trackums Features

 

 

 

        
 

PicUm - Equipped with a 2 mp camera to allow you to snap a photo from your App to see exactly where your pet is from the Trackums device. See what your pet sees and know if they are safe or not.

 

 

 
 

TagUm - Use the Customizable Virtual Tag to personalize the tag on the 1.22” LCD screen with your pet’s name, a fun photo, your address, or an “I’m lost” message if someone finds your furry friend.

 

 

 

FindUm & ProtectUm - The GeoTracking feature allows you to track your pet wherever they may go. Just use the App and it will map out and show the location of your pet.
Then, the GeoFencing feature allows you to set a virtual boundary for your pet, and if they go outside of that area, you will be notified on your App so you can bring them back to safety.

 

 

                                                       

 

SpotUm - The LED Flashlight function on Trackums makes your pet visible in dark areas so others can see them, or to guide the way for them as they walk in a possibly unfamiliar area.

 

   

                                             

      

 

ChatUm - Two-Way Talk is a feature that, while your pet may not talk back, will allow you to speak to your pet and call them to come inside or just let them hear a familiar voice if they are out and lost.

The Deal

You can PreOrder Trackums now, before they are available for retail in September. For an introductory price of $120, you can have a Trackums before anyone else and enjoy the benefits that Trackums brings to you and your pets. That price includes 1-year of free service, as well. This is a limited time offer, so take advantage now!

 

 

 

How important is your pet to you in your life? Off the charts, right? That’s why we created Trackums. Knowing your pet is safe and secure is a “warm fuzzy” everyone loves to have.

Just use the Trackums Guardian App on your smartphone to access all of the Trackums features, and make this virtual safety tool a reality.   

                            

Peace of mind and the protection of your pets is invaluable, and Trackums is here to deliver that feeling of security for the safety of your fur babies.

 

   

Yes, it's cool. Are you surprised with a company that has a Chief Puppy and Kitty Officer?

                                                           

                                                          

     Pet Parents say... 

                             

  

“We wanted something that would make it easier to find our babies.” -- Rockelle; Frisco, TX  - Pet parent of Purcilla

   

  

“At Blue Jay we saw a huge need for something that is not only cool – but fashionable. Our pets have been known to dress up around here.” -- Bryant; Celina, TX - Pet parent of Weasel Fly Dog

 

“We are most excited to see how Trackums is going to revolutionize the way we track our pets. We're excited and believe in this product 100%!” -- Pookie & Shannon; Los Angeles, CA - Pet parents of social media superstars Nala_Cat, White Coffee Cat, Luna Rose and Spencer

 

$$ - Find out how to earn some extra money by referring Trackums to friends and having others sign up for this PreSell Launch Offer. Go to http://bluejaywireless.com/trackums/affiliates

 

Trackums was crafted to provide a fun, cool way to protect your pet and give you that sense of security for the four-legged members of your family. Trackums collar attachments will be available in several cool colors to show off your pet’s style.

Frequently Asked Questions

 

What is Trackums?     

 

A smart wireless wearable device made especially for your pet.

 

Can I use a Trackums on a cat?

 

YES!  You can track your whole squad: dogs, cats, bunnies, pigs and perhaps your pet rooster.

 

What if I have multiple pets?

 

Each pet can have a Trackums device. You will register each device in a single Trackums App.  One App to track the whole squad.

 

What does it do?

 

More like what doesn’t it do.

  • Have fun with real time photos from pet’s point of view with the camera feature.
  • Tell your pet it’s time to come back inside for dinner by using the interactive communication with two-way talk.
  • Never be in the dark with the built-in flashlight.
  • Always be in style with a virtual customizable tag.
  • Set up a geofencing perimeter to be alerted if your pet leaves the yard to chase a squirrel without your permission.
  • Ability for your neighbors to call you immediately via push to talk in the event they find your pet.
  • Always know where your pet is by accessing location information and displaying their position on a map on your App.

 

How does Trackums work?

 

Trackums utilizes cellular network technology to track and message your pet.

 

How do I set up Trackums?

 

Download the Trackums App from Google or the Apple store.

 

Is the Trackums App hard to set up?

 

No, it’s very easy to create your account and register your Trackums.  Our customer service department is also available to assist you.

 

Why do I need the Trackums App?

 

The App allows you to configure your emergency numbers in case your pet has been lost.

The App controls all the features of the Trackums, for example the camera, flashlight and virtual tag.

 

Can I share my App with my friends and family?

 

Yes! You can share access securely by sending an invite to family and friends.  They will have access to your pet’s location and they can even send a message.

 

How much does it cost?

 

Retail price is $199.99 plus monthly service fee.

Promotional price is $120 with a free year of service.

 

Where can we buy it?

 

www.bluejaywireless.com

 

What if I buy 1 Trackums and decide two days later I want to purchase 2 more for the discounted price?

 

Call customer service to process your additional devices and to ensure you receive the discount 888-99TRACK (888-998-7225).

 

Where can I use Trackums?

 

Continental United States
Exclusions: Alaska, Alabama, Chicago area

 

What cellular networks does Trackums use?

Trackums works on a variety of networks to provide national voice and data coverage excluding Alaska.

Do I need a data plan?

No. Our promotional price includes one full year of free service.

What colors to you offer?

We currently offer blue, pink, red, gold, and black.

What are the dimensions and weight?

Trackums is 52mm long x 37mm wide x 14mm tall and weighs about 1.26 ounces.  YES, it’s small enough for your cat!

Why is there a $9.99 service fee?

 

Administration fee.

 

Who do I call if I have a question?

 

Call our customer service department at 888-99TRACK (888-998-7225).

 

Can I send a question via email?

 

Yes, service@trackums.com

 

When will I receive my Trackums?

 

We anticipate shipments to begin in the first part of September.

 

How will I know when my Trackums has been mailed?

 

You will receive an email with your tracking number.

 

What is the refund policy?

During our pre-sale period prior to September 2017, you can request a refund prior to the shipment of the device.   Please allow 14 days for refund to be processed.  We will not be able to refund orders once we’ve shipped the device.

 

What is the battery life?

 

Expected battery life will last up to five days depending on user settings.  Beginning in September 2017, you can visit www.bluejaywireless.com for an option to purchase a cool new juice charger pack which can clip on Trackums and fully recharge the device three times.

 

Is the device water proof?

 

The device is water resistant and submersible in water up to a depth of 1 meter up to 30 minutes.

 

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Customer service: service@trackums.com

Media inquiries: media@trackums.com

Investor inquiries: partners@trackums.com

 

 

 

We love pets and we know you do too. We’ve designed Trackums for you not just to know where your pet is, but for you to always let them know that you’re nearby. Come join us, and Protect Your Squad!

                               

One more thing....

We've partnered with the Morris Animal Foundation in our commitment to ensuring that all squads out there are taken care of. 

If you love animals, you should get to know Morris Animal Foundation. They are global leaders in funding scientific studies that improve animal health and save lives. As the animals that share our planet and homes are increasingly afflicted by diseases both new and old, as entire species are threatened because of challenges to their health, their work has never been more important. Your giving to any of our offerings on Indiegogo will be helping to fund this amazing organization.

       What are you waiting for? 

                                                     Pick up your paw and PreOrder Now!

Yes, it's cool. Are you surprised with a company that has a Chief Puppy and Kitty Officer?
                                                           
                                                          







     Pet Parents say... 
                             
  
“We wanted something that would make it easier to find our babies.” -- Rockelle; Frisco, TX  - Pet parent of Purcilla
   
  
“At Blue Jay we saw a huge need for something that is not only cool – but fashionable. Our pets have been known to dress up around here.” -- Bryant; Celina, TX - Pet parent of Weasel Fly Dog
 
“We are most excited to see how Trackums is going to revolutionize the way we track our pets. We're excited and believe in this product 100%!” -- Pookie & Shannon; Los Angeles, CA - Pet parents of social media superstars Nala_Cat, White Coffee Cat, Luna Rose and Spencer
 
$$ - Find out how to earn some extra money by referring Trackums to friends and having others sign up for this PreSell Launch Offer. Go to http://bluejaywireless.com/trackums/affiliates

 
Trackums was crafted to provide a fun, cool way to protect your pet and give you that sense of security for the four-legged members of your family. Trackums collar attachments will be available in several cool colors to show off your pet’s style.
Frequently Asked Questions
 



What is Trackums?      
 


A smart wireless wearable device made especially for your pet.
 




Can I use a Trackums on a cat?
 


YES!  You can track your whole squad: dogs, cats, bunnies, pigs and perhaps your pet rooster.
 




What if I have multiple pets?
 


Each pet can have a Trackums device. You will register each device in a single Trackums App.  One App to track the whole squad.
 




What does it do?
 


More like what doesn’t it do.

Have fun with real time photos from pet’s point of view with the camera feature.
Tell your pet it’s time to come back inside for dinner by using the interactive communication with two-way talk.
Never be in the dark with the built-in flashlight.
Always be in style with a virtual customizable tag.
Set up a geofencing perimeter to be alerted if your pet leaves the yard to chase a squirrel without your permission.
Ability for your neighbors to call you immediately via push to talk in the event they find your pet.
Always know where your pet is by accessing location information and displaying their position on a map on your App.

 




How does Trackums work? 
 


Trackums utilizes cellular network technology to track and message your pet.
 




How do I set up Trackums? 
 


Download the Trackums App from Google or the Apple store.
 




Is the Trackums App hard to set up?
 


No, it’s very easy to create your account and register your Trackums.  Our customer service department is also available to assist you.
 




Why do I need the Trackums App? 
 


The App allows you to configure your emergency numbers in case your pet has been lost.
The App controls all the features of the Trackums, for example the camera, flashlight and virtual tag.
 




Can I share my App with my friends and family?
 


Yes! You can share access securely by sending an invite to family and friends.  They will have access to your pet’s location and they can even send a message.
 




How much does it cost? 
 


Retail price is $199.99 plus monthly service fee.
Promotional price is $120 with a free year of service.
 




Where can we buy it? 
 


www.bluejaywireless.com
 




What if I buy 1 Trackums and decide two days later I want to purchase 2 more for the discounted price?
 


Call customer service to process your additional devices and to ensure you receive the discount 888-99TRACK (888-998-7225).
 




Where can I use Trackums? 
 


Continental United StatesExclusions: Alaska, Alabama, Chicago area
 



What cellular networks does Trackums use?
Trackums works on a variety of networks to provide national voice and data coverage excluding Alaska.


Do I need a data plan?
No. Our promotional price includes one full year of free service.


What colors to you offer?
We currently offer blue, pink, red, gold, and black.


What are the dimensions and weight?
Trackums is 52mm long x 37mm wide x 14mm tall and weighs about 1.26 ounces.  YES, it’s small enough for your cat!



Why is there a $9.99 service fee? 
 


Administration fee.
 




Who do I call if I have a question? 
 


Call our customer service department at 888-99TRACK (888-998-7225).
 




Can I send a question via email?
 


Yes, service@trackums.com
 




When will I receive my Trackums?
 


We anticipate shipments to begin in the first part of September.
 




How will I know when my Trackums has been mailed?
 


You will receive an email with your tracking number.
 



What is the refund policy?

During our pre-sale period prior to September 2017, you can request a refund prior to the shipment of the device.   Please allow 14 days for refund to be processed.  We will not be able to refund orders once we’ve shipped the device.
 




What is the battery life?
 


Expected battery life will last up to five days depending on user settings.  Beginning in September 2017, you can visit www.bluejaywireless.com for an option to purchase a cool new juice charger pack which can clip on Trackums and fully recharge the device three times.
 




Is the device water proof?
 


The device is water resistant and submersible in water up to a depth of 1 meter up to 30 minutes.
 



If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Customer service: service@trackums.com
Media inquiries: media@trackums.com
Investor inquiries: partners@trackums.com
 



 
 
We love pets and we know you do too. We’ve designed Trackums for you not just to know where your pet is, but for you to always let them know that you’re nearby. Come join us, and Protect Your Squad!
                               One more thing....We've partnered with the Morris Animal Foundation in our commitment to ensuring that all squads out there are taken care of. If you love animals, you should get to know Morris Animal Foundation. They are global leaders in funding scientific studies that improve animal health and save lives. As the animals that share our planet and homes are increasingly afflicted by diseases both new and old, as entire species are threatened because of challenges to their health, their work has never been more important. Your giving to any of our offerings on Indiegogo will be helping to fund this amazing organization.       What are you waiting for?                                                      Pick up your paw and PreOrder Now!

story:
Hello and thank you for visiting!  My name is Susan Dalton and I am the co-founder and CEO of Our Jewelry Club.  OJC is a Colorado based woman owned business specializing in high fashion jewelry for a reasonable price.  Our membership allows women to expand their jewelry collection for work, play and even special occasions.  

I have been the COO of a B2B membership association since 2002, so when I went to LA with a friend of mine so she could buy wholesale jewelry for her boutique I had the idea of combining the two.  OJC is the perfect merge – combining great jewelry with the growing popularity of membership sales models.

With the help of family I opened the first Our Jewelry Club in 2010.  But my father was ill and I had to close OJC in order to take over his business in 2012 while still working full time (three jobs proved to be too many).  By that time I had countless loyal members however family always comes first.  

So when my best friend suggested reopening Our Jewelry Club with her by my side, I could not resist.  After a 20-year friendship I could not wait to work with her and combine our talents. She brings a great eye and creative mind.  We have built a basic site to get us started, but do not have the kind of money needed to promote and market the business, just our vision for what it can become.

We have spent some time away, so regaining our positioning in search engines and getting the word out that Our Jewelry Club is back and better will take time and resources.  We are hoping to raise funds to market OJC to the masses, because the more members we have the better discounts we can negotiate.  This is not to increase our profits, but to bring even better jewelry to our members.

This is where you come in.  We invite you to check out our web site, review our video about how it works and then join us on our journey.  We plan to use the money raise to promote Our Jewelry Club and take the website to the next level adding feature and making the process easier.

story:
Look at these products...

They look great, don't you think? Well, there is a dark side in the world of hand-knitted businesses you may not be aware of: Many companies that sell handmade alpaca wool products abuse the craftsmen and women who do them by paying them less than what they are really worth. As a consequence, they can never raise enough money to improve their lives standards or the ones of their children.

We created Tinkuy (Quechua word for 'together' and for 'meeting point') to try to do something about it. Our goal is to help Peruvian craftswomen's sell their valuable handmade works at realistic prices to a market that really values them. By reducing the number of middlemen to just one, artists make more profit for their work. As a matter of fact, they get the lion's share from each sell from our store.

In addition, we have reached an agreement with associations of women who are currently imprisoned. We are already selling their products too, motivating them this way to concentrate their time in producing something worth selling instead of thinking about commiting crimes once they get freedom.

At the moment, Tinkuy is starting with craftpersons in Junin, Peru. Yet our intention is to help all Peruvian artists sell their works fairly to the world in a reasonable short future.

Some other examples

 

Mate burilado. The technique involves engraving fine lines into a gourd with a scalpel called a "buril," creating a series of drawings that generally represent active scenes of farming life.

 

                   

Mirtha Huangal loves knitting. Every time she does it, she delivers a work of art, and she feels she is transmitting her passion.

 

Sweaters and clothing on Tinkuy are 100% hand knitted baby alpaca wool. Many of them are provided by the Association of Crafts Knitters of Jauja prison.

 

María Elena Cusi Puma is an expert weaver of blankets and quilts. She works both sheep and alpaca wool with a manual loom.

 

Her weaving students consider her the best teacher of loom in this beautiful project. She trains women in Hualhuas, Peru. Wool balls are made with a spinning wheel, "It is a long but productive process, I love it!"

 

Once the wool ball is complete, the straw is extracted and finally washed.

At Tinkuy.shop online store we will include a short description about each of them, so you can learn a bit more about who is behind each of them, who shared their art with you.  

We want this initiative to grow and involve more communities in our country. We want to turn the talent of Peruvians into income for their households, and break the vicious circle that makes many still think about Peru as a country with poverty.

Help us help! 

Tinkuy Team

Tinkuy was born as a social responsibility project, led by a group of university students. After visiting many communities away from their cities, they found a weird combination of low income and really fine skills in craftsmanship that have been taught from generation to generation.

Amanda Dolorier, loves the flowers and confesses that in most of her work we will find beautiful traditional flowers of Huancayo - Peru.

 

Maria and Daniel are planning to visit their mother and give her a big surprise, but Daniel forgot the drawing he had prepared for Mom.

They decided to create a marketing medium for the products created by women artisans and their apprentices, and realize that these could be sold without middlemen, and with a fair payment to artists.

Today Tinkuy has a basic online shop where you can buy handmade products; including household items, beautiful baby alpaca wool sweaters and handmade garments that you may find second to any other high-quality clothing in the world. All they need is someone seling them smartly.

 

When you acquire a product from Tinkuy, you take much more; dreams, shopping tradition and history. Take a little Peru to your home helping improve the living conditions of a craftsman.

As mentioned above, we have partnered with the Kniting Craftswomen Association of Jauja Prison in the city of Junin, Peru, who weave alpaca sweaters and accessories, helping these women to find a second chance to start the right path.

Tinkuy also believes that training programs are important for every individual, so we are planning to supplement our selling business with training programs in the future as well.

Tinkuy seeks to give special attention to helping the inmates confront the challenges they face when they return to the community.

 

All of the sweaters provided by Tinkuy's virtual store are 100% baby alpaca. Each of them has been made by women artisans from the Association of Knitters of Jauja Prison.

Help us help and get a nice Peruvian product in exchange

Contribute with $25 - Finest Alpaca Wool Teddy - There are four models to choose.

Finest Alpaca Wool Teddy - Design One

Teddy made of alpaca wool, the softest feeling you could feel throughout your life

Finest Alpaca Wool Teddy - Design Two

Finest Alpaca Wool Teddy - Design Three

Finest Alpaca Wool Teddy - Design Four

Contribute with $30 and get a stone sculpture. There are six models to choose:

Alpaca Sculpture

The alpacas inspire this beautiful handmade sculpture. This sculpture is of white color and additionally carries some adornments of beautiful colors in the back of this animal. This beautiful ornament is made of a native Peruvian stone rock.

Elephant Sculpture

Owl Decor

Elephant Decor

Rabbit Decor

Dolphin Statue

Tinkuy wants to expand this idea throughout Peru and invite craftsmen and women communities to join us to make more profit from their own work. Later, we hand to create training programs for those places that do not yet develop these techniques.

Contribute $199 and get THE finest 100% handknitted Baby Alpaca Wool Sweater you can ever buy (period!). There are five designs to choose.

Even before Inca times traditional knitting has been taught from father to son. Peruvian Andes settlers are renown for their skills in alpaca wool using the pedal loom, waist loom, crochet and knitting needles.

When you buy one of these products, you help to improve the quality of life of a Peruvian craftsman - and that is something worth doing.

Handwoven Sweater - Design One

Handwoven Sweater - Design Two

Handwoven Sweater - Design Three

Handwoven Sweater - Design Four

Handwoven Sweater - Design Five

 

Contribute $34 and get a refined 100% hand-knitted Baby Alpaca Wool Beanie or Chullo hats. There are six models to choose.

 

Classic Black Beanie Peru

The idea of a light and warm hat was made in the hands of Peruvian artisans.

Classic Brown Beanie

Classic Blue Beanie

Andes Hat

Orange Hat

Pompoms Hat

Contribute with $44 - Handmade handbags - There are four designs to choose.

Alpaca Handbag

Cuzco Handbag

Crochet Bag

Evening Bag

Contribute with $49 - Andean Decorative Pillow has two sides with different designs(colors)  - There are two models to choose.

Model One

Model Two

Contribute with $99 - Beautiful felt bags - There are three unique designs to choose.

Colorful Bag

Colorful Bag made with felt. Peruvian artisans evoke this happy field of flowers made entirely by handmade which contributes to the care of the environment.

Fashionable Bag

Flowers Bag

Contribute $499 and get exclusive alpaca coats made 100% with the finest Baby Alpaca wool. There are two designs to choose.

 

Baby Alpaca Elegant Long Coat

Coat Knitting Cardigan

Contribute with $299 - Unique Exclusive Hat - Two designs.

The talent of the artisans of Peru and the ancestral technique they embody in each of their pieces is the result of traditions that have remained unchanged for millennia. They revalue the great history and culture of the Incas. 

Dress Hat - Model One

Dress Hat - Model Two

Dress Hat - Model Three

Dress Hat - Model Four

Dress Hat - Model Five

Dress Hat - Model Six

Contribute with $20 - Decor Mask for him & for her - Two designs.

For Him

For Her

Contribute with $999 - Thick Blanket of 100% Finest Baby Alpaca Wool - Unique Design.

Challenges:

We look forward to empowering as many more rural communities as possible, to achieve this we must promote the crafts and reach more people who prefer Tinkuy products, since there will be more demand and will need to join to the project to more communities. 

Risks:

Not to can generate the necessary monetary resources for the sustainability of the Tinkuy project because our desire is to be able to help more artisans and communities of Peru.

We take care of the environment:  

Tinkuy has an organizational culture, in the workplace, that is respectful of the environment based on energy saving.  

Tinkuy's production policy is not based on large-scale production, as large companies do, but it is a production and a more personalized quality since the products are handmade, thus contributing to the care of the environment.  

The packaging used for the delivery of the product is 100% made of recycled paper, which guarantees the non-deforestation of the trees, in addition, the inks with which these bags are printed are water-based inks, harmless to living beings.

High quality in our products:

Tinkuy has policies to encourage master craftsmen to produce quality products.

To support the Tinkuy project you do not need to have money, you can help us sharing or divulging our purpose in social networks.

story:
Dorian House gathers the most remarkable independent designers and makers from all four corners of Europe.

We offer a balanced mix of business-casual clothing and accessories for men and women, natural beauty products and contemporary homeware.

We work closely with the workshops to ensure the use of high quality materials and traditional manufacturing skills, at competitive prices.

Bring the European lifestyle a little closer to you by purchasing one of our gift cards now!

We are currently running a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo to raise additional funds to support the marketplace launch. You can help us reach our goal by purchasing a gift card now, to spend on the online marketplace when it opens, on the 1st of November 2018.

The marketplace is available for shipping to the United States, Canada, Australia, United Kingdom and mainland Europe. Visit our FAQs page to know more about the gift card benefits.

One of the best ways to get a taste of the European lifestyle is by ordering one of our Taste of Europe monthly subscription boxes.

Each month, we put together a carefully-curated selection of the most coveted products from a selected European country.

From fashion to beauty to homeware, each box offers you the chance to discover new brands and acquire hard-to-find products, at a discounted price.

We offer a range of subscription plans for both, men and women.

Italian subscription box for him - 100% cotton slim fitted jeans (from Rome). Full grain leather belt (from Milan). 100% silk handmade handkerchief (from Como). Stainless steel 3 piece shaving set with natural hair brush (from Lucca).

British subscription box for her - 100% Scottish Merino wool sweater (from Edinburgh). Wool felt hat with leather belt and Mandarin feather pin (from London). Natural aloe-vera moisturising serum (from Lake District). 100% natural bamboo set of salt and spice box (from Oxfordshire).

Austrian subscription box for him - Wool felt hat with skinny leather belt (from Tirol). Silver plated round glasses frame (from Vienna). Merino Wool scarf with horizontal stripes (from Carinthia). Real red-brown leather handmade lace-up boots (from Salzburg).

(*) All subscription boxes shown above are for illustration purposes only. Actual box contents will vary between European country, month, gender and style preferences.

Upon subscription, you will be asked to fill in an online form to tailor the box to your sizing and style preferences.

We are currently running a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo to raise additional funds to support the marketplace launch. You can help us reach our goal by purchasing a gift card now, to spend on the online marketplace when it opens, on the 1st of November 2018.

The marketplace is available for shipping to the United States, Canada, Australia, United Kingdom and mainland Europe. Flat shipping cost applied at checkout. Subscription processed as a single payment. Visit our FAQs page to know more about the subscription benefits.

At Dorian House, we are working to reinvent your online shopping experience with Alfie, our Artificial Intelligence (AI) powered engine, always running in the background, to learn all about you and the way you like to shop online.

Alfie closely follows and interprets any decisions and patterns you display when looking at a product or making a purchase.

It uses complex algorithms to create a unique profile of you and your style, learning from more than 100 physical and psychological features, to provide you with a fully personalised online shopping experience, tailored with style suggestions and professional advice.

Just like having your very own personal stylist!

Listen to the inspiring stories behind our designers' and makers' work-life and take a sneaky look inside their workshops.

Enjoy browsing through a collection of articles related to the marketplace, its designers and makers and their fascinating products.

Every week we add great new articles, so make sure to sign up to our newsletter to receive the latest articles directly into your inbox.

Most of the features described below will be available once the marketplace opens, on the 1st of November 2018.

Premium membership

Some gift cards and subscription plans offer you the possibility to become a premium member for free. Premium members will have exclusive or early access to some products, offers and events featured in the marketplace. Premium members will also get priority delivery options or shipping costs discounts on selected products.

Loyalty points

Loyalty points can be exchanged in the marketplace for special discounts on certain products or shipping options. We also release products in the marketplace that can only be purchased using loyalty points. The value of loyalty points could vary between products.

Extra gift items

Some gift cards and subscription plans come with an extra gift item. Items are hand-picked by our team of experts and are tailored to you based on your gender, age range, interests and style preferences.

Subscription plans

You can purchase a Taste of Europe subscription plan through Indiegogo at a discounted price and with additional benefits, before the crowdfunding campaign finishes on the 20th of June 2018. Afterwards, standard prices apply.

You will receive a Taste of Europe box at the beginning of every month, starting from the 15th of August 2018. The number of boxes you receive will depend on the plan purchased.

At the moment, it is only possible to process a subscription plan as a single payment due to platform restrictions in regards recurrent payments. Once the marketplace opens up on the 1st of November 2018, you will be able to pay for a Taste of Europe subscription plan as an ongoing monthly service.

Subscription boxes

The contents of the Taste of Europe box vary between months, based on the selected country for that particular month, your gender, age range and style preferences.

Although the contents vary, it will usually contain the following products:

  • 1 main clothing item
  • 1 fashion accessory or homeware
  • 1 large size or 2 small size beauty products
  • Local food or ingredients

Upon subscription, you will receive an online form to fill in, so our team of experts can work out the best products for you.

For any questions you may have, do not hesitate to contact us.
story_txt:
Dorian House gathers the most remarkable independent designers and makers from all four corners of Europe.

We offer a balanced mix of business-casual clothing and accessories for men and women, natural beauty products and contemporary homeware.
We work closely with the workshops to ensure the use of high quality materials and traditional manufacturing skills, at competitive prices.

Bring the European lifestyle a little closer to you by purchasing one of our gift cards now!


We are currently running a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo to raise additional funds to support the marketplace launch. You can help us reach our goal by purchasing a gift card now, to spend on the online marketplace when it opens, on the 1st of November 2018.


The marketplace is available for shipping to the United States, Canada, Australia, United Kingdom and mainland Europe. Visit our FAQs page to know more about the gift card benefits.


One of the best ways to get a taste of the European lifestyle is by ordering one of our Taste of Europe monthly subscription boxes.
Each month, we put together a carefully-curated selection of the most coveted products from a selected European country.
From fashion to beauty to homeware, each box offers you the chance to discover new brands and acquire hard-to-find products, at a discounted price.
We offer a range of subscription plans for both, men and women.



Italian subscription box for him - 100% cotton slim fitted jeans (from Rome). Full grain leather belt (from Milan). 100% silk handmade handkerchief (from Como). Stainless steel 3 piece shaving set with natural hair brush (from Lucca).




British subscription box for her - 100% Scottish Merino wool sweater (from Edinburgh). Wool felt hat with leather belt and Mandarin feather pin (from London). Natural aloe-vera moisturising serum (from Lake District). 100% natural bamboo set of salt and spice box (from Oxfordshire).




Austrian subscription box for him - Wool felt hat with skinny leather belt (from Tirol). Silver plated round glasses frame (from Vienna). Merino Wool scarf with horizontal stripes (from Carinthia). Real red-brown leather handmade lace-up boots (from Salzburg).

(*) All subscription boxes shown above are for illustration purposes only. Actual box contents will vary between European country, month, gender and style preferences.
Upon subscription, you will be asked to fill in an online form to tailor the box to your sizing and style preferences.

story:
Starting out from Nepal, growing out to the world, posed a seemingly insurmountable challenge for us. Almost a mountain like. We chose to be inspired by it, than to succumb to it. As the upshot, we created our AMA DABLAM collection - a namesake for a mountain with the most aesthetic climbing route in the world.

The ascents, the descents and quirky twin-headed peaks with crevasses creating dramatic accents inspired the clean chamfers on the frontal face of our designs. The bold, unapologetic design attempts to resemble the striking grandeur of Mt. AMA DABLAM overshooting the sky.

All in all, amalgamation of our ethos to create impact beyond ourselves and boundaries & the challenge to grow beyond territories posed at us defined our AMA DABLAM collection. And here, we present it to you.

 

 

 

 

Ama Dablam Series is a reflection of our extensive efforts towards creating that perfect combination of protection, comfort and style. Our team in Nepal spent the last year brainstorming on the best possible designs.

Getting it RIGHT is important to us. All our designs go through diligent prototyping starting out with minimal cardboard cut-out, then to 3D printed designs & finally moving on to sampling table.

Colors and patterns speak volumes. We understand that at Anthropose. Every design undergoes a lot of variation sampling before it hits the production line.

 

 

 

MEASUREMENTS

 

 

 

MEASUREMENTS

 

Our story began in 2014 with an aim to create a brand where we all can give back to the society. We believed in the power of unity and were sure that when you and we come together we can change things towards progress. With that belief we introduced our first line-up of eyewear as a means to offer a solution to the deep rooted problem of cataracts in rural Nepal. 

As of December 2017, we have been able to restore eyesight of 186 people in rural Nepal.

Get the full report here. 

Starting November, 2018 we will be funding our first remedial courses for the struggling public school students in rural Nepal. The remedial courses help by strengthening the fundamentals of the lowest-performing students leading to an increased interest in learning, and the confidence needed to continue and complete an education.

Check the website here to know how you help them directly via our giving partners.

 

Help us reach out to more like-minded people like yourself

 

 

Hear what out partners have to say.

Dr. Sanduk Ruit

 

Changing Stories Nepal

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Over the past four years, we have built up our supply chain to successfully fulfill thousands of quality sunglasses. Our partnership with major logistics companies has always ensured timely delivery. Fulfilling orders worldwide to countries with varying custom procedures may affect the duration of delivery depending on the country. However, with our experienced logistics partner, we assure you the delivery of your pair of Anthropose to you.

In case of any unforeseen delays, we will notify you at the earliest and resolve the matter to your satisfaction.

We are only a chat away on our website www.intl.anthropose.com if you may have any further queries. Alternatively, you can also write to us at caredesk@intl.anthropose.com.

 

 

 

 

Find yourself a perfect pair!

 

Help us get one more step closer to our goal.

_____________________________________________________________________________________

 

 

Thank you for staying with us until the end!

Team Anthropose.

story:
www.Asorockwatches.com

THANKS FOR THE SUPPORT <3

Quick Update: 

Get the Asorock Speedracer series delivered in march by selecting perk 1 or perk 3 as we currently have Limited Quantities of the Speedracer series in stock and ready to be shipped to backers who select Perk 1 or Perk 3 .  When this batch runs out, all other pre-orders of the Speedracer will be shipped in May- June as planned. 

 

 

 

Here at ASOROCK Watches, a name influenced by the breath-taking mountains in Central Nigeria, our love and affection for watches, created a desire in us, to make a positive long-lasting impact on the African continent by representing her in the luxury watch market of the world.

Being avid watch enthusiasts ourselves, we were fed up with our limited choices due to the inflated high mark up prices of popular name brands. It also didn't help that we always felt like our collection was never complete (a problem all true watch enthusiasts can relate to). It bothered us even more that we didn't have a single watch from an African source where we have our roots. All these led to the creation of the ASOROCK range of watches. 

Primarily, we believe that through the sales of our fantastically made watches we will raise the funds needed to realize our deep dreams of building libraries with computers equipped with Wifi and learning software in various villages in Africa. 

We also foresee the massive amounts of employment our brand will offer from; library keepers to tech-savvy millennials worldwide who want to promote and be an influencer for us, and also down to our photographers and design team that will grow as we grow and produce better designs than we have now. These factors further led us to the creation of ASOROCK. 

That's why ASOROCK Watches is truly more than just another watch company,  not only are we more of a charity at heart by using the sales of our awesome watches as leverage to achieve our core aims of helping empower the youths in our motherland and continent, but we are also seeking to create jobs. 

 

We have spent the last year and a half meeting with designers, factories and industry experts to come up with an affordable, stylish looking watch collection that we know everyone will love.

When designing our watches, we did not hold back on quality. We made sure of 4 prospects that differentiate us:

 1) We offer various multiple models of watches under each watch type.

2) All of our watches are made with the finest quality of materials. (staying true to our principles "if you are going to do something, do it right") 

3) We offer our watches at a price less than half of what our competitors charge for watches of the same category.

4) Purchase of any AsoRock watch, does more than just get you compliments, it also goes towards helping to create a better foundation for the youths in Africa. 

THE MONOLITH SERIES  

 

THE SPEEDRACER (Below)

 

For our first releases, we are offering 2 series with 7 models to choose from 

The "Monolith" Collection:  Available in 5 variations, all with interchangeable bands to give you more versatility in your style selection.

 

Below - The "Speedracer" Collection: Available in two variations (All Black and RoseGold/Black)

 

ASOROCK WATCHES IS ALSO BACKED WITH A WARRANTY!

We are very confident in the quality and durability of our watches that If something were to happen within the first two (2) years, we hope you will send it back to us for replacement. 

WARRANTY DOES NOT COVER:

  • The battery life
  • Wear and tear (scratches etc)

  • Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.) 

 

In the near future, we hope to have a wider range of different types and styles of watches that will always remain affordable. Pictures of some of our future renderings are on the last page. We plan to unveil our stylish, feminine range of watches shortly.

By December 2019, we plan to lay the foundation of our first Youth Complex in a village in Nigeria. When completed, the Complex will have a library fitted with computers equipped with Wifi and free learning software and sports amenities (such as a basketball court) for the youngsters to discover their talents. 

To show appreciation to our backers, their names will be engraved on a Pillar in the middle of the Youth Complex upon which we shall fly the Indiegogo flag. 

We also have long-term plans of diversifying into other fashion accessories such as Sunglasses, Belts, Bracelets/Rings etc. Needless to say, we are here for the long-term and plan to take "AsoRock Watches" and its subsidiaries such as "AsoRock Sunglasses" to the level of a globally recognized brand someday, with your support, of course.

So why not join with us on this fun and exciting journey and be a part of it every step of the way. We will send out several updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information.  We want to create a bond, and synergy with our backers because ultimately you are the ones turning our dream into a reality and we appreciate you from the bottom of our hearts.  We are excited to grow and anxious to see what the future has in store for us.

 

To be a success we have made highly precise calculated estimations and came to a figure:

We need a minimum of $15,000 in funding to be able to mass produce our first two collections and ship out orders, as well as to cover advertisement costs and other operating expenses. And, laying the foundation on the youth complex. 

 

To your right, you will see some perks : 

1) Pledge $59  and receive one of the Speedracers (retailing for $110)

2) Pledge $69 and receive any of the five (5) Monolith watches donate 

3) Pledge $110 and receive all two (2) of the Speedracers (retailing for $220) . 

4) Pledge $130 and receive 2 of the Monolith (retailing for $240)

5) Pledge $340 and receive all 5 of the Monolith collection (retailing $600)

All names of backers/Pre-orderers will be engraved on a monumental pillar in the middle of the library complex we plan to build in a village in Nigeria by December 2019 regardless of the amount donated 

 

If we don't reach our 15k goal, we will use any funds raised to produce the bulk for the watch and possibly launch only one collection first instead of two; we won't let not reaching our monetary goal stop us!! A child in Africa who doesn't know we exist is depending on us to succeed.

 

Started by young entrepreneurs and watch enthusiasts Ben Iroala (Nigerian American), and Andrew Mutale (Zambian American) who sought to cut out the high retail markup of popular name brands. We have been obsessed with watches our entire life and got fed up paying for overpriced name brand watches that only cost a fraction of the price to produce. 

We share the same vision and hope to one day become successful entrepreneurs who will eventually build multiple libraries, free hospitals, free education and many more for our people.

However, we know we need funds to make those dreams of uplifting our homeland a reality. So in the summer of 2017 we assembled a team of other like-minded individuals including the young, highly creative Maclaine Morris to create a fantastically made watch that we can sell and use part of the profit to achieve the ultimate dream of contributing significantly to changing Africa.

1)Founder: Ben Iroala 

2)Co-Founder/CFO: Andrew Mutale: 

3)COO: Maclaine Morris  

4)Marketing Director: Joel Mutsinzi 

5)Graphic Designer: Alicia McCartney 

 

 

Case Material:  316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 43 mm
Bezel Width: 2.5 mm
Band Material: Interchangeable Genuine Leather Straps 
Band Width: 24 mm
Clasp: Pushbutton Deployment Clasp
Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Dial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal Coated Anti-Scratch Resistant  Glass
Display: Analog
Movement: Japanese Miyota 
Date Function: Yes

Water Resistant: 5 ATM

 

 

Case Material:  316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 45 mm
Bezel Width: 2.5 mm
Band Material: Rubber 
Band Width: 24 mm
Clasp: Pushbutton Deployment Clasp
Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Dial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal Coated Anti-Scratch Resistant  Glass
Display: Chronograph 
Movement: Japanese Miyota 
Date Function: Yes

Water Resistant: 5 ATM

 

 

PROJECT TIMELINE 

Now we're here on IndieGogo, with two fully functional prototypes that look absolutely stunning. We just need one more thing... your support to mass produce them for the world.

 

ASOROCK brand is more than just a company. We aim to achieve 6 things:

1)  Put Africa on the spotlight as a continent whose entrepreneurs are capable of creating affordable brands of quality luxury products.

2) ) We want everybody to diversify their watch collection by adding a watch that stands for something.

3) Introduce more millennials to the awesomeness of horology and watches. 

4) Disrupt the watch industry by proving that making and buying a luxuriously made watch does not have to break the bank. 

5) Creation of jobs for millennials. As we grow so will our diverse team of designers, accountants and independent "gig" employees such as social influencers and photographers.

6) Be an example to African youths/start-ups: that we can be a part of this world and its fashion scene while giving back directly to the community with free schools and learning/sports centers in Nigeria and with time, Africa as a whole.

Your contribution will make all these a reality and you can be proud you were part of the water that made the AsoRock seed grow. 

 

We've modified the initial prototype, finalized our design, purchased the molds and selected a manufacturer that has a great reputation in the industry.  Once Indiegogo campaign ends, Our team will then ship the orders to the backers of perk 1 (the Speedracer) who will receive the watches within 15days. All other backers will receive their watches approximately 1-2 months after the campaign ends. We have experience with shipping from our E-commerce background which should make for a very smooth process. 

 

 

We Need Your Support!

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome watches, but also sharing the story with a friend. The important thing to remember with IndieGogo is if we don't reach our full funding goal...we get nothing. 

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top ^ of the page, right below the video.

 

IT IS AFRICA'S TIME TO SHINE 

From all of us here at Asorock Watches, thanks for helping us kickstart this project and dream.

Risks & Challenges

The challenges of AsoRock Watches will be spreading the word out, and convincing IndieGoGo to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

Once the funding is in place, our next step will be producing on a large scale.  we have been dealing with a trusted manufacturer for the last several months of whom we have much confidence in, to be able to deliver promptly on our demands. 

Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ

SOME YOUTUBE REVIEW VIDEOS From critically acclaimed youtube luxury watch reviewers: 

 

 

 

  
 
 

FUTURE COLLECTIONS TO COME

 

 

 

The "Villa" Series: Projected release: December 2019

We need a minimum of $15,000 in funding to be able to mass produce our first two collections and ship out orders, as well as to cover advertisement costs and other operating expenses. And, laying the foundation on the youth complex. 
 


To your right, you will see some perks : 
1) Pledge $59  and receive one of the Speedracers (retailing for $110)
2) Pledge $69 and receive any of the five (5) Monolith watches donate 
3) Pledge $110 and receive all two (2) of the Speedracers (retailing for $220) . 
4) Pledge $130 and receive 2 of the Monolith (retailing for $240)
5) Pledge $340 and receive all 5 of the Monolith collection (retailing $600)
All names of backers/Pre-orderers will be engraved on a monumental pillar in the middle of the library complex we plan to build in a village in Nigeria by December 2019 regardless of the amount donated 

 

If we don't reach our 15k goal, we will use any funds raised to produce the bulk for the watch and possibly launch only one collection first instead of two; we won't let not reaching our monetary goal stop us!! A child in Africa who doesn't know we exist is depending on us to succeed.
 

Started by young entrepreneurs and watch enthusiasts Ben Iroala (Nigerian American), and Andrew Mutale (Zambian American) who sought to cut out the high retail markup of popular name brands. We have been obsessed with watches our entire life and got fed up paying for overpriced name brand watches that only cost a fraction of the price to produce. 
We share the same vision and hope to one day become successful entrepreneurs who will eventually build multiple libraries, free hospitals, free education and many more for our people.
However, we know we need funds to make those dreams of uplifting our homeland a reality. So in the summer of 2017 we assembled a team of other like-minded individuals including the young, highly creative Maclaine Morris to create a fantastically made watch that we can sell and use part of the profit to achieve the ultimate dream of contributing significantly to changing Africa.
1)Founder: Ben Iroala 
2)Co-Founder/CFO: Andrew Mutale: 
3)COO: Maclaine Morris  
4)Marketing Director: Joel Mutsinzi 
5)Graphic Designer: Alicia McCartney 
 
 



Case Material:  316L Carbon Stainless SteelCase Diameter: 43 mmBezel Width: 2.5 mmBand Material: Interchangeable Genuine Leather Straps Band Width: 24 mmClasp: Pushbutton Deployment ClaspClasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless SteelDial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal Coated Anti-Scratch Resistant  GlassDisplay: AnalogMovement: Japanese Miyota Date Function: Yes
Water Resistant: 5 ATM

 

 

Case Material:  316L Carbon Stainless SteelCase Diameter: 45 mmBezel Width: 2.5 mmBand Material: Rubber Band Width: 24 mmClasp: Pushbutton Deployment ClaspClasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless SteelDial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal Coated Anti-Scratch Resistant  GlassDisplay: Chronograph Movement: Japanese Miyota Date Function: Yes
Water Resistant: 5 ATM


 
 


PROJECT TIMELINE 


Now we're here on IndieGogo, with two fully functional prototypes that look absolutely stunning. We just need one more thing... your support to mass produce them for the world.
 


ASOROCK brand is more than just a company. We aim to achieve 6 things:
1)  Put Africa on the spotlight as a continent whose entrepreneurs are capable of creating affordable brands of quality luxury products.
2) ) We want everybody to diversify their watch collection by adding a watch that stands for something.
3) Introduce more millennials to the awesomeness of horology and watches. 
4) Disrupt the watch industry by proving that making and buying a luxuriously made watch does not have to break the bank. 
5) Creation of jobs for millennials. As we grow so will our diverse team of designers, accountants and independent "gig" employees such as social influencers and photographers.
6) Be an example to African youths/start-ups: that we can be a part of this world and its fashion scene while giving back directly to the community with free schools and learning/sports centers in Nigeria and with time, Africa as a whole.
Your contribution will make all these a reality and you can be proud you were part of the water that made the AsoRock seed grow. 
 
We've modified the initial prototype, finalized our design, purchased the molds and selected a manufacturer that has a great reputation in the industry.  Once Indiegogo campaign ends, Our team will then ship the orders to the backers of perk 1 (the Speedracer) who will receive the watches within 15days. All other backers will receive their watches approximately 1-2 months after the campaign ends. We have experience with shipping from our E-commerce background which should make for a very smooth process. 
 

 
We Need Your Support!

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome watches, but also sharing the story with a friend. The important thing to remember with IndieGogo is if we don't reach our full funding goal...we get nothing. 
We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top ^ of the page, right below the video.

 
IT IS AFRICA'S TIME TO SHINE 
From all of us here at Asorock Watches, thanks for helping us kickstart this project and dream.



Risks & Challenges
The challenges of AsoRock Watches will be spreading the word out, and convincing IndieGoGo to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.
Once the funding is in place, our next step will be producing on a large scale.  we have been dealing with a trusted manufacturer for the last several months of whom we have much confidence in, to be able to deliver promptly on our demands. 
Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ
SOME YOUTUBE REVIEW VIDEOS From critically acclaimed youtube luxury watch reviewers: 

 


 


 

  

 
 
FUTURE COLLECTIONS TO COME

 

 
 
The "Villa" Series: Projected release: December 2019

story:
Fast wallets for men have been around for years, but never have the needs of women been considered in their marketing. That’s why we developed AQUS:  offering all the utility of a fast wallet without loss of aesthetics.

AQUS is designed to meet the needs that women have when it comes to carrying their documents, money and cell phone. It’s the first “speed wallet” for women;  elegant, practical and safe.  And its detachable mini permits ease of use when a large wallet is simply not feasible.

Years of effort have yielded a high quality product which  transcends the barrier of conventional  women's accessories. AQUS is the gateway to a wide variety of products designed to make women’s lives easier  every day.

 

 

 

Aqus responds to a real consumer need:  women deserve a wallet that adapts  quickly and easily to their everyday lives.   I saw  how my wife constantly struggled to re-organize what stayed and went when she needed to leave the house with her hands free.  That struggle was the inspiration for  the first speed wallet for women that offers security and agility. 

 

Our extensive experience in the leather goods market and the customer satisfaction that we have seen locally give us total confidence in our global launch.  Our quality control and vendor management support our ability to promise delivery within a maximum of two months upon receipt of your order.

In Aqus we want to revolutionize the world of accessories by making them practical, efficient, durable and above all with a lot of design.

We have many ideas ready to be produced, this is the front door to be able to continue giving our customers many options of practical accessories.

 

 

 

Please Share This Project

Know someone who will love this project?

story:
Short Summary

  • Two young women on the brink of graduating college with their degrees in Finance partnered in January of 2019 with a concept - to create a brand of contemporary and stylish clothing for both modest Muslim and Orthodox Jewish women.
  • We teamed up with the Susquehanna Township - School of Fashion, where the talented students listened to our pitch and created their own designs based on the ideals of modest fashion. We had the pleasure of working with their mentor, a boutique clothing designer, Richard Andries.
    • The design and prototype creation was a collaborative process among all of the fashion students. The head designers of AMAL's Introductory Collection are: Lemede Magil, Pamela Martinez, Laelani Porter, Lenysha Howze, and Shylin Clark.

What We Need & What You Get

  • AMAL is currently only in the prototype stage, where the first line of garments has been designed and created, but we are in need of funding in order to mass produce and get our actual E-commerce website running. 
  • We are in the midst of registering for business competitions and finding investors for our small business, as well as opening this campaign for contributors to help us out on our mission.
  • Through the fundraiser, we will be accepting donations and selling merchandise.  These items are branded AMAL merchandise including shirts, hats, sweaters, and accessories.  We hope the money generated from these sales will help us be able to start manufacturing our fashion clothing line.
  • We estimate a flexible goal of $10,000 for this campaign to be reached within 60 days.

The Impact

  • Orthodox Jewish and Muslim women are unlikely counterparts due to political disagreements. In a time where fashion revolves around sex appeal, it can be quite difficult for religious women to find clothing that both interests them and suits their ideals. However, we have recognized that Orthodox Jewish and Muslim women face similar struggles regarding religious appearance customs. 
  • As a future goal when AMAL is established and revenue-building, we hope to donate 5% of revenue to related peace-driven causes.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't contribute a monetary amount, your word means just as much! Please share our campaign to your friends and family!
story_txt:
Short Summary

Two young women on the brink of graduating college with their degrees in Finance partnered in January of 2019 with a concept - to create a brand of contemporary and stylish clothing for both modest Muslim and Orthodox Jewish women.
We teamed up with the Susquehanna Township - School of Fashion, where the talented students listened to our pitch and created their own designs based on the ideals of modest fashion. We had the pleasure of working with their mentor, a boutique clothing designer, Richard Andries.The design and prototype creation was a collaborative process among all of the fashion students. The head designers of AMAL's Introductory Collection are: Lemede Magil, Pamela Martinez, Laelani Porter, Lenysha Howze, and Shylin Clark.




What We Need & What You Get

AMAL is currently only in the prototype stage, where the first line of garments has been designed and created, but we are in need of funding in order to mass produce and get our actual E-commerce website running. 
We are in the midst of registering for business competitions and finding investors for our small business, as well as opening this campaign for contributors to help us out on our mission.
Through the fundraiser, we will be accepting donations and selling merchandise.  These items are branded AMAL merchandise including shirts, hats, sweaters, and accessories.  We hope the money generated from these sales will help us be able to start manufacturing our fashion clothing line.
We estimate a flexible goal of $10,000 for this campaign to be reached within 60 days.


The Impact

Orthodox Jewish and Muslim women are unlikely counterparts due to political disagreements. In a time where fashion revolves around sex appeal, it can be quite difficult for religious women to find clothing that both interests them and suits their ideals. However, we have recognized that Orthodox Jewish and Muslim women face similar struggles regarding religious appearance customs. 
As a future goal when AMAL is established and revenue-building, we hope to donate 5% of revenue to related peace-driven causes.


Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute a monetary amount, your word means just as much! Please share our campaign to your friends and family!

story:
E-Glasses is The world's first instant dimming sunglasses with LCD film technology and TR90 Titanium plastic made from master-craftsmen in Japan. A built-in light sensor and liquid crystal technology, it senses the brightness and automatically adjusts the visibility of the lens at 0.1 seconds, No hassle, No trouble. The light sensor is made from a solar panel so it does not need batteries for any power. With Liquid film technology, it also adds polarization function to reduce glare, reflections and provide a 99% UV cut rate to protect your eyes from Ultraviolet rays.

E-Glasses have been developed and will be produced by one of the highest-rated manufacturers in the world (Japan), and are certified with all the quality standards in eye protection, as well as all the following regulations that are requested in order to sell all over the world.

The E-glasses is inspired through a number of different modern sunglasses that are modern, sexy, and stylish to complement almost any outfit or clothing. The E-glasses are trendy, techy, and fun with medium lenses that add a touch of mystery and excitement to your look.

Ultra-lightweight material that is extremely tough and flexible at the same time.

 

 

 

 

  • The real challenge begins now, both failure and success are in the hands of our backers. 
  • There may be a delay due to production conditions, weather, and delivery. 
  • If the number of support exceeds the expectation, the shipping time may be delayed due to the manufacturing process 
  • If there is a change in the content described on the project page, we will notify you as soon as possible. Please check our page regularly for an update.
  • We cannot accept cancellations, refunds, or returns after the project ended. 
  • We are ready to face everything that comes our way with enthusiasm and dedication. We are going to focus all of our energy into making this experience amazing for each one of our backers.
  • All of our team members will work with all of their hearts. We will try as hard as we can to make it on time.
  • To everyone who has supported the E-Glasses, Thank you.
