story:
The JUST5 Jacket is designed to seamlessly (and stylishly) integrate into your existing wardrobe to provide you with extra protection.

Treated with award-winning HEIQ V-Block, JUST5 is designed to give you the confidence you need to tackle the day whether you're on your way to the supermarket or around the world.

The JUST5 Jacket features:

  • Stylish fit
  • Men, Women, and Children's sizes
  • Easy to use handguard
  • Hood and transparent visor to use as a face covering
  • A HEIQ V-Block barrier against contaminants

 

 

 

 

Our award-winning HeiQ V-Block coats our jacket fabric, zippers, hand, and face shields to give the jacket an extra layer of protection against contaminants that may be lurking in train stations, airports, at the supermarket, and anywhere else where you might go.

Gentle enough to come in contact with your skin, but tough on microorganisms and other potentially dangerous elements, HeiQ V-Block effectively inhibits the growth and persistence of these invisible impurities that use textiles as a hosting surface. The jacket itself is dubbed the “JUST5” Jacket because it takes a HeiQ V-Block treated surface only up to 5 minutes to eliminate.

 

 
HEIQ V-Block is not only trusted by brands like Serta Simmons Bedding, Kenneth Cole, and Cornelia James, but now Gold's Gym has joined the HEIQ family. In partnership with Escape Fitness, the HeiQ V-block Ecosystem will be implemented in individual gyms, as they are scheduled to reopen across California in the coming months. Because HEIQ V-Block is a bio-based, non-toxic, and non-allergenic antimicrobial surface protection spray, it's a perfect fit for gyms and other spaces that are frequently used. 

 

All parts of the JUST5 Jacket are treated with HeiQ V-Block - the ultimate fabric protection from microorganisms and other nasties.



 


 

Built with Italian style and design, the JUST5 Jacket is more than just functional, but has an everyday urban design that’s easily integrated into any wardrobe. It’s also adjustable at the hood and the waist for the perfect fit. Made for travel, the JUST5 has a built-in travel pouch that the jacket collapses into for easy, compact portability.

 

 

The JUST5 is also made of WINDTEX, a water-repellent, and breathable premium layered fabric, the JUST5 Jacket is seam taped to guarantee that it’s waterproof. Because it also has thermo-regulating technology, the fabric maintains the heat of the body so the wearer is always comfortable - not too hot, not too cold - just the right balance. It’s the perfect length for fuller coverage and is durable for colder weather when worn over warmer clothing. 

 

Featuring a simple, but innovative design, the hand shields are not just a cuff or glove, but an extendable elastic cuff made with an internal, reversed pocket.  Easy to slip over your hand, you can feel confident when you need to grip a pole on the subway, hold the railing of an escalator, or press an elevator button - and then slip them off once you’re done.

 

Comfortable to wear for children and adults alike, you can still use your smartphone, tablet, or iPad screens thanks to the special warp-knitted fabric. And, of course, it’s all coated with HeiQ V-Block for added protection for all the nasty, invisible things that we unconsciously touch during the day.

 

Because the zippers to your coat and pockets are places that you might touch over and over again, we’ve made sure to coat it in HeiQ V-Block as well for even more shielding from nasty things. Developed by 2A-NYGUARD the famed first Italian zipper manufacturer in Europe’s history, our zippers are made to last.

The hood is designed to fit any head and is easily adjustable using the rear tie rods. The clear visor is transparent so as to offer protection, while not obstructing your view.

 

We’ve even included a special glasses-cleaning cloth coated in HeiQ V-Block. Glasses and screens get smudged and we want to make sure that none of the contaminants that might inhabit them transfer and stay on the cloth. 

 

 


If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the jacket should fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your jacket for any reason, we’ll happily do that but you’ll have to pay for shipping both ways. Because we are offering our jackets at highly discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns. Please make sure the items are unworn and unwashed. Also, all items must be in the condition you received them in with all hang tags still attached. We accept exchanges up to 30 days after you receive the jacket.

Antimicrobial properties are built into the product. This product does not guarantee to protect you against human pathogens including bacteria, germs or other organisms. We encourage you to follow CDC guidelines. Please check their website for prevention tips. We also highly encourage you to keep the jacket clean.

JUST5 is an initiative by 5 leading material manufacturers and it is the result of the synergic combination of Swiss technology with Italian textile craftsmanship, design, and creativity.

story:
Have you ever caught yourself buying a cheap umbrella thinking that it will break or get lost eventually and so there is no point investing in its quality? Or maybe you bought the one, then only just to leave it on a bus or in a restaurant? 

           Baobab brolly is a modern response to everything that is wrong with the current market offerings. Featuring loss prevention system & based on a modular system (letting you swap just the part you’re not happy with, as opposed to having to discard the whole brolly), it’s a sustainable solution for the world where everything else is smart.

 

Only the handles and straps can be customized for this release.

 

 

Unlike any other umbrella in the world, we have embedded loss alert smart technology into the handle which is connected to an app on your smartphone. No more worrying about which restaurant you left your umbrella at - you will not lose another umbrella because we made it that way.  

bbb.B’s smart handle features loss prevention system which will go off when the distance between your mobile and your brolly is greater than 15 steps. It will also let you locate your brolly on the map, thanks to the Beacon tracking system.   

 

 

The battery lasts up to 1,905 days. 

 

 

 

Based on British craftsmen’s know-how bbb.B applies the original umbrella-making technology (developed and tested for over 150 years) and enhances it with nickel frame and strengthened iron ribs to ensure you are prepared for the worst weather. 

 

 

Windproof frame study

 

Solid and resilient steel nickel frame

 

Wind tunnel test

 

20m/s(44.74mph)

 

 

bbb.B is customizable and can be disassembled down to handle, canopy and tip. It not only offers you the option to personalise your bbb.B experience but also improves the umbrella's natural lifespan. The modular nature of bbb.B allows you to replace parts rather than discarding the whole brolly. 

 

 

Once our Kickstarter orders have been fulfilled we’ll be offering spare parts online, via our e-commerce store.

 

 

From the start of the production to the final ironing, all of our umbrellas are 90% handmade by trained craftsmen who pour their soul into each and every unit they make.

 

 

 

No matter how good the waterproof coating is, the wear & tear cannot be avoided. Worry not though, bbb.B offers more advanced waterproofing than other umbrellas in the market due to its fabric.  

Our fabric is made of 75 strands of polyester tied together in a single thread. It has more than 30% higher density compared to other umbrellas available on the market, with the same 75T fabric.

Did you know that you can use bbb.B for sun protection too? The effect may differ between the colours but you can expect UV blocking of anything between 90% (Urban Classic Black) to 60% (Urban Classic Light Gray). 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Your brolly’s unique product number is laser-engraved for effective post-purchase care. It works as your warranty and ensures custom-tailored service in the future. 

 

 

 

 

 bbb.B has a total length of 91cm (36") and its diameter when opened is 110cm (43").

Canopies : Four colours(Light gray, Apricot, Black, Deep Green) are available. 

Handle : Aluminum, PolyCarbonate 

Strap : Italy Full Grain Leather

Weight : Approximately 800 grams (28.21 ounces)

 

 

 

 

 

bbb.B features silicone runner handle which lets you safely unfasten & fix the umbrella's safety latch.  

 

 

 

 

Add your own personality with bbb.B’s luxurious FG leather stripe which wraps itself gently around your wrist - extra chrome coating was applied to protect it against rainwater and any other potential contamination.

 

 

For myself, and for the beloved ones, the product as is. We package and deliver with sincerity for the people waiting for bbb.B.

 

 

Inside package

an expected shape

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We were extremely lucky to be featured by many great partners, in a number of outstanding publications. If you want to see more, please scroll down to the bottom of this page. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Did you know that Sheffield, England, is a birthplace of the modern umbrella? That's where we come from. bbb.B is a combination of the essential structure of an umbrella (in use for over 150 years!) and a modern outtake on the umbrella's ribs - a combination bound to bring you a maximized performance.   

 

Take a little trip down our memory lane and see our very first designs of what you now know as Baobab Brolly.  

 

 

 

 

Did you know? We're aiming to send at least 1,060 units before Christmas! Be one of the first ones to pledge & receive your brolly before anybody else does!  

 

 

 

 

 

Clef Innovation was set up in England on August 2015, after our first ever brolly was invented. Up until today, we've spent approximately 12 000 hours working together, travelled about 45 000 km (across 10 different countries) gathering a talented team and establishing wonderful partnerships. We have umbrella-making mentors from around the globe (Great Britain, United States, Japan, Korea, China, Taiwan) and a design team that lives & breaths their work, trying to make each and every brolly a little work of art. We believe that our team has everything that it takes to make it the last umbrella you'll ever buy. 

 

Our legal & administrative teams are based in London and Seoul monitoring each and every aspect of our campaign daily to ensure smooth running and timely execution. We're a customer-oriented business & if a complaint is to go three days without being acknowledged (after the funding has been completed - running a campaign like this can be overwhelming at times!) our CEO will become personally involved in the complaint handling. We'll do our best to communicate with our backers frequently, and keep them updated during each stage of the campaign, as well as in the post-funding process. We see your pledge as a credit of trust and we take the communication process very seriously. 

 

We are London, New York, Seoul & Tokyo based doing our best to bring you a product that meets & exceeds your expectations. Kickstarter is just the beginning of our journey and we aim to make it as interactive as possible. We'll unravel stretch goals and other investment opportunities as we go.

We'd also like to take this moment to send loads of love to our good friends, our partners and subscribers who appreciated our talent and passion enough to become a part of this journey. Thank you to you, dear potential backer - we really appreciate your interest and if you could spare us a minute to share this campaign with your friends & family, we'd be extremely grateful.

For all the rainy days to come, we spread the bbb.B love!

 

 

 

 

 

 

bbb.B is an abbreviation for Baobab Brolly,  which is a compound word that combines the strong baobab trees, also known as the world tree, and brolly, an archaic term of English umbrellas, which is the beginning of modern umbrellas. bbb.B began with a commitment to sustainability and diversity. bbb.B embraces the durability of baobab trees, symbolized by the tree of life, and also the benefits it provides the nature and humans. The aesthetic originality and technology that was utilized in making bbb.B were based on the 300 years of know-how and traditional technology of England, the birthplace for modern umbrellas. 

bbb.B is a brand that does not limit the value of umbrella as only a tool to block the sunshine and rain, but it is a brand that creates new values that embrace the environment and the culture to protect you and your loved ones for a long time.

bbb.B is a brand that offers new experiences and inspiration to customers around the world with diverse cultures through umbrella. bbb.B thinks about sustainable circulation structure during the process of making and using products and creates new value that embraces fashion and IT, environment, and culture. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

*bbb.B Full Version Video

*bbb.B Making Video (behind the scene)

*bbb.B Wind tunnel Video

 

* bbb.B Press Kit (Google Drive)

 

Risks and challenges

Up to date, we created 7 prototypes of bbb.B & we're excited to offer you its newest, best version yet. Before going into mass production, we received official certification after undergoing various tests such as waterproof/vibration proof/KC & held patents for a long period of time. Based on the results of this funding, we are aiming to deliver an upgraded quality of the model presented on this page (The design will not change.). 

No matter well prepared we come to the table, there are always some risks involved. Unexpectedly, there may be a supply chain problem caused by damage to the machine or tool. Global shipping will be consigned to experts, but there may be delivery issues related to weather or warehousing. 

But what we can be sure of is that no matter what happens, we're going to transparently disclose the whole process to you who believe and funded us, and we're going to get the news out as quickly as possible. 

If you would like to support us press the support button now to become a member of the bbb.B family. 

Thank you!
story_txt:
Have you ever caught yourself buying a cheap umbrella thinking that it will break or get lost eventually and so there is no point investing in its quality? Or maybe you bought the one, then only just to leave it on a bus or in a restaurant?            Baobab brolly is a modern response to everything that is wrong with the current market offerings. Featuring loss prevention system & based on a modular system (letting you swap just the part you’re not happy with, as opposed to having to discard the whole brolly), it’s a sustainable solution for the world where everything else is smart.
 

Only the handles and straps can be customized for this release.
 
 


Unlike any other umbrella in the world, we have embedded loss alert smart technology into the handle which is connected to an app on your smartphone. No more worrying about which restaurant you left your umbrella at - you will not lose another umbrella because we made it that way.  

bbb.B’s smart handle features loss prevention system which will go off when the distance between your mobile and your brolly is greater than 15 steps. It will also let you locate your brolly on the map, thanks to the Beacon tracking system.   

 

 

The battery lasts up to 1,905 days. 
 
 

 

Based on British craftsmen’s know-how bbb.B applies the original umbrella-making technology (developed and tested for over 150 years) and enhances it with nickel frame and strengthened iron ribs to ensure you are prepared for the worst weather. 
 

 

Windproof frame study
 

Solid and resilient steel nickel frame
 

Wind tunnel test
 

20m/s(44.74mph)
 

 


bbb.B is customizable and can be disassembled down to handle, canopy and tip. It not only offers you the option to personalise your bbb.B experience but also improves the umbrella's natural lifespan. The modular nature of bbb.B allows you to replace parts rather than discarding the whole brolly. 
 

 
Once our Kickstarter orders have been fulfilled we’ll be offering spare parts online, via our e-commerce store.
 



 

From the start of the production to the final ironing, all of our umbrellas are 90% handmade by trained craftsmen who pour their soul into each and every unit they make.
 

 

 
No matter how good the waterproof coating is, the wear & tear cannot be avoided. Worry not though, bbb.B offers more advanced waterproofing than other umbrellas in the market due to its fabric.  

Our fabric is made of 75 strands of polyester tied together in a single thread. It has more than 30% higher density compared to other umbrellas available on the market, with the same 75T fabric.
Did you know that you can use bbb.B for sun protection too? The effect may differ between the colours but you can expect UV blocking of anything between 90% (Urban Classic Black) to 60% (Urban Classic Light Gray). 
 

 

 
 

 

 
Your brolly’s unique product number is laser-engraved for effective post-purchase care. It works as your warranty and ensures custom-tailored service in the future. 
 

 
 

 
 bbb.B has a total length of 91cm (36") and its diameter when opened is 110cm (43").
Canopies : Four colours(Light gray, Apricot, Black, Deep Green) are available. 
Handle : Aluminum, PolyCarbonate 
Strap : Italy Full Grain Leather
Weight : Approximately 800 grams (28.21 ounces)
 

 

 
 

 
bbb.B features silicone runner handle which lets you safely unfasten & fix the umbrella's safety latch.  
 

 
 

 

Add your own personality with bbb.B’s luxurious FG leather stripe which wraps itself gently around your wrist - extra chrome coating was applied to protect it against rainwater and any other potential contamination.
 

 

For myself, and for the beloved ones, the product as is. We package and deliver with sincerity for the people waiting for bbb.B.
 
 
Inside package

an expected shape
 
 

 

 

 
 

 
We were extremely lucky to be featured by many great partners, in a number of outstanding publications. If you want to see more, please scroll down to the bottom of this page. 
 
 

 

 
 

 

Did you know that Sheffield, England, is a birthplace of the modern umbrella? That's where we come from. bbb.B is a combination of the essential structure of an umbrella (in use for over 150 years!) and a modern outtake on the umbrella's ribs - a combination bound to bring you a maximized performance.   
 

Take a little trip down our memory lane and see our very first designs of what you now know as Baobab Brolly.  
 

 
 

 

Did you know? We're aiming to send at least 1,060 units before Christmas! Be one of the first ones to pledge & receive your brolly before anybody else does!  
 
 

 
 

 

Clef Innovation was set up in England on August 2015, after our first ever brolly was invented. Up until today, we've spent approximately 12 000 hours working together, travelled about 45 000 km (across 10 different countries) gathering a talented team and establishing wonderful partnerships. We have umbrella-making mentors from around the globe (Great Britain, United States, Japan, Korea, China, Taiwan) and a design team that lives & breaths their work, trying to make each and every brolly a little work of art. We believe that our team has everything that it takes to make it the last umbrella you'll ever buy. 
 

Our legal & administrative teams are based in London and Seoul monitoring each and every aspect of our campaign daily to ensure smooth running and timely execution. We're a customer-oriented business & if a complaint is to go three days without being acknowledged (after the funding has been completed - running a campaign like this can be overwhelming at times!) our CEO will become personally involved in the complaint handling. We'll do our best to communicate with our backers frequently, and keep them updated during each stage of the campaign, as well as in the post-funding process. We see your pledge as a credit of trust and we take the communication process very seriously. 
 

We are London, New York, Seoul & Tokyo based doing our best to bring you a product that meets & exceeds your expectations. Kickstarter is just the beginning of our journey and we aim to make it as interactive as possible. We'll unravel stretch goals and other investment opportunities as we go.
We'd also like to take this moment to send loads of love to our good friends, our partners and subscribers who appreciated our talent and passion enough to become a part of this journey. Thank you to you, dear potential backer - we really appreciate your interest and if you could spare us a minute to share this campaign with your friends & family, we'd be extremely grateful.
For all the rainy days to come, we spread the bbb.B love!

*bbb.B Making Video (behind the scene)

*bbb.B Wind tunnel Video

 
* bbb.B Press Kit (Google Drive)
 
Risks and challenges
Up to date, we created 7 prototypes of bbb.B & we're excited to offer you its newest, best version yet. Before going into mass production, we received official certification after undergoing various tests such as waterproof/vibration proof/KC & held patents for a long period of time. Based on the results of this funding, we are aiming to deliver an upgraded quality of the model presented on this page (The design will not change.).

story: Design on the C2 Advanced is updated. For more information please visit https://focx.store
story_txt: Design on the C2 Advanced is updated. For more information please visit https://focx.store

story:
Drooled | 24Hourtime.Info | Gadget Flow | Watchuseek | Master Horologer | WatchBandit | BackerKit | Europa Star | Anthill Magazine | Design-Inspiration | Worn & Wound | Perfect Timepiece (Video Review) | The Gadgeteer

"The result of wearing the 24-hour dial and single hand is a dramatic shift in how time is perceived in relation to your day. You begin to view the day as an almost physical entity within which you exist and move. Soon the telling of time goes from when to where - your own movements reflected by the movements of the single hand revolving inside a wheel." - Man of Many

"Classically designed watches, with a big difference" - Hey Gents

"...a brand who’s giving traditional watches a run for their money" - The Style Guide

"Unique, stunning and with a completely new twist on how we view time, the Jacopo Dondi Collection breathes fresh air into the world of watches." - Jebiga Design & Lifestyle

 

For the past year, we have been working to create a unique, single-handed, 24-hour watch design, that looks and feels undoubtedly familiar, but completely changes our perception of time and how best we should use it.

It started with a simple idea, but we soon realised that the concept already existed. Not only did we find that it already existed, but it has been around for almost 700 years. It was actually the original way of telling the time.

A couple of weeks passed before we started to think that we were likely not alone in having never seen a 24-hour dial. We began asking around and speaking to people in the industry - including watchmakers - and sure enough, it was as new to them as it was to us. To this day, we've only met a handful of people that have come across the concept.

The brands that had attempted a 24-hour dial either lacked elegance or were charging an insane amount of money - keeping the concept hidden. So we set out to create a watch that exudes style and distinction at an affordable price, but with a genuinely unique concept.

 

Telling The Time

Telling the time on a 24-hour dial can be tricky to begin with. You are essentially learning how to tell the time all over again. The trickiness isn't because of something inherent to 24-hour dials but rather because of our conditioning to only use 12-hour dials.

Our dials display the time in 10-minute increments, but you can easily estimate the time to the nearest 5 minutes by simply focusing for a little longer. Sure, you could argue that 12-hour dials display the time more accurately, but when does it truly matter if it's 15:59 or 16:00, anyway? This is time displayed more naturally, not more accurately.

Psychology Of The Dial

Owning, wearing and even just seeing a 24-hour dial gives you an entirely different awareness of time itself. We also found that placing the midday point at the top of the dial - causing the hand to appear in the top half of the watch while you're going about your day - has an uplifting effect.

Once you start using a 24-hour dial, you soon become aware of the fact that it’s a much more natural way of visualizing where you are in your day.

Using The Watch As A Compass

As well as simply telling the time, you can also use your watch as a compass.

NORTHERN HEMISPHERE: Simply point the hand towards the position of the sun, and wherever the '24' marker is pointing, is North.

SOUTHERN HEMISPHERE: Simply point the '12' marker towards the position of the sun, and wherever the hand is pointing, is North.

It may come in handy one day!

It Just Makes Sense

The 24-hour dial just seems to make sense - one hand that passes each marker once a day.

It might not change the world, but it could change yours.

 

The early history of the clock - as a post-sundial concept - is not particularly well known. Historians do however agree that they were likely just devices that rang bells at regular intervals. So when Prince Ubertino de Carrara commissioned Jacopo de’Dondi to design and erect a public clock, with a face, in the Torre dei Signori of the Palazzo del Capitanio in Padua, the world would finally be able to visualise time.

The clock contained a 24-hour dial, with the hour hand rotating at half the speed of that that we consider to be normal today.

Sadly, the clock was destroyed by fire between 1390 and 1399, so there is only a replacement clock, which was built in 1423, standing in its place today; it is said to be a faithful copy of the original.

Image courtesy of Nicola Lovato @niclov

Jacopo's son would later go on to write the following about his own clock:

“...we desire nothing more from it than the uniform and equal motion of a wheel which shall complete its course in the space of a natural day, and such a wheel is called the horary sphere.”

The Phasing Out Of The 24-Hour Dial

Sometime around the early 1500's, the clockmakers of France and Germany had started to use the 12-hour dial. By the late 1500's the whole of Europe had changed to using this more ambiguous method. There's no obvious reason as to why the switch happened, but the 24-hour dial would be forgotten until the 20th century.

Radio amateurs, pilots and the military have adopted the concept in modern times, and you'd struggle to find anyone familiar with the design that doesn't have a military-style background or is exceptionally well-versed in horology.

We love the 24-hour dial, though and we want to make the design familiar once again!

 

 

Interchangeable Straps

If you would like to add another strap, then just add $25 AUD to your pledge, for each additional strap.

Swapping the straps around is easy. Simply use a small flat-headed screwdriver to release the spring in the strap and it comes right off. A quick release function may be added as a stretch goal.

 

Watch case: 316L stainless steel
Water resistant: 5 ATM, 50 meters
Glass: mineral glass
Hands: leaf-style, non-luminous
Strap width: 20mm
Wrist sizes suited: 150mm - 200mm
Dial size (diameter / thickness): 42mm / 8mm
Weight (with strap): 55g silicone, 46g leather
Movement: Swiss-made, Ronda 515.24h Quartz
Strap material: silicone / genuine leather
Available strap colours: black silicone / blue silicone / black leather / tan leather
Buckle: stainless steel pin buckle
Warranty: 2 years limited warranty against manufacturing defects

 

 

 

We are incredibly proud of our watches but please be aware that they are still pre-production models. This means that they could still be subject to minor changes. We have already made three improvements to our design since receiving our samples. Namely:

  • Upgraded from a Swiss-parts movement to a Swiss-made movement,
  • Increased water-resistance reliability by increasing the thickness of the case wall by 0.5 mm (barely noticeable to the naked eye), and
  • Reduced the size of the logo, so as that it doesn't detract from our classic styling.

No changes will occur that will drastically alter the overall look of the watch and any adjustments - minor or major - will always be an improvement. If any changes are made to the design, then our backers will be the first to know.

Reduced Logo Size

One thing that has come to our attention, since we received our prototypes, is that the branding on our dial is slightly too large.

We're happy to say that we will be going to production with a more subtle, spaced out logo.

 

Photoshop warning!

We know that you are ultimately buying into the concept, but it still has to be something that you're proud to wear - a watch is an incredibly personal item. We think you'll agree that the new look is a little more delicate, and not so "in your face."

A Second Round Of Prototyping

For everyone's peace of mind, another round of prototypes are currently being made and will be sent to us for approval in the next few weeks. We will send an update out with pictures of the new prototypes to all our backers, just to get some feedback but we're not expecting them to look that different to the current samples we have; it's just a process you have to go through when any changes are made to the design.

Why Haven't We Done This Already?

Prototyping can be an expensive process, so we were resisting the urge to arrange for new samples until we knew that we had a viable product.

 

 

 

Choose your pledge level and you'll receive a survey at the end of the campaign to specify the model(s) of your chosen watch(es).

Future Retail Prices: Silicone A$240 | Leather A$260

Can't Pledge The Full Amount For A Watch Right Now?

No worries! Just pledge what you can in the Good Karma reward section, and we will deduct this amount from your first purchase of a watch, once you are ready to buy one. Just let us know that you backed our campaign, by sending us an email and we will look back through our Indiegogo records, just to confirm the deduction.

 


 

Jake & Carmen

We are a young couple, living in sunny Perth, Australia. Born and raised on separate continents (Europe and Africa), we met in England while Carmen lived there, briefly, with her family. The family soon decided to move on to an entirely different continent (Australia) - this time taking Jake along for the ride. Australia is now home and has been for almost five years.

We've worked hard to gather the best people around us and now we need pre-orders to complete the puzzle. Even through the testing times, it's always remained an exciting project for us to be working on. Just to think of people wearing our watches is an incredible feeling.

Eugene Ho & Pacific Watchworks

Eugene is the owner of Pacific Watchworks and has almost 20 years of product development experience in the watch industry while working on brands such as Hugo Boss, Timberland, Tommy Hilfiger, Ecko and Reebok. Eugene grew up in Canada but has been living and working in his chosen industry in Hong Kong since 1997. Eugene has been pivotal in what we have been able to achieve so far and is already looking ahead and coming up with ways in which we can move the concept forward. It's because of Eugene that we have been able to bring onboard such high-quality craftspeople - people that make watches for Casio, Hugo Boss, and Bulova. For more information, please visit www.pacificwatchworks.com.

 

We welcome your feedback, so please feel free to send us a message, letting us know what you think and don't forget to leave a comment on our campaign if you back, or share our project on your socials - especially if you're fans of what we're doing but you aren't quite ready to back us financially; it will all help in the end!

 

Facebook: jacopodondiwatches

Instagram: @jacopodondi

Twitter: @JacopoDondi

The family soon decided to move on to an entirely different continent (Australia) - this time taking Jake along for the ride. Australia is now home and has been for almost five years.We've worked hard to gather the best people around us and now we need pre-orders to complete the puzzle. Even through the testing times, it's always remained an exciting project for us to be working on. Just to think of people wearing our watches is an incredible feeling.Eugene Ho & Pacific WatchworksEugene is the owner of Pacific Watchworks and has almost 20 years of product development experience in the watch industry while working on brands such as Hugo Boss, Timberland, Tommy Hilfiger, Ecko and Reebok. Eugene grew up in Canada but has been living and working in his chosen industry in Hong Kong since 1997. Eugene has been pivotal in what we have been able to achieve so far and is already looking ahead and coming up with ways in which we can move the concept forward. It's because of Eugene that we have been able to bring onboard such high-quality craftspeople - people that make watches for Casio, Hugo Boss, and Bulova. For more information, please visit www.pacificwatchworks.com. We welcome your feedback, so please feel free to send us a message, letting us know what you think and don't forget to leave a comment on our campaign if you back, or share our project on your socials - especially if you're fans of what we're doing but you aren't quite ready to back us financially; it will all help in the end! Facebook: jacopodondiwatchesInstagram: @jacopodondiTwitter: @JacopoDondi

story:
Short Summary

We are a startup, dedicated to agile web & mobile  development and cutting edge Internet of Things applications. We believe in continuous learning and lifelong partnerships. For the past 6 months we've been working on Snipy, a smart gadget that watches over your postbox and personal space. Anytime post arrives or movement is detected, you get a notification on your smartphone.

 

What We Need & What You Get

After an extensive Research and Development phase, we still need $45.000 to bring Snipy to life. For starters, we need to order components in bulk quantities.

We value your contribution and for the limited time of this campaign, we offer you Snipy at a special price. Early backers will be rewarded with large discounts.

 

The Impact

We aspire to bring you a novel solution to a century old problem: getting important mail as soon as possible.

There are many other use cases for Snipy, many of which we probably didn't even think of. We leave this task to you, our esteemed contributor.

 

 

Product features

Free online account for managing notifications

Create a free account on www.snipy.io and manage your notifications. You can set up smartphone and e-mail notifications in just a few clicks. You can assign as many Snipy devices as you like to a single account. The online account keeps an archive of all your notifications, providing you metrics for a wide range of real-life use-cases.

Battery level warnings

You can set up a low battery warning threshold from 5% to 20% battery life. Depending on the location of your Snipy, you may need an early warning to be able to schedule a battery swap.  There is also a critical battery warning notification when Snipy hits 2% of battery life.  

Status LED light

The status LED indicates the different operating modes. It gives you a subtle blink when Snipy is triggered.

Easy device configuration

All you need is a smartphone with a browser and  just a couple of minutes of your time. The configuration is intuitive and self-explanatory. Anyone can set it up, regardless of skill and age.

 

Specifications

Snipy WIFI: 

  • Motion sensor
  • Logic board w. microcontroller unit
  • WIFI network communications
  • Ergonomic case with premium matte finish
  • Trigger LED
  • Free online account
  • 3+ months battery life

Snipy WIFI + GSM:

  • Motion sensor
  • Logic board w. microcontroller unit
  • WIFI communications
  • GSM (2G network) communications
  • Ergonomic case with premium matte finish
  • Trigger LED
  • Free online account
  • 3+ months battery life

 

Risks & Challenges

We have the ambition to bring the most talented people together and help them be creative. We take risks and face tough challenges every day. One of the risks of this project is the R&D effort we already invested. If we don't get enough pledges, we might lose the opportunity to order components in bulk and this might drive up Snipy's price. We want people to enjoy the comfort and ease Snipy can provide at a reasonable price. For this, we need your support by pledging.

 

The team

Our team is an international one, each member having his own contribution to the creation of Snipy:

Andrei MATYAS 

Founder and initiator of the Snipy idea, Andrei has extensive JAVA and WEB tehnologies experience. He has been working as a software developer in Paris since 2005.

 

Örs DARABONT

Örs is an aspiring telecommunications engineer with a strong focus on Internet of Things and Internet of Everything. He blends his humanities background with a strong analytical and technical thinking to drive innovation forward.

 

Szilveszter ZSIGMOND

Szilveszter brings his excellent web developer chops to implement the online service side of Snipy. He has many years of experience with WEB technologies and frameworks. He is also familiar with the networking infrastructure side of the World Wide Web.

 

Zsolt MÁTHÉ

Zsolt is the CTO of our startup. He has vast knowledge of Agile methodologies, software programming and management. He works in Paris since 2006, complementing our team with insightful financial and commercial feedback.

 

László SOÓS

László brings together all our resources and focuses our individual efforts. He has great financial and management skills and ideas that have a major impact on Snipy's success.

 

Timeline

We invested a lot in R&D and got through a lot of technical obstacles, but finally our perseverance payed off. This is how we got to the Indiegogo campaign stage. We plan to continue in the same manner we got here, with a lot of hard work, perseverance and dedication. This is our timeline, so far:

story:
Arabic Name Pendant

Silver Plated 18k Yellow Gold 

18 Inch Rope Chain

"Asifa" in Arabic 

 

Who We Are?

My name is Usama Zaid (IG: @ap_zaid) and I’m the founder of Pendalz! Let me introduce you to our essential team members.  Laiba Zaid (IG: @bodmonzaid) and Asifa Zaid (IG: @bodmonlikes) are our marketing managers. Uzair Zaid(IG: @uzairuz) is our creative director and jewelry designer. Asad Nasir is a 5th generation jeweler that specializes in wholesale gold and custom diamonds (IG: @asadsdiamonds) ! He manages our entire manufacturing process. Sana Hussain (IG: @sana.hussainn) is our product model!

 

English Name Pendant

Silver Plated 18k White Gold + Diamond

Bead Chain

"Asifa" in English

 

Why We Started?

I always wished there was a way to create personalized jewelry made of precious metals and gemstones which could represent me as an individual. It would either be impossible to find a place, be very inconvenient and slow or it would cost a fortune to bring together all these elements into one piece of jewelry. For example, my family special ordered my sisters name which was hand-carved solid gold and took 6-8 weeks before we received it! It has its flaws because it was hand made. Sadly, because it was a custom piece it was non refundable and we were not able to view the flawed design before hand. That being said we have been quietly working on a project with one of the largest wholesalers of gold, silver and diamond jewelry in Canada. We are about to launch a custom name pendant project. This will be a certified website that will allow you to submit orders for your name in any language and we will have it made for you in perfection through a state of the art 3D printing system followed by finishing touches by hand in our workshop. Our basic model will be 925 silver, plated with white/yellow 18 karat gold and will come with a chain made in equivalent metals. We will also have custom name pendant in solid gold (10k/14k/18k/22k) with real diamonds as well as any precious stones you may desire. Our goal is to provide you with extravagant statement pieces for an affordable rate and in a timely fashion.

 

Name Earrings 

Silver Plated 18k Yellow Gold

"Zaid" in Arabic

 

 

What will this campaign achieve?

This campaign is there to show you that luxury custom jewelry doesn’t have to be a difficult process and can be affordable at the same time. Contributors to this campaign will help us create the website we need get this product out to the world and buy larger amounts of luxury material. Larger stock of raw materials will mean a lower price point for our customers!

 

Arabic Name Pendant

Silver Plated 18k White Gold

16 & 18 Inch Bead Chain

"Laiba" in Arabic

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are trying to raise $5000 USD through sales
    • The money will go towards a website, raw luxury material, jewelry manufacturing employees and designers
    • Buying raw material in bulk will allow us to further reduce our cost and provide a more affordable product
  • You will get a custom name pendant, bracelet, or earrings when you purchase from our page here at Indiegogo
  • The product should arrive to you within a month!
  • If we don’t reach our goal of $4000 USD, we will still carry on by creating our unique products and a website at a slower pace

 

Name Pendant with Diamond

Silver Plated 18k Yellow Gold + Genuine Diamond

Bead Chain 

"Laiba" in English

 

The Impact

  • Support us and take the hassle out of custom jewelry
  • Name pendants, earrings and bracelets are just the few things we are launching with, but we have many other creative ideas when it comes to jewelry. The success of this campaign will allow us to create and show the world what we can do with custom jewelry made specifically for you!

 

Arabic Name Pendant

Silver Plated 18k Yellow Gold

16 Inch Rope chain 

"Asifa" in Arabic

How long is the process to craft a custom piece?

Design = 2 hours

Wax Mold = 1 day

Casting Precious Metal = 1 day

Plating/Polishing/Finishing = 2 days

 

Where is our jewelry manufactured?

Designed and Manufactured in Toronto, Canada

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please ask you friends and family to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • You can share our campaign on social media by clicking the share option available
  • Your support and love is priceless!

Sincerely the Zaid Family :)

story:
Introducing GIOVARE™  

After a year of development, we are finally ready to present to you our best product yet... 

The Premium Everyday Clutch, made with High Quality Genuine Italian Nappa-Leather,Splash-Proof, Not Easily Scratched and giving you more protection with RFID Blocking Materials. It's designed to satisfy the needs of a diverse range of lifestyles and professions.

 

As RFID radio transmission technology is becoming increasingly widespread in passports, credit cards, debit cards, identity cards, key cards, and access control cards, the risks of “electronic pick-pocketing” (identity and personal data theft, payment fraud, and unintentional contactless payment) are on the rise. We've designed this wallet with a special lining to help protect the Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) chips in your credit and debit cards from unwarranted scanning.

 

 

The ultimate in simple and convenient design. Keep your everyday small essentials in one place, safe and snug. Fit your life into a single pocket. 

Dimensions 

 - 22cm x 11cm x 2cm 

 - Removable Wrist Strap : 18cm 

 Details 

 - Premium Quality Nappa Leather 

 - Genuine YKK Japan Zippers 

 - Up to 5.7" Phone Pocket ( iPhone 7s, iPhone 7, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6, Samsung S7, Etc. ) 

 - Sections for Passport, Pens, Stylus, Cards, Cords, Earphone, Keys, Tickets & Bills 

 - RFID Blocking Material

 

 

Versatility clutch thoughtfully designed to take you through daytime and nights out. It's fashionable and practical.  

Dimensions

- 27.5cm x 21cm x 2.7cm  

- Removable Wrist Strap : 18cm  

Details  

- Premium Quality Nappa Leather  

- Genuine YKK Japan Zippers  

- Up to 5.7" Phone Pocket & 10.1" Tablet ( iPad Pro 9.7, iPad Air 2, iPad 4, iPad 3, iPad Mini 4, Galaxy Tab S2, Etc. )  

- Magnetic or Stainless Button Closure  

- Sections for Passport, Pens, Stylus, Cards, Cords, Earphone, Watches, Notebook, Powerbank, Wifi Adaptor, Keys, Tickets & Bills  

- RFID Blocking Material

 
 

Professional and compact clutch pro. It designed to hold everything you need.  

Dimensions  

- 34cm x 25.5cm x 4cm  

- Removable Wrist Strap : 18cm  

- Removable & Adjustable Shoulder Strap : 103cm to 123cm  

Details  

- Premium Quality Nappa Leather  

- Genuine YKK Japan Zippers  

- Up to 5.7" Phone Pocket, 13.3" Laptop & Tablet ( MacBook Air 13.3", Macbook Pro 13.3", Macbook Air 11.6", Surface Book, Surface Pro 4, iPad Pro 12.9", iPad Pro 9.7", Galaxy S Tab 10.5", Etc. )  

- Magnetic or Stainless Button Closure  

- Sections for Passport, Pen, Stylus, Cards, Cords, Earphone, Watches, Notebook, Powerbank, Wifi Adaptor, Sunglasses, Keys, Tickets & Bills  

- RFID Blocking Material

 

 

Most importantly, we both personally take 100% responsibility for ensuring that our backers, products are fulfilled and their expectations are exceeded.​

 

 

 

 

With our working experience in a manufacturing company focused on the supply chain, we've researched for a year and create many prototypes to ensure the best quality of product, also to manufacture the fashion product with the level of international standards and creating the culture in GIOVARE™

and Now we are CONFIDENT to launching on Indiegogo get funding and spreading this good news ..

story:
Our Vision

These limited-edition enamel lapel pins are wearable statements to help cope with the current toxic political environment; pieces to express hope and strength. Pins from reSISTERS are pretty and meaningful things to wear, and maybe even a new way to break the ice and connect with like-minded strangers! 

In addition to providing people with beautiful trinkets to express their beliefs, this project is a creative outlet for us to stay positive, motivated, and engaged. The proceeds from each sale will be donated to support an important and timely social cause through reputable organizations that are advocating for and protecting marginalized groups. 

Who are reSISTERS?

We're two friends (Tameeka & Rachel) who live in New York City. We met about a decade ago at work. Between us, our professional lives have spanned design, sales, marketing, and management. We're ladies that get things done, and this time we're using our skills to guide a passion project.

If you back our project, you're a reSISTER too! 

Our Plan

We are crowdfunding for our initial start-up costs of $2,200. If we meet our goal, the money raised will be used to manufacture most, if not all of the designs you see here. We are also working on more designs for which we will fund production with our initial sales. In addition to producing the pins, money raised will go towards packaging, promotion, and of course, donations to social causes that need the support now more than ever. 

This campaign is to fund production and get things stared. Once the designs are produced, we will sell the pins online. All proceeds from these sales will be donated. 

Potential Challenges

We will have to order minimum quantities for each design. If we are unable to fund all of the minimums up front, we may not be able to produce all of the designs right away. We may need to follow a scaled approach where we sell a few preliminary designs to fund more designs. We also will need to invest time in promotion, through social media, and with our contacts in various influential communities to generate interest. 

In the event that we reach only 25% of our goal by the end of our campaign, we will donate the all funds to the social causes we have selected for this project; this includes Planned Parenthood, ACLU,The TREVOR PROJECT, SPLC, etc. If we reach only 50% of our goal we will still produce the Exclusive Normalize Empathy Teal Pin for our backers who donated $20 or more. Any leftover funds will be donated. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Tell everyone you know about our campaign! 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Promote us on social medial! Follow and share our posts on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/re.sisters/

We may need to follow a scaled approach where we sell a few preliminary designs to fund more designs. We also will need to invest time in promotion, through social media, and with our contacts in various influential communities to generate interest. 
In the event that we reach only 25% of our goal by the end of our campaign, we will donate the all funds to the social causes we have selected for this project; this includes Planned Parenthood, ACLU,The TREVOR PROJECT, SPLC, etc. If we reach only 50% of our goal we will still produce the Exclusive Normalize Empathy Teal Pin for our backers who donated $20 or more. Any leftover funds will be donated. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell everyone you know about our campaign! 
Use the Indiegogo share tools!
Promote us on social medial! Follow and share our posts on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/re.sisters/

story:
Sepehr Maghsoudi is a Dutch fashion designer with a Persian background. His vibrant personality and enthusiasm for craftsmanship and experimentation are visible in his collections.

In 2008 Sepehr started his own brand in Paris. All of the 14 collections he made over these last 7 years have gained international recognition. To be attending the Paris Couture week is a huge opportunity to take his innovative 15th collection out of the Netherlands.

 

Support Sepehr to present his next collection in Paris! 

“From 2014 on there have been calls from different countries to come over and present my collection abroad. It is my wildest dream to do so, but I need your support to help me make this dream come true.” 

“Fashion-art is my fate and destiny and my ambition has always been to conquer the world with my designs. After being invited to participate in New York, Vancouver and LA fashion weeks, I have had my sights set on global expansion, and Paris speaks to me as a couturier.” 

“Currently I am designing my 15th collection. Being eager to spread my wings I have decided to present this collection during the Paris Couture Week, on the 24th of January 2017. The presentation will be at 121 rue de Lille, 75007 Paris”

 

Join Sepehr and be part of this experience! 

To achieve this courageous goal Sepehr Maghsoudi is hosting a campaign to raise the money for his participation in the Paris couture week. 

 

Through this campaign we want to raise €26.000 

The money will go towards the ‘Paris Project’ in order to set up the show in Paris. This full set-up, consisting of models, location, catering, light, seating, travelling and accommodation for 35 + people, is expected to cost €26.000 

Contributors to the current campaign will receive various gifts depending upon their donation, from an original designer T-shirts and seat at the Paris show to an original handmade design for men or women by Sepehr Maghsoudi . 

With this show we also want to give a stage for upcoming artists to make this an experience through film and music.

Companies that want to support this project with their products or services are more than welcome. Please contact: sepehrmaghsoudi@gmail.com for information about our favours and services in return. 

This crowdfunding campaign provides a way for everyone to get involved through donations, large and small, to contribute to the next phase in the international expansion of Sepehr Maghsoudi as a couturier. 

We welcome everyone who wants to participate in this project.

 

Short biography of Sepehr Maghsoudi 

Sepehr Maghsoudi, Dutch fashion designer with a Persian background, is known for his exclusive, innovative and constructive designs. He is a two-times winner of the Edgar Vos Couture price, was awarded Fashion Designer of the Year 2012 and his couture designs were on show in the Westfries Museum in Hoorn, the Netherlands. 

Sepehr designed for famous people like Armin van Buuren and made a scarf for Queen Maxima of the Netherlands. He styled big artists like Eva Simons, Ferry Corsten, Kate Ryan and Maan, winner of The Voice of Holland 2016, who used his designs in their video clips and on their CD covers. 

Sepehr Maghsoudi also designed for Just Dance, nr 1 Ubisoft game for Nintendo Wii, for an episode of MTV’s “My Super Sweet Sixteen” and participated in “Project Catwalk” and “The Face”. 

Sepehr created costumes for the Dutch movies “Heksen bestaan niet” and “Fashion Chicks”. 

His work has been published worldwide in Vogue Italy, Elle, Esquire, Razor Red, Zink Magazine and many more.

 

The eyes of the world are on Sepehr Maghsoudi

Shortly after presenting his 11th collection “Talking with Silence” in July 2014, Sepehr was nominated for the Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week New York. The comments of the jury were full of praise: 

''Sepehr Maghsoudi is an impressive designer and this Brand fits perfectly with our theme of Artistically inspired fashion designers from around the world. We checked his work on his website as you recommended http://sepehrmaghsoudi.com/ and are very impressed by his creative, innovative craftsmanship. We also investigated his work on his latest fashion shows, reviews in the press and on social media and are pleased. We are therefore delighted to be able to allow this brand to Mercedes Benz New York''. 

And what’s more: some weeks later there was breaking news from the International Designer Coordinator Vancouver Fashion Week: 

'' I am writing to you because our team, after having carefully studied your fabulous collections and great talent, decided to select you as a designer candidate for our next fall/winter season, which will be organized from March 16th to the 22nd 2015. 

We really want to compliment you for your talent and creativity, that you express through the beautiful art of fashion design. Especially, I really like the way you are able to combine simplicity, elegance and research of fabric.'' 

Whereas recently, the management of Style Fashion Week invited him to come to Los Angeles: 

“Love your style and design aesthetic. It has originality which sets you apart.” 

… just imagine what Sepehr may achieve with your support!

story:
Our Story

Launching THE Perfect Pencil Skirt debut collection, WRITTEN Apparel aims to embrace the classic pencil skirt style and silhouette while elevating the design through high quality sewing, unique luxury fabrics, and attention to detail. In addition, we are going to put Iowa on the fashion map by staying true to the core values of authenticity, quality, beauty, originality, and innovation that we are grounded upon.

We will take the industry by storm with our selling model by offering more frequent collections. This means that you are going to be able to see what you can buy RIGHT NOW and wear our trend-aligned pencil skirts as they arise.

The "Re-Writing the Pencil Skirt" campaign has been created to provide WRITTEN Apparel with the resources to produce and market the debut collection. We are going to rewrite the script in the fashion industry by launching a high quality women's clothing label from Iowa and paving a way for other designers in the state to recognize that they can do it too.

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking a $25,000 funding goal and orders for the debut collection. Funding raised will be used as seed capital for the domestic (Made in the USA) production of the debut collection. Production costs include all of the beautiful fabrics we've selected, high quality trims/notions, and branding elements.  We will use any remaining funds to market the brand (retail partnerships and e-commerce), development of the sophomore collection, and related travel. Any orders placed through the campaign will help us validate and ensure that we are creating the very best pencil skirt in the market. 

For this campaign we are offering several amazing rewards for our supporters; these include significant discounts on the debut collection pencil skirts, a special edition pencil skirt created only for campaign contributors, custom pencil skirt vouchers, style guides, fashion illustrations of the collection, and one-on-one style sessions with WRITTEN Founder, Emily Carlson.

We hope that you will recognize our passion for the success of the WRITTEN brand, however, if we do not reach our funding goal, we will prioritize the use of funds raised towards the production of the debut collection and scale back our marketing and travel costs accordingly.


The Skirts

Astrid

Inspired by spring blooms and vintage vibes – the bold, floral print and Spring pastels can be worn dressed up with a crop top and heels, or dressed down with sneakers and a t-shirt. The barely sheer knit has just enough stretch for comfort and shape.

Material: 55% Nylon, 45% Cotton


Blanche

Textured with retro-styled details. Lined for comfort and versatility, this skirt can be worn from the office straight to happy hour. The contrasting waistband and covered buttons add the unique twist that is our signature.

Shell: 97% Polyester, 3% Elastene

Trim: 83% Polyester, 17% Metallic

Lining: 100% Polyester


Cleo

The sequins on this skirt were inspired by the glow of lightning bugs over a pond scattered with lily pads. This high waist silhouette lends itself to figure flattery; with sheer side panels that add just enough allure to be sensual. This look will dazzle just as well by candlelight or under the glimmer of a disco ball.

Shell: 100% Polyester

Lining: 96% Polyester, 4% Lycra


Size Chart

XS (Size 0-2) S (Size 4-6) M (Size 8-10) L (Size 12-14)
Waist 25-26 27-28 29-30 31.5-33
Hips 34.5-35.5 36.5-37.5 38.5-39.5 41.5-43



Why the Pencil Skirt? 

The pencil skirt has been a staple in beautiful women's wardrobes for decades; Its longevity in the market, while other styles have come and gone, is due to its figure-flattering silhouette and elegant sensuality. We will keep these characteristics true while elevating the pencil skirt by adding unique detailing and luxury fabrics that will become signature to the WRITTEN brand. By designing and developing only pencil skirts as a young brand, we are able to narrow our focus and specialize in doing it very well. This method allows for more organic growth into other products and markets in the future

WRITTEN Apparel aims to consistently deliver new and unique iterations of the pencil skirt while maintaining quality and production standards from collection to collection. The pencil skirt has always been a wardrobe staple for some women, but we want to show that it can be styled and worn just as easily as a pair of blue jeans to fit EVERY woman's lifestyle and story.


The Impact

When our Founder, Emily Carlson initially set out to pursue her dream of becoming a fashion designer for a respected and desired clothing brand, she knew it wouldn't be easy, but as she has navigated the roads of the fashion industry, she realized that she had gained knowledge and resources that could help others with the same dream. Since founding WRITTEN Apparel, Emily has not only designed unique and beautiful pencil skirts, but she has also become a role model for other young, Iowa women wanting to be a part of the fashion industry. Emily stays motivated knowing that she is not only pursuing her dream of being a fashion designer, but paving the way for others to do the same.
Supporting our campaign will help us show the world that regardless of where you live or work, it's possible to break into the fashion industry. Our success will be shared with our community - helping aspiring designers learn from our mistakes and challenges.

Risks & Challenges

We have selected a domestic production source that employs a talented group of production supervisors with decades of industry experience.  As we finalize the designs with our production partner, we will be very conscious of any adjustments and their impact to our launch timeline.  Design changes to improve quality and consistency have already occurred in our development process, and may occur in the future.  These improvements and refinements do cost us time.  We feel that our designs are very close to final, so any changes will be minimal at this point.

Regarding logistics, we are sourcing European fabrics for our debut collection.  We acknowledge that as a smaller player we are at the mercy of the mill’s production schedule.  We have already established a relationship with our current supplier’s domestic agent so things should progress smoothly.  Shipping has been handled by a common international carrier, but there is always inherent risk.

Funding the initial production run carries the most risk.  We will need to purchase the fabric and trims/notions in complete quantities as well as the production deposit.  This requires significant capital to move forward.

Not able to contribute monetarily? We Understand.

There are several other ways we would greatly appreciate your help and support in WRITTEN Apparel reaching their goal.

Simply share this campaign using the Indiegogo sharing tools provided. Social media is one of our key channels of marketing and by sharing, you can help us get the word out about our dream!

When you wear a WRITTEN Pencil Skirt, we promise you will be noticed! Your testimony to the brand is just as valuable to us in growing brand awareness.

As entrepreneurs, we are still working to find out what works or doesn't work. Have feedback for us? Send an email to emily@writtenapparel.com and let us know how we are doing!

story:
MATE Showroom is an online platform by which buyers and brands connect. We're essentially the "match maker" of the retail world. We work to streamline the task driven activities and provide quality and relevance within the wholesale process by vetting retailers and brands to find perfect MATEs.


"Being raised by two very fashionable parents, I naturally gained an interest in fashion. However, upon exiting college and being thrown out into the "real world" I quickly discovered that there wasn't much of a fashion Industry in my hometown of Detroit, MI, and to start my path in the industry I had to move. However, there was one HUGE problem, New York and LA were much too expensive for my budget. Therefore, I ventured south realizing yet again there wasn't much of a fashion industry there either, but why?

Each region of the US has their own style and esthetics so shouldn't there be some sort of fashion market specializing in product within a given region? Sure, there are regional trade shows, local shops, and boutiques but how exactly are these boutiques sourcing their product and what is it costing them to do so between paying travel and shipping fees?

Moreover, Trade Show cost increase consistently year over year, causing many independent brands not to attend, going unseen by prospective buyers. 

Thats where MATE comes in... We want MATE to be the go to source for finding brands that meet voids in our buyers assortment regardless of their location or budget."

-Nyiesha J. (Founder)


Fact 1: Tradeshows are a great way to meet with new and existing brands in the same place, but with the high cost and consumption of time many attendees are opting out. 

A survey of trade show attendees by the Center for Exhibition Industry Research (CEIR) concluded that inconvenient venues and high costs were by far the main reasons given by attendees for their decision not to attend shows. 60% of respondents stated that Location and Travel time were their reasons for not attending, while 43% listed cost. (Anderson, Hil. "Location, Cost Cited As Top Reasons For Not Attending." Trade Show Executive ::. N.p., 4 June 2014. Web. 07 Apr. 2016.)

Fact 2: There is a need in the market for more than technology

As technology evolves wholesalers are seeking out ways to utilize technology in their businesses. Although there is a need for technology to streamline processes the art of selling requires more than what computer data can generate. (Barr, Bobb. "What B2B Organizations Should Know About Personalization." 01/18/2016. N.p., n.d. Web. 07 Mar. 2016.)


MATE Showroom seeks to foster long lasting relationships between brands and retailers through detailed analysis and personalized selection within an online setting. 

Personal and Online? Kind of an oxymoron, right? 

Not Exactly, MATE will primarily operate online relieving brand partners of high monthly showroom cost, yet still maintaining a close client brand relationship. Hosting an online platform will simply streamline buying processes such as sample request, line sheets and ordering, allowing more time to spend on the fun stuff like establishing connections and product.  

So where exactly does the personal come in?

Each client will be partnered with an Account Manager who will then use their vetting skills to vet through brands to match them with potential retailers. 

The MATE team will regularly add to the partner database by consistently seeking out new qualified buyers and brands. There is no one size fits all, our team will seek out retailers that best fit the brand and vise versa. This is extremely exciting for Buyers being that this will eliminate misdirected solicitations. 

Many retailers lack the time to vet through new designers, and therefore rely on existing relationships, limiting emerging designers from making an impact in the market. Each Retailer will have the ability to create a profile that will be used to analyze their businesses. This information will then be used to match retailers with Brands that align specifically with the retailers needs. 

Due to limited experience and funds many new brands lack the reach to be able to connect with retailers and also lack knowledge in what information needs to be presented to retailers therefore disqualifying them before their line is even viewed. A MATE Rep will work with the brand to established their line within the market through Wholesale Sales Representation, Distribution planning, and Branding all within an online platform. 



Step 1: Tell us about your business

Create a profile to help our brand reps seek out product that best Fits your business needs.


Step 2: You've got a match!

Within 48 hours a brand rep will send you a personalized assortment to choose from.


Step 3: Request Samples

Receive samples of your selections within 5 days


Step 4: Place your order

Use our assortment planning tool to confirm you are purchasing in the right quantities. 


Your Contribution

So where exactly is your money going?

By raising $40,000 through Indiegogo, we will be able to accomplish the following:

* Develop the MATE Showroom Web App for Buyers and Brands to Utilize in their everyday businesses

* Marketing Initiatives: Marketing Events, Tradeshows, and Direct Mailings

* Develop high-quality MATE T-Shirts

Any additional contributions will go towards the development of the MATE Showroom IOS and Android App which will allow Brands and Reps Access on the go and Sales Rep On-boarding Equipment and Materials.

Check us out online: mateshowroom.com

Fact 1: Tradeshows are a great way to meet with new and existing brands in the same place, but with the high cost and consumption of time many attendees are opting out. 
A survey of trade show attendees by the Center for Exhibition Industry Research (CEIR) concluded that inconvenient venues and high costs were by far the main reasons given by attendees for their decision not to attend shows. 60% of respondents stated that Location and Travel time were their reasons for not attending, while 43% listed cost. (Anderson, Hil. "Location, Cost Cited As Top Reasons For Not Attending." Trade Show Executive ::. N.p., 4 June 2014. Web. 07 Apr. 2016.)
Fact 2: There is a need in the market for more than technology
As technology evolves wholesalers are seeking out ways to utilize technology in their businesses. Although there is a need for technology to streamline processes the art of selling requires more than what computer data can generate. (Barr, Bobb. "What B2B Organizations Should Know About Personalization." 01/18/2016. N.p., n.d. Web. 07 Mar. 2016.)
   
  
MATE Showroom seeks to foster long lasting relationships between brands and retailers through detailed analysis and personalized selection within an online setting. 
Personal and Online? Kind of an oxymoron, right? 
Not Exactly, MATE will primarily operate online relieving brand partners of high monthly showroom cost, yet still maintaining a close client brand relationship. Hosting an online platform will simply streamline buying processes such as sample request, line sheets and ordering, allowing more time to spend on the fun stuff like establishing connections and product.  
So where exactly does the personal come in?
Each client will be partnered with an Account Manager who will then use their vetting skills to vet through brands to match them with potential retailers. 
The MATE team will regularly add to the partner database by consistently seeking out new qualified buyers and brands. There is no one size fits all, our team will seek out retailers that best fit the brand and vise versa. This is extremely exciting for Buyers being that this will eliminate misdirected solicitations. 
Many retailers lack the time to vet through new designers, and therefore rely on existing relationships, limiting emerging designers from making an impact in the market. Each Retailer will have the ability to create a profile that will be used to analyze their businesses. This information will then be used to match retailers with Brands that align specifically with the retailers needs. 
Due to limited experience and funds many new brands lack the reach to be able to connect with retailers and also lack knowledge in what information needs to be presented to retailers therefore disqualifying them before their line is even viewed. A MATE Rep will work with the brand to established their line within the market through Wholesale Sales Representation, Distribution planning, and Branding all within an online platform. 
   
 
Step 1: Tell us about your businessCreate a profile to help our brand reps seek out product that best Fits your business needs.Step 2: You've got a match!Within 48 hours a brand rep will send you a personalized assortment to choose from.Step 3: Request SamplesReceive samples of your selections within 5 daysStep 4: Place your orderUse our assortment planning tool to confirm you are purchasing in the right quantities.
